2:23.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِى رَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِنَا فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِسُورَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣

2:24.text: فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وَقُودُهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِجَارَةُ‌ۖ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

2:25.text: وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۖ كُلَّمَا رُزِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َمَرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى رُزِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَأُتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُتَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّطَهَّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

2:26.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَسۡتَحۡى<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضۡرِبَ مَثَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا بَعُوضَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَا فَوۡقَهَا‌ۚ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَيَقُولُونَ مَاذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَادَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَثَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۘ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلُّ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَهۡدِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا يُضِلُّ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

2:27.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُضُونَ عَهۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

2:28.text: كَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَحۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

2:29.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَسَوَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٩

2:30.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى جَاعِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ خَلِيفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ فِيهَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُفۡسِدُ فِيهَا وَيَسۡفِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَنَحۡنُ نُسَبِّحُ بِحَمۡدِكَ وَنُقَدِّسُ لَكَ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

2:31.text: وَعَلَّمَ ءَادَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ كُلَّهَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ عَرَضَهُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ فَقَالَ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِــُٔونِى بِأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

2:32.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ لَا عِلۡمَ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمۡتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣٢

2:33.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ــَٔادَمُ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِئۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َأَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ غَيۡبَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُونَ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡتُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

2:34.text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَدَمَ فَسَجَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ أَبَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٤

2:35.text: وَقُلۡنَا يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ــَٔادَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡكُنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَزَوۡجُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَكُلَا مِنۡهَا رَغَدًا حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمَا وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

2:36.text: فَأَزَلَّهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ عَنۡهَا فَأَخۡرَجَهُمَا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانَا فِيهِ‌ۖ وَقُلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عٌ إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٦

2:37.text: فَتَلَقَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَادَمُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوَّابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣٧

2:38.text: قُلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى هُ<rule class=ikhafa>دًى</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

2:40.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡتُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُوفِ بِعَهۡدِكُمۡ وَإِيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡهَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٤٠

2:62.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِــِٔينَ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

2:63.text: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَكُمۡ وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورَ خُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِقُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

2:64.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَوَلَّيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ فَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

2:65.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِ فَقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قِرَدَةً خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٥

2:66.text: فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا نَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهَا وَمَا خَلۡفَهَا وَمَوۡعِظَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

2:67.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَأۡمُرُكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َذۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَقَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَتَتَّخِذُنَا هُزُ<rule class=ikhafa>وًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ أَعُوذُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

2:68.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنَا مَا هِىَ‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَقُولُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا بَقَرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا فَارِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا بِكۡرٌ عَوَا<rule class=iqlab>نُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا تُؤۡمَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

2:69.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنَا مَا لَوۡنُهَا‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَقُولُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا بَقَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َفۡر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَاقِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡنُهَا تَسُرُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٩

2:70.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ يُبَيّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنَا مَا هِىَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَقَرَ تَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهَ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

2:71.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَقُولُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا بَقَرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا ذَلُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُثِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَلَا تَسۡقِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡثَ مُسَلَّمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا شِيَةَ فِيهَا‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ جِئۡتَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ فَذَبَحُوهَا وَمَا كَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

2:72.text: وَإِذۡ قَتَلۡتُمۡ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ف</rule>َ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>دّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رٰٔۡتُمۡ فِيهَا‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مُخۡرِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡتُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

2:73.text: فَقُلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَا‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

2:74.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قَسَتۡ قُلُوبُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَهِىَ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِجَارَةِ أَوۡ أَشَدُّ قَسۡوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِجَارَةِ لَمَا يَتَفَجَّرُ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡهَا لَمَا يَشَّقَّقُ فَيَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡهَا لَمَا يَهۡبِطُ مِنۡ خَشۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

2:75.text: ۞أَفَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ كَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحَرِّفُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا عَقَلُوهُ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

2:76.text: وَإِذَا لَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَإِذَا خَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَتُحَدِّثُونَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا فَتَحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لِيُح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجُّوك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكُمۡ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

2:77.text: أَوَلَا يَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

2:78.text: وَمِنۡهُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِيُّونَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَانِىَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

2:79.text: فَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُبُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَقُولُونَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لِيَشۡتَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَتَبَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

2:106.text: ۞مَا نَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َخۡ مِنۡ ءَايَةٍ أَوۡ نُ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِهَا نَأۡتِ بِخَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ مِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٠٦

2:107.text: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١٠٧

2:108.text: أَمۡ تُرِيدُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡــَٔلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَسُولَكُمۡ كَمَا سُئِلَ مُوسَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَبَدَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَّ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ١٠٨

2:109.text: وَدَّ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَوۡ يَرُدُّونَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ كُفَّارًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡفَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٠٩

2:110.text: وَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدُوهُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١٠

2:111.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ‌ۗ تِلۡكَ أَمَانِيُّهُمۡ‌ۗ قُلۡ هَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١١

2:112.text: بَلَىٰ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٢

2:113.text: وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ لَيۡسَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ لَيۡسَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ‌ۗ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ مِثۡلَ قَوۡلِهِمۡ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فِيمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٣

2:114.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّنَعَ مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُذۡكَرَ فِيهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَسَعَىٰ فِى خَرَابِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَا كَانَ لَهُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا خ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفِينَ‌ۚ لَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا خِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٤

2:115.text: وَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡرِقُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡرِبُ‌ۚ فَأَيۡنَمَا تُوَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَثَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٥

2:116.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ بَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٦

2:117.text: بَدِيعُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَإِذَا قَضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَقُولُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نُ ١١٧

2:118.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ لَوۡلَا يُكَلِّمُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَوۡ تَأۡتِين<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّثۡلَ قَوۡلِهِمۡ‌ۘ تَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۗ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٨

2:119.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ بَشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تُسۡــَٔلُ عَنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١١٩

2:120.text: وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرۡضَىٰ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ حَتَّىٰ تَتَّبِعَ مِلَّتَهُمۡ‌ۗ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هُدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ‌ۗ وَلَئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ‌ۙ مَا لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١٢٠

2:121.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَتۡلُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَقَّ تِلَاوَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢١

2:122.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡتُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى فَضَّلۡتُكُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٢

2:123.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى نَفۡسٌ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلُ مِنۡهَا عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُهَا شَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٣

2:124.text: ۞وَإِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى جَاعِلُكَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ إِمَا<rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِى‌ۖ قَالَ لَا يَنَالُ عَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٤

2:125.text: وَإِذۡ جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡتَ مَثَابَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَأَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّقَامِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ مُصَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َهِّرَا بَيۡتِىَ لِلطّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِفِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّكَّعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٢٥

2:126.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مُ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَلَدًا ءَامِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡزُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> أَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ مِنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۖ قَالَ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَأُمَتِّعُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَضۡطَرُّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٢٦

2:127.text: وَإِذۡ يَرۡفَعُ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوَاعِدَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡتِ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلُ رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلۡ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٢٧

2:128.text: رَبَّنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنَا مُسۡلِمَيۡنِ لَكَ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡلِمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ وَأَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوَّابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٢٨

2:129.text: رَبَّنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثۡ فِيهِمۡ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكَ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٢٩

2:130.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡغَبُ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّلَّةِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َفِهَ نَفۡسَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٠

2:131.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَسۡلِمۡ‌ۖ قَالَ أَسۡلَمۡتُ لِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣١

2:132.text: وَوَصَّىٰ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مُ بَنِيهِ وَيَعۡقُوبُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَنِىَّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَىٰ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ فَلَا تَمُوتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَّا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٢

2:133.text: أَمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِذۡ حَضَرَ يَعۡقُوبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ إِذۡ قَالَ لِبَنِيهِ مَا تَعۡبُدُونَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِى قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَعۡبُدُ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَكَ وَإِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٣

2:134.text: تِلۡكَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ‌ۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تُسۡــَٔلُونَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٤

2:135.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ تَهۡتَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> قُلۡ بَلۡ مِلَّةَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٥

2:136.text: قُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡنَا وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡبَاطِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ مُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيُّونَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيۡنَ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٦

2:137.text: فَإِنۡ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمِثۡلِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَّإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هُمۡ فِى شِقَا<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَيَكۡفِيكَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٣٧

2:138.text: صِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٨

2:139.text: قُلۡ أَتُح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجُّونَنَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهُوَ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمۡ وَلَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ وَنَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُخۡلِص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٩

2:140.text: أَمۡ تَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِـ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـۧ</rule>مَ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡبَاطَ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُودًا أَوۡ نَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ‌ۗ قُلۡ ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َتَمَ شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةً عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٠

2:141.text: تِلۡكَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ‌ۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تُسۡــَٔلُونَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤١

2:142.text: ۞سَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّفَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ مَا وَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَتِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهَا‌ۚ قُل لِّلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡرِقُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡرِبُ‌ۚ يَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٤٢

2:143.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَيَكُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ شَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا لِنَعۡلَمَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبُ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيۡهِ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ لَكَبِيرَةً إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُضِيعَ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَرَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤٣

2:144.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَرَىٰ تَقَلُّبَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ فَلَنُوَلِّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ قِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرۡضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا‌ۚ فَوَلِّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَكَ شَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ‌ۚ وَحَيۡثُ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَوَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وُجُوهَكُمۡ شَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ لَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٤

2:145.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَتَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِكُلِّ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَتَكَ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِتَابِ<rule class=ikhafa>عٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَتَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا بَعۡضُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِتَابِ<rule class=ikhafa>عٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَةَ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٥

2:146.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ لَيَكۡتُمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٦

2:147.text: ٱلۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٧

2:148.text: وَلِكُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَةٌ هُوَ مُوَلِّيهَا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَبِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ أَيۡنَ مَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَأۡتِ بِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٤٨

2:149.text: وَمِنۡ حَيۡثُ خَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَ فَوَلِّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَكَ شَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَلۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٩

2:150.text: وَمِنۡ حَيۡثُ خَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَ فَوَلِّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَكَ شَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ‌ۚ وَحَيۡثُ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَوَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وُجُوهَكُمۡ شَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حُجَّةٌ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ فَلَا تَخۡشَوۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡشَوۡنِى وَلِأُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نِعۡمَتِى عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٠

2:151.text: كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيكُمۡ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَيُزَكِّيكُمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَيُعَلِّمُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَمۡ تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥١

2:152.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَذۡكُرۡكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِى وَلَا تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٥٢

2:153.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعِينُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٣

2:154.text: وَلَا تَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَلُ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='iqlab'>تُۢ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ أَحۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٤

2:155.text: وَلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوۡفِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُوعِ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>صٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۗ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٥

2:197.text: ٱلۡحَجُّ أَشۡهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡلُومَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرَضَ فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَجَّ فَلَا رَفَثَ وَلَا فُسُوقَ وَلَا جِدَالَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَجِّ‌ۗ وَمَا تَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَمۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ وَتَزَوَّدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ خَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُونِ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩٧

2:198.text: لَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَضۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۚ فَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَضۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَرَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡعَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُوهُ كَمَا هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٨

2:199.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَفِيضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَفَاضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٩٩

2:200.text: فَإِذَا قَضَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِكَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَذِكۡرِكُمۡ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ أَوۡ أَشَدَّ ذِكۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتِنَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ مِنۡ خَلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٢٠٠

2:203.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَيَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>م</rule>َّعۡدُود<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعَجَّلَ فِى يَوۡمَيۡنِ فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأَخَّرَ فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِثۡمَ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۚ لِمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَىٰ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٣

2:204.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعۡجِبُكَ قَوۡلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَيُشۡهِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ مَا فِى قَلۡبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَهُوَ أَلَدُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِص<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>مِ ٢٠٤

2:207.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡرِى نَفۡسَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَرۡضَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَءُو<rule class=iqlab>فُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٠٧

2:208.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّلۡمِ ك<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خُطُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٠٨

2:209.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َلَلۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٠٩

2:210.text: هَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى ظُلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَمَامِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَقُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ‌ۚ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢١٠

2:211.text: سَلۡ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ كَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢١١

2:212.text: زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَيَسۡخَرُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۘ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَرۡزُقُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ بِغَيۡرِ حِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢١٢

2:213.text: كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َبَعَثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِينَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مَعَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ فِيمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ‌ۚ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفَ فِيهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُوهُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بَغۡي<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۖ فَهَدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢١٣

2:214.text: أَمۡ حَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡتِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَلَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّسَّتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَأۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَزُلۡزِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَقُولَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَتَىٰ نَصۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ نَصۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٢١٤

2:215.text: يَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ مَاذَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ‌ۖ قُلۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ف</rule>َلِلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ‌ۗ وَمَا تَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢١٥

2:216.text: كُتِبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِتَالُ وَهُوَ كُرۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَعَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكۡرَهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَعَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُحِبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ شَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١٦
