2:220.text: فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۗ وَيَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ‌ۖ قُلۡ إِصۡلَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُخَالِطُوهُمۡ فَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِدَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصۡلِحِ‌ۚ وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَأَعۡنَتَكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٠

2:221.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ حَتَّىٰ يُؤۡمِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَلَأَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَةٌ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّشۡرِكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَتۡكُمۡ‌ۗ وَلَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ حَتَّىٰ يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَلَعَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنٌ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّشۡرِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكُمۡ‌ۗ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡفِرَةِ بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَيُبَيِّنُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢١

2:222.text: وَيَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَحِيضِ‌ۖ قُلۡ هُوَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ذًى</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَزِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَحِيضِ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هُرۡنَ‌ۖ فَإِذَا تَطَهَّرۡنَ فَأۡتُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَمَرَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحِبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>تَّوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بِينَ وَيُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَطَهِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢٢

2:223.text: نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ حَرۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ثٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَرۡثَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ شِئۡتُمۡ‌ۖ وَقَدِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُوهُ‌ۗ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢٣

2:224.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عُرۡضَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتُصۡلِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٤

2:225.text: لَّا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّغۡوِ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤَاخِذُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُورٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٥

2:226.text: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٦

2:227.text: وَإِنۡ عَزَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٧

2:228.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُطَلَّقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ يَتَرَبَّصۡنَ بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةَ قُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَحِلُّ لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡتُمۡنَ مَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡحَامِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يُؤۡمِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۚ وَبُعُولَتُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَحَقُّ بِرَدِّهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ إِنۡ أَرَاد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِثۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ‌ۚ وَلِلرِّجَالِ عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ دَرَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢٨

2:229.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُ مَرَّتَانِ‌ۖ فَإِمۡسَا<rule class=iqlab>كُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَعۡرُوفٍ أَوۡ تَسۡرِي<rule class=iqlab>حُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِإِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَحِلُّ لَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡخُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡتُمُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ شَيۡــًٔا إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخَاف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ فَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ أَلَّا يُقِيمَا حُدُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِمَا فِيمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَدَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ تِلۡكَ حُدُودُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلَا تَعۡتَدُوهَا‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢٩

2:230.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َلَّقَهَا فَلَا تَحِلُّ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدُ حَتَّىٰ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحَ زَوۡجًا غَيۡرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َلَّقَهَا فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَرَاجَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُقِيمَا حُدُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَتِلۡكَ حُدُودُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُبَيِّنُهَا لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣٠

2:231.text: وَإِذَا طَلَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَبَلَغۡنَ أَجَلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَأَمۡسِكُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِمَعۡرُوفٍ أَوۡ سَرِّحُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِمَعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تُمۡسِكُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ضِرَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَعۡتَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ظَلَمَ نَفۡسَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَا تَتَّخِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُزُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةِ يَعِظُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٣١

2:232.text: وَإِذَا طَلَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَبَلَغۡنَ أَجَلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَلَا تَعۡضُلُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحۡنَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَهُ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ إِذَا تَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ضَوۡ<rule class='slnt'>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ‌ۗ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُوعَظُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۗ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ أَزۡكَىٰ لَكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هَرُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣٢

2:233.text: ۞وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ يُرۡضِعۡنَ أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَهُ<rule عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذَا سَلَّمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule 2:234.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوۡنَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَرَبَّصۡنَ بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَشۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا بَلَغۡنَ أَجَلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِيمَا فَعَلۡنَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٣٤

2:235.text: وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِيمَا عَرَّضۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ خِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَوۡ أَكۡنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۚ عَلِمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ سَتَذۡكُرُونَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُوَاعِدُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سِرًّا إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَعۡزِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِكَاحِ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ أَجَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡذَرُوهُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٣٥

2:236.text: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َلَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا لَمۡ تَمَسُّوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَوۡ تَفۡرِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَرِيضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَتِّعُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُوسِعِ قَدَرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تِرِ قَدَرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ‌ۖ حَقًّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣٦

2:238.text: حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صَّلَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوُسۡطَىٰ وَقُومُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣٨

2:239.text: فَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ فَرِجَالاً أَوۡ رُكۡبَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَمَا عَلَّمَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَمۡ تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣٩

2:240.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُتَوَفَّوۡنَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَيَذَرُونَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َصِيَّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_wo_ghunnah'>ل</rule>ِّأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِه<rule class='idgham_shafawi'>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عًا إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَوۡلِ غَيۡرَ إِخۡرَا<rule class=ikhafa>جٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِنۡ خَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَ فَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِى مَا فَعَلۡنَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٤٠

2:247.text: وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ نَبِيُّهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَعَثَ لَكُمۡ طَالُوتَ مَلِ<rule class=ikhafa>كًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يَكُونُ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ عَلَيۡنَا وَنَحۡنُ أَحَقُّ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكِ مِنۡهُ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡتَ سَعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَالِ‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَزَادَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَسۡطَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِسۡمِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُؤۡتِى مُلۡكَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٤٧

2:248.text: وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ نَبِيُّهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ءَايَةَ مُلۡكِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّابُوتُ فِيهِ سَكِينَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَبَقِيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَرَكَ ءَالُ مُوسَىٰ وَءَالُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ تَحۡمِلُهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤٨

2:250.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا بَرَزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِجَالُوتَ وَجُنُودِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَبِّتۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَامَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥٠

2:264.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَذَىٰ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُ مَالَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رِئ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۖ فَمَثَلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَمَثَلِ صَفۡوَانٍ عَلَيۡهِ تُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَصَابَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَابِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَرَكَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> صَلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُونَ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦٤

2:265.text: وَمَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَرۡضَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَتَثۡبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ كَمَثَلِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>وَةٍ أَصَابَهَا وَابِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َـَٔـاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا ضِعۡفَيۡنِ فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هَا وَابِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َطَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٦٥

2:266.text: أَيَوَدُّ أَحَدُكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّخِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعۡنَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِيهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَأَصَابَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِبَرُ وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ذُرِّيَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ُعَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَأَصَابَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِعۡصَا<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡتَرَقَتۡ‌ۗ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُبَيِّنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦٦

2:267.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مَا كَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَلَا تَيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبِيثَ مِنۡهُ تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ وَلَسۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـاخِذِيهِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُغۡمِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَنِىٌّ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٦٧

2:268.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ يَعِدُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَ وَيَأۡمُرُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعِدُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَفَضۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٦٨

2:269.text: يُؤۡتِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُوتِىَ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢٦٩

2:270.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفَقَةٍ أَوۡ نَذَرۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ وَمَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٍ ٢٧٠

2:271.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَنِعِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا هِىَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُخۡفُوهَا وَتُؤۡتُوهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُقَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَهُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۚ وَيُكَفِّرُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َيِّـَٔـاتِكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٧١

2:272.text: ۞لَّيۡسَ عَلَيۡكَ هُدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَمَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَمَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوَفَّ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧٢

2:284.text: لِّلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ يُحَاسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ فَيَغۡفِرُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٨٤

2:285.text: ءَامَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ‌ۚ كُلٌّ ءَامَنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَكُتُبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَا نُفَرِّقُ بَيۡنَ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَمِعۡنَا وَأَطَعۡنَا‌ۖ غُفۡرَانَكَ رَبَّنَا وَإِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٢٨٥

2:286.text: لَا يُكَلِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَا‌ۚ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَعَلَيۡهَا مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَسَبَتۡ‌ۗ رَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّسِين<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ أَخۡطَأۡنَا‌ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحۡمِلۡ عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِصۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َمَا حَمَلۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِنَا‌ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِلۡنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡفُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡحَمۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٨٦

3:2.text: ٱللَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَيّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مُ ٢

3:3.text: نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ مُصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لَ ٣

3:4.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ هُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُرۡقَانَ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِي<rule class=ikhafa>زٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>مٍ ٤

3:5.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ٥

3:6.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُصَوِّرُكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامِ كَيۡفَ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦

3:7.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِنۡهُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّحۡكَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٌ هُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَأُخَرُ مُتَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ زَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>غٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَتَّبِعُونَ مَا تَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهَ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ تَأۡوِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَمَا يَعۡلَمُ تَأۡوِيلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِخُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ يَقُولُونَ ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ رَبِّنَا‌ۗ وَمَا يَذَّكَّرُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٧

3:8.text: رَبَّنَا لَا تُزِغۡ قُلُوبَنَا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَيۡتَنَا وَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ رَحۡمَةً‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٨

3:9.text: رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ جَامِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لِيَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ٩

3:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُغۡنِىَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمۡ وَقُودُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٠

3:11.text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَأَخَذَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١١

3:12.text: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۚ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٢

3:13.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى فِئَتَيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ۡتَقَتَا‌ۖ فِئَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأُخۡرَىٰ كَافِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡنَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّثۡلَيۡهِمۡ رَأۡىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَيۡنِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُؤَيِّدُ بِنَصۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَعِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رِ ١٣

3:14.text: زُيِّنَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ حُبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>شَّهَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َرَةِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّهَبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِضَّةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسَوَّمَةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡثِ‌ۗ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حُسۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَـَٔـ<rule class=madda_permissible>ا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٤

3:15.text: ۞قُلۡ أَؤُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ‌ۚ لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّطَهَّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َرِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَصِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٥

3:16.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٦

3:17.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِرِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِتِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَغۡفِرِينَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡح<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٧

3:18.text: شَهِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۚ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٨

3:19.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِسۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ إِلَّا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡي<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩

3:20.text: فَإِنۡ ح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجُّوكَ فَقُلۡ أَسۡلَمۡتُ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِىَ لِلَّهِ وَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَنِ‌ۗ وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ ءَأَسۡلَمۡتُمۡ‌ۚ فَإِنۡ أَسۡلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَّإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَصِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٠

3:21.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ بِغَيۡرِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ فَبَشِّرۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِعَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢١

3:22.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَمَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

3:23.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَىٰ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لِيَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

3:24.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمَسَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَيَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>م</rule>َّعۡدُود<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَرَّهُمۡ فِى دِينِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

3:25.text: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا جَمَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِيَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

3:26.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكِ تُؤۡتِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ بِيَدِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٦
