3:101.text: وَكَيۡفَ تَكۡفُرُونَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَفِيكُمۡ رَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡتَص<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> هُدِىَ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠١

3:102.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ حَقَّ تُقَاتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا تَمُوتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَّا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٢

3:103.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَصِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِحَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَفَرَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَلَّفَ بَيۡنَ قُلُوبِكُمۡ فَأَصۡبَحۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِنِعۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَفَا حُفۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َذَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۗ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُبَيِّنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٣

3:104.text: وَلۡتَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٤

3:105.text: وَلَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَفَرَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٥

3:106.text: يَوۡمَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>يَضُّ وُجُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَسۡوَدُّ وُجُو<rule class=ikhafa>هٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡوَدَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ أَكَفَرۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٦

3:107.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>يَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِى رَحۡمَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٧

3:108.text: تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُرِيدُ ظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٨

3:109.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٠٩

3:110.text: كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ خَيۡرَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أُخۡرِجَتۡ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ تَأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَتَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَتُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَلَوۡ ءَامَنَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَكَانَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٠

3:111.text: ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضُرُّوكُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًى‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُوكُمۡ يُوَلُّوكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَارَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

3:112.text: ضُرِبَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّلَّةُ أَيۡنَ مَا ثُقِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا بِحَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو بِغَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَضُرِبَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡكَنَةُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِغَيۡرِ حَ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍّ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِمَا عَصَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٢

3:113.text: ۞لَيۡسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتۡلُونَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ءَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَهُمۡ يَسۡجُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٣

3:114.text: يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَيُسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِعُونَ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٤

3:115.text: وَمَا يَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكۡفَرُوهُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٥

3:116.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُغۡنِىَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۚ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٦

3:117.text: مَثَلُ مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا كَمَثَلِ رِي<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا صِرٌّ أَصَابَتۡ حَرۡثَ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ فَأَهۡلَكَتۡهُ‌ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٧

3:118.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِطَانَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِكُمۡ لَا يَأۡلُونَكُمۡ خَبَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا عَنِتُّمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَدَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ أَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَمَا تُخۡفِى صُدُورُهُمۡ أَكۡبَرُ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٨

3:119.text: هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ تُحِبُّونَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِبُّونَكُمۡ وَتُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ كُلِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِذَا لَقُوكُمۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَإِذَا خَلَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَضُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنَامِلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡظِ‌ۚ قُلۡ مُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِغَيۡظِكُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١١٩

3:120.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمۡسَسۡكُمۡ حَسَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسُؤۡهُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ سَيِّئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡرَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡــًٔا‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٌ ١٢٠

3:121.text: وَإِذۡ غَدَوۡتَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِدَ لِلۡقِتَالِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢١

3:122.text: إِذۡ هَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَتَانِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َفۡشَلَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَا‌ۗ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٢

3:123.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَصَرَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِبَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَذِلَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٣

3:124.text: إِذۡ تَقُولُ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفِيَكُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُمِدَّكُمۡ رَبُّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةِ ءَالَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٤

3:125.text: بَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَأۡتُوك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡرِهِمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يُمۡدِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>كُمۡ رَبُّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَمۡسَةِ ءَالَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ مُسَوِّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٥

3:126.text: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا بُشۡرَىٰ لَكُمۡ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قُلُوبُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٢٦

3:127.text: لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعَ طَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡ يَكۡبِتَهُمۡ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٧

3:128.text: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ شَىۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٨

3:129.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢٩

3:130.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel><rule class=slnt>و</rule>ٰٓاۡ</rule> أَضۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٠

3:131.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣١

3:132.text: وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٢

3:133.text: ۞وَسَارِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةٍ عَرۡضُهَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٣

3:134.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ظِمِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡظَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَافِينَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٤

3:135.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذَا فَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَةً أَوۡ ظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ ذَكَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَمۡ يُصِرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَا فَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٥

3:136.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ وَجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ وَنِعۡمَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٦

3:137.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ سُنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٧

3:138.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَيَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَوۡعِظَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٨

3:139.text: وَلَا تَهِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَا تَحۡزَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٩

3:140.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡسَسۡكُمۡ قَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَسَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ قَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَتِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَّامُ نُدَاوِلُهَا بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَتَّخِذَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٠

3:141.text: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَمۡحَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤١

3:142.text: أَمۡ حَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡلَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٢

3:143.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َلۡقَوۡهُ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَأَيۡتُمُوهُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٣

3:144.text: وَمَا مُحَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َدٌ إِلَّا رَسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلُ‌ۚ أَفَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّاتَ أَوۡ قُتِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيۡهِ فَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضُرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٤

3:146.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِ<rule class=ikhafa>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رِبِّيُّونَ كَثِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَا وَهَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَهُمۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا ضَعُفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٦

3:147.text: وَمَا كَانَ قَوۡلَهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَإِسۡرَافَنَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡرِنَا وَثَبِّتۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَامَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٧

3:148.text: فَـَٔـاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ثَوَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَحُسۡنَ ثَوَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٨

3:149.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَرُدُّوكُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِكُمۡ فَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٩

3:150.text: بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٠

3:152.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَدَقَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِذۡ تَحُسُّونَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا فَشِلۡتُمۡ وَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَعۡتُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ وَعَصَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا تُحِبُّونَ‌ۚ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ صَرَفَكُمۡ عَنۡهُمۡ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَلِيَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَفَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٢

3:153.text: ۞إِذۡ تُصۡعِدُونَ وَلَا تَلۡوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>نَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوكُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُخۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ فَأَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَكُمۡ غَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكَيۡلَا تَحۡزَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٣

فِى صُدُورِكُمۡ وَلِيُمَحِّصَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٥٤

3:155.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ۡتَقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعَانِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَزَلَّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ بِبَعۡضِ مَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَفَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُورٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥٥

3:156.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ إِذَا ضَرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> غُز<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َنَا مَا مَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا قُتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ حَسۡرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٥٦

3:157.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُتِلۡتُمۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡ مُتُّمۡ لَمَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَحۡمَةٌ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٧

3:158.text: وَلَئ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٨

3:159.text: فَبِمَا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ لَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فَظًّا غَلِيظَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَلۡبِ لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َضُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ حَوۡلِكَ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ وَشَاوِرۡهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ‌ۖ فَإِذَا عَزَمۡتَ فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَوَكِّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٩

3:160.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَلَا غَالِبَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡذُلۡكُمۡ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٠

3:161.text: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَبِىٍّ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغُلَّ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡلُلۡ يَأۡتِ بِمَا غَلَّ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦١

3:162.text: أَفَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ رِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَم<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِسَخَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۚ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٦٢

3:163.text: هُمۡ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَصِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٣

3:164.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ إِذۡ بَعَثَ فِيهِمۡ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ يَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٦٤

3:165.text: أَوَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصِيبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّثۡلَيۡهَا قُلۡتُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۖ قُلۡ هُوَ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٦٥

3:166.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ۡتَقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعَانِ فَبِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٦

3:167.text: وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ نَافَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>فَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ نَعۡلَمُ قِتَال<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۗ هُمۡ لِلۡكُفۡرِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُ مِنۡهُمۡ لِلۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِه<rule class='idgham_shafawi'>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَيۡسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَكۡتُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٧

3:168.text: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ وَقَعَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ أَطَاعُونَا مَا قُتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> قُلۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَءُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٨

3:169.text: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قُتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ت<rule class='iqlab'>َۢا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ أَحۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٩

3:170.text: فَرِحِينَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَمۡ يَلۡحَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ أَلَّا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٠

3:171.text: ۞يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِرُونَ بِنِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَفَضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧١

3:172.text: ٱلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡحُ‌ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٧٢

3:173.text: ٱلَّذِينَ قَالَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡشَوۡهُمۡ فَزَادَهُمۡ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَسۡبُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لُ ١٧٣

3:174.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِنِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَفَضۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَمۡسَسۡهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو فَضۡلٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٧٤

3:179.text: مَّا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَذَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ حَتَّىٰ يَمِيزَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبِيثَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبِ‌ۗ وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>لِعَكُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبِى م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ فَـَٔـامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٧٩

3:180.text: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُونَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ هُوَ شَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۖ سَيُطَوَّقُونَ مَا بَخِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ وَلِلَّهِ مِير<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ثُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٨٠

3:181.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَمِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَوۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَقِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَحۡنُ أَغۡنِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۘ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقَتۡلَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِغَيۡرِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَقُولُ ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١٨١

3:182.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٨٢

3:183.text: ٱلَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَهِدَ إِلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَّا نُؤۡمِنَ لِرَسُولٍ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَنَا بِقُرۡبَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡكُلُهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۗ قُلۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِى بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى قُلۡتُمۡ فَلِمَ قَتَلۡتُمُوهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٣

3:185.text: كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تُوَفَّوۡنَ أُجُورَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۖ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُحۡزِحَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ وَأُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَازَ‌ۗ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٨٥

3:186.text: ۞لَتُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَوُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ وَلَتَسۡمَعُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَشۡرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ذًى</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٨٦

3:187.text: وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ لَتُبَيِّنُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَا تَكۡتُمُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَنَبَذُوهُ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ظُهُورِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َبِئۡسَ مَا يَشۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٧

3:188.text: لَا تَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَفۡرَحُونَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّيُحِبُّونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡمَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا لَمۡ يَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا تَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَفَازَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ‌ۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٨٨

3:189.text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٨٩

3:190.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى خَلۡقِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩٠

3:191.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَذۡكُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُعُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِهِمۡ وَيَتَفَكَّرُونَ فِى خَلۡقِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ رَبَّنَا مَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ فَقِنَا عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٩١

3:192.text: رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخۡزَيۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٍ ١٩٢

3:193.text: رَّبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا سَمِعۡنَا مُنَادِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَادِى لِلۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ أَنۡ ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَـَٔـامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا‌ۚ رَبَّنَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرۡ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَيِّـَٔـاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٩٣

3:194.text: رَبَّنَا وَءَاتِنَا مَا وَعَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخۡزِنَا يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَا تُخۡلِفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ١٩٤

3:195.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَابَ لَهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُضِيعُ عَمَلَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َكَرٍ أَوۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ‌ۖ بَعۡضُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأُخۡرِجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ وَأُوذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِى وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقُتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَأُكَفِّرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ وَلَأُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ ثَوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حُسۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّو<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩٥

3:196.text: لَا يَغُرَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ تَقَلُّبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٩٦

3:197.text: مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِي<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ مَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۚ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٩٧

3:198.text: لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا نُزُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَمَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٩٨

3:199.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعِينَ لِلَّهِ لَا يَشۡتَرُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيلاً‌ۗ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩٩

3:200.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَابِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَرَابِطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٠

4:1.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَلَقَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا وَبَثَّ مِنۡهُمَا رِجَال<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَلُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ رَقِيبًا ١

4:2.text: وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تَتَبَدَّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبِيثَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبِ‌ۖ وَلَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ حُو<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٢

4:3.text: وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ أَلَّا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا طَابَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَثۡنَىٰ وَثُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ وَرُبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ‌ۖ فَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ أَلَّا تَعۡدِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةً أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَلَّا تَعُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ٣

class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٥

4:26.text: يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُبَيِّنَ لَكُمۡ وَيَهۡدِيَكُمۡ سُنَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَيَتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٦

4:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتُوبَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>شَّهَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمِيلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَيۡلاً عَظِيمًا ٢٧

4:28.text: يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخَفِّفَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَخُلِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ ضَعِيفًا ٢٨

4:29.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ تِجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَةً عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمًا ٢٩

4:30.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عُ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظُلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَوۡفَ نُصۡلِيهِ نَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَسِيرًا ٣٠

4:31.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَنِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَ مَا تُنۡهَوۡنَ عَنۡهُ نُكَفِّرۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِكُمۡ وَنُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َرِيمًا ٣١

4:32.text: وَلَا تَتَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فَضَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَعۡضَكُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلرِّجَالِ نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَلِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ‌ۚ وَسۡــَٔلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَلِيمًا ٣٢

4:33.text: وَلِكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلۡنَا مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِىَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَرَكَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَانِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُونَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَقَدَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ فَـَٔـاتُوهُمۡ نَصِيبَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِيدًا ٣٣

4:34.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالُ قَوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>مُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بِمَا فَضَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَعۡضَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٌ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡغَيۡبِ بِمَا حَفِظَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى تَخَافُونَ نُشُوزَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَعِظُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡجُرُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَضَاجِعِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِبُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۖ فَإِنۡ أَطَعۡنَكُمۡ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَبِيلاً‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٣٤

4:35.text: وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ شِقَاقَ بَيۡنِهِمَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَحَكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوَفِّقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا خَبِيرًا ٣٥

4:36.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَلَا تُشۡرِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َبِ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبِذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَارِ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُنُبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّاحِبِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ وَمَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مُخۡتَال<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخُورًا ٣٦

4:37.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُخۡلِ وَيَكۡتُمُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّهِينًا ٣٧

4:38.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ رِئ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ قَرِينًا ٣٨

4:39.text: وَمَاذَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوۡ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَقَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهِمۡ عَلِيمًا ٣٩

4:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُ حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِفۡهَا وَيُؤۡتِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُنۡهُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ٤٠
