4:59.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَعۡتُمۡ فِى ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرُدُّوهُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلاً ٥٩

4:60.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَزۡعُمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ يُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَحَاكَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُوتِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُمِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلَّهُمۡ ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعِيدًا ٦٠

4:61.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ رَأَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ صُدُودًا ٦١

4:62.text: فَكَيۡفَ إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصِيبَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوكَ يَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَوۡفِيقًا ٦٢

4:63.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَعِظۡهُمۡ وَقُل لَّهُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ قَوۡل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلِيغًا ٦٣

4:64.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا لِيُطَاعَ بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ذ</rule> ظَّلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفَرَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ لَوَجَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ تَوَّا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٦٤

4:65.text: فَلَا وَرَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ حَتَّىٰ يُحَكِّمُوكَ فِيمَا شَجَرَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَضَيۡتَ وَيُسَلِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَسۡلِيمًا ٦٥

4:66.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فَعَلُوهُ إِلَّا قَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا يُوعَظُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَكَانَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ وَأَشَدَّ تَثۡبِيتًا ٦٦

4:67.text: وَإِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّأَتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ٦٧

4:68.text: وَلَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقِيمًا ٦٨

4:69.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صِّدِّيقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحِينَ‌ۚ وَحَسُنَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ رَفِيقًا ٦٩

4:71.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حِذۡرَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُبَاتٍ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> جَمِيعًا ٧١

4:72.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ لَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيُبَطِّئَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَإِنۡ أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصِيبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَنۡعَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىَّ إِذۡ لَمۡ أَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهُمۡ شَهِيدًا ٧٢

4:73.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَكُمۡ فَضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَيَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَك<rule class=iqlab>ُنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَوَدَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مَعَهُمۡ فَأَفُوزَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا ٧٣

4:74.text: ۞فَلۡيُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَشۡرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَلۡ أَوۡ يَغۡلِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> فَسَوۡفَ نُؤۡتِيهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ٧٤

4:75.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ لَا تُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡوِلۡد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا مِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّالِمِ أَهۡلُهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ نَصِيرًا ٧٥

4:76.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُوتِ فَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَيۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ كَانَ ضَعِيفًا ٧٦

4:77.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ كُفّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كُتِبَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِتَالُ إِذَا فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَخۡشَوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ كَخَشۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡ أَشَدَّ خَشۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا لِمَ كَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَ عَلَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِتَالَ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَّرۡتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا قَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَىٰ وَلَا تُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلاً ٧٧

4:78.text: أَيۡنَمَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِككُّمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ وَلَوۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِى بُرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّشَيَّدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ سَيِّئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِكَ‌ۚ قُلۡ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ فَمَالِ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ لَا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ حَدِيثًا ٧٨

4:79.text: مّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَكَ مِنۡ حَسَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َيِّئَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِكَ‌ۚ وَأَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَهِيدًا ٧٩

4:80.text: مّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَطَاعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّىٰ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظًا ٨٠

4:81.text: وَيَقُولُونَ طَاعَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا بَرَزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِكَ بَيَّتَ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ غَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَقُولُ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَكۡتُبُ مَا يُبَيِّتُونَ‌ۖ فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكِيلاً ٨١

4:82.text: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ‌ۚ وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ غَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَوَجَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِيرًا ٨٢

4:83.text: وَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ أَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡنِ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوۡفِ أَذَاعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَلَوۡ رَدُّوهُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ وَإِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ مِنۡهُمۡ لَعَلِمَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡتَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِطُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۗ وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٨٣

4:84.text: فَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا تُكَلَّفُ إِلَّا نَفۡسَكَ‌ۚ وَحَرِّضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۖ عَسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُفَّ بَأۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَشَدُّ بَأۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَشَدُّ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِيلاً ٨٤

4:85.text: مّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡفَعۡ شَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَةً حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡفَعۡ شَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َيِّئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كِفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّقِيتًا ٨٥

4:86.text: وَإِذَا حُيِّيت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِتَحِيَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َحَيُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَحۡسَنَ مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ رُدُّوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ حَسِيبًا ٨٦

4:87.text: ٱللَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ لَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ‌ۗ وَمَنۡ أَصۡدَقُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَدِيثًا ٨٧

4:88.text: ۞فَمَا لَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ فِئَتَيۡنِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَرۡكَسَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> أَتُرِيدُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َهۡدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنۡ أَضَلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَبِيلاً ٨٨

4:89.text: وَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ كَمَا كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَكُونُونَ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ حَتَّىٰ يُهَاجِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَخُذُوهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوهُمۡ حَيۡثُ وَجَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمُوهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصِيرًا ٨٩

4:91.text: سَتَجِدُونَ ءَاخَرِينَ يُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡمَنُوكُمۡ وَيَأۡمَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمَهُمۡ كُلَّ مَا رُدّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةِ أُرۡكِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا‌ۚ فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَعۡتَزِلُوكُمۡ وَيُلۡق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَمَ وَيَكُفّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ فَخُذُوهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوهُمۡ حَيۡثُ ثَقِفۡتُمُوهُمۡ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكُمۡ جَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ٩١

4:96.text: دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَمَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٩٦

4:97.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ ظَالِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيمَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ أَرۡضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتُهَاجِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا‌ۚ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ وَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ مَصِيرًا ٩٧

4:98.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡوِلۡد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ حِيلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَهۡتَدُونَ سَبِيلاً ٩٨

4:99.text: فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ عَسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡفُوَ عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَفُوًّا غَفُورًا ٩٩

4:100.text: ۞وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُهَاجِرۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>غَ<rule class='ikhafa'>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُهَاجِرًا إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِكۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَقَعَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١٠٠

4:101.text: وَإِذَا ضَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَاحٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ إِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡتِنَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَدُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١٠١

4:102.text: وَإِذَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فِيهِمۡ فَأَقَمۡتَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule 4:103.text: فَإِذَا قَضَيۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُعُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَىٰ جُنُوبِكُمۡ‌ۚ فَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَأۡنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ كَانَتۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّوۡقُوتًا ١٠٣

4:104.text: وَلَا تَهِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَأۡلَمُونَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَأۡلَمُونَ كَمَا تَأۡلَمُونَ‌ۖ وَتَرۡجُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَرۡجُونَ‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا ١٠٤

4:105.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِتَحۡكُمَ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَلَا تَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡخ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنِينَ خَصِيمًا ١٠٥

4:106.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١٠٦

4:107.text: وَلَا تُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخۡتَانُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ خَوَّانًا أَثِيمًا ١٠٧

4:108.text: يَسۡتَخۡفُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَا يَسۡتَخۡفُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهُوَ مَعَهُمۡ إِذۡ يُبَيِّتُونَ مَا لَا يَرۡضَىٰ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ مُحِيطًا ١٠٨

4:109.text: هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَلۡتُمۡ عَنۡهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ أ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَكِيلاً ١٠٩

4:110.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءًا أَوۡ يَظۡلِمۡ نَفۡسَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَسۡتَغۡفِرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١١٠

4:111.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> إِثۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَكۡسِبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا ١١١

4:112.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> خَطِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ــَٔةً أَوۡ إِثۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَرۡمِ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَرِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ـ<rule class=ikhafa>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡتَمَلَ بُهۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِثۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١١٢

4:113.text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكَ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلُّوكَ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَمَا يَضُرُّونَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَعَلَّمَكَ مَا لَمۡ تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡلَمُ‌ۚ وَكَانَ فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكَ عَظِيمًا ١١٣

4:114.text: ۞لَّا خَيۡرَ فِى كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَمَرَ بِصَدَقَةٍ أَوۡ مَعۡرُوفٍ أَوۡ إِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>حِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَرۡضَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَسَوۡفَ نُؤۡتِيهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ١١٤

4:115.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشَاقِقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ وَيَتَّبِعۡ غَيۡرَ سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ نُوَلِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا تَوَلَّىٰ وَنُصۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۖ وَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ مَصِيرًا ١١٥

4:116.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَغۡفِرُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشۡرَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَغۡفِرُ مَا دُونَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشۡرِكۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَّ ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعِيدًا ١١٦

4:117.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلَّا شَيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرِيدًا ١١٧

4:118.text: لَّعَنَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّفۡرُوضًا ١١٨

4:119.text: وَلَأُضِلَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ وَلَأُمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ وَلَأَمُرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فَلَيُبَتِّكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ءَاذَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ وَلَأَمُرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فَلَيُغَيِّرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ خَلۡقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَسِرَ خُسۡرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١١٩

4:120.text: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِيهِمۡ‌ۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا ١٢٠

4:121.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ عَنۡهَا مَحِيصًا ١٢١

4:122.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سَنُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَق<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَنۡ أَصۡدَقُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قِيلاً ١٢٢

4:123.text: لَّيۡسَ بِأَمَانِيِّكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَانِىِّ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ‌ۗ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصِيرًا ١٢٣

4:124.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َكَرٍ أَوۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ نَقِيرًا ١٢٤

4:125.text: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ دِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ مِلَّةَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ خَلِيلاً ١٢٥

4:126.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّحِيطًا ١٢٦

4:127.text: وَيَسۡتَفۡتُونَكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُفۡتِيكُمۡ فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَمَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ فِى يَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى لَا تُؤۡتُونَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَا كُتِبَ لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَتَرۡغَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَضۡعَفِينَ مِنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡوِلۡد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُومُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۚ وَمَا تَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلِيمًا ١٢٧

4:128.text: وَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَةٌ خَافَتۡ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡلِهَا نُشُوزًا أَوۡ إِعۡرَا<rule class=ikhafa>ضًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصۡلِحَا بَيۡنَهُمَا صُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّلۡحُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُحۡضِرَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّحَّ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُحۡسِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا ١٢٨

4:129.text: وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَطِيع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡدِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتُمۡ‌ۖ فَلَا تَمِيلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيۡلِ فَتَذَرُوهَا كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعَلَّقَةِ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصۡلِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١٢٩

4:130.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَرَّقَا يُغۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ كُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َعَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعًا حَكِيمًا ١٣٠

4:131.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَصَّيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَإِيَّاكُمۡ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَنِيًّا حَمِيدًا ١٣١

4:132.text: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكِيلاً ١٣٢

4:133.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔـاخَرِينَ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَدِيرًا ١٣٣

4:134.text: مَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا فَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثَوَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َصِيرًا ١٣٤

4:135.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>مِينَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لِلَّهِ وَلَوۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ أَوِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبِينَ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُنۡ غَنِيًّا أَوۡ فَقِي<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهِمَا‌ۖ فَلَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهَوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡدِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َلۡوُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓاۡ</rule> أَوۡ تُعۡرِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا ١٣٥

4:136.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَزَّلَ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَكُتُبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَّ ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعِيدًا ١٣٦

4:137.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>زۡدَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُفۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَكُنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ سَبِيلاَۢ ١٣٧

4:138.text: بَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٣٨

4:139.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّخِذُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۚ أَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُونَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا ١٣٩

4:140.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَزَّلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أَنۡ إِذَا سَمِعۡتُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُكۡفَرُ بِهَا وَيُسۡتَهۡزَأُ بِهَا فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُهُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ جَامِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ جَمِيعًا ١٤٠

4:141.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَرَبَّصُونَ بِكُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ لَكُمۡ فَتۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَلَمۡ نَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَكُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ نَصِي<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَلَمۡ نَسۡتَحۡوِذۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَنَمۡنَعۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ سَبِيلاً ١٤١

4:142.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ يُخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَهُوَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِعُهُمۡ وَإِذَا قَام<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ قَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُسَالَىٰ يُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ وَلَا يَذۡكُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ١٤٢

4:143.text: مُّذَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ذَبِينَ بَيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَبِيلاً ١٤٣

4:144.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۚ أَتُرِيدُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١٤٤

4:145.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّرۡكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡفَلِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لَهُمۡ نَصِيرًا ١٤٥

4:146.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَصۡلَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَصَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأَخۡلَصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دِينَهُمۡ لِلَّهِ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۖ وَسَوۡفَ يُؤۡتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ١٤٦

4:147.text: مَّا يَفۡعَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِعَذَابِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َكَرۡتُمۡ وَءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَاكِرًا عَلِيمًا ١٤٧

4:148.text: ۞لَّا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَهۡرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>ُلِمَ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعًا عَلِيمًا ١٤٨

4:149.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَيۡرًا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ أَوۡ تَعۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَفُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدِيرًا ١٤٩

4:150.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُفَرِّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَقُولُونَ نُؤۡمِنُ بِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَكۡفُرُ بِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ سَبِيلاً ١٥٠

4:151.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرُونَ حَق<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّهِينًا ١٥١

4:152.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَمۡ يُفَرِّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ سَوۡفَ يُؤۡتِيهِمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١٥٢

4:153.text: يَسۡــَٔلُكَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُنَزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَأَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَكۡبَرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَرِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ جَهۡرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِقَةُ بِظُلۡمِهِمۡ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ فَعَفَوۡنَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۚ وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١٥٣

4:154.text: وَرَفَعۡنَا فَوۡقَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورَ بِمِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِهِمۡ وَقُلۡنَا لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَابَ سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لَا تَعۡدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِ وَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قًا غَلِيظًا ١٥٤

4:155.text: فَبِمَا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَهُمۡ وَكُفۡرِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَقَتۡلِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِغَيۡرِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَوۡلِهِمۡ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡ<rule class=iqlab>فُۢ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ طَبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهَا بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ١٥٥

4:156.text: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نًا عَظِيمًا ١٥٦

4:157.text: وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَتَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحَ عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ رَسُولَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ وَمَا صَلَبُوهُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ُبِّهَ لَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ‌ۚ مَا لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تِّبَاعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ‌ۚ وَمَا قَتَلُوهُ يَقِينَۢا ١٥٧

4:158.text: بَ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّفَعَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا ١٥٨

4:159.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ إِلَّا لَيُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ مَوۡتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ يَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ شَهِيدًا ١٥٩

4:160.text: فَبِظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ طَيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ أُحِلَّتۡ لَهُمۡ وَبِصَدِّهِمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَثِيرًا ١٦٠

4:161.text: وَأَخۡذِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّبَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>اۡ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نُهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَأَكۡلِهِمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ‌ۚ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٦١

4:162.text: لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِخُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقِيمِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ سَنُؤۡتِيهِمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ١٦٢

4:163.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡبَاطِ وَعِيسَىٰ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُونُسَ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ وَسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۚ وَءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ زَبُورًا ١٦٣

4:164.text: وَرُسُل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قَصَصۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَرُسُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صُصۡهُمۡ عَلَيۡكَ‌ۚ وَكَلَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مُوسَىٰ تَكۡلِيمًا ١٦٤

4:165.text: رُّسُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حُجَّ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا ١٦٥

4:166.text: لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِعِلۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ يَشۡهَدُونَ‌ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَهِيدًا ١٦٦

4:167.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعِيدًا ١٦٧

4:168.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَمۡ يَكُنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا لِيَهۡدِيَهُمۡ طَرِيقًا ١٦٨

5:14.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَهُمۡ فَنَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَظ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأَغۡرَيۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَدَاوَةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ وَسَوۡفَ يُنَبِّئُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَصۡنَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

5:15.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمۡ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُخۡفُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَيَعۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٥

5:16.text: يَهۡدِى بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ رِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> سُبُلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ وَيُخۡرِجُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَهۡدِيهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٦

5:17.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَفَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ‌ۚ قُلۡ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡلِكُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡــًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُهۡلِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ وَأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا‌ۚ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٧

5:18.text: وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ نَحۡنُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأَحِبَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ قُلۡ فَلِمَ يُعَذِّبُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذُنُوبِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ خَلَقَ‌ۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٨

5:19.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ رَسُولُنَا يُبَيِّنُ لَكُمۡ عَلَىٰ فَتۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَذِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٩

5:20.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ جَعَلَ فِيكُمۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَجَعَلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَمۡ يُؤۡتِ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

5:21.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَدَّسَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كَتَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ وَلَا تَرۡتَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَارِكُمۡ فَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١

5:22.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِيهَا قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َبَّارِينَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلَهَا حَتَّىٰ يَخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا فَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>خِل<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

5:23.text: قَالَ رَجُلَانِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أَنۡعَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَابَ فَإِذَا دَخَلۡتُمُوهُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِبُونَ‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَتَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣
