5:26.text: قَالَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا مُحَرَّمَةٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۛ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۛ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتِيهُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ فَلَا تَأۡسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

5:27.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َىۡ</rule> ءَادَمَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ إِذۡ قَرَّبَا قُرۡبَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتُقُبِّلَ مِنۡ أَحَدِهِمَا وَلَمۡ يُتَقَبَّلۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخَرِ قَالَ لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

5:29.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُرِيدُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓأَ بِإِثۡمِى وَإِثۡمِكَ فَتَكُونَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُ<rule class='slnt'>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

5:30.text: فَطَوَّعَتۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَفۡسُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَتۡلَ أَخِيهِ فَقَتَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَأَصۡبَحَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

5:31.text: فَبَعَثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَثُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ لِيُرِيَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَيۡفَ يُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِى سَوۡءَةَ أَخِيهِ‌ۚ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَتَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعَجَزۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِثۡلَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُرَابِ فَأُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِىَ سَوۡءَةَ أَخِى‌ۖ فَأَصۡبَحَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

5:32.text: مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا عَلَىٰ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َتَلَ نَفۡس<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ نَفۡسٍ أَوۡ فَسَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَكَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا قَتَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَنۡ أَحۡيَاهَا فَكَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحۡيَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ لَمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

5:34.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٤

5:37.text: يُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ وَمَا ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِجِينَ مِنۡهَا‌ۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٧

5:38.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّارِقُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّارِقَةُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡدِيَهُمَا جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَا نَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٨

5:39.text: فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ظُلۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٩

5:40.text: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَغۡفِرُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤٠

5:64.text: وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ يَدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَغۡلُولَةٌ‌ۚ غُلَّتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَلُعِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۘ</rule> بَلۡ يَدَاهُ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُوطَتَانِ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُ كَيۡفَ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَلَيَزِيدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَلۡقَيۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡعَد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ كُلَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡقَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡحَرۡبِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَأَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَيَسۡعَوۡنَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَسَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

5:65.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَفَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ وَلَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٦٥

5:66.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيلَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ لَأَكَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَصِدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

5:67.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ بَلِّغۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَفۡعَلۡ فَمَا بَلَّغۡتَ رِسَالَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡصِمُكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

5:68.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَسۡتُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَىۡءٍ حَتَّىٰ تُقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيلَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۗ وَلَيَزِيدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تَأۡسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

5:69.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِــُٔونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَىٰ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

5:70.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذۡنَا مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَأَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ رُسُل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلَّمَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ رَسُو<rule class=iqlab>لُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا لَا تَهۡوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ فَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَفَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

5:71.text: وَحَسِب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَلَّا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ عَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَصِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

5:72.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَفَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ‌ۖ وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبَّكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشۡرِكۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۖ وَمَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٍ ٧٢

5:73.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَفَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ ثَالِثُ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۘ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا مِنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَقُولُونَ لَيَمَسَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٣

5:74.text: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٤

5:75.text: مَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ إِلَّا رَسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلُ وَأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> صِدِّيقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَا يَأۡكُلَانِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّعَامَ‌ۗ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ نُبَيِّنُ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

5:76.text: قُلۡ أَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٧٦

5:77.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَا تَغۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دِينِكُمۡ غَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَأَضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ٧٧

5:78.text: لُعِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ لِسَانِ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ وَعِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ مَرۡيَمَ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِمَا عَصَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

5:79.text: كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَتَنَاهَوۡنَ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَلُوهُ‌ۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

5:80.text: تَرَىٰ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> لَبِئۡسَ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َخِطَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ هُمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

5:85.text: فَأَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

5:89.text: لَا يُؤَاخِذُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّغۡوِ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤَاخِذُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا عَقَّ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۖ فَكَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَتُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَامُ عَشَرَةِ مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينَ مِنۡ أَوۡسَطِ مَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُونَ أَهۡلِيكُمۡ أَوۡ كِسۡوَتُهُمۡ أَوۡ تَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَصِيَامُ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَةُ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ إِذَا حَلَفۡتُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡفَظ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُبَيِّنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٩

5:90.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَمۡرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيۡسِرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َابُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَزۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَمَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَنِبُوهُ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٠

5:91.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوقِعَ بَيۡنَكُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡعَد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَمۡرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيۡسِرِ وَيَصُدَّكُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَعَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ‌ۖ فَهَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩١

5:92.text: وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡذَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٩٢

5:104.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَسۡبُنَا مَا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٤

5:105.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ‌ۖ لَا يَضُرُّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَيۡتُمۡ‌ۚ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

5:106.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةُ بَيۡنِكُمۡ إِذَا حَضَرَ أَحَدَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ حِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَصِيَّةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَانِ ذَوَا عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أَوۡ ءَاخَرَانِ مِنۡ غَيۡرِكُمۡ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ ضَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصِيبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۚ تَحۡبِسُونَهُمَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ فَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمَانِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ لَا نَشۡتَرِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰ‌ۙ وَلَا نَكۡتُمُ شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٦

5:107.text: فَإِنۡ عُثِرَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَحَقّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِثۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َـَٔـاخَرَانِ يَقُومَانِ مَقَامَهُمَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوۡلَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمَانِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَشَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَتُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَقُّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَتِهِمَا وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَدَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٧

5:108.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ عَلَىٰ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ يَخَاف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرَدَّ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٨

5:109.text: ۞يَوۡمَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلَ فَيَقُولُ مَاذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا عِلۡمَ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٠٩

5:110.text: إِذۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ <rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ إِذۡ جِئۡتَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule
