5:111.text: وَإِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡتُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَوَارِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ أَنۡ ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِى وَبِرَسُولِى قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

5:112.text: إِذۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَوَارِيُّونَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ هَلۡ يَسۡتَطِيعُ رَبُّكَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَزِّلَ عَلَيۡنَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٢

5:113.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّأۡكُلَ مِنۡهَا وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قُلُوبُنَا وَنَعۡلَمَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَنَا وَنَكُونَ عَلَيۡهَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٣

5:114.text: قَالَ عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلۡ عَلَيۡنَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ تَكُونُ لَنَا عِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَوَّلِنَا وَءَاخِرِنَا وَءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡزُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِق<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٤

5:115.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُنَزِّلُهَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بَعۡدُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُعَذِّبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَذَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُعَذِّبُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٥

5:116.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ قُلۡتَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخِذُونِى وَأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِىَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَيۡنِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ قَالَ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ مَا يَكُونُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَقُولَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِى بِحَقٍّ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ قُلۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ تَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى نَفۡسِى وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى نَفۡسِكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١١٦

5:117.text: مَا قُلۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِلَّا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرۡتَنِى بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبَّكُمۡ‌ۚ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ شَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا دُمۡتُ فِيهِمۡ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَوَفَّيۡتَنِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّقِيبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١١٧

5:118.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عِبَادُكَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١١٨

5:119.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِقِينَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قُهُمۡ‌ۚ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١١٩

5:120.text: لِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُۢ ١٢٠

6:1.text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورَ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

6:2.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِي<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قَضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًى عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

6:3.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

6:4.text: وَمَا تَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

6:5.text: فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

6:6.text: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَمۡ نُمَكّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ وَأَرۡسَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهِمۡ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ قَرۡنًا ءَاخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

6:7.text: وَلَوۡ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى قِرۡطَا<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَمَسُوهُ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ لَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧

6:8.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا مَلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

6:9.text: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مَلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَجُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَلَبَسۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَلۡبِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

6:10.text: وَلَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَحَاقَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سَخِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

6:11.text: قُلۡ سِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

6:12.text: قُل لِّم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ قُل لِّلَّهِ‌ۚ كَتَبَ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةَ‌ۚ لَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

6:13.text: ۞وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا سَكَنَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٣

6:14.text: قُلۡ أَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَتَّخِذُ وَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َاطِرِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَهُوَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُ وَلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَمُ‌ۗ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

6:15.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٥

6:16.text: مّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصۡرَفۡ عَنۡهُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَحِمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٦

6:17.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡسَسۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِضُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡسَسۡكَ بِخَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٧

6:18.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَكِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٨

6:19.text: قُلۡ أَىُّ شَىۡءٍ أَكۡبَرُ شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ شَهِي<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَأُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ لِأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَم<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلَغَ‌ۚ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَشۡهَدُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ءَالِهَةً أُخۡرَىٰ‌ۚ قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡهَدُ‌ۚ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هُوَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

6:20.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَعۡرِفُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَمَا يَعۡرِفُونَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ‌ۘ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

6:21.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

6:22.text: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡنَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَزۡعُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

6:23.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِتۡنَتُهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رَبِّنَا مَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣

6:24.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَذَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

6:25.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَمِعُ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةً أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡقَهُوهُ وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلَّ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا‌ۚ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوكَ يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُونَكَ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

6:26.text: وَهُمۡ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنۡهُ وَيَنۡــَٔوۡنَ عَنۡهُ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُهۡلِكُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

6:27.text: وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ وُقِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنَا نُرَدُّ وَلَا نُكَذِّبَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّنَا وَنَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

6:28.text: بَلۡ بَدَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُخۡفُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ رُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِمَا نُهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

6:29.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوث<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

6:30.text: وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ وُقِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۚ قَالَ أَلَيۡسَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَا‌ۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

6:31.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَسِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَسۡرَتَنَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نَا فِيهَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡمِلُونَ أَوۡزَارَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِهِمۡ‌ۚ أَلَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَزِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

6:32.text: وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا لَعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَلدَّارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ‌ۗ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

6:33.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَعۡلَمُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَيَحۡزُنُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَقُولُونَ‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يُكَذِّبُونَكَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

6:34.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَصَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَا كُذِّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأُوذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ نَصۡرُنَا‌ۚ وَلَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبَإِ<rule class=slnt>ىۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٤

6:35.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيۡكَ إِعۡرَاضُهُمۡ فَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡتَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِىَ نَفَ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَوۡ سُلَّ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَتَأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَجَمَعَهُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ‌ۚ فَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

6:36.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَسۡتَجِيبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡمَعُونَ‌ۘ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

6:37.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَادِرٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَزِّلَ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

6:38.text: وَمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َطِيرُ بِجَنَاحَيۡهِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمَمٌ أَمۡثَالُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فَرَّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

6:39.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا صُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبُكۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۗ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَإِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُضۡلِلۡهُ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡهُ عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٩

6:40.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡ أَتَتۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ أَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

6:41.text: بَلۡ إِيَّاهُ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ فَيَكۡشِفُ مَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلَيۡهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َوۡنَ مَا تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

6:42.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَأۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَضَرَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

6:43.text: فَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسُنَا تَضَرَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

6:44.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَ كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا فَرِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوت<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

6:45.text: فَقُطِعَ دَابِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥

6:46.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمۡعَكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكُمۡ وَخَتَمَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٌ غَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَأۡتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِ‌ۗ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ نُصَرِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ هُمۡ يَصۡدِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

6:47.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتَكُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ جَهۡرَةً هَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

6:48.text: وَمَا نُرۡسِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِينَ‌ۖ فَمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

6:49.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يَمَسُّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡسُق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

6:50.text: قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولُ لَكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِى خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولُ لَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَلَكٌ‌ۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ‌ۚ قُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصِيرُ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

6:51.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۙ لَيۡسَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا شَفِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

6:52.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رُدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَدَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَشِىِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ مَا عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ حِسَابِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا مِنۡ حِسَابِكَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رُدَهُمۡ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

6:53.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بَعۡضَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَلَيۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

6:54.text: وَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَقُلۡ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ كَتَبَ رَبُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةَ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَنۡ عَمِلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓء<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِجَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَصۡلَحَ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٤

6:55.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَلِتَسۡتَبِينَ سَبِيلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

6:56.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَّبِعُ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۙ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَلۡتُ إِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

6:57.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى وَكَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ مَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِى مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ‌ۖ يَقُصُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ‌ۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

6:58.text: قُل لَّوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِى مَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَقُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

6:59.text: ۞وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَفَاتِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ لَا يَعۡلَمُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ‌ۚ وَمَا تَسۡقُطُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَقَةٍ إِلَّا يَعۡلَمُهَا وَلَا حَبَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى ظُلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا رَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَابِسٍ إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٥٩

6:60.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا جَرَحۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُكُمۡ فِيهِ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=ikhafa>ًّى‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

6:61.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَاهِرُ فَوۡقَ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَيُرۡسِلُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَفَظَةً حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَحَدَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ تَوَفَّتۡهُ رُسُلُنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفَرِّط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

6:62.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رُدّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ أَلَا لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ وَهُوَ أَسۡرَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٢

6:63.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَجِّيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>ُلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> تَضَرُّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخُفۡيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّئِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا مِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٣

6:64.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُنَجِّيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ كَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

6:65.text: قُلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَادِرُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِكُمۡ أَوۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِكُمۡ أَوۡ يَلۡبِسَكُمۡ شِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُذِيقَ بَعۡضَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسَ بَعۡضٍ‌ۗ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ نُصَرِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

6:66.text: وَكَذَّبَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِوَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٦٦

6:67.text: لِّكُلِّ نَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>إٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

6:68.text: وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخُوضُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَخُوضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى حَدِيثٍ غَيۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَىٰ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

6:69.text: وَمَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

6:70.text: وَذَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دِينَهُمۡ لَعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَرَّتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۚ وَذَكِّرۡ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سَلَ نَفۡ<rule class=iqlab>سُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَتۡ لَيۡسَ لَهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا شَفِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡدِلۡ كُلَّ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡخَذۡ مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> لَهُمۡ شَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَذَابٌ أَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

6:71.text: قُلۡ أَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُنَا وَلَا يَضُرُّنَا وَنُرَدُّ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡقَابِنَا بَعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَهۡوَتۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ حَيۡرَانَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِنَا‌ۗ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هُدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ‌ۖ وَأُمِرۡنَا لِنُسۡلِمَ لِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

6:72.text: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُوهُ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

6:73.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ وَيَوۡمَ يَقُولُ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَكُونُ‌ۚ قَوۡلُهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۚ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َخُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ‌ۚ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَكِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٧٣

6:74.text: ۞وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ ءَازَرَ أَتَتَّخِذُ أَصۡنَامًا ءَالِهَةً‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ وَقَوۡمَكَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧٤

6:75.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ مَلَكُوتَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلِيَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

6:76.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلُ رَءَا كَوۡكَ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا رَبِّى‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَلَ قَالَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٦

6:77.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ بَازِ<rule class=ikhafa>غًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا رَبِّى‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَلَ قَالَ لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَهۡدِنِى رَبِّى لَأَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

6:78.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ بَازِغَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا رَبِّى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡبَرُ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَلَتۡ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

6:79.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى وَجَّهۡتُ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِىَ لِلَّذِى فَطَرَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٩

6:80.text: وَح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَوۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ قَالَ أَتُحَ<rule class=madda_necessary>ـٰٓ</rule>جّ<rule class=madda_necessary>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَافُ مَا تُشۡرِكُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبِّى شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسِعَ رَبِّى كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ عِلۡمًا‌ۗ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

6:81.text: وَكَيۡفَ أَخَافُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡرَكۡتُمۡ وَلَا تَخَافُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ أَشۡرَكۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ أَحَقُّ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡنِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

6:82.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَمۡ يَلۡبِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِظُلۡمٍ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡنُ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

6:83.text: وَتِلۡكَ حُجَّتُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٨٣

6:84.text: وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ‌ۚ كُلاًّ هَدَيۡنَا‌ۚ وَنُوحًا هَدَيۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ وَسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَأَيُّوبَ وَيُوسُفَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ‌ۚ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

6:85.text: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحۡيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلۡيَاسَ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

6:86.text: وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَسَعَ وَيُونُسَ وَلُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضَّلۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

6:87.text: وَمِنۡ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ وَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٨٧

6:88.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَهۡدِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَوۡ أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَحَبِطَ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

6:89.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُبُوَّةَ‌ۚ فَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بِهَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَكَّلۡنَا بِهَا قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيۡسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا بِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٩

6:90.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ فَبِهُدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَدِهۡ‌ۗ قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا‌ۖ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

6:91.text: وَمَا قَدَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ حَقَّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ مَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُوسَىٰ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۖ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَرَاطِيسَ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُونَهَا وَتُخۡفُونَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُلِّمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ‌ۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ ذَرۡهُمۡ فِى خَوۡضِهِمۡ يَلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩١

6:92.text: وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مُبَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّصَدِّقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَلِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢
