6:105.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُصَرِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَلِيَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دَرَسۡتَ وَلِنُبَيِّنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

6:106.text: ٱتَّبِعۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٦

6:107.text: وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَمَا جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِوَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ١٠٧

6:108.text: وَلَا تَسُبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَيَسُبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>و<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ عِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لِكُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ عَمَلَهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرۡجِعُهُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٨

6:109.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ لَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيُؤۡمِنُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِهَا‌ۚ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَمَا يُشۡعِرُكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٩

6:110.text: وَنُقَلِّبُ أَفۡــِٔدَتَهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ كَمَا لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذَرُهُمۡ فِى طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٠

6:111.text: ۞وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا نَزَّلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ وَكَلَّمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَحَشَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ كُلَّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُبُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

6:112.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ يُوحِى بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُخۡرُفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ غُرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ مَا فَعَلُوهُ‌ۖ فَذَرۡهُمۡ وَمَا يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٢

6:113.text: وَلِتَصۡغَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ أَفۡــِٔدَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَلِيَرۡضَوۡهُ وَلِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٣

6:114.text: أَفَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِى حَكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ إِلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مُفَصَّل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُنَزَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٤

6:115.text: وَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١١٥

6:116.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُطِعۡ أَكۡثَرَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يُضِلُّوكَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٦

6:117.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضِلُّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٧

6:118.text: فَكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذُكِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٨

6:119.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذُكِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَصَّلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا حَرَّمَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِلَّا مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡطُرِرۡتُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيُضِلُّونَ بِأَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٍ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٩

6:120.text: وَذَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمِ وَبَاطِنَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَكۡسِبُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمَ سَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٠

6:121.text: وَلَا تَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا لَمۡ يُذۡكَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَفِسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ لَيُوحُونَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ لِيُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُوكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِنۡ أَطَعۡتُمُوهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢١

6:122.text: أَوَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>تًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَحۡيَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡشِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ كَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّثَلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَيۡسَ بِخَارِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٢

6:123.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَعَلۡنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٍ أَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِرَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِيهَا لِيَمۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا‌ۖ وَمَا يَمۡكُرُونَ إِلَّا بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَمَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٣

6:124.text: وَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ حَتَّىٰ نُؤۡتَىٰ مِثۡلَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ رُسُلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۘ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ حَيۡثُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ رِسَالَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ سَيُصِيبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَغَارٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَعَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَمۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٤

6:125.text: فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِيَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَشۡرَحۡ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلۡإِسۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ضَيِّقًا حَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>جًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَصَّعَّدُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٥

6:126.text: وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَصَّلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٦

6:127.text: ۞لَهُمۡ دَارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ وَلِيُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٧

6:128.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَعۡشَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ قَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡثَرۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ‌ۖ وَقَالَ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡتَعَ بَعۡضُنَا بِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَلَغۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجَلَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَجَّلۡتَ لَنَا‌ۚ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ مَثۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ حَكِيمٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢٨

6:129.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُوَلِّى بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ بَعۡض<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٩

6:130.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَعۡشَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُونَكُمۡ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِنَا‌ۖ وَغَرَّتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَشَهِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٠

6:131.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَهۡلُهَا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣١

6:132.text: وَلِكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٢

6:133.text: وَرَبُّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةِ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفۡ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّةِ قَوۡمٍ ءَاخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٣

6:134.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَا تُوعَدُونَ لَأَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٤

6:135.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عَامِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٥

6:136.text: وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذَرَأَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡثِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ نَصِي<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لِلَّهِ بِزَعۡمِهِمۡ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لِشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنَا‌ۖ فَمَا كَانَ لِشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ فَلَا يَصِلُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ فَهُوَ يَصِلُ إِلَىٰ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ‌ۗ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٦

6:137.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زَيَّنَ لِكَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ قَتۡلَ أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِهِمۡ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُمۡ لِيُرۡدُوهُمۡ وَلِيَلۡبِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ دِينَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا فَعَلُوهُ‌ۖ فَذَرۡهُمۡ وَمَا يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٧

6:138.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَرۡثٌ حِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَمُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ بِزَعۡمِهِمۡ وَأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ حُرِّمَتۡ ظُهُورُهَا وَأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَذۡكُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً عَلَيۡهِ‌ۚ سَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٨

6:139.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فِى بُطُونِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ خَالِصَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّذُكُورِنَا وَمُحَرَّمٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِنَا‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُمۡ فِيهِ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ سَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيهِمۡ وَصۡفَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَكِيمٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٣٩

6:140.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَسِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَتَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَهُمۡ سَفَه<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَرَّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا رَزَقَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٠

6:141.text: ۞وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡرُوشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَيۡرَ مَعۡرُوشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّرۡعَ مُخۡتَلِفًا أُكُلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّيۡتُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َانَ مُتَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَيۡرَ مُتَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ<rule class=ikhafa>هٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َمَرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَثۡمَرَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَقَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَوۡمَ حَصَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَلَا تُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤١

6:142.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ حَمُولَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>شًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَقَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خُطُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٤٢

6:143.text: ثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّأۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ‌ۗ قُلۡ ءَآلذَّكَرَيۡنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َيَيۡنِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَمَلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَرۡحَامُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َيَيۡنِ‌ۖ نَبِّــُٔونِى بِعِلۡمٍ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٣

6:144.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِبِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَقَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ‌ۗ قُلۡ ءَآلذَّكَرَيۡنِ حَرَّمَ أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َيَيۡنِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَمَلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَرۡحَامُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َيَيۡنِ‌ۖ أَمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِذۡ وَصَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۚ فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُضِلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٍ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٤

6:145.text: قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجِدُ فِى م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَىَّ مُحَرَّمًا عَلَىٰ طَاعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَمُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ مَيۡتَةً أَوۡ دَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡفُوحًا أَوۡ لَحۡمَ خِ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سٌ أَوۡ فِسۡقًا أُهِلَّ لِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡطُرَّ غَيۡرَ بَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>غٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤٥

6:146.text: وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَرَّمۡنَا كُلَّ ذِى ظُفُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَقَرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنَمِ حَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ شُحُومَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَا حَمَلَتۡ ظُهُورُهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَوَاي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَطَ بِعَظۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَزَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَغۡيِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٦

6:147.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبُوكَ فَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبُّكُمۡ ذُو رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٧

6:148.text: سَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡرَكۡنَا وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا وَلَا حَرَّمۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ ذَاقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَأۡسَنَا‌ۗ قُلۡ هَلۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتُخۡرِجُوهُ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَإِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا تَخۡرُص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٨

6:149.text: قُلۡ فَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُجَّةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغَةُ‌ۖ فَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَهَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٩

6:150.text: قُلۡ هَلُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَشۡهَدُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ حَرَّمَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا تَشۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَعَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّهِمۡ يَعۡدِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٠

6:151.text: ۞قُلۡ تَعَالَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَتۡلُ مَا حَرَّمَ رَبُّكُمۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ أَلَّا تُشۡرِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َبِ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِمۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكُمۡ وَإِيَّاهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡفَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنۡهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَصَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥١

6:152.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ أَشُدَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۖ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَا‌ۖ وَإِذَا قُلۡتُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡدِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰ‌ۖ وَبِعَهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَصَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٢

6:153.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِى مُسۡتَقِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُوهُ‌ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّبُلَ فَتَفَرَّقَ بِكُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَصَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٣

6:154.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ تَمَامًا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ وَتَفۡصِيل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّهِمۡ يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٤

6:155.text: وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مُبَارَ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُوهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٥

6:156.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ عَلَىٰ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَتَيۡنِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِنَا وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِرَاسَتِهِمۡ لَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٦

6:157.text: أَوۡ تَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ لَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۚ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَصَدَفَ عَنۡهَا‌ۗ سَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَصۡدِفُونَ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَصۡدِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٧

6:158.text: هَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ أَوۡ يَأۡتِىَ رَبُّكَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِىَ بَعۡضُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّكَ‌ۗ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِى بَعۡضُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّكَ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ نَفۡسًا إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهَا لَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَامَنَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ أَوۡ كَسَبَتۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهَا خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٨

6:159.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فَرَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دِينَهُمۡ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شِيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّسۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِى شَىۡءٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرُهُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٩

6:160.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَشۡرُ أَمۡثَالِهَا‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَّا مِثۡلَهَا وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٠

6:161.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نِى رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقِي<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِي<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّلَّةَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦١

6:162.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحۡيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٢

6:163.text: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَبِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أُمِرۡتُ وَأَنَاۡ أَوَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٣

6:164.text: قُلۡ أَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِى رَب<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ رَبُّ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡسٍ إِلَّا عَلَيۡهَا‌ۚ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٤

6:165.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَرَفَعَ بَعۡضَكُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَكُمۡ فِى م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ سَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِقَابِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُۢ ١٦٥

7:2.text: كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ فَلَا يَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِكَ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ لِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

7:3.text: ٱتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۗ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

7:4.text: وَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا فَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهَا بَأۡسُنَا بَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تًا أَوۡ هُمۡ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

7:5.text: فَمَا كَانَ دَعۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

7:6.text: فَلَنَسۡــَٔلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَنَسۡــَٔلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

7:7.text: فَلَنَقُصَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا غ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

7:8.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَزۡنُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۚ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َقُلَتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

7:9.text: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

7:10.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يِشَ‌ۗ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

7:11.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ صَوَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَدَمَ فَسَجَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ لَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

7:12.text: قَالَ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَلَّا تَسۡجُدَ إِذۡ أَمَرۡتُكَ‌ۖ قَالَ أَنَاۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَنِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٢

7:13.text: قَالَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا فَمَا يَكُونُ لَكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَكَبَّرَ فِيهَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

7:14.text: قَالَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ِرۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

7:15.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

7:16.text: قَالَ فَبِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡوَيۡتَنِى لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ١٦

7:17.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَأَتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ وَعَنۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ وَعَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

7:18.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا مَذۡءُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَأَمۡلَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

7:19.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ـَٔـادَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡكُنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَزَوۡجُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ فَكُلَا مِنۡ حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمَا وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةَ فَتَكُونَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

7:20.text: فَوَسۡوَسَ لَهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِىَ لَهُمَا مَا وُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>رِىَ عَنۡهُمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>س</rule>َوۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِمَا وَقَالَ مَا نَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمَا رَبُّكُمَا عَنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَا مَلَكَيۡنِ أَوۡ تَكُونَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

7:21.text: وَقَاسَمَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكُمَا لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١

7:22.text: فَدَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا بِغُرُو<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذَاقَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةَ بَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۖ وَنَادَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمَا رَبُّهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَمۡ أَنۡهَكُمَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ِلۡكُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةِ وَأَقُل لَّكُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَكُمَا عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٢

7:23.text: قَالَا رَبَّنَا ظَلَمۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَنَا وَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَتَرۡحَمۡنَا لَنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣

7:24.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُسۡتَقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عٌ إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٤

7:25.text: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

7:26.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ لِبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ي</rule>ُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِى سَوۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ وَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>شًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِبَاسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

7:27.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ لَا يَفۡتِنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرَجَ أَبَوَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِعُ عَنۡهُمَا لِبَاسَهُمَا لِيُرِيَهُمَا سَوۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِم<rule class='madda_obligatory_monfasel'>َآ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ هُوَ وَقَبِيلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا تَرَوۡنَهُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

7:28.text: وَإِذَا فَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَمَرَنَا بِهَا‌ۗ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَأۡمُرُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

7:29.text: قُلۡ أَمَرَ رَبِّى بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۖ وَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وُجُوهَكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ كُلِّ مَسۡجِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ‌ۚ كَمَا بَدَأَكُمۡ تَعُود<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

7:30.text: فَرِيقًا هَدَىٰ وَفَرِيقًا حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَةُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

7:31.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ خُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> زِينَتَكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ كُلِّ مَسۡجِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَا تُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

7:32.text: قُلۡ مَنۡ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخۡرَجَ لِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقِ‌ۚ قُلۡ هِىَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا خَالِصَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

7:33.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا حَرَّمَ رَبِّىَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡفَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِشَ مَا ظَهَرَ مِنۡهَا وَمَا بَطَنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡىَ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُشۡرِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

7:34.text: وَلِكُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَأۡخِرُونَ سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

7:35.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يَقُصُّونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى‌ۙ فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَىٰ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

7:36.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

7:37.text: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَنَالُهُمۡ نَصِيبُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُنَا يَتَوَفَّوۡنَهُمۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَشَهِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

7:38.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَتۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَنَتۡ أُخۡتَهَا‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>دَّارَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَتۡ أُخۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِأُولَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ رَبَّنَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَضَلُّونَا فَـَٔـاتِهِمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ِعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ قَالَ لِكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ِعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

7:39.text: وَقَالَتۡ أُولَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِأُخۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَمَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

7:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا لَا تُفَتَّحُ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَلَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ حَتَّىٰ يَلِجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمَلُ فِى سَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِيَاطِ‌ۚ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

7:41.text: لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مِهَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِمۡ غَوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>شٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

7:42.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

7:54.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ يُغۡشِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>لُبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُجُومَ مُسَخَّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='iqlab'>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَلَا لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ‌ۗ تَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٤

7:56.text: وَلَا تُفۡسِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َطَمَعًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَحۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

7:57.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُرۡسِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ بُشۡر<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ يَدَىۡ رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقَلَّتۡ سَحَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ِقَال<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ لِبَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيِّ<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

7:58.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبُ يَخۡرُجُ نَبَاتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَبُثَ لَا يَخۡرُجُ إِلَّا نَكِ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُصَرِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

7:59.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٩

7:60.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٦٠

7:61.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦١

7:62.text: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّى وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َحُ لَكُمۡ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

7:63.text: أَوَعَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ لِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَكُمۡ وَلِتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

7:64.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ وَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمًا عَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

7:65.text: ۞وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُو<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَفَلَا تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

7:66.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ فِى سَفَاهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

7:67.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لَيۡسَ بِى سَفَاهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

7:68.text: أُبَلِّغُكُمۡ رِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّى وَأَنَاۡ لَكُمۡ نَاصِحٌ أَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦٨

7:69.text: أَوَعَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ لِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ جَعَلَكُمۡ خُلَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ قَوۡمِ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزَادَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقِ بَصۜۡطَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩
