7:70.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَجِئۡتَنَا لِنَعۡبُدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَحۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَنَذَرَ مَا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا‌ۖ فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٠

7:71.text: قَالَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَقَعَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَضَبٌ‌ۖ أَتُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُونَنِى ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َيۡتُمُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

7:72.text: فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَقَطَعۡنَا دَابِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۖ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

7:73.text: وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَاقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٣

7:74.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ جَعَلَكُمۡ خُلَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ عَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَوَّأَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُهُولِهَا قُصُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَنۡحِتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ بُيُو<rule class=ikhafa>تًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

7:75.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُضۡعِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِمَنۡ ءَامَنَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَتَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّرۡسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

7:76.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

7:77.text: فَعَقَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاقَةَ وَعَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

7:78.text: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>فَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دَارِهِمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٨

7:79.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَالَةَ رَبِّى وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُحِبُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٩

7:80.text: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا مِنۡ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

7:81.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالَ شَهۡوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

7:82.text: وَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَخۡرِجُوه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَتِكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أُنَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَطَهَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

7:83.text: فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَتۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

7:84.text: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّطَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

7:85.text: وَإِلَىٰ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ فَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أَشۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَلَا تُفۡسِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بَعۡدَ إِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

7:86.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِكُلِّ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُوعِدُونَ وَتَصُدُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَهَا عِوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَثَّرَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

7:87.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَيۡنَنَا‌ۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

7:88.text: ۞قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنُخۡرِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شُعَيۡبُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ لَتَعُودُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى مِلَّتِنَا‌ۚ قَالَ أَوَلَوۡ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٨

7:89.text: قَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَيۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا إِنۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا فِى مِلَّتِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ إِذۡ نَجَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنۡهَا‌ۚ وَمَا يَكُونُ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّعُودَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّنَا‌ۚ وَسِعَ رَبُّنَا كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ عِلۡمًا‌ۚ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا‌ۚ رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَحۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ قَوۡمِنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٩

7:90.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتُمۡ شُعَيۡبًا إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٠

7:91.text: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>فَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دَارِهِمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

7:92.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُعَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُعَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٢

7:93.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَغۡتُكُمۡ رِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّى وَنَصَحۡتُ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ فَكَيۡفَ ءَاسَىٰ عَلَىٰ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٣

7:94.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِى قَرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِىٍّ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَذۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَهَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَأۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَضَّرَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٤

7:95.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَدَّلۡنَا مَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةَ حَتَّىٰ عَفَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَسَّ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

7:96.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَفَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َرَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

7:97.text: أَفَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسُنَا بَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٧

7:98.text: أَوَأَمِنَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسُنَا ضُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يَلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٨

7:99.text: أَفَأَمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ فَلَا يَأۡمَنُ مَكۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٩

7:100.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لِلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ أَصَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذُنُوبِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٠

7:101.text: تِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهَا‌ۚ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠١

7:102.text: وَمَا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِأَكۡثَرِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٢

7:103.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَعَثۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٣

7:104.text: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرۡعَوۡنُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٤

7:105.text: حَقِيقٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِىَ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ١٠٥

7:106.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأۡتِ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٦

7:107.text: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعۡبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٠٧

7:108.text: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٨

7:109.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِرٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٩

7:110.text: يُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡرِجَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡ‌ۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٠

7:111.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَأَرۡسِلۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنِ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١١

7:112.text: يَأۡتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِرٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١١٢

7:113.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَنَا لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٣

7:114.text: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَرَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٤

7:115.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُلۡقِىَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكُونَ نَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٥

7:116.text: قَالَ أَلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلۡقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَحَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَعۡيُنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَرۡهَبُوهُمۡ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو بِسِحۡرٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١١٦

7:117.text: ۞وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَ‌ۖ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٧

7:118.text: فَوَقَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَبَطَلَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٨

7:119.text: فَغُلِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُنَالِكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٩

7:120.text: وَأُلۡقِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٠

7:121.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢١

7:123.text: قَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَمَكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَرۡتُمُوهُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ لِتُخۡرِجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَهَا‌ۖ فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٣

7:124.text: لَأُقَطِّعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>فٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَأُصَلِّبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٤

7:125.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٥

7:126.text: وَمَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ِمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡ ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّنَا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡنَا‌ۚ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٦

7:127.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ أَتَذَرُ مُوسَىٰ وَقَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِيُفۡسِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَيَذَرَكَ وَءَالِهَتَكَ‌ۚ قَالَ سَنُقَتِّلُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَنَسۡتَحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَوۡقَهُمۡ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٧

7:128.text: قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعِينُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ لِلَّهِ يُورِثُهَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٨

7:129.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أُوذِينَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَنَا وَم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا جِئۡتَنَا‌ۚ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُهۡلِكَ عَدُوَّكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٩

7:130.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّنِينَ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>صٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٠

7:131.text: فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةُ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ سَيِّئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َطَّيَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمُوسَىٰ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِرُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣١

7:132.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَهۡمَا تَأۡتِنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَسۡحَرَنَا بِهَا فَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٢

7:133.text: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّوفَانَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَرَادَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّفَادِعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّمَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّفَصَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٣

7:134.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا وَقَعَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زُ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َكَ‌ۖ لَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َشَفۡتَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ لَنُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ وَلَنُرۡسِلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَعَكَ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ١٣٤

7:135.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَلٍ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغُوهُ إِذَا هُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٥

7:136.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٦

7:137.text: وَأَوۡرَثۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ مَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِبَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكۡنَا فِيهَا‌ۖ وَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ عَلَىٰ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ بِمَا صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَدَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرۡنَا مَا كَانَ يَصۡنَعُ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَقَوۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡرِش<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٧

7:138.text: وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَزۡنَا بِبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَ فَأَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡكُفُونَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَصۡنَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>هًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َمَا لَهُمۡ ءَالِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٨

7:139.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مُتَبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا هُمۡ فِيهِ وَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣٩

7:140.text: قَالَ أَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِيكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ فَضَّلَكُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٠

7:141.text: وَإِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ‌ۖ يُقَتِّلُونَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيُونَ نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَفِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤١

7:142.text: ۞وَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عَ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>نَا مُوسَىٰ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِينَ لَيۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَتۡمَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا بِعَشۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ مِيقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَرۡبَعِينَ لَيۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَخِيهِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡلُفۡنِى فِى قَوۡمِى وَأَصۡلِحۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ سَبِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٢

7:143.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مُوسَىٰ لِمِيقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَكَلَّمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَالَ رَبِّ أَرِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۚ قَالَ لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نِى وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَبَلِ فَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقَرَّ مَكَانَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَسَوۡفَ تَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نِى‌ۚ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَجَلَّىٰ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلۡجَبَلِ جَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> دَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَرَّ مُوسَىٰ صَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَاقَ قَالَ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُ إِلَيۡكَ وَأَنَاۡ أَوَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٣

7:144.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَيۡتُكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِرِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَبِكَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِى فَخُذۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡتُكَ وَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٤

7:145.text: وَكَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡوَاحِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّوۡعِظَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَفۡصِيل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخُذۡهَا بِقُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأۡمُرۡ قَوۡمَكَ يَأۡخُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَحۡسَنِهَا‌ۚ سَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>رِيكُمۡ دَارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٥

7:146.text: سَأَصۡرِفُ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتَكَبَّرُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلَّ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَبِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّشۡدِ لَا يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَبِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَىِّ يَتَّخِذُوهُ سَبِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٦

7:147.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ‌ۚ هَلۡ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٧

7:148.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ قَوۡمُ مُوسَىٰ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ حُلِيِّهِمۡ عِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خُوَارٌ‌ۚ أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُكَلِّمُهُمۡ وَلَا يَهۡدِيهِمۡ سَبِيلاً‌ۘ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُوهُ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٨

7:149.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سُقِطَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَرَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَرۡحَمۡنَا رَبُّنَا وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا لَنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٩

7:150.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَجَعَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> غَضۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ أَسِ<rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ بِئۡسَمَا خَلَفۡتُمُونِى م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> أَعَجِلۡتُمۡ أَمۡرَ رَبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَأَلۡقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡوَاحَ وَأَخَذَ بِرَأۡسِ أَخِيهِ يَجُرُّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَضۡعَفُونِى وَكَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَنِى فَلَا تُشۡمِتۡ بِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٠

7:151.text: قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِى وَلِأَخِى وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡنَا فِى رَحۡمَتِكَ‌ۖ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ أَرۡحَمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِم<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥١

7:152.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لَ سَيَنَالُهُمۡ غَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ وَذِلَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۚ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٢

7:153.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهَا وَءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهَا لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥٣

7:154.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سَكَتَ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَضَبُ أَخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡوَاحَ‌ۖ وَفِى نُسۡخَتِهَا هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِرَبِّهِمۡ يَرۡهَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٤

7:155.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَارَ مُوسَىٰ قَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عِينَ رَجُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمِيقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>فَةُ قَالَ رَبِّ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ أَهۡلَكۡتَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَإِيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ‌ۖ أَتُهۡلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّفَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِنۡ هِىَ إِلَّا فِتۡنَتُكَ تُضِلُّ بِهَا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَتَهۡدِى مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَلِيُّنَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡحَمۡنَا‌ۖ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٥

7:156.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَنَا فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا هُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ‌ۚ قَالَ عَذَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُصِيبُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَنۡ أَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَرَحۡمَتِى وَسِعَتۡ كُلَّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَأَكۡتُبُهَا لِلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٦

7:157.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَجِدُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَكۡتُوبًا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيلِ يَأۡمُرُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَيُحِلُّ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَيُحَرِّمُ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِثَ وَيَضَعُ عَنۡهُمۡ إِصۡرَهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كَانَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَعَزَّرُوهُ وَنَصَرُوهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۙ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٧

7:158.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَيۡكُمۡ جَمِيعًا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ‌ۖ فَـَٔـامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِىِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُوهُ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٨

7:159.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَعۡدِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٩

7:160.text: وَقَطَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَتَىۡ عَشۡرَةَ أَسۡبَاطًا أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَسۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ قَوۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَجَرَ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َجَسَتۡ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَتَا عَشۡرَةَ عَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمَ كُلُّ أُنَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّشۡرَبَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَظَلَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلۡوَىٰ‌ۖ كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مَا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمُونَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٠

7:161.text: وَإِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةَ وَكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ شِئۡتُمۡ وَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حِطَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَابَ سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ خَطِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ‌ۚ سَنَزِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦١

7:162.text: فَبَدَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ قَوۡلاً غَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى قِيلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>زًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٢

7:163.text: وَسۡــَٔلۡهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كَانَتۡ حَاضِرَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ إِذۡ يَعۡدُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِ إِذۡ تَأۡتِيهِمۡ حِيتَانُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِهِمۡ شُرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَوۡمَ لَا يَسۡبِتُونَ‌ۙ لَا تَأۡتِيهِمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡسُق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٣

7:164.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَتۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ لِمَ تَعِظُونَ قَوۡمًا‌ۙ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مُهۡلِكُهُمۡ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعۡذِرَةً إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٤

7:165.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ وَأَخَذۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَذَا<rule class=iqlab>بِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َــِٔي<rule class=iqlab>سِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡسُق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٥

7:166.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا نُهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ قُلۡنَا لَهُمۡ كُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قِرَدَةً خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٦

7:167.text: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكَ لَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسُومُهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَسَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِقَابِ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٦٧

7:168.text: وَقَطَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُونَ وَمِنۡهُمۡ دُونَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ وَبَلَوۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٨

7:169.text: فَخَلَفَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَأۡخُذُونَ عَرَضَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَىٰ وَيَقُولُونَ سَيُغۡفَرُ لَنَا وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِهِمۡ عَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَأۡخُذُوهُ‌ۚ أَلَمۡ يُؤۡخَذۡ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَدَرَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فِيهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ‌ۗ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٩

7:170.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُمَسِّكُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَا نُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧٠

7:171.text: ۞وَإِذۡ نَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَبَلَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ظُلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَاقِ<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِهِمۡ خُذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِقُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧١

7:172.text: وَإِذۡ أَخَذَ رَبُّكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>ُهُورِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَأَشۡهَدَهُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ أَلَسۡتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ‌ۛ شَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۛ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧٢

7:173.text: أَوۡ تَقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡرَكَ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ذُرِّيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ‌ۖ أَفَتُهۡلِكُنَا بِمَا فَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٣

7:174.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٤

7:175.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َلَخَ مِنۡهَا فَأَتۡبَعَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فَكَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَاو<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧٥

7:176.text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَرَفَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِهَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَخۡلَدَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ هَوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ‌ۚ فَمَثَلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَمَثَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَلۡبِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡمِلۡ عَلَيۡهِ يَلۡهَثۡ أَوۡ تَتۡرُكۡهُ يَلۡهَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ث</rule>‌ۚ ذّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صُصِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَصَصَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٦

7:177.text: س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَثَلاً <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٧

7:178.text: م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَدِى‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلۡ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٨

7:179.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ذَرَأۡنَا لِجَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ‌ۖ لَهُمۡ قُلُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَفۡقَهُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡيُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرُونَ بِهَا وَلَهُمۡ ءَاذَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَسۡمَعُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٩

7:180.text: وَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ بِهَا‌ۖ وَذَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُلۡحِدُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَسۡمَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ‌ۚ</rule> سَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٠

7:181.text: وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَعۡدِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨١

7:182.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا سَنَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِجُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٢

7:183.text: وَأُمۡلِى لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَيۡدِى مَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٨٣

7:184.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> مَا بِصَاحِبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةٍ‌ۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٨٤

7:185.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى مَلَكُوتِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنۡ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ قَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرَبَ أَجَلُهُمۡ‌ۖ فَبِأَىِّ حَدِي<rule class=iqlab>ثِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٥

7:186.text: م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَلَا هَادِىَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَيَذَرُهُمۡ فِى طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٦

7:187.text: يَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا‌ۖ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّى‌ۖ لَا يُجَلِّيهَا لِوَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ ثَقُلَتۡ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ لَا تَأۡتِيكُمۡ إِلَّا بَغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡــَٔلُونَكَ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ حَفِىٌّ عَنۡهَا‌ۖ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٧

7:188.text: قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِى نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ضَرًّا إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَلَوۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ أَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡثَرۡتُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ وَمَا مَسَّنِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ إِنۡ أَنَاۡ إِلَّا نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَشِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٨

7:189.text: ۞هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا لِيَسۡكُنَ إِلَيۡهَا‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَغَشَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا حَمَلَتۡ حَمۡلاً خَفِي<rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَرَّتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَثۡقَلَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> دَّعَوَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبَّهُمَا لَئِنۡ ءَاتَيۡتَنَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٩

7:190.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فِيم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا‌ۚ فَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩٠

7:191.text: أَيُشۡرِكُونَ مَا لَا يَخۡلُقُ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يُخۡلَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩١

7:192.text: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩٢

7:193.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَتَّبِعُوكُمۡ‌ۚ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَدَعَوۡتُمُوهُمۡ أَمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩٣

7:194.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عِبَادٌ أَمۡثَالُكُمۡ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ فَلۡيَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٤
