7:195.text: أَلَهُمۡ أَرۡجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡشُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> أَمۡ لَهُمۡ أَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِشُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> أَمۡ لَهُمۡ أَعۡيُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> أَمۡ لَهُمۡ ءَاذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡمَعُونَ بِهَا‌ۗ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كِيدُونِ فَلَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٩٥

7:196.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلِــِّۧىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ‌ۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٦

7:197.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩٧

7:198.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ لَا يَسۡمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩٨

7:199.text: خُذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَفۡوَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُرۡفِ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٩

7:200.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َغَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ نَزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>غٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعِذۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٠٠

7:201.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا مَسَّهُمۡ طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ تَذَكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠١

7:202.text: وَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَىِّ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٢

7:203.text: وَإِذَا لَمۡ تَأۡتِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَيۡتَهَا‌ۚ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَّبِعُ مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى‌ۚ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَص<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٣

7:204.text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ِتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٤

7:205.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ فِى نَفۡسِكَ تَضَرُّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخِيفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَهۡرِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُدُوِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصَالِ وَلَا تَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠٥

7:206.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُسَبِّحُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَسۡجُدُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ٢٠٦

8:1.text: يَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َالِ‌ۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َالُ لِلَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَصۡلِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذَاتَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ‌ۖ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١

8:2.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَجِلَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَإِذَا تُلِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> زَادَتۡهُمۡ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

8:3.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

8:4.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ حَق<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ وَمَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤

8:5.text: كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡتِكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

8:6.text: يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُونَكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ بَعۡدَ مَا تَبَيَّنَ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُسَاقُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ وَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

8:7.text: وَإِذۡ يَعِدُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِحۡدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَتَيۡنِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا لَكُمۡ وَتَوَدُّونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ غَيۡرَ ذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّوۡكَةِ تَكُونُ لَكُمۡ وَيُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحِقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعَ دَابِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

8:8.text: لِيُحِقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

8:9.text: إِذۡ تَسۡتَغِيثُونَ رَبَّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَابَ لَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُمِدُّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ مُرۡدِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

8:10.text: وَمَا جَعَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا بُشۡرَىٰ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قُلُوبُكُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصۡرُ إِلَّا مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠

8:11.text: إِذۡ يُغَشِّيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُعَاسَ أَمَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَيُنَزِّلُ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُطَهِّرَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُذۡهِبَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلِيَرۡبِطَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتَ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>د<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>مَ ١١

8:12.text: إِذۡ يُوحِى رَبُّكَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَكُمۡ فَثَبِّتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> سَأُلۡقِى فِى قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّعۡبَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَوۡقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡنَاقِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ كُلَّ بَن<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>نٍ ١٢

8:13.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ش<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشَاقِقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٣

8:14.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٤

8:15.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا لَقِيتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> زَحۡ<rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تُوَلُّوهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رَ ١٥

8:16.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوَلِّهِمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُبُرَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا مُتَحَرِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقِتَالٍ أَوۡ مُتَحَيِّزًا إِلَىٰ فِئَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِغَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٦

8:17.text: فَلَمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوهُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَتَلَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا رَمَيۡتَ إِذۡ رَمَيۡتَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَمَىٰ‌ۚ وَلِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡهُ بَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً حَسَنًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٧

8:18.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُوهِنُ كَيۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

8:19.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَفۡتِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحُ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَهُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعُودُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَعُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُغۡنِىَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فِئَتُكُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ كَثُرَتۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

8:20.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَا تَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

8:21.text: وَلَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَمِعۡنَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

8:22.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ شَرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّو<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبِّ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُكۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

8:23.text: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

8:24.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ إِذَا دَعَاكُمۡ لِمَا يُحۡيِيكُمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَحُولُ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡءِ وَقَلۡبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

8:25.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُصِيبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ خ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓصَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢٥

8:26.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَضۡعَفُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ تَخَافُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَخَطَّفَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ فَـَٔـاوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَأَيَّدَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِنَصۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَرَزَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

8:27.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَخُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ وَتَخُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

8:28.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُكُمۡ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٨

8:29.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ فُرۡقَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُكَفِّرۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢٩

8:30.text: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَ‌ۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

8:31.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَمِعۡنَا لَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَقُلۡنَا مِثۡلَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۙ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

8:32.text: وَإِذۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِكَ فَأَمۡطِرۡ عَلَيۡنَا حِجَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٢

8:33.text: وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فِيهِمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مُعَذِّبَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَسۡتَغۡفِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

8:34.text: وَمَا لَهُمۡ أَلَّا يُعَذِّبَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ وَمَا كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِنۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقُونَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

8:35.text: وَمَا كَانَ صَلَاتُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡتِ إِلَّا مُك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَصۡدِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

8:36.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ لِيَصُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ فَسَيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَهَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسۡرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُغۡلَبُونَ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ يُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

8:37.text: لِيَمِيزَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبِيثَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبِيثَ بَعۡضَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَرۡكُمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

8:38.text: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُغۡفَرۡ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَلَفَ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعُودُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَضَتۡ سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

8:39.text: وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُوهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ لَا تَكُونَ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَكُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينُ كُلُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلَّهِ‌ۚ فَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣٩

8:40.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۚ نِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٤٠

8:41.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا غَنِمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ خُمُسَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِنَا يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُرۡقَانِ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ۡتَقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعَانِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤١

8:42.text: إِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>وَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>وَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُصۡوَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّكۡبُ أَسۡفَلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَوۡ تَوَاعَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِ‌ۙ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مَفۡعُول<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَهۡلِكَ مَنۡ هَلَكَ ع<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَحۡيَىٰ مَنۡ حَىَّ ع<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَسَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٢

8:44.text: وَإِذۡ يُرِيكُمُوهُمۡ إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ۡتَقَيۡتُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡيُنِكُمۡ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُقَلِّلُكُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مَفۡعُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٤٤

8:45.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا لَقِيتُمۡ فِئَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡبُتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

8:46.text: وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَا تَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَفۡشَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَذۡهَبَ رِيحُكُمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

8:48.text: وَإِذۡ زَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ وَقَالَ لَا غَالِبَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى جَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِئَتَانِ نَكَصَ عَلَىٰ عَقِبَيۡهِ وَقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَىٰ مَا لَا تَرَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤٨

8:49.text: إِذۡ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَضٌ غَرَّ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ دِينُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٩

8:50.text: وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ يَتَوَفَّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ وَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ٥٠

8:51.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٥١

8:52.text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ‌ۙ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَوِ<rule class=ikhafa>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٥٢

8:53.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَمۡ يَكُ مُغَيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّعۡمَةً أَنۡعَمَهَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۙ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٣

8:54.text: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ‌ۙ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذُنُوبِهِمۡ وَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ‌ۚ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٤

8:55.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ شَرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّو<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبِّ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

8:56.text: ٱلَّذِينَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّ مِنۡهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُضُونَ عَهۡدَهُمۡ فِى كُلِّ مَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

8:57.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَثۡقَفَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

8:58.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَخَافَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمٍ خِيَانَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِذۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَلَىٰ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

8:74.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاوَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّنَصَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ حَق<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٤

8:75.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدُ وَهَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَكُمۡ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُۢ ٧٥

9:1.text: بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تّ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١

9:2.text: فَسِيحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَرۡبَعَةَ أَشۡهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡزِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

9:3.text: وَأَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَجِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَكۡبَرِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ‌ۙ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فَهُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ غَيۡرُ مُعۡجِزِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣

9:4.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تّ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُصُوكُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يُظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَحَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ عَهۡدَهُمۡ إِلَىٰ مُدَّتِهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

9:5.text: فَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َلَخَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَشۡهُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُرُمُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ حَيۡثُ وَجَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمُوهُمۡ وَخُذُوهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡصُرُوهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ كُلَّ مَرۡصَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ فَخَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَبِيلَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥

9:6.text: وَإِنۡ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَارَكَ فَأَجِرۡهُ حَتَّىٰ يَسۡمَعَ كَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِغۡهُ مَأۡمَنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

9:7.text: كَيۡفَ يَكُونُ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ عَهۡدٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ‌ۖ فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

9:8.text: كَيۡفَ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َظۡهَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا يَرۡقُبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيكُمۡ إِل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ذِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡضُونَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَتَأۡبَىٰ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

9:9.text: ٱشۡتَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

9:10.text: لَا يَرۡقُبُونَ فِى مُؤۡمِنٍ إِل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ذِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

9:11.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ فَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ‌ۗ وَنُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

9:12.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ عَهۡدِهِمۡ وَطَعَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دِينِكُمۡ فَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

9:13.text: أَلَا تُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ وَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِإِخۡرَاجِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َدَءُوكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٍ‌ۚ أَتَخۡشَوۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَحَقُّ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡشَوۡهُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

9:14.text: قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُوهُمۡ يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَيُخۡزِهِمۡ وَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَيَشۡفِ صُدُورَ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

9:15.text: وَيُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> غَيۡظَ قُلُوبِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَيَتُوبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥

9:16.text: أَمۡ حَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُتۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡلَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلَمۡ يَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلِيجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

9:17.text: مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدِينَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ هُمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

9:18.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَعۡمُرُ مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَأَقَامَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَلَمۡ يَخۡشَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ فَعَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

9:19.text: ۞أَجَعَلۡتُمۡ سِقَايَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجِّ وَعِمَارَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ كَمَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ لَا يَسۡتَوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>نَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

9:20.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

9:21.text: يُبَشِّرُهُمۡ رَبُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَرِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَعِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢١

9:22.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَدًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢

9:23.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَتَّخِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ وَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَحَبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

9:24.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ وَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جُكُمۡ وَعَشِيرَتُكُمۡ وَأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لٌ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرَفۡتُمُوهَا وَتِجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡشَوۡنَ كَسَادَهَا وَمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنُ تَرۡضَوۡنَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَبَّ إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَجِهَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى سَبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَتَرَبَّصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

9:25.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَصَرَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى مَوَاطِنَ كَثِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَوۡمَ حُنَيۡنٍ‌ۙ إِذۡ أَعۡجَبَتۡكُمۡ كَثۡرَتُكُمۡ فَلَمۡ تُغۡنِ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ وَلَّيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

9:26.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ جُنُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا وَعَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

9:27.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَتُوبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٧

9:28.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكُونَ نَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامَ بَعۡدَ عَامِهِمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۚ وَإِنۡ خِفۡتُمۡ عَيۡلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَوۡفَ يُغۡنِيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٨

9:29.text: قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَلَا يُحَرِّمُونَ مَا حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَا يَدِينُونَ دِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ حَتَّىٰ يُعۡطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِزۡيَةَ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

9:30.text: وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَهُودُ عُزَيۡرٌ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَوۡلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ‌ۖ يُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِــُٔونَ قَوۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

9:31.text: ٱتَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَحۡبَارَهُمۡ وَرُهۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ أَرۡبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسِيحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_wo_ghunnah'>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

9:32.text: يُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فِــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نُورَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَيَأۡبَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُورَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

9:33.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ كُلِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

9:34.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡبَارِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّهۡبَانِ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَكۡنِزُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّهَبَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِضَّةَ وَلَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَهَا فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَبَشِّرۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِعَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٤

9:35.text: يَوۡمَ يُحۡمَىٰ عَلَيۡهَا فِى نَارِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ فَتُكۡوَىٰ بِهَا جِبَاهُهُمۡ وَجُنُوبُهُمۡ وَظُهُورُهُمۡ‌ۖ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَا كَنَزۡتُمۡ لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡنِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

9:36.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عِدَّةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّهُورِ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَا عَشَرَ شَهۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَوۡمَ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡبَعَةٌ حُرُ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَيِّمُ‌ۚ فَلَا تَظۡلِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ ك<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َمَا يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَكُمۡ ك<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

9:37.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓءُ زِيَادَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرِ‌ۖ يُضَلُّ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُحِلُّونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُحَرِّمُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُوَاطِــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِدَّةَ مَا حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَيُحِلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ زُيِّنَ لَهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

9:38.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا لَكُمۡ إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثَّاقَلۡتُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ أَرَضِيت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ فَمَا مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ إِلَّا قَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ٣٨

9:39.text: إِلَّا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّوهُ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣٩

9:40.text: إِلَّا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُوهُ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَصَرَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثَانِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ إِذۡ هُمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَارِ إِذۡ يَقُولُ لِصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَا تَحۡزَنۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَنَا‌ۖ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ وَأَيَّدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِجُنُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا وَجَعَلَ كَلِمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّفۡلَىٰ‌ۗ وَكَلِمَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُلۡيَا‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٠

9:41.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خِفَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثِقَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

9:42.text: لَوۡ كَانَ عَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ضًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَفَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َاصِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُوكَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعُدَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّقَّةُ‌ۚ وَسَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡنَا لَخَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا مَعَكُمۡ يُهۡلِكُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢
