9:44.text: لَا يَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

9:45.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَابَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِى رَيۡبِهِمۡ يَتَرَدَّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

9:46.text: ۞وَلَوۡ أَرَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُرُوجَ لَأَعَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عُدَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِعَاثَهُمۡ فَثَبَّطَهُمۡ وَقِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

9:47.text: لَوۡ خَرَجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا زَادُوكُمۡ إِلَّا خَبَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَأَوۡضَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةَ وَفِيكُمۡ سَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُونَ لَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

9:48.text: لَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَقَلَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُمُورَ حَتَّىٰ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَظَهَرَ أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

9:49.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡذ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّى وَلَا تَفۡتِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةِ سَقَطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لَمُحِيطَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

9:50.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَ حَسَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسُؤۡهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَ مُصِيبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرَنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَيَتَوَلَّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّهُمۡ فَرِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

9:51.text: قُل لّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصِيبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَا كَتَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَنَا هُوَ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

9:52.text: قُلۡ هَلۡ تَرَبَّصُونَ بِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِحۡدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَيَيۡنِ‌ۖ وَنَحۡنُ نَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصِيبَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِعَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡ بِأَيۡدِينَا‌ۖ فَتَرَبَّص<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّتَرَبِّص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

9:53.text: قُلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُتَقَبَّلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

9:54.text: وَمَا مَنَعَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَبِرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كُسَالَىٰ وَلَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ إِلَّا وَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

9:55.text: فَلَا تُعۡجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

9:56.text: وَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَمَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡرَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

9:57.text: لَوۡ يَجِدُونَ مَلۡجَــًٔا أَوۡ مَغَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تٍ أَوۡ مُدَّخَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ وَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

9:58.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َلۡمِزُكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَإِنۡ أُعۡطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا رَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يُعۡطَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡخَط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

9:59.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ رَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَسۡبُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَيُؤۡتِينَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>غِب<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

9:60.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ لِلۡفُقَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِلِينَ عَلَيۡهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤَلَّفَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّقَابِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِمِينَ وَفِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ‌ۖ فَرِيضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٠

9:61.text: وَمِنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىَّ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ أُذُ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ أُذُنُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيُؤۡمِنُ لِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ رَسُولَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦١

9:62.text: يَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَكُمۡ لِيُرۡضُوكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحَقُّ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡضُوهُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٢

9:63.text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحَادِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَارَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِزۡىُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٣

9:64.text: يَحۡذَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُورَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡرِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَحۡذَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

9:65.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتَهُمۡ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَخُوضُ وَنَلۡعَبُ‌ۚ قُلۡ أَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

9:67.text: ٱلۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بَعۡضُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بِضُونَ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ‌ۚ نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَنَسِيَهُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

9:68.text: وَعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ هِىَ حَسۡبُهُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٨

9:69.text: كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَشَدَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَكۡثَرَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ل<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡتَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِخَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِهِمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡتَعۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِكُمۡ كَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡتَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِهِمۡ وَخُضۡتُمۡ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَاض<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

9:70.text: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِهِمۡ نَبَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ قَوۡمِ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمُودَ وَقَوۡمِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡتَفِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ أَتَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۖ فَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

9:71.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡمُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَيَنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَيُقِيمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُطِيعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ سَيَرۡحَمُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧١

9:72.text: وَعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا وَمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنَ طَيِّبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َرِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٧٢

9:73.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٧٣

9:74.text: يَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَلِمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرِ وَكَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَعۡدَ إِسۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِهِمۡ وَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا لَمۡ يَنَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَمَا نَقَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡ أَغۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ فَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتُوبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَذَابًا أَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٧٤

9:75.text: ۞وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَئِنۡ ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنَصَّدَّقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

9:76.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَخِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتَوَلَّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

9:77.text: فَأَعۡقَبَهُمۡ نِفَا<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا وَعَدُوهُ وَبِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

9:78.text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٧٨

9:79.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَلۡمِزُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُطَّوِّعِينَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ إِلَّا جُهۡدَهُمۡ فَيَسۡخَرُونَ مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۙ سَخِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٩

9:80.text: ٱسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ أَوۡ لَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عِينَ مَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

9:81.text: فَرِحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخَلَّفُونَ بِمَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عَدِهِمۡ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فَ رَسُولِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكَرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرِّ‌ۗ قُلۡ نَارُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ أَشَدُّ حَر<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

9:82.text: فَلۡيَضۡحَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلۡيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَثِي<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

9:83.text: فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّجَعَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَىٰ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡذَنُوكَ لِلۡخُرُوجِ فَقُل لَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعِىَ أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعِىَ عَدُوًّا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ رَضِيت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُعُودِ أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

9:84.text: وَلَا تُصَلِّ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّاتَ أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَقُمۡ عَلَىٰ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

9:85.text: وَلَا تُعۡجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعَذِّبَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

9:86.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَتۡ سُورَةٌ أَنۡ ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ رَسُولِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡذَنَكَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّوۡلِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذَرۡنَا نَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

9:87.text: رَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوَالِفِ وَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٧

9:88.text: لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

9:89.text: أَعَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨٩

9:90.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعَذِّرُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ لِيُؤۡذَنَ لَهُمۡ وَقَعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ سَيُصِيبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩٠

9:91.text: لَّيۡسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّعَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡضَىٰ وَلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَجِدُونَ مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ حَرَجٌ إِذَا نَصَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ مَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِنِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩١

9:92.text: وَلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَوۡكَ لِتَحۡمِلَهُمۡ قُلۡتَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجِدُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحۡمِلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَلَّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّأَعۡيُنُهُمۡ تَفِيضُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّمۡعِ حَزَنًا أَلَّا يَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

9:93.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُونَكَ وَهُمۡ أَغۡنِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ رَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوَالِفِ وَطَبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

9:94.text: يَعۡتَذِرُونَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ إِذَا رَجَعۡتُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ قُل لَّا تَعۡتَذِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ لَكُمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَبَّأَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنۡ أَخۡبَارِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَسَيَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَمَلَكُمۡ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٤

9:95.text: سَيَحۡلِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَكُمۡ إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لِتُعۡرِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ فَأَعۡرِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

9:96.text: يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ لِتَرۡضَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرۡضَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَرۡضَىٰ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٦

9:97.text: ٱلۡأَعۡرَابُ أَشَدُّ كُفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنِفَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَرُ أَلَّا يَعۡلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حُدُودَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩٧

9:98.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذُ مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُ مَغۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَتَرَبَّصُ بِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَ‌ۚ عَلَيۡهِمۡ د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩٨

9:99.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ وَيَتَّخِذُ مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُ قُرُبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَصَلَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ‌ۚ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا قُرۡبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۚ سَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩٩

9:100.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِقُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِرِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َارِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُوه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِإِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى تَحۡتَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٠

9:101.text: وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ حَوۡلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ مُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ‌ۖ وَمِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ‌ۖ مَرَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِفَاقِ لَا تَعۡلَمُهُمۡ‌ۖ نَحۡنُ نَعۡلَمُهُمۡ‌ۚ سَنُعَذِّبُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَّتَيۡنِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠١

9:102.text: وَءَاخَرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَرَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِذُنُوبِهِمۡ خَلَطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَمَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاخَرَ سَيِّئًا عَسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٢

9:103.text: خُذۡ مِنۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ صَدَقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُطَهِّرُهُمۡ وَتُزَكِّيه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا وَصَلِّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ صَلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>تَكَ سَكَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٣

9:104.text: أَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَأۡخُذُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوَّابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٤

9:105.text: وَقُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَسَيَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَمَلَكُمۡ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ‌ۖ وَسَتُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

9:106.text: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٦

9:107.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَسۡجِ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ِرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَفۡرِيق<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَإِرۡصَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنۡ حَارَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ وَلَيَحۡلِفُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِنۡ أَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٧

9:108.text: لَا تَقُمۡ فِيهِ أَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمَسۡجِدٌ أُسِّسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ مِنۡ أَوَّلِ يَوۡمٍ أَحَقُّ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُومَ فِيهِ‌ۚ فِيهِ رِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحِبُّونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَطَهَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُطَّهِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٨

9:109.text: أَفَمَنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نٍ خَيۡرٌ أ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَسَّسَ بُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ شَفَا جُرُفٍ هَا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>نۡهَارَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فِى نَارِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٩

9:110.text: لَا يَزَالُ بُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَنَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رِيبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقَطَّعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٠

9:111.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَرَىٰ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ وَأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَه<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ‌ۚ يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَلُونَ‌ۖ وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَق<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ‌ۚ وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِعَهۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِبَيۡعِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَايَعۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١١١

9:112.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِبُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِحُونَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>كِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمِرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاهُونَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظُونَ لِحُدُودِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٢

9:113.text: مَا كَانَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَلَوۡ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى قُرۡبَىٰ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١١٣

9:114.text: وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتِغۡفَارُ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ إِلَّا ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّوۡعِدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَدَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِيَّاهُ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّهِ تَبَرَّأَ مِنۡهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ لَأَوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٤

9:115.text: وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُضِلَّ قَوۡم<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ إِذۡ هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُبَيِّنَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَتَّقُونَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٥

9:116.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ‌ۚ وَمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١١٦

9:117.text: لَّقَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule> تَّابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِرِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُوهُ فِى سَاعَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُسۡرَةِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا كَادَ يَزِيغُ قُلُوبُ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِهِمۡ رَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٧

9:118.text: وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خُلِّفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ بِمَا رَحُبَتۡ وَضَاقَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا مَلۡجَأَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَتُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوَّابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١١٨

9:119.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٩

9:120.text: مَا كَانَ لِأَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَخَلَّفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ع<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا يَرۡغَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يُصِيبُهُمۡ ظَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>أٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا مَخۡمَصَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا يَطَــُٔونَ مَوۡطِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ئًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغِيظُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارَ وَلَا يَنَالُونَ مِنۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّيۡلاً إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحٌ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٠

9:121.text: وَلَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُونَ نَفَقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َغِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا كَبِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعُونَ وَادِيًا إِلَّا كُتِبَ لَهُمۡ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَحۡسَنَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢١

9:122.text: ۞وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ لِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ك<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَوۡلَا نَفَرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ فِرۡقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَتَفَقَّهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ وَلِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمَهُمۡ إِذَا رَجَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَحۡذَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٢

9:123.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَلُونَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارِ وَلۡيَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيكُمۡ غِلۡظَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٣

9:124.text: وَإِذَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَتۡ سُورَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُ أَيُّكُمۡ زَادَتۡهُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَزَادَتۡهُمۡ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٤

9:125.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َزَادَتۡهُمۡ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سًا إِلَىٰ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سِهِمۡ وَمَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٥

9:126.text: أَوَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يُفۡتَنُونَ فِى كُلِّ عَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرَّةً أَوۡ مَرَّتَيۡنِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَتُوبُونَ وَلَا هُمۡ يَذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٦

9:127.text: وَإِذَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَتۡ سُورَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّظَرَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ هَلۡ يَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَحَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َرَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> صَرَفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قُلُوبَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٧

9:128.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ عَزِيزٌ عَلَيۡهِ مَا عَنِتُّمۡ حَرِيصٌ عَلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢٨

9:129.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقُلۡ حَسۡبِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٢٩

10:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١

10:2.text: أَكَانَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَجَبًا أَنۡ أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ قَدَمَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۗ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢

10:3.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ‌ۖ يُدَبِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ‌ۖ مَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َفِيعٍ إِلَّا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ إِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُوهُ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

10:4.text: إِلَيۡهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَقًّا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ شَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَذَابٌ أَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

10:5.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ ضِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَدَّرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَنَازِلَ لِتَعۡلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَدَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِسَابَ‌ۚ مَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ يُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

10:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

10:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا وَرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

10:8.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ مَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

10:9.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ‌ۖ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٩

10:10.text: دَعۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِيهَا سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ وَتَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاخِرُ دَعۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

10:11.text: ۞وَلَوۡ يُعَجِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتِعۡجَالَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ لَقُضِىَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَجَلُهُمۡ‌ۖ فَنَذَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا فِى طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

10:12.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرُّ دَعَانَا لِجَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡ قَاعِدًا أَوۡ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُ ضُرَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَرَّ كَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ ضُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زُيِّنَ لِلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

10:13.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۙ</rule> وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

10:14.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ خَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِفَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ لِنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرَ كَيۡفَ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

10:15.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَاتُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِ بِقُرۡءَانٍ غَيۡرِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ بَدِّلۡهُ‌ۚ قُلۡ مَا يَكُونُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡ أُبَدِّلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ِلۡقَآىِٕ نَفۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّى عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٥

10:16.text: قُل لَّوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا تَلَوۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَبِثۡتُ فِيكُمۡ عُمُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

10:17.text: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

10:18.text: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ وَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ شُفَعَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُنَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قُلۡ أَتُنَبِّــُٔونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

10:19.text: وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِيمَا فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

10:20.text: وَيَقُولُونَ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَقُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبُ لِلَّهِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

10:21.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ضَرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَسَّتۡهُمۡ إِذَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّكۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَاتِنَا‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَسۡرَعُ مَكۡرًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رُسُلَنَا يَكۡتُبُونَ مَا تَمۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

10:22.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُسَيِّرُكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ وَجَرَيۡنَ بِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرِي<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفَرِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهَا رِيحٌ عَاصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡجُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أُحِيطَ بِهِمۡ‌ۙ دَعَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ لَئِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡتَنَا مِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

10:23.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِذَا هُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۗ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا بَغۡيُكُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَنُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣
