10:24.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَطَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَبَاتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡكُلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَذَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ زُخۡرُفَهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>زَّيَّنَتۡ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَهۡلُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِرُونَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرُنَا لَيۡلاً أَوۡ نَهَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا حَصِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَغۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡسِ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

10:25.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ دَارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ وَيَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٥

10:26.text: ۞لِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ وَزِيَادَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَرۡهَقُ وُجُوهَهُمۡ قَتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ذِلَّةٌ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

10:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ سَيِّئَ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمِثۡلِهَا وَتَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنۡ عَاصِ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُغۡشِيَتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ قِطَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ مُظۡلِمًا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

10:28.text: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكَانَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ‌ۚ فَزَيَّلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَقَالَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِيَّانَا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

10:29.text: فَكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَهِيد<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَنۡ عِبَادَتِكُمۡ لَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

10:30.text: هُنَالِكَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡلَفَتۡ‌ۚ وَرُدّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

10:31.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡزُقُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىَّ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىِّ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُدَبِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ‌ۚ فَسَيَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ فَقُلۡ أَفَلَا تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

10:32.text: فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۖ فَمَاذَا بَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ‌ۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُصۡرَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

10:33.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فَسَق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

10:34.text: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

10:35.text: قُلۡ هَلۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَهۡدِى لِلۡحَقِّ‌ۗ أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ أَحَقُّ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُتَّبَعَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَهِدّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُهۡدَىٰ‌ۖ فَمَا لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ تَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

10:36.text: وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ إِلَّا ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَا يُغۡنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ شَيۡــًٔا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

10:37.text: وَمَا كَانَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُفۡتَرَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصۡدِيقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

10:38.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ‌ۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِسُورَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

10:39.text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا لَمۡ يُحِيطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعِلۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡتِهِمۡ تَأۡوِيلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٩

10:40.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

10:41.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبُوكَ فَقُل لِّى عَمَلِى وَلَكُمۡ عَمَلُكُمۡ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َرِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ــُٔونَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡمَلُ وَأَنَاۡ بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

10:42.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۚ أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ وَلَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

10:43.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۚ أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمۡىَ وَلَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

10:44.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَظۡلِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

10:45.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ كَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَلۡبَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ يَتَعَارَفُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَسِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥

10:46.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نُرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

10:47.text: وَلِكُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَسُولُهُمۡ قُضِىَ بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

10:48.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

10:49.text: قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡلِكُ لِنَفۡسِى ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَفۡعًا إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ لِكُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أَجَلٌ‌ۚ إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَــٔۡخِرُونَ سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

10:50.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِنۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَابُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تًا أَوۡ نَهَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّاذَا يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

10:51.text: أَثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا مَا وَقَعَ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> ءَ<rule class=madda_necessary>ا</rule>ٓلۡـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَسۡتَعۡجِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

10:52.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدِ هَلۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

10:53.text: ۞وَيَسۡتَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِــُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَ‌ۖ قُلۡ إِى وَرَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

10:54.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِكُلِّ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَمَتۡ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَدَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَأَسَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َدَامَةَ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ‌ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۚ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

10:55.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

10:56.text: هُوَ يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

10:57.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡعِظَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَشِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّدُورِ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

10:58.text: قُلۡ بِفَضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَبِرَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَبِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَلۡيَفۡرَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

10:59.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ حَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ ءَآللَّهُ أَذِنَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ أَمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

10:60.text: وَمَا ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

10:61.text: وَمَا تَكُونُ فِى شَأۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا تَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُرۡءَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مِنۡ عَمَلٍ إِلَّا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَيۡكُمۡ شُهُودًا إِذۡ تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَمَا يَعۡزُبُ ع<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡقَالِ ذَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصۡغَرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡبَرَ إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٦١

10:62.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

10:63.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

10:64.text: لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُشۡرَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيلَ لِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٤

10:65.text: وَلَا يَحۡزُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ قَوۡلُهُمۡ‌ۘ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةَ لِلَّهِ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٥

10:66.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَمَا يَتَّبِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

10:67.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ لِتَسۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

10:68.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ‌ۖ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ إِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَتَقُولُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

10:69.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

10:70.text: مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُذِيقُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّدِيدَ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

10:71.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ نُوحٍ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ كَبُرَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّقَامِى وَتَذۡكِيرِى بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَكُمۡ وَشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَكُنۡ أَمۡرُكُمۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىَّ وَلَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٧١

10:72.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَمَا سَأَلۡتُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ‌ۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

10:73.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ خَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِفَ وَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

10:74.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَعَثۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> رُسُلاً إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِيُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بَعُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

10:75.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَعَثۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

10:76.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِنَا قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَسِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧٦

10:77.text: قَالَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَتَقُولُونَ لِلۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۖ أَسِحۡرٌ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

10:78.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَلۡفِتَنَا عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا وَتَكُونَ لَكُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكُمَا بِمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٨

10:79.text: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُونِى بِكُلِّ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِرٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧٩

10:80.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلۡق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

10:81.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلۡقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَالَ مُوسَىٰ مَا جِئۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّحۡرُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِلُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُصۡلِحُ عَمَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

10:82.text: وَيُحِقُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

10:83.text: فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَنَ لِمُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَّا ذُرِّيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَىٰ خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>هِمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡتِنَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لَعَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

10:84.text: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَعَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

10:85.text: فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَوَكَّلۡنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنَا فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

10:86.text: وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحۡمَتِكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

10:87.text: وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَأَخِيهِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبَوَّءَا لِقَوۡمِكُمَا بِمِصۡرَ بُيُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُيُوتَكُمۡ قِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۗ وَبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

10:88.text: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ ءَاتَيۡتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَأَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> زِينَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ل<rule class='ikhafa'>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا رَبَّنَا لِيُضِلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِكَ‌ۖ رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مِسۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡدُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٨٨

10:89.text: قَالَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُجِيبَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> دَّعۡوَتُكُمَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِع<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ سَبِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٩

10:90.text: ۞وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَزۡنَا بِبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَجُنُودُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَغۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>وًا‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَكَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَرَقُ قَالَ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَامَنَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَأَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

10:91.text: ءَ<rule class=madda_necessary>آ</rule>لۡـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَصَيۡتَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

10:92.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ نُنَجِّيكَ بِبَدَنِكَ لِتَكُونَ لِمَنۡ خَلۡفَكَ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا لَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

10:93.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَوَّأۡنَا بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ مُبَوَّأَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِى بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فِيمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

10:94.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ فَسۡــَٔلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَءُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ‌ۚ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٤

10:95.text: وَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٥

10:96.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

10:97.text: وَلَوۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٩٧

10:98.text: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَتۡ قَرۡيَةٌ ءَامَنَتۡ فَنَفَعَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا قَوۡمَ يُونُسَ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِزۡىِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَمَتَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٩٨

10:99.text: وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ لَأَمَنَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ كُلُّهُمۡ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تُكۡرِهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ حَتَّىٰ يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٩

10:100.text: وَمَا كَانَ لِنَفۡسٍ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُؤۡمِنَ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٠

10:101.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَاذَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَمَا تُغۡنِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُذُرُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠١

10:102.text: فَهَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِرُونَ إِلَّا مِثۡلَ أَيَّامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَلَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ قُلۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٢

10:103.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُنَجِّى رُسُلَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نُ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٣

10:104.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِينِى فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنۡ أَعۡبُدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٤

10:105.text: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٥

10:106.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُكَ وَلَا يَضُرُّكَ‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَلۡتَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ إِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٦

10:107.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡسَسۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِضُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا كَاشِفَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>كَ بِخَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا ر<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدَّ لِفَضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ يُصِيبُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٧

10:108.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَىٰ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَهۡتَدِى لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيۡهَا‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ عَلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِوَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ١٠٨

10:109.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٩

11:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ أُحۡكِمَتۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ فُصِّلَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١

11:2.text: أَلَّا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَش<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢

11:3.text: وَأَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ يُمَتِّعۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عًا حَسَنًا إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُؤۡتِ كُلَّ ذِى فَضۡ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٣

11:4.text: إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤

11:5.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَثۡنُونَ صُدُورَهُمۡ لِيَسۡتَخۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ‌ۚ أَلَا حِينَ يَسۡتَغۡشُونَ ثِيَابَهُمۡ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٥

11:6.text: ۞وَمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رِزۡقُهَا وَيَعۡلَمُ مُسۡتَقَرَّهَا وَمُسۡتَوۡدَعَهَا‌ۚ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٦

11:7.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ عَرۡشُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡتَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوثُونَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ لَيَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧

11:8.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡدُودَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَا يَحۡبِسُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَلَا يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِيهِمۡ لَيۡسَ مَصۡرُوفًا عَنۡهُمۡ وَحَاقَ بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

11:9.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رَحۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نَزَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا مِنۡهُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَيَــُٔو<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٩

11:10.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ نَعۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بَعۡدَ ضَرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذَهَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَفَرِ<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ١٠

11:11.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١

11:12.text: فَلَعَلَّكَ تَارِ<rule class=iqlab>كُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡضَ مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=iqlab>قُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رُكَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ كَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ٌ أَوۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَلَكٌ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ١٢

11:13.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ‌ۖ قُلۡ فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَشۡرِ سُوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُفۡتَرَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

11:14.text: فَإِلَّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ بِعِلۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ فَهَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

11:15.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا نُوَفِّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ فِيهَا وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

11:16.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۖ وَحَبِطَ مَا صَنَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا وَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

11:17.text: أَفَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَتۡلُوهُ شَاهِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَةً‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ مَوۡعِدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

11:18.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُعۡرَضُونَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَشۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۚ أَلَا لَعۡنَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

11:19.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَصُدُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَهَا عِوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

11:20.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَمۡ يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُعۡجِزِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۘ يُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَفُ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ‌ۚ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

11:21.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

11:22.text: لَا جَرَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخۡسَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

11:23.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَأَخۡبَت<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

11:24.text: ۞مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصِيرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعِ‌ۚ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلاً‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

11:25.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٥

11:26.text: أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٦

11:27.text: فَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا نَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلَنَا وَمَا نَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَكَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَرَاذِلُنَا بَادِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّأۡىِ وَمَا نَرَىٰ لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡ<rule class=iqlab>لِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ نَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

11:28.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى وَءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِى رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَعُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِيَتۡ عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَنُلۡزِمُكُمُوهَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَهَا كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

11:29.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مَالاً‌ۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ بِطَارِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبِّهِمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

11:30.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َرَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّهُمۡ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

11:31.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولُ لَكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِى خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ تَزۡدَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡيُنُكُمۡ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡرًا‌ۖ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

11:32.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُوحُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَلۡتَنَا فَأَكۡثَرۡتَ جِد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

11:33.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَأۡتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

11:34.text: وَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُكُمۡ نُصۡح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِنۡ أَرَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّ أَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َحَ لَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُغۡوِيَكُمۡ‌ۚ هُوَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

11:35.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ‌ۖ قُلۡ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَيۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَعَلَىَّ إِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَامِى وَأَنَاۡ بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

11:36.text: وَأُوحِىَ إِلَىٰ نُوحٍ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِكَ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَامَنَ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

11:37.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡنَعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا وَوَحۡيِنَا وَلَا تُخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّغۡرَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

11:38.text: وَيَصۡنَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ وَكُلَّمَا مَرَّ عَلَيۡهِ مَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>أٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَخِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡخَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَسۡخَرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ كَمَا تَسۡخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

11:39.text: فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيهِ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيۡهِ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٩

11:40.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُنَا وَفَارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورُ قُلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡمِلۡ فِيهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َوۡجَيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ وَمَنۡ ءَامَنَ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَنَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا قَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ٤٠

11:41.text: ۞وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡكَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا بِسۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ر۪<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَا وَمُرۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤١

11:42.text: وَهِىَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى بِهِمۡ فِى مَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ وَنَادَىٰ نُوحٌ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَكَانَ فِى مَعۡزِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡكَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ب</rule> <rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َعَنَا وَلَا تَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

11:43.text: قَالَ سَـَٔـاو<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ جَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡصِمُنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ قَالَ لَا عَاصِمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِمَ‌ۚ وَحَالَ بَيۡنَهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡجُ فَكَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُغۡرَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٣

11:44.text: وَقِيلَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَرۡضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَعِى م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكِ وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>لِعِى وَغِيضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَقُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُودِىِّ‌ۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

11:45.text: وَنَادَىٰ نُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِى مِنۡ أَهۡلِى وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ أَحۡكَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥
