11:46.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُوحُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَيۡسَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَمَلٌ غَيۡرُ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تَسۡــَٔلۡنِ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡمٌ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعِظُكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

11:47.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنۡ أَسۡــَٔلَكَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِى وَتَرۡحَمۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

11:48.text: قِيلَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُوحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> بِسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَبَرَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَكَ‌ۚ وَأُمَ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَمَسُّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٨

11:49.text: تِلۡكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَعۡلَمُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَلَا قَوۡمُكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةَ لِلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

11:50.text: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمۡ هُو<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا مُفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

11:51.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا‌ۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

11:52.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡسِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>كُمۡ قُوَّةً إِلَىٰ قُوَّتِكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

11:53.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُودُ مَا جِئۡتَنَا بِبَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَارِك<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَالِهَتِنَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡلِكَ وَمَا نَحۡنُ لَكَ بِمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

11:54.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّقُولُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ بَعۡضُ ءَالِهَتِنَا بِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُشۡهِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

11:55.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَكِيدُونِى جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٥

11:56.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى تَوَكَّلۡتُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رَبِّى وَرَبِّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ ءَاخِ<rule class=iqlab>ذُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِنَاصِيَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٦

11:57.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَغۡتُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۚ وَيَسۡتَخۡلِفُ رَبِّى قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ وَلَا تَضُرُّونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شَيۡــًٔا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ حَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٌ ٥٧

11:58.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا هُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابٍ غَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٍ ٥٨

11:59.text: وَتِلۡكَ عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َحَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رُسُلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَ كُلِّ جَبَّارٍ عَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٥٩

11:60.text: وَأُتۡبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّهُمۡ‌ۗ أَلَا بُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّعَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِ ه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٦٠

11:61.text: ۞وَإِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ هُوَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعۡمَرَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى قَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٦١

11:62.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فِينَا مَرۡجُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> أَتَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّعۡبُدَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ مُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٦٢

11:63.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى وَءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِى مِنۡهُ رَحۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ فَمَا تَزِيدُونَنِى غَيۡرَ تَخۡس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٦٣

11:64.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَاقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َذَرُوهَا تَأۡكُلۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٦٤

11:65.text: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَقَالَ تَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دَارِكُمۡ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةَ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَعۡدٌ غَيۡرُ مَكۡذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٦٥

11:66.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَمِنۡ خِزۡىِ يَوۡمِئِذٍ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زُ ٦٦

11:67.text: وَأَخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

11:68.text: كَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ثَمُودَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّهُمۡ‌ۗ أَلَا بُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّثَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ٦٨

11:69.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ رُسُلُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَا لَبِثَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِعِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لٍ حَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ذٍ ٦٩

11:70.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَء<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيۡهِ نَكِرَهُمۡ وَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَخَفۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِ ل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٍ ٧٠

11:71.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا بِإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ يَعۡق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٧١

11:72.text: قَالَتۡ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَتَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَأَلِدُ وَأَنَاۡ عَجُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>زٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَعۡلِى شَيۡخًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَشَىۡءٌ عَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٧٢

11:73.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَتَعۡجَبِينَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ رَحۡمَتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَبَرَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡتِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧٣

11:74.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذَهَبَ عَنۡ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّوۡعُ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُشۡرَىٰ يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُنَا فِى قَوۡمِ ل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٍ ٧٤

11:75.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ لَحَلِيمٌ أَوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٧٥

11:76.text: يَ<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ـٰٓ</rule>إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِمۡ عَذَابٌ غَيۡرُ مَرۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٧٦

11:77.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُو<rule class=ikhafa>طًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمٌ عَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٧٧

11:78.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَوۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُهۡرَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ‌ۚ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بَنَاتِى هُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هَرُ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡزُونِ فِى ضَيۡف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> أَلَيۡسَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧٨

11:79.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡتَ مَا لَنَا فِى بَنَاتِكَ مِنۡ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَتَعۡلَمُ مَا نُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٧٩

11:80.text: قَالَ لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِى بِكُمۡ قُوَّةً أَوۡ ءَاو<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ رُكۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٨٠

11:81.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُوطُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رُسُلُ رَبِّكَ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َصِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أَحَدٌ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُصِيبُهَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَوۡعِدَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حُ‌ۚ أَلَيۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حُ بِقَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٨١

11:82.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُنَا جَعَلۡنَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا حِجَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِجِّي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>نض</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٨٢

11:83.text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ وَمَا هِىَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ بِبَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٨٣

11:84.text: ۞وَإِلَىٰ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِكۡيَالَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٍ ٨٤

11:85.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِكۡيَالَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أَشۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

11:86.text: بَقِيَّتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ عَلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِحَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٍ ٨٦

11:87.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شُعَيۡبُ أَصَلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>تُكَ تَأۡمُرُكَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتۡرُكَ مَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡعَلَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِنَا مَا نَشَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّش<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٨٧

11:88.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى وَرَزَقَنِى مِنۡهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُخَالِفَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَنۡهُ‌ۚ إِنۡ أُرِيدُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡتُ‌ۚ وَمَا تَوۡفِيق<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٨٨

11:89.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ شِقَاق<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصِيبَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّثۡلُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَ قَوۡمَ نُوحٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ هُودٍ أَوۡ قَوۡمَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا قَوۡمُ لُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٨٩

11:90.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى رَحِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٩٠

11:91.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شُعَيۡبُ مَا نَفۡقَهُ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَقُولُ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ فِينَا ضَعِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡلَا رَهۡطُكَ لَرَجَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَيۡنَا بِعَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٍ ٩١

11:92.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَرَهۡط<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعَزُّ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡتُمُوهُ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ ظِهۡرِيًّا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ مُح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٌ ٩٢

11:93.text: وَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيهِ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡزِيهِ وَمَنۡ هُوَ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَقِب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَكُمۡ رَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٩٣

11:94.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُنَا نَجَّيۡنَا شُعَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَأَخَذَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٤

11:95.text: كَأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَغۡنَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَلَا بُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ كَمَا بَعِدَتۡ ثَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٩٥

11:96.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٩٦

11:97.text: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِرَش<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٩٧

11:98.text: يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دُمُ قَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فَأَوۡرَدَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوِرۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٩٨

11:99.text: وَأُتۡبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ بِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّفۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٩٩

11:100.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ نَقُصُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكَ‌ۖ مِنۡهَا ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٠٠

11:101.text: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ‌ۖ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَتۡ عَنۡهُمۡ ءَالِهَتُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ وَمَا زَادُوهُمۡ غَيۡرَ تَتۡب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ١٠١

11:102.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَخۡذُ رَبِّكَ إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ وَهِىَ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمَةٌ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَخۡذَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٠٢

11:103.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّشۡه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٠٣

11:104.text: وَمَا نُؤَخِّرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا لِأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٠٤

11:105.text: يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِ لَا تَكَلَّمُ نَفۡسٌ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ فَمِنۡهُمۡ شَقِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٠٥

11:106.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ شَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٌ ١٠٦

11:107.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ فَعَّا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا يُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٠٧

11:108.text: ۞وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سُعِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ‌ۖ عَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً غَيۡرَ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>ذٍ ١٠٨

11:109.text: فَلَا تَكُ فِى مِرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡبُدُ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ مَا يَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا كَمَا يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمُوَفُّوهُمۡ نَصِيبَهُمۡ غَيۡرَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>صٍ ١٠٩

11:110.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتُلِفَ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ مُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ١١٠

11:111.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا لَيُوَفِّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ رَبُّكَ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١١

11:112.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقِمۡ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِرۡتَ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ مَعَكَ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>غَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١٢

11:113.text: وَلَا تَرۡكَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَمَسَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ وَمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٣

11:114.text: وَأَقِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ طَرَفَىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَزُلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ يُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ ذِكۡرَىٰ لِلذّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>كِر<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٤

11:115.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٥

11:116.text: فَلَوۡلَا كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَقِيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َنۡهَوۡنَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَسَادِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُتۡرِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٦

11:117.text: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٧

11:118.text: وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٨

11:119.text: إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِمَ رَبُّكَ‌ۚ وَلِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَلَقَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتۡ كَلِمَةُ رَبِّكَ لَأَمۡلَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٩

11:120.text: وَكُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ مَا نُثَبِّتُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فُؤَادَكَ‌ۚ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَمَوۡعِظَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٠

11:121.text: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢١

11:122.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٢

11:123.text: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ كُلُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُ وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٣

12:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١

12:2.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ قُرۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

12:3.text: نَحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ أَحۡسَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَصَصِ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣

12:4.text: إِذۡ قَالَ يُوسُفُ لِأَبِيهِ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَأَيۡتُ أَحَدَ عَشَرَ كَوۡكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ رَأَيۡتُهُمۡ لِى سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

12:5.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صُصۡ رُءۡيَاكَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِخۡوَتِكَ فَيَكِيدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَ كَيۡدًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لِلۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥

12:6.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبِيكَ رَبُّكَ وَيُعَلِّمُكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡوِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحَادِيثِ وَيُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ نِعۡمَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَبَوَيۡكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦

12:7.text: ۞لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ فِى يُوسُفَ وَإِخۡوَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلسّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

12:8.text: إِذۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيُوسُفُ وَأَخُوهُ أَحَبُّ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَبِينَا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَبَانَا لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٨

12:9.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوسُفَ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَحُوهُ أَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُ لَكُمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هُ أَبِيكُمۡ وَتَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

12:10.text: قَالَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوسُفَ وَأَلۡقُوهُ فِى غَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُبِّ يَلۡتَقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هُ بَعۡضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيَّارَةِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

12:11.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَانَا مَا لَكَ لَا تَأۡمَ۫<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

12:12.text: أَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعَنَا غَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡتَعۡ وَيَلۡعَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

12:13.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَيَحۡزُنُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َذۡهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡكُلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّئۡبُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَنۡهُ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

12:14.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَئِنۡ أَكَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّئۡبُ وَنَحۡنُ عُصۡبَةٌ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

12:15.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ذَهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُوهُ فِى غَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُبِّ‌ۚ وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ لَتُنَبِّئَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَمۡرِهِمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

12:16.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓء<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ</rule> أَبَاهُمۡ عِش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

12:17.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ذَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا نَسۡتَبِقُ وَتَرَكۡنَا يُوسُفَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِنَا فَأَكَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّئۡبُ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِمُؤۡمِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنَا وَلَوۡ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

12:18.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو عَلَىٰ قَمِيصِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بِدَ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذِ<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُكُمۡ أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

12:19.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ سَيَّارَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَرۡسَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَارِدَهُمۡ فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>لَىٰ دَلۡوَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُشۡرَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا غُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَسَرُّوهُ بِضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

12:20.text: وَشَرَوۡهُ بِثَمَ<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َخۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>د</rule>َر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِمَ مَعۡدُودَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ مِنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>زّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِد<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

12:21.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّصۡرَ لِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَكۡرِمِى مَثۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لِيُوسُفَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلِنُعَلِّمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡوِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحَادِيثِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَالِبٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

12:22.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

12:23.text: وَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَدَتۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هُوَ فِى بَيۡتِهَا ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَغَلَّقَتِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَ وَقَالَتۡ هَيۡتَ لَكَ‌ۚ قَالَ مَعَاذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ مَثۡوَاىَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

12:24.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بِهَا لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّءَا بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِنَصۡرِفَ عَنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخۡلَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

12:25.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَبَقَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَابَ وَقَدَّتۡ قَمِيصَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُبُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَلۡفَيَا سَيِّدَهَا لَدَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَابِ‌ۚ قَالَتۡ مَا جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مَنۡ أَرَادَ بِأَهۡلِكَ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءًا إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُسۡجَنَ أَوۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٥

12:26.text: قَالَ هِىَ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَدَتۡنِى ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِى‌ۚ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ قَمِيصُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قُدَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُبُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَدَقَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

12:27.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ قَمِيصُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قُدَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُبُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

12:28.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَا قَمِيصَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قُدَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُبُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َيۡدِكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَيۡدَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٨

12:29.text: يُوسُفُ أَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرِى لِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِكِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكِ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَاطِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

12:30.text: ۞وَقَالَ نِسۡوَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ تُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وِدُ فَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> شَغَفَهَا حُبًّا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَا فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٠

12:31.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سَمِعَتۡ بِمَكۡرِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَرۡسَلَتۡ إِلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأَعۡتَدَتۡ لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مُتَّكَـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَتۡ كُلَّ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سِكِّي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَيۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَكۡبَرۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَقَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَقُلۡنَ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شَ لِلَّهِ مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَشَرًا إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا مَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣١

12:32.text: قَالَتۡ فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لُمۡتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى فِيهِ‌ۖ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَ<rule class='idgham_mutajanisayn'>د</rule>تُّهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعۡصَمَ‌ۖ وَلَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَفۡعَلۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامُرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَيُسۡجَنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَيَكُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

12:33.text: قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نُ أَحَبُّ إِلَىَّ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ‌ۖ وَإِلَّا تَصۡرِفۡ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كَيۡدَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَصۡبُ إِلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

12:41.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِبَىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسۡقِى رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخَرُ فَيُصۡلَبُ فَتَأۡكُلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّأۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فِيهِ تَسۡتَفۡتِي<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>نِ ٤١

12:42.text: وَقَالَ لِلَّذِى ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡنِى عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ ذِكۡرَ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلَبِثَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نِ بِضۡعَ سِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

12:43.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَىٰ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ بَقَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡكُلُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عٌ عِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ خُضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُخَرَ يَابِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ أَفۡتُونِى فِى رُءۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لِلرُّءۡيَا تَعۡبُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

12:44.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَضۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثُ أَحۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا نَحۡنُ بِتَأۡوِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ بِعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

12:45.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>دَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أَنَاۡ أُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِتَأۡوِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأَرۡسِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٤٥

12:46.text: يُوسُفُ أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صِّدِّيقُ أَفۡتِنَا فِى سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عِ بَقَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡكُلُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عٌ عِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عِ سُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ خُضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُخَرَ يَابِسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡجِعُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

12:47.text: قَالَ تَزۡرَعُونَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سِنِينَ دَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَا حَصَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ فَذَرُوهُ فِى سُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ُلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

12:48.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَأۡتِى م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِدَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡكُلۡنَ مَا قَدَّمۡتُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَّا قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُحۡصِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

12:49.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَأۡتِى م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَا<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ يُغَاثُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَفِيهِ يَعۡصِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

12:50.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُونِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَسۡــَٔلۡهُ مَا بَالُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِسۡوَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى قَطَّعۡنَ أَيۡدِيَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى بِكَيۡدِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٠

12:51.text: قَالَ مَا خَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بُكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِذۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَ<rule class='idgham_mutajanisayn'>د</rule>تُّ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ يُوسُفَ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قُلۡنَ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شَ لِلَّهِ مَا عَلِمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡـَٔ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ حَصۡحَصَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ أَنَاۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَ<rule class='idgham_mutajanisayn'>د</rule>تُّهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥١

12:52.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِيَعۡلَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَمۡ أَخُنۡهُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى كَيۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

12:53.text: ۞وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُبَرِّئُ نَفۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسَ لَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َارَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ إِلَّا مَا رَحِمَ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٣

12:54.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُونِى بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَسۡتَخۡلِصۡهُ لِنَفۡسِى‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَلَّمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ لَدَيۡنَا مَكِينٌ أَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥٤

12:55.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى عَلَىٰ خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى حَفِيظٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٥

12:56.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لِيُوسُفَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَتَبَوَّأُ مِنۡهَا حَيۡثُ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ نُصِيبُ بِرَحۡمَتِنَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَلَا نُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

12:57.text: وَلَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

12:58.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِخۡوَةُ يُوسُفَ فَدَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ فَعَرَفَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

12:59.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَهَّزَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِجَهَازِهِمۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُونِى بِأَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>خٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَبِيكُمۡ‌ۚ أَلَا تَرَوۡنَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُوفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ وَأَنَاۡ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٩

12:60.text: فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَأۡتُونِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلَا كَيۡلَ لَكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِى وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٦٠

12:61.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَنُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

12:62.text: وَقَالَ لِفِتۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَتَهُمۡ فِى رِحَالِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَعۡرِفُونَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِهِمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

12:63.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَجَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَبِيهِمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَانَا مُنِعَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلُ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَانَا نَكۡتَلۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

12:64.text: قَالَ هَلۡ ءَامَنُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُكُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَخِيهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡرٌ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِم<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

12:65.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا فَتَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَهُمۡ وَجَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَتَهُمۡ رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَانَا مَا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِى‌ۖ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بِضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَتُنَا رُدَّتۡ إِلَيۡنَا‌ۖ وَنَمِيرُ أَهۡلَنَا وَنَحۡفَظُ أَخَانَا وَنَزۡدَادُ كَيۡلَ بَعِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٦٥

12:66.text: قَالَ لَنۡ أُرۡسِلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَعَكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡتُونِ مَوۡثِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَتَأۡتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحَاطَ بِكُمۡ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَوۡهُ مَوۡثِقَهُمۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ٦٦
