12:67.text: وَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَنِىَّ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتَفَرِّقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُغۡنِى عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ‌ۖ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ إِلَّا لِلَّهِ‌ۖ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ‌ۖ وَعَلَيۡهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَوَكِّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

12:68.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ حَيۡثُ أَمَرَهُمۡ أَبُوه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانَ يُغۡنِى عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِلَّا حَاجَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى نَفۡسِ يَعۡقُوبَ قَضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَذُو عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا عَلَّمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

12:69.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ أَخَاهُ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنَاۡ أَخُوكَ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَئِسۡ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

12:70.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَهَّزَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِجَهَازِهِمۡ جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّقَايَةَ فِى رَحۡلِ أَخِيهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَذَّنَ مُؤَذِّنٌ أَيَّتُهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِيرُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

12:71.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّاذَا تَفۡقِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

12:72.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَفۡقِدُ صُوَاعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكِ وَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> حِمۡلُ بَعِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَاۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> زَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٢

12:73.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا جِئۡنَا لِنُفۡسِدَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

12:74.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَمَا جَز<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُهُ<rule class='madda_obligatory_monfasel'>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

12:75.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> جَز<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ُجِدَ فِى رَحۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَهُوَ جَز<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

12:76.text: فَبَدَأَ بِأَوۡعِيَتِهِمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ وِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَخِيهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَخۡرَجَهَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَخِيهِ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِيُوسُفَ‌ۖ مَا كَانَ لِيَأۡخُذَ أَخَاهُ فِى دِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ نَرۡفَعُ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَفَوۡقَ كُلِّ ذِى عِلۡمٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٦

12:77.text: ۞قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَرَقَ أَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>خٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ فَأَسَرَّهَا يُوسُفُ فِى نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَمۡ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِهَا لَهُمۡ‌ۚ قَالَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

12:78.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>خًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِي<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخُذۡ أَحَدَنَا مَكَانَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٨

12:79.text: قَالَ مَعَاذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّأۡخُذَ إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَنَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

12:80.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَيۡــَٔسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ خَلَصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَجِي<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ كَبِيرُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَبَاكُمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡثِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ مَا فَرَّطتُمۡ فِى يُوسُفَ‌ۖ فَلَنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡذَنَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡ يَحۡكُمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِى‌ۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

12:81.text: ٱرۡجِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَبِيكُمۡ فَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَكَ سَرَقَ وَمَا شَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بِمَا عَلِمۡنَا وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لِلۡغَيۡبِ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

12:82.text: وَسۡــَٔلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فِيهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِيرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلۡنَا فِيهَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

12:83.text: قَالَ بَلۡ سَوَّلَتۡ لَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُكُمۡ أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِيلٌ‌ۖ عَسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَنِى بِهِمۡ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨٣

12:84.text: وَتَوَلَّىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَسَفَىٰ عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>يَضَّتۡ عَيۡنَاهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُزۡنِ فَهُوَ كَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٨٤

12:85.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَفۡتَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَذۡكُرُ يُوسُفَ حَتَّىٰ تَكُونَ حَرَضًا أَوۡ تَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

12:86.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَثِّى وَحُزۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأَعۡلَمُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٦

12:87.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَنِىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَحَسَّسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ وَلَا تَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>يۡــَٔسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّوۡحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>يۡــَٔسُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّوۡحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٧

12:88.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ مَسَّنَا وَأَهۡلَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرُّ وَجِئۡنَا بِبِضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّزۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَوۡفِ لَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ وَتَصَدَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَصَدِّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٨

12:89.text: قَالَ هَلۡ عَلِمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فَعَلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٩

12:90.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ يُوسُفُ‌ۖ قَالَ أَنَاۡ يُوسُفُ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخِى‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّقِ وَيَصۡبِرۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

12:91.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاثَرَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

12:92.text: قَالَ لَا تَثۡرِيبَ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ‌ۖ يَغۡفِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ أَرۡحَمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِم<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٢

12:93.text: ٱذۡهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِقَمِيصِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فَأَلۡقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِ أَبِى يَأۡتِ بَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأۡتُونِى بِأَهۡلِكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٣

12:94.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا فَصَلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِيرُ قَالَ أَبُوهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَأَجِدُ رِيحَ يُوسُفَ‌ۖ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُفَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٩٤

12:95.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٩٥

12:96.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَشِيرُ أَلۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ عَلَىٰ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَدَّ بَصِي<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

12:97.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَانَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا ذُنُوبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٧

12:98.text: قَالَ سَوۡفَ أَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكُمۡ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩٨

12:99.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ يُوسُفَ ءَاوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ أَبَوَيۡهِ وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِصۡرَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ءَامِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٩

12:100.text: وَرَفَعَ أَبَوَيۡهِ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ وَخَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا تَأۡوِيلُ رُءۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَعَلَهَا رَبِّى حَق<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ ب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِذۡ أَخۡرَجَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نِ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>وِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّزَغَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَ إِخۡوَت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى لَطِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٠

12:101.text: ۞رَبِّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡتَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكِ وَعَلَّمۡتَنِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡوِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحَادِيثِ‌ۚ فَاطِرَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَلِىّ<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ تَوَفَّنِى مُسۡلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَلۡحِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نِى بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠١

12:102.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ لَدَيۡهِمۡ إِذۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَمۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٢

12:103.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡثَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَوۡ حَرَصۡتَ بِمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٣

12:104.text: وَمَا تَسۡــَٔلُهُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ‌ۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٤

12:105.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡهَا وَهُمۡ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

12:106.text: وَمَا يُؤۡمِنُ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٦

12:107.text: أَفَأَمِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٧

12:108.text: قُلۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَبِيل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ عَلَىٰ بَصِيرَةٍ أَنَاۡ وَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَنِى‌ۖ وَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٨

12:109.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ إِلَّا رِجَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَلَدَارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٩

12:110.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَيۡــَٔسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلُ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُذِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ نَصۡرُنَا فَنُجِّىَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُنَا عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٠

12:111.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ فِى قَصَصِهِمۡ عِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ‌ۗ مَا كَانَ حَدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُفۡتَرَىٰ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصۡدِيقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ وَتَفۡصِيلَ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

13:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>مٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

13:2.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى رَفَعَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ بِغَيۡرِ عَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرَوۡنَهَا‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ‌ۖ وَسَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى لِأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُدَبِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ يُفَصِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّكُمۡ تُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

13:3.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى مَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ وَأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ جَعَلَ فِيهَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ‌ۖ يُغۡشِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

13:4.text: وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ قِطَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>م</rule>ُّتَجَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>وِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَخِي<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>ِنۡوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َغَيۡرُ صِنۡوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُسۡقَىٰ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنُفَضِّلُ بَعۡضَهَا عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُكُلِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

13:5.text: ۞وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> فَعَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡلُهُمۡ أَءِذَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَفِى خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َدِيدٍ‌ۗ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡنَاقِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

13:6.text: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَثُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَلَىٰ ظُلۡمِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَشَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٦

13:7.text: وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِكُلِّ قَوۡمٍ ه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٧

13:8.text: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُ‌ۖ وَكُلُّ شَىۡءٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>د<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٍ ٨

13:9.text: عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَبِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَع<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لِ ٩

13:10.text: سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَسَرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َهَرَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمَنۡ هُوَ مُسۡتَخۡ<rule class=iqlab>فِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَسَارِ<rule class=iqlab>بُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٠

13:11.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُعَقِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَحۡفَظُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ أَمۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُغَيِّرُ مَا بِقَوۡمٍ حَتَّىٰ يُغَيِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَادَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِقَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا مَرَدَّ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَمَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لٍ ١١

13:12.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُرِيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َطَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ِئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثِّق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لَ ١٢

13:13.text: وَيُسَبِّحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّعۡدُ بِحَمۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ مِنۡ خِيفَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُرۡسِلُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صَّو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عِقَ فَيُصِيبُ بِهَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَهُمۡ يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهُوَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِح<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لِ ١٣

13:14.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> دَعۡوَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَا يَسۡتَجِيبُونَ لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِشَىۡءٍ إِلَّا كَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِطِ كَفَّيۡهِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ فَاهُ وَمَا هُوَ بِبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَمَا دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>لٍ ١٤

13:15.text: وَلِلَّهِ يَسۡجُدُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ طَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُدُوِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ا</rule>لِ ۩ ١٥

13:16.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ قُلۡ أَفَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ضَر<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصِيرُ أَمۡ هَلۡ تَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورُ‌ۗ أَمۡ جَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ خَلَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَخَلۡقِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَتَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِقُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَهَّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رُ ١٦

13:17.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَالَتۡ أَوۡدِيَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِقَدَرِهَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡتَمَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيۡلُ زَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّابِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُوقِدُونَ عَلَيۡهِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ حِلۡيَةٍ أَوۡ مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَضۡرِبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلَ‌ۚ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّبَدُ فَيَذۡهَبُ جُف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ فَيَمۡكُثُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَضۡرِبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡث<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لَ ١٧

13:18.text: لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِرَبِّهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِثۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِسَابِ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٨

13:19.text: ۞أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ كَمَنۡ هُوَ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٩

13:20.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُوفُونَ بِعَهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُضُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيثَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>َ ٢٠

13:21.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَصِلُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوصَلَ وَيَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُمۡ وَيَخَافُونَ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢١

13:22.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سِر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَانِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَءُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٢٢

13:23.text: جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَهَا وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َلَحَ مِنۡ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ ب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢٣

13:24.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا صَبَرۡتُمۡ‌ۚ فَنِعۡمَ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٢٤

13:25.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُضُونَ عَهۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوصَلَ وَيُفۡسِدُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۙ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّعۡنَةُ وَلَهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٢٥

13:26.text: ٱللَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ‌ۚ وَفَرِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ إِلَّا مَتَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>عٌ ٢٦

13:27.text: وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُضِلُّ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ مَنۡ أَن<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٢٧

13:28.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ قُلُوبُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ أَلَا بِذِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٢٨

13:29.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ طُوبَىٰ لَهُمۡ وَحُسۡنُ مَــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢٩

13:30.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَتۡلُوَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَهُمۡ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ قُلۡ هُوَ رَبِّى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ مَت<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣٠

13:31.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قُرۡءَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُيِّرَتۡ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ أَوۡ قُطِّعَتۡ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ أَوۡ كُلِّمَ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ‌ۗ بَل لِّلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ جَمِيعًا‌ۗ أَفَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>يۡــَٔسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهَدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَزَالُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تُصِيبُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا صَنَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَارِعَةٌ أَوۡ تَحُلُّ قَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َارِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِىَ وَعۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُخۡلِفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ٣١

13:32.text: وَلَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَأَمۡلَيۡتُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَخَذۡتُهُمۡ‌ۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣٢

13:33.text: أَفَمَنۡ هُوَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمٌ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ نَفۡ<rule class=iqlab>سِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَتۡ‌ۗ وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ قُلۡ سَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُوهُمۡ‌ۚ أَمۡ تُنَبِّــُٔونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أ<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ‌ۗ بَلۡ زُيِّنَ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَصُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ ه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٣٣

13:34.text: لَّهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَشَقُّ‌ۖ وَمَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٣٤

13:35.text: ۞مَّثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وُعِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقُونَ‌ۖ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۖ أُكُلُهَا د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظِلُّهَا‌ۚ تِلۡكَ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَّعُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٣٥

13:36.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يَفۡرَحُونَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِرُ بَعۡضَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُشۡرِكَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَإِلَيۡهِ مَـَٔـ<rule class=madda_permissible>ا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣٦

13:37.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ حُكۡمًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class="ikhafa_shafawi" data-bs-original-title="" title="">ب</rule>َعۡدَ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ مَا لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا و<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٣٧

13:38.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذُرِّيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ بِـَٔـايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ لِكُلِّ أَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ِت<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٣٨

13:39.text: يَمۡحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيُثۡبِتُ‌ۖ وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣٩

13:40.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا نُرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ وَعَلَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٤٠

13:41.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَأۡتِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ نَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُصُهَا مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَافِهَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ لَا مُعَقِّبَ لِحُكۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَهُوَ سَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤١

13:42.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَكَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ فَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَكۡرُ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَيَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ لِمَنۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٤٢

13:43.text: وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَسۡتَ مُرۡسَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَهِيد<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ وَمَنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِلۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤٣

14:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَيۡكَ لِتُخۡرِجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١

14:2.text: ٱللَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٢

14:3.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡتَحِبُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَيَصُدُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَهَا عِوَجًا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>لِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٣

14:4.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا بِلِسَانِ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمۡ‌ۖ فَيُضِلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٤

14:5.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡ أَخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> قَوۡمَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ وَذَكِّرۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ صَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٥

14:6.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ يَسُومُونَكُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَيُذَبِّحُونَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡيُونَ نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَفِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦

14:7.text: وَإِذۡ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمۡ لَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َكَرۡتُمۡ لَأَزِيدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابِى لَشَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٧

14:8.text: وَقَالَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكۡفُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَغَنِىٌّ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٨

14:9.text: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ قَوۡمِ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمُودَ‌ۛ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ‌ۛ لَا يَعۡلَمُهُمۡ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَرَدّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَفَرۡنَا بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ مُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٩

14:10.text: ۞قَالَتۡ رُسُلُهُمۡ أَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َاطِرِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوكُمۡ لِيَغۡفِرَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرَكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=ikhafa>ًّى‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُنَا تُرِيدُونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َصُدُّونَا عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا فَأۡتُونَا بِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٠

14:11.text: قَالَتۡ لَهُمۡ رُسُلُهُمۡ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحۡنُ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَمُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّأۡتِيَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

14:12.text: وَمَا لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَّا نَتَوَكَّلَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نَا سُبُلَنَا‌ۚ وَلَنَصۡبِرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاذَيۡتُمُونَا‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَوَكِّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

14:13.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِرُسُلِهِمۡ لَنُخۡرِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَرۡضِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ لَتَعُودُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى مِلَّتِنَا‌ۖ فَأَوۡحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ لَنُهۡلِكَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

14:14.text: وَلَنُسۡكِنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِى وَخَافَ وَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٤

14:15.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَفۡتَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَخَابَ كُلُّ جَبَّارٍ عَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٥

14:16.text: مّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٦

14:17.text: يَتَجَرَّعُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَا يَكَادُ يُسِيغُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَيَأۡتِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا هُوَ بِمَيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَذَابٌ غَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٌ ١٧

14:18.text: مَّثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ كَرَمَادٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَدَّتۡ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيحُ فِى يَوۡمٍ عَاصِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُونَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٨

14:19.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٩

14:20.text: وَمَا ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِعَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٍ ٢٠

14:21.text: وَبَرَزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّعَفَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَكُمۡ تَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّغۡنُونَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِنۡ عَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجَزِعۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡ صَبَرۡنَا مَا لَنَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>صٍ ٢١

14:22.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَعَدَكُمۡ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَوَعَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّكُمۡ فَأَخۡلَفۡتُكُمۡ‌ۖ وَمَا كَانَ لِىَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َعَوۡتُكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ لِى‌ۖ فَلَا تَلُومُونِى وَلُوم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ بِمُصۡرِخِكُمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُصۡرِخِىَّ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كَفَرۡتُ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡرَكۡتُمُونِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٢

14:23.text: وَأُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ فِيهَا سَلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>مٌ ٢٣

14:24.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َشَجَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَةٍ أَصۡلُهَا ثَابِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفَرۡعُهَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ٢٤

14:25.text: تُؤۡت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُكُلَهَا كُلَّ حِي<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهَا‌ۗ وَيَضۡرِبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَالَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

14:26.text: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تُثَّتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٍ ٢٦
