14:27.text: يُثَبِّتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّابِتِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ وَيُضِلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ‌ۚ وَيَفۡعَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ ٢٧

14:28.text: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ بَدَّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كُفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَحَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمَهُمۡ دَارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَو<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٢٨

14:29.text: جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٢٩

14:30.text: وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُضِلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَصِيرَكُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٣٠

14:31.text: قُل لِّعِبَادِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سِر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَانِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا بَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ وَلَا خِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>لٌ ٣١

14:32.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخۡرَجَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ رِزۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ لِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ بِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رَ ٣٢

14:33.text: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِبَيۡنِ‌ۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رَ ٣٣

14:34.text: وَءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَظَلُو<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٌ ٣٤

14:35.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمُ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَدَ ءَامِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِى وَبَنِىَّ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّعۡبُدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>مَ ٣٥

14:36.text: رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَضۡلَلۡنَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۖ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِعَنِى فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى‌ۖ وَمَنۡ عَصَانِى فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٦

14:37.text: رَّبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَسۡكَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِى بِوَادٍ غَيۡرِ ذِى زَرۡعٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ بَيۡتِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحَرَّمِ رَبَّنَا لِيُقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ أَفۡــِٔدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ تَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡزُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

14:38.text: رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ تَعۡلَمُ مَا نُخۡفِى وَمَا نُعۡلِنُ‌ۗ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ٣٨

14:39.text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى وَهَبَ لِى عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِبَرِ إِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى لَسَمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ٣٩

14:40.text: رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى مُقِيمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِى‌ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ٤٠

14:41.text: رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِى وَلِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَىَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يَوۡمَ يَقُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٤١

14:42.text: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلاً عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡمَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ لِيَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َشۡخَصُ فِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رُ ٤٢

14:43.text: مُهۡطِعِينَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نِعِى رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَا يَرۡتَدُّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ طَرۡفُهُمۡ‌ۖ وَأَفۡــِٔدَتُهُمۡ هَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ ٤٣

14:44.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتِيهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ فَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخِّرۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> دَعۡوَتَكَ وَنَتَّبِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلَ‌ۗ أَوَلَمۡ تَكُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َو<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لٍ ٤٤

14:45.text: وَسَكَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِى مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ وَتَبَيَّنَ لَكُمۡ كَيۡفَ فَعَلۡنَا بِهِمۡ وَضَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡث<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لَ ٤٥

14:46.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَكَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِب<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>لُ ٤٦

14:47.text: فَلَا تَحۡسَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِفَ وَعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> رُسُلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِي<rule class=ikhafa>زٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>مٍ ٤٧

14:48.text: يَوۡمَ تُبَدَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ غَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ‌ۖ وَبَرَزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٤٨

14:49.text: وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّقَرَّنِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصۡف<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤٩

14:50.text: سَرَابِيلُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َطِرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٥٠

14:51.text: لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ كُلَّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَسَبَتۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَرِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٥١

14:52.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>غٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلِيَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هُوَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِيَذَّكَّرَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٥٢

15:1.text: ا<rule class=madda_necessary>لٓ</rule>ر‌ۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَقُرۡءَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١

15:2.text: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

15:3.text: ذَرۡهُمۡ يَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَتَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيُلۡهِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمَلُ‌ۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

15:4.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤

15:5.text: مَّا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَــٔۡخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

15:6.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٦

15:7.text: لَّوۡ مَا تَأۡتِينَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

15:8.text: مَا نُنَزِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَمَا كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

15:9.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ نَزَّلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

15:10.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فِى شِيَعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

15:11.text: وَمَا يَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

15:12.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَسۡلُكُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢

15:13.text: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

15:14.text: وَلَوۡ فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَظَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَعۡرُج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

15:15.text: لَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡحُور<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

15:59.text: إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمُنَجُّوهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٩

15:60.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَدَّرۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۙ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٠

15:61.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

15:62.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

15:63.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلۡ جِئۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

15:64.text: وَأَتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

15:65.text: فَأَسۡرِ بِأَهۡلِكَ بِقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ وَلَا يَلۡتَفِتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَيۡثُ تُؤۡمَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

15:66.text: وَقَضَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ دَابِرَ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّصۡبِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

15:67.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

15:68.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ضَيۡفِى فَلَا تَفۡضَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٦٨

15:69.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَلَا تُخۡز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٦٩

15:70.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوَلَمۡ نَنۡهَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٠

15:71.text: قَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بَنَات<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

15:72.text: لَعَمۡرُكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَفِى سَكۡرَتِهِمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

15:74.text: فَجَعَلۡنَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِجّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٧٤

15:75.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَوَسِّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

15:76.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا لَبِسَبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧٦

15:77.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

15:78.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡكَةِ لَظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٨

15:79.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمَا لَبِإِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧٩

15:80.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

15:81.text: وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

15:82.text: وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَنۡحِتُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٢

15:84.text: فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

15:85.text: وَمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ لَأَتِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡفَحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّفۡحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لَ ٨٥

15:86.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨٦

15:87.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَثَانِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٨٧

15:88.text: لَا تَمُدَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٨

15:89.text: وَقُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َذِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٨٩

15:90.text: كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَسِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

15:91.text: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ عِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

15:92.text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسۡــَٔلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٢

15:93.text: عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

15:94.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٤

15:95.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَفَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٥

15:96.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ‌ۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

15:97.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ يَضِيقُ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رُكَ بِمَا يَقُول<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٧

15:98.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٨

15:99.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأۡتِيَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٩٩

16:1.text: أَتَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

16:2.text: يُنَزِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحِ مِنۡ أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٢

16:3.text: خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ تَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

16:4.text: خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا هُوَ خَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤

16:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ خَلَقَهَا‌ۗ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا دِفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِعُ وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

16:6.text: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

16:7.text: وَتَحۡمِلُ أَثۡقَالَكُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغِيهِ إِلَّا بِشِقِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧

16:8.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِغَالَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمِيرَ لِتَرۡكَبُوهَا وَزِينَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَخۡلُقُ مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

16:9.text: وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قَصۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ وَمِنۡهَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَهَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

16:10.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ءً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ شَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنۡهُ شَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ تُسِيم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

16:11.text: يُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِتُ لَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّرۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّيۡتُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخِيلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

16:12.text: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُجُومُ مُسَخَّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='iqlab'>تُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

16:13.text: وَمَا ذَرَأَ لَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهُ<rule class='madda_obligatory_monfasel'>ۥٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َذَّكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

16:14.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى سَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَ لِتَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ لَحۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَسۡتَخۡرِجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُ حِلۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َلۡبَسُونَهَا وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ مَوَاخِرَ فِيهِ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

16:15.text: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسُبُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

16:16.text: وَعَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مِ هُمۡ يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

16:17.text: أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقُ كَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَخۡلُقُ‌ۗ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

16:18.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٨

16:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

16:20.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يُخۡلَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

16:21.text: أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

16:22.text: إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='ikhafa'>دٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ قُلُوبُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡتَكۡبِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

16:23.text: لَا جَرَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَكۡبِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣

16:24.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّاذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ رَبُّكُمۡ‌ۙ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

16:25.text: لِيَحۡمِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡزَارَهُمۡ كَامِلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۙ وَمِنۡ أَوۡزَارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُضِلُّونَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ عِلۡمٍ‌ۗ أَلَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَزِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

16:26.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَكَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ فَأَتَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوَاعِدِ فَخَرَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>فُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِمۡ وَأَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

16:27.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ يُخۡزِيهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُشَ<rule class=madda_necessary>ـٰٓ</rule>قُّونَ فِيهِمۡ‌ۚ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِزۡىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

16:28.text: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ ظَالِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَأَلۡقَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَمَ مَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَعۡمَلُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

16:29.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۖ فَلَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَكَبِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

16:30.text: ۞وَقِيلَ لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَاذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ رَبُّكُمۡ‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ أَحۡسَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَدَارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَنِعۡمَ دَارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

16:31.text: جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَهَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۖ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

16:32.text: ٱلَّذِينَ تَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ طَيِّبِينَ‌ۙ يَقُولُونَ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

16:33.text: هَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ أَوۡ يَأۡتِىَ أَمۡرُ رَبِّكَ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا ظَلَمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

16:34.text: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتُ مَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَحَاقَ بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

16:35.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا عَبَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحۡنُ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا وَلَا حَرَّمۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ فَهَلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٣٥

16:36.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَعَثۡنَا فِى كُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولاً أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَنِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُوتَ‌ۖ فَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ هَدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ حَقَّتۡ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَةُ‌ۚ فَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

16:37.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلُّ‌ۖ وَمَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

16:38.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ‌ۙ لَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمُوتُ‌ۚ بَلَىٰ وَعۡدًا عَلَيۡهِ حَق<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

16:39.text: لِيُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٩

16:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَىۡءٍ إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّقُولَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نُ ٤٠

16:41.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَنُبَوِّئَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَكۡبَرُ‌ۚ لَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

16:42.text: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

16:43.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ إِلَّا رِجَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ فَسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

16:44.text: بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زُّبُرِ‌ۗ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ لِتُبَيِّنَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ مَا نُزِّلَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

16:45.text: أَفَأَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مَكَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡسِفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

16:46.text: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ فِى تَقَلُّبِهِمۡ فَمَا ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

16:47.text: أَوۡ يَأۡخُذَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ تَخَوُّ<rule class=ikhafa>فٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكُمۡ لَرَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٧

16:48.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَيَّؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلِ سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّهِ وَهُمۡ د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>خِر<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

16:49.text: وَلِلَّهِ يَسۡجُدُ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

16:50.text: يَخَافُونَ رَبَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَرُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ٥٠

16:51.text: ۞وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا تَتَّخِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَيۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هُوَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='ikhafa'>دٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡهَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥١

16:52.text: وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينُ وَاصِبًا‌ۚ أَفَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

16:53.text: وَمَا بِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّعۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا مَسَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرُّ فَإِلَيۡهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ــَٔر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

16:54.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا كَشَفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرَّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ إِذَا فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّهِمۡ يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

16:55.text: لِيَكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ‌ۚ فَتَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

16:56.text: وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَ لِمَا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ نَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ‌ۗ تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَتُسۡــَٔلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

16:57.text: وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۙ وَلَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَشۡتَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

16:58.text: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ ظَلَّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡوَد<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ كَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٨

16:59.text: يَتَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رَىٰ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ مَا بُشِّرَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَيُمۡسِكُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ هُونٍ أَمۡ يَدُسُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تُّرَابِ‌ۗ أَلَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

16:60.text: لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ‌ۖ وَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَىٰ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٠

16:61.text: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ بِظُلۡمِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا تَرَكَ عَلَيۡهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=ikhafa>ًّى‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَــٔۡخِرُونَ سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

16:62.text: وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَ لِلَّهِ مَا يَكۡرَهُونَ وَتَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۖ لَا جَرَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّفۡرَط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

16:63.text: تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ فَهُوَ وَلِيُّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٣

16:64.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ إِلَّا لِتُبَيِّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ‌ۙ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

16:65.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَحۡيَا بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

16:66.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ لَعِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّسۡقِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا فِى بُطُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ فَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َدَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّبَنًا خَالِ<rule class=ikhafa>صًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>غًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلشَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

16:67.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ث</rule>َمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخِيلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ تَتَّخِذُونَ مِنۡهُ سَكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِزۡقًا حَسَنًا‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

16:68.text: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َحۡلِ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخِذِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ بُيُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرِ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡرِش<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

16:69.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كُلِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ثَّمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡلُكِى سُبُلَ رَبِّكِ ذُلُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُجُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُطُونِهَا شَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فِيهِ شِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

16:70.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۚ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرَدُّ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَرۡذَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمُرِ لِكَىۡ لَا يَعۡلَمَ بَعۡدَ عِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡــًٔا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧٠

16:71.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَضَّلَ بَعۡضَكُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقِ‌ۚ فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فُضِّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِر<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدِّى رِزۡقِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيهِ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ‌ۚ أَفَبِنِعۡمَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

16:72.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َنِينَ وَحَفَدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَزَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ أَفَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ وَبِنِعۡمَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُمۡ يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

16:73.text: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ رِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡتَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

16:74.text: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَالَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

16:75.text: ۞ضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَلاً عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّمۡلُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رِزۡقًا حَسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُ مِنۡهُ سِر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَهۡرًا‌ۖ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>نَ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

16:76.text: وَضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّجُلَيۡنِ أَحَدُهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَمُ لَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ كَلٌّ عَلَىٰ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أَيۡنَمَا يُوَجِّههُّ لَا يَأۡتِ بِخَيۡرٍ‌ۖ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِى هُوَ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡمُرُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>لِ‌ۙ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧٦

16:77.text: وَلِلَّهِ غَيۡبُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ إِلَّا كَلَمۡحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرِ أَوۡ هُوَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧٧

16:78.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَخۡرَجَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُطُونِ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفۡــِٔدَةَ‌ۙ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

16:79.text: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرِ مُسَخَّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى جَوِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

16:80.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُيُوتِكُمۡ سَكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ُلُودِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ بُيُو<rule class=ikhafa>تًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَخِفُّونَهَا يَوۡمَ ظَعۡنِكُمۡ وَيَوۡمَ إِقَامَتِكُمۡ‌ۙ وَمِنۡ أَصۡوَافِهَا وَأَوۡبَارِهَا وَأَشۡعَارِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عًا إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٨٠

16:81.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا خَلَقَ ظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ أَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ سَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بِيلَ تَقِيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَّ وَسَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بِيلَ تَقِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َأۡسَكُمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ نِعۡمَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

16:82.text: فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٨٢

16:83.text: يَعۡرِفُونَ نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِرُونَهَا وَأَكۡثَرُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٣

16:84.text: وَيَوۡمَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُؤۡذَنُ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

16:85.text: وَإِذَا رَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ فَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

16:86.text: وَإِذَا رَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَشۡرَكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِكَ‌ۖ فَأَلۡقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٦

16:87.text: وَأَلۡقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَمَ‌ۖ وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٧

16:88.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ زِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

16:89.text: وَيَوۡمَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ فِى كُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِيدًا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَجِئۡنَا بِكَ شَهِيدًا عَلَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ تِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٩

16:90.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَأۡمُرُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>لِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَإِيتَآىِٕ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَيَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡىِ‌ۚ يَعِظُكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٠

16:91.text: وَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِذَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ وَلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بَعۡدَ تَوۡكِيدِهَا وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَعَلۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ كَفِيلاً‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩١
