16:92.text: وَلَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى نَقَضَتۡ غَزۡلَهَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ قُوَّةٍ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>ثًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّخِذُونَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ دَخَل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٌ هِىَ أَرۡبَىٰ مِنۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَيُبَيِّنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

16:93.text: وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَجَعَلَكُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلُّ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَلَتُسۡــَٔلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

16:94.text: وَلَا تَتَّخِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ دَخَل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَكُمۡ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَ<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ ثُبُوتِهَا وَتَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ بِمَا صَدَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَلَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩٤

16:95.text: وَلَا تَشۡتَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعَهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيلاً‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

16:96.text: مَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َكُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َدُ‌ۖ وَمَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ صَبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَحۡسَنِ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

16:97.text: مَنۡ عَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َكَرٍ أَوۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَنُحۡيِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَحۡسَنِ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٧

16:98.text: فَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعِذۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٩٨

16:99.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَيۡسَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٌ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٩

16:100.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتَوَلَّوۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٠

16:101.text: وَإِذَا بَدَّلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَانَ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يُنَزِّلُ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مُفۡتَ<rule class=iqlab>رِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠١

16:102.text: قُلۡ نَزَّلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رُوحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُدُسِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِيُثَبِّتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٢

16:103.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُعَلِّمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَشَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّسَانُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُلۡحِدُونَ إِلَيۡهِ أَعۡجَمِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لِسَانٌ عَرَبِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٠٣

16:104.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا يَهۡدِيهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٤

16:105.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَفۡتَرِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

16:106.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا مَنۡ أُكۡرِهَ وَقَلۡبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِن<rule class=iqlab>ُّۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرَحَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرِ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَلَيۡهِمۡ غَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠٦

16:107.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَحَبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٧

16:108.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ طَبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَسَمۡعِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٨

16:109.text: لَا جَرَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٩

16:110.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ هَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا فُتِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهَا لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٠

16:111.text: ۞يَوۡمَ تَأۡتِى كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِهَا وَتُوَفَّىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

16:112.text: وَضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ ءَامِنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيهَا رِزۡقُهَا رَغَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَفَرَتۡ بِأَنۡعُمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَأَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>قَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِبَاسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُوعِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوۡفِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَصۡنَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٢

16:113.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ رَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ وَهُمۡ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٣

16:114.text: فَكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَقَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ حَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٤

16:115.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا حَرَّمَ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيۡتَةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّمَ وَلَحۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيرِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُهِلَّ لِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡطُرَّ غَيۡرَ بَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>غٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٥

16:116.text: وَلَا تَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِمَا تَصِفُ أَلۡسِنَتُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا حَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا حَرَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَفۡتَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَفۡتَرُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ لَا يُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٦

16:117.text: مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٧

16:118.text: وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَرَّمۡنَا مَا قَصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٨

16:119.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لِلَّذِينَ عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ بِجَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَأَصۡلَح<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهَا لَغَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١٩

16:120.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ كَانَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َانِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّهِ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يَكُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٠

16:121.text: شَاكِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَنۡعُمِهِ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَهَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٢١

16:122.text: وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٢

16:123.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡ مِلَّةَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ حَنِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٣

16:124.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا جُعِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَيَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فِيمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٤

16:125.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ إِلَىٰ سَبِيلِ رَبِّكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡعِظَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ‌ۖ وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٥

16:126.text: وَإِنۡ عَاقَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فَعَاقِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َبَرۡتُمۡ لَهُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلصَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٦

16:127.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ وَمَا صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رُكَ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُ فِى ضَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَمۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٧

16:128.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٨

17:1.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَسۡرَىٰ بِعَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَيۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكۡنَا حَوۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِنُرِيَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١

17:2.text: وَءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ هُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ أَلَّا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِى وَكِيلاً ٢

17:3.text: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َكُورًا ٣

17:4.text: وَقَضَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَتُفۡسِدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَلَتَعۡلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عُلُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٤

17:5.text: فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَعۡدُ أُولَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا بَعَثۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمۡ عِبَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى بَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَاسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّيَارِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ وَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّفۡعُولاً ٥

17:6.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَرَّةَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَأَمۡدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَنِينَ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ أَكۡثَرَ نَفِيرًا ٦

17:7.text: إِنۡ أَحۡسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَحۡسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِنۡ أَسَأۡتُمۡ فَلَهَا‌ۚ فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَعۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ لِيَسُ<rule class=madda_normal>ــۥٓ</rule>ــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وُجُوهَكُمۡ وَلِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدَ كَمَا دَخَلُوهُ أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِيُتَبِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا عَلَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَتۡبِيرًا ٧

17:8.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡحَمَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِنۡ عُ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا‌ۘ وَجَعَلۡنَا جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ حَصِيرًا ٨

17:9.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ يَهۡدِى لِلَّتِى هِىَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَمُ وَيُبَشِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٩

17:10.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٠

17:11.text: وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرِّ دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ‌ۖ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ عَجُولاً ١١

17:12.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ ءَايَتَيۡنِ‌ۖ فَمَحَوۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَجَعَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَضۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَلِتَعۡلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَدَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِسَابَ‌ۚ وَكُلَّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ تَفۡصِيلاً ١٢

17:13.text: وَكُلَّ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ أَلۡزَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى عُنُقِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَنُخۡرِجُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َلۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ُورًا ١٣

17:14.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَأۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبًا ١٤

17:15.text: مَّنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَىٰ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَهۡتَدِى لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيۡهَا‌ۚ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ‌ۗ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُعَذِّبِينَ حَتَّىٰ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَ رَسُولاً ١٥

17:16.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّهۡلِكَ قَرۡيَةً أَمَرۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيهَا فَفَسَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ فَدَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>مِيرًا ١٦

17:17.text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَبِير<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َصِيرًا ١٧

17:18.text: مَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَاجِلَةَ عَجَّلۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِيهَا مَا نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّرِيدُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ يَصۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا مَذۡمُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حُورًا ١٨

17:19.text: وَمَنۡ أَرَادَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ وَسَعَىٰ لَهَا سَعۡيَهَا وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ كَانَ سَعۡيُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّشۡكُورًا ١٩

17:20.text: كُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّمِدُّ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَهَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مِنۡ عَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّكَ‌ۚ وَمَا كَانَ عَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ رَبِّكَ مَحۡظُورًا ٢٠

17:21.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَلۡأَخِرَةُ أَكۡبَرُ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَكۡبَرُ تَفۡضِيلاً ٢١

17:22.text: لَّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدَ مَذۡمُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّخۡذُولاً ٢٢

17:23.text: ۞وَقَضَىٰ رَبُّكَ أَلَّا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِيَّاهُ وَبِ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ إِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِبَرَ أَحَدُهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ كِلَاهُمَا فَلَا تَقُل لَّهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَنۡهَرۡهُمَا وَقُل لَّهُمَا قَوۡل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َرِيمًا ٢٣

17:24.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡفِضۡ لَهُمَا جَنَاحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّلِّ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةِ وَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡحَمۡهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِى صَغِيرًا ٢٤

17:25.text: رَّبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا فِى نُفُوسِكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحِينَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ لِلۡأَوّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بِينَ غَفُورًا ٢٥

17:26.text: وَءَاتِ ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ حَقَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡكِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ وَلَا تُبَذِّرۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ذِيرًا ٢٦

17:27.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينِ‌ۖ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لِرَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَفُورًا ٢٧

17:28.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُعۡرِضَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ تَرۡجُوهَا فَقُل لَّهُمۡ قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيۡسُورًا ٢٨

17:29.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ يَدَكَ مَغۡلُولَةً إِلَىٰ عُنُقِكَ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هَا كُلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَسۡطِ فَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عُدَ مَلُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡسُورًا ٢٩

17:30.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ بِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَبِير<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َصِيرًا ٣٠

17:31.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَكُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ إِمۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُهُمۡ وَإِيَّاكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قَتۡلَهُمۡ كَانَ خِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>ـ<rule class=ikhafa>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٣١

17:32.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زِّنَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ سَبِيلاً ٣٢

17:33.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۗ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُتِلَ مَظۡلُو<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَعَلۡنَا لِوَلِيِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا يُسۡرِف فِّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَتۡلِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُورًا ٣٣

17:34.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتِيمِ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ أَشُدَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَهۡدِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَهۡدَ كَانَ مَسۡــُٔولاً ٣٤

17:35.text: وَأَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ إِذَا كِلۡتُمۡ وَزِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطَاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَقِيمِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَحۡسَنُ تَأۡوِيلاً ٣٥

17:36.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>فُ مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡمٌ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُؤَادَ كُلُّ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ كَانَ عَنۡهُ مَسۡــُٔولاً ٣٦

17:37.text: وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡرِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ طُولاً ٣٧

17:38.text: كُلُّ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهًا ٣٨

17:39.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ رَبُّكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةِ‌ۗ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ فَتُلۡقَىٰ فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مَلُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حُورًا ٣٩

17:40.text: أَفَأَصۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ رَبُّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ إِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَقُولُونَ قَوۡلاً عَظِيمًا ٤٠

17:41.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَرَّفۡنَا فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ لِيَذَّكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورًا ٤١

17:42.text: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> ءَالِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َمَا يَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ سَبِيلاً ٤٢

17:43.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَقُولُونَ عُلُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٤٣

17:44.text: تُسَبِّحُ لَهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِلَّا يُسَبِّحُ بِحَمۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَفۡقَهُونَ تَسۡبِيحَهُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا ٤٤

17:45.text: وَإِذَا قَرَأۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ جَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ حِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡتُورًا ٤٥

17:46.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةً أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡقَهُوهُ وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِذَا ذَكَرۡتَ رَبَّكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ وَحۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ نُفُورًا ٤٦

17:47.text: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَسۡتَمِعُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذۡ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِذۡ هُمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡحُورًا ٤٧

17:48.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَالَ فَضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلاً ٤٨

17:49.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِذَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرُفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوثُونَ خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َدِيدًا ٤٩

17:51.text: أَوۡ خَلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَكۡبُرُ فِى صُدُورِكُمۡ‌ۚ فَسَيَقُولُونَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعِيدُنَا‌ۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَيُنۡغِضُونَ إِلَيۡكَ رُءُوسَهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هُوَ‌ۖ قُلۡ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ قَرِيبًا ٥١

17:52.text: يَوۡمَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوكُمۡ فَتَسۡتَجِيبُونَ بِحَمۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُونَ إ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٥٢

17:53.text: وَقُل لِّعِبَادِى يَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َغُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ كَانَ لِلۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَدُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ٥٣

17:54.text: رَّبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِكُمۡ‌ۖ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يَرۡحَمۡكُمۡ أَوۡ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَكِيلاً ٥٤

17:55.text: وَرَبُّكَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَضَّلۡنَا بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ زَبُورًا ٥٥

17:56.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ زَعَمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ كَشۡفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرِّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلَا تَحۡوِيلاً ٥٦

17:57.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُونَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَسِيلَةَ أَيُّهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُ وَيَرۡجُونَ رَحۡمَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَيَخَافُونَ عَذَابَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ كَانَ مَحۡذُورًا ٥٧

17:58.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا نَحۡنُ مُهۡلِكُوهَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ أَوۡ مُعَذِّبُوهَا عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مَسۡطُورًا ٥٨

17:59.text: وَمَا مَنَعَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّرۡسِلَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبَ بِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلُونَ‌ۚ وَءَاتَيۡنَا ثَمُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاقَةَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا‌ۚ وَمَا نُرۡسِلُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَّا تَخۡوِيفًا ٥٩

17:60.text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لَكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ أَحَاطَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۚ وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّءۡيَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ إِلَّا فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلۡعُونَةَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ‌ۚ وَنُخَوِّفُهُمۡ فَمَا يَزِيدُهُمۡ إِلَّا طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٦٠

17:61.text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَدَمَ فَسَجَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ قَالَ ءَأَسۡجُدُ لِمَنۡ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَ طِينًا ٦١

17:62.text: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَكَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَرَّمۡتَ عَلَىَّ لَئِنۡ أَخَّرۡتَنِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ لَأَحۡتَنِكَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذُرِّيَّتَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٦٢

17:63.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّوۡفُورًا ٦٣

17:64.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَفۡزِزۡ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡتَ مِنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِصَوۡتِكَ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِخَيۡلِكَ وَرَجِلِكَ وَشَارِكۡهُمۡ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِ وَعِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا ٦٤

17:65.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عِبَادِى لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ وَكِيلاً ٦٥

17:66.text: رَّبُّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُزۡجِى لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ لِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمًا ٦٦

17:67.text: وَإِذَا مَسَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضُّرُّ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ ضَلَّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِيَّاهُ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَجَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ أَعۡرَضۡتُمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ كَفُورًا ٦٧

17:68.text: أَفَأَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡسِفَ بِكُمۡ جَانِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ أَوۡ يُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ وَكِيلاً ٦٨

17:69.text: أَمۡ أَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعِيدَكُمۡ فِيهِ تَارَةً أُخۡرَىٰ فَيُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ قَاصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيحِ فَيُغۡرِقَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَفَرۡتُمۡ‌ۙ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَلَيۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَبِيعًا ٦٩

17:70.text: ۞وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَرَّمۡنَا بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ وَحَمَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ وَرَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَفَضَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَلَىٰ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا تَفۡضِيلاً ٧٠

17:71.text: يَوۡمَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلَّ أُنَا<rule class=iqlab>سِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِإِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَمَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِيَمِينِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَءُونَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُمۡ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلاً ٧١

17:72.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَعۡمَىٰ فَهُوَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ وَأَضَلُّ سَبِيلاً ٧٢

17:73.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيَفۡتِنُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ لِتَفۡتَرِىَ عَلَيۡنَا غَيۡرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُوكَ خَلِيلاً ٧٣

17:74.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َبَّتۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=ikhafa>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيلاً ٧٤

17:75.text: إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّأَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ ضِعۡفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَضِعۡفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَمَاتِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ عَلَيۡنَا نَصِيرًا ٧٥

17:76.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيَسۡتَفِزُّونَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ لِيُخۡرِجُوكَ مِنۡهَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَلۡبَثُونَ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فَكَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٧٦

17:77.text: سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّسُلِنَا‌ۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ لِسُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتِنَا تَحۡوِيلاً ٧٧

17:78.text: أَقِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ لِدُلُوكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسِ إِلَىٰ غَسَقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَقُرۡءَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قُرۡءَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِ كَانَ مَشۡهُودًا ٧٨

17:79.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ فَتَهَجَّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَافِلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَكَ رَبُّكَ مَقَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡمُودًا ٧٩

17:80.text: وَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡنِى مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نِى مُخۡرَجَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لِّى م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّصِيرًا ٨٠

17:81.text: وَقُلۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَزَهَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلَ كَانَ زَهُوقًا ٨١

17:82.text: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۙ وَلَا يَزِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارًا ٨٢

17:83.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔـا بِجَانِبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرُّ كَانَ يَــُٔوسًا ٨٣

17:84.text: قُلۡ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلُ عَلَىٰ شَاكِلَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَرَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَنۡ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ سَبِيلاً ٨٤

17:85.text: وَيَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحِ‌ۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ مِنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّى وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِيت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٨٥

17:86.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِئۡنَا لَنَذۡهَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تَجِدُ لَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَيۡنَا وَكِيلاً ٨٦

17:87.text: إِلَّا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَضۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرًا ٨٧

17:88.text: قُل لَّئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَمَعَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمِثۡلِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ لَا يَأۡتُونَ بِمِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَانَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َهِيرًا ٨٨

17:89.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَرَّفۡنَا لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَثَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَكۡثَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا ٨٩

17:90.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ُوعًا ٩٠

17:91.text: أَوۡ تَكُونَ لَكَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّخِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِنَ<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتُفَجِّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهَا تَفۡجِيرًا ٩١

17:92.text: أَوۡ تُسۡقِطَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ كَمَا زَعَمۡتَ عَلَيۡنَا كِسَفًا أَوۡ تَأۡتِىَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ قَبِيلاً ٩٢

17:93.text: أَوۡ يَكُونَ لَكَ بَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُخۡرُفٍ أَوۡ تَرۡقَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ لِرُقِيِّكَ حَتَّىٰ تُنَزِّلَ عَلَيۡنَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَؤُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ قُلۡ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَانَ رَبِّى هَلۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولاً ٩٣

17:94.text: وَمَا مَنَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَبَعَثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَشَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولاً ٩٤

17:95.text: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡشُونَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِينَ لَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولاً ٩٥

17:96.text: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَهِيد<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ بِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَبِير<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َصِيرًا ٩٦

17:97.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَدِ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلۡ فَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لَهُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَنَحۡشُرُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ عُمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َصُم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ كُلَّمَا خَبَتۡ زِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سَعِيرًا ٩٧

17:98.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِذَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرُفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوثُونَ خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َدِيدًا ٩٨

17:99.text: ۞أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ قَادِرٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۡ وَجَعَلَ لَهُمۡ أَجَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ فَأَبَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ إِلَّا كُفُورًا ٩٩

17:100.text: قُل لَّوۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَمۡلِكُونَ خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنَ رَحۡمَةِ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّأَمۡسَكۡتُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َاقِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ قَتُورًا ١٠٠

17:101.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ تِسۡعَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسۡــَٔلۡ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ فَقَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِرۡعَوۡنُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَأَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ مَسۡحُورًا ١٠١

17:102.text: قَالَ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡتَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِلَّا رَبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بَص<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَأَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرۡعَوۡنُ مَثۡبُورًا ١٠٢

17:103.text: فَأَرَادَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَفِزَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَمِيعًا ١٠٣

17:104.text: وَقُلۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَعۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ جِئۡنَا بِكُمۡ لَفِيفًا ١٠٤

17:105.text: وَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ نَزَلَ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِيرًا ١٠٥

17:106.text: وَقُرۡءَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ لِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَأَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَلَىٰ مُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَزَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلاً ١٠٦

17:107.text: قُلۡ ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡ لَا تُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ يَخِرُّونَ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِ سُجَّدًا ١٠٧

17:108.text: وَيَقُولُونَ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ رَبِّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّنَا لَمَفۡعُولاً ١٠٨

17:109.text: وَيَخِرُّونَ لِلۡأَذۡقَانِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُونَ وَيَزِيدُهُمۡ خُشُوعًا ۩ ١٠٩

17:110.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۖ أَي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۚ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَرۡ بِصَلَاتِكَ وَلَا تُخَافِتۡ بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِ بَيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ سَبِيلاً ١١٠

17:111.text: وَقُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَمۡ يَتَّخِذۡ وَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكِ وَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّلِّ‌ۖ وَكَبِّرۡهُ تَكۡبِيرَۢا ١١١

18:1.text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ عَلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِوَجَاۜ ١

18:2.text: قَيِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ بَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُنۡهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا حَسَنًا ٢

18:4.text: وَيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَلَدًا ٤

18:5.text: مَّا لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا لِأَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَبُرَتۡ كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡرُجُ مِنۡ أَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبًا ٥

18:6.text: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>خِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسَكَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ إ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا ٦

18:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ زِينَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهَا لِنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلاً ٧

18:8.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ُرُزًا ٨

18:9.text: أَمۡ حَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَهۡفِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّقِيمِ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا عَجَبًا ٩

18:10.text: إِذۡ أَوَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡيَةُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَهۡفِ فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتِنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَيِّئۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا رَشَدًا ١٠

18:11.text: فَضَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدًا ١١

18:12.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَعَثۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمَدًا ١٢

18:13.text: نَّحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ نَبَأَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِتۡيَةٌ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ وَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ هُدًى ١٣

18:14.text: وَرَبَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِذۡ قَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبُّنَا رَبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>هًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قُلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َطَطًا ١٤

18:15.text: هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ قَوۡمُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡلَا يَأۡتُونَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا ١٥
