18:16.text: وَإِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَزَلۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَأۡوُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓاۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَهۡفِ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ُرۡ لَكُمۡ رَبُّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُهَيِّئۡ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَمۡرِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّرۡفَقًا ١٦

18:17.text: ۞وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّز<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَرُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َهۡفِهِمۡ ذَاتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رِضُهُمۡ ذَاتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّمَالِ وَهُمۡ فِى فَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَدِ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلۡ فَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّرۡشِدًا ١٧

18:18.text: وَتَحۡسَبُهُمۡ أَيۡقَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ رُقُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنُقَلِّبُهُمۡ ذَاتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّمَالِ‌ۖ وَكَلۡبُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِ<rule class=ikhafa>طٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِرَاعَيۡهِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَصِيدِ‌ۚ لَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>طَّلَعۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوَلَّيۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمُلِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ رُعۡبًا ١٨

18:19.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بَعَثۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِيَتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ قَالَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثۡتُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَحَدَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِوَرِقِكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ فَلۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ أَيُّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَزۡكَىٰ طَعَا<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلۡيَأۡتِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ وَلۡيَتَلَطَّفۡ وَلَا يُشۡعِرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِكُمۡ أَحَدًا ١٩

18:20.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َظۡهَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَرۡجُمُوكُمۡ أَوۡ يُعِيدُوكُمۡ فِى مِلَّتِهِمۡ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذًا أَبَدًا ٢٠

18:21.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَعۡثَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ يَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَعُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَمۡرَهُمۡ‌ۖ فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبُّهُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِهِمۡ‌ۚ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ غَلَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡرِهِمۡ لَنَتَّخِذَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّسۡجِدًا ٢١

18:22.text: سَيَقُولُونَ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّابِعُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ خَمۡسَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َادِسُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ رَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>م<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ‌ۖ وَيَقُولُونَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَامِنُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ‌ۚ قُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ بِعِدَّتِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَعۡلَمُهُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تُمَارِ فِيهِمۡ إِلَّا مِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَسۡتَفۡتِ فِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أَحَدًا ٢٢

18:23.text: وَلَا تَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِشَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ىۡءٍ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى فَاعِ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ غَدًا ٢٣

18:24.text: إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ إِذَا نَسِيتَ وَقُلۡ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِيَنِ رَبِّى لِأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبَ مِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا رَشَدًا ٢٤

18:25.text: وَلَبِثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ مِ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ئَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>زۡدَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تِسۡعًا ٢٥

18:26.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> غَيۡبُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَسۡمِعۡ‌ۚ مَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُشۡرِكُ فِى حُكۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَحَدًا ٢٦

18:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تۡلُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ِتَابِ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُلۡتَحَدًا ٢٧

18:28.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ نَفۡسَكَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَدَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَشِىِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَلَا تَعۡدُ عَيۡنَاكَ عَنۡهُمۡ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مَنۡ أَغۡفَلۡنَا قَلۡبَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ هَوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فُرُطًا ٢٨

18:29.text: وَقُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ‌ۖ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَلۡيُؤۡم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَلۡيَكۡفُرۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ نَارًا أَحَاطَ بِهِمۡ سُرَادِقُهَا‌ۚ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَغِيثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُغَاثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡلِ يَشۡوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوُجُوهَ‌ۚ بِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرَابُ وَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقًا ٢٩

18:30.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَا نُضِيعُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ مَنۡ أَحۡسَنَ عَمَلاً ٣٠

18:31.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَلۡبَسُونَ ثِيَابًا خُضۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتَّكِــِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكِ‌ۚ نِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّوَابُ وَحَسُنَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقًا ٣١

18:32.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّجُلَيۡنِ جَعَلۡنَا لِأَحَدِهِمَا جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَيۡنِ مِنۡ أَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَفَفۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا بِنَخۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمَا زَرۡعًا ٣٢

18:33.text: كِلۡتَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَيۡنِ ءَاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمۡ تَظۡل<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفَجَّرۡنَا خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمَا نَهَرًا ٣٣

18:34.text: وَكَانَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ لِصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَنَاۡ أَكۡثَرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ مَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعَزُّ نَفَرًا ٣٤

18:35.text: وَدَخَلَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهُوَ ظَالِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَالَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِيدَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَبَدًا ٣٥

18:36.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّدِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى لَأَجِدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَبًا ٣٦

18:37.text: قَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> صَاحِبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَكَفَرۡتَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ سَوَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ رَجُلاً ٣٧

18:38.text: لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبِّى وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحَدًا ٣٨

18:39.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ دَخَلۡتَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَكَ قُلۡتَ مَا ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرَنِ أَنَاۡ أَقَلَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ مَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َوَلَدًا ٣٩

18:40.text: فَعَسَىٰ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡتِيَنِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتِكَ وَيُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهَا حُسۡبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَتُصۡبِحَ صَعِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َلَقًا ٤٠

18:41.text: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهَا غَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> طَلَبًا ٤١

18:42.text: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأَصۡبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيۡهِ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقَ فِيهَا وَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى لَمۡ أُشۡرِكۡ بِرَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحَدًا ٤٢

18:43.text: وَلَمۡ تَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصِرًا ٤٣

18:44.text: هُنَالِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَةُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَيۡرٌ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بًا ٤٤

18:45.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّثَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَطَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَبَاتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصۡبَحَ هَشِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َذۡرُوهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حُ‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَدِرًا ٤٥

18:46.text: ٱلۡمَالُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ خَيۡرٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ ثَوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَيۡرٌ أَمَلاً ٤٦

18:47.text: وَيَوۡمَ نُسَيِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَارِزَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَشَرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَلَمۡ نُغَادِرۡ مِنۡهُمۡ أَحَدًا ٤٧

18:48.text: وَعُرِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ صَف<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتُمُونَا كَمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَلّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡعِدًا ٤٨

18:49.text: وَوُضِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ فَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ مُشۡفِقِينَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا فِيهِ وَيَقُولُونَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَتَنَا مَالِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَا يُغَادِرُ صَغِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا كَبِيرَةً إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحۡصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا‌ۚ وَوَجَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَاضِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَظۡلِمُ رَبُّكَ أَحَدًا ٤٩

18:50.text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَدَمَ فَسَجَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ فَفَسَقَ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَفَتَتَّخِذُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَذُرِّيَّتَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِى وَهُمۡ لَكُمۡ عَدُو<rule class=iqlab>ُّۢ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِئۡسَ لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ بَدَلاً ٥٠

18:51.text: ۞مّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشۡهَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مُتَّخِذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدًا ٥١

18:52.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَقُولُ نَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡبِقًا ٥٢

18:53.text: وَرَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ فَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفًا ٥٣

18:54.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَرَّفۡنَا فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَثَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَكۡثَرَ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َدَلاً ٥٤

18:55.text: وَمَا مَنَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمۡ سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلِينَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ قُبُلاً ٥٥

18:56.text: وَمَا نُرۡسِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرِينَ‌ۚ وَيُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُزُوًا ٥٦

18:57.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُكِّرَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَا وَنَسِىَ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةً أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡقَهُوهُ وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُهُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ فَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡتَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذًا أَبَدًا ٥٧

18:58.text: وَرَبُّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةِ‌ۖ لَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ‌ۚ بَل لَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡعِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَوۡئِلاً ٥٨

18:59.text: وَتِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡعِدًا ٥٩

18:60.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِفَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَحُ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَمۡضِىَ حُقُبًا ٦٠

18:61.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا بَلَغَا مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعَ بَيۡنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوتَهُمَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ سَرَبًا ٦١

18:62.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ ءَاتِنَا غَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَقِينَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َفَرِنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا نَصَبًا ٦٢

18:63.text: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَ إِذۡ أَوَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّخۡرَةِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى نَسِيتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُوتَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيهُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَنۡ أَذۡكُرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ عَجَبًا ٦٣

18:64.text: قَالَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَدَّا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصًا ٦٤

18:65.text: فَوَجَدَا عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِبَادِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِنَا وَعَلَّمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عِلۡمًا ٦٥

18:66.text: قَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُوسَىٰ هَلۡ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُعَلِّمَنِ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عُلِّمۡتَ رُشۡدًا ٦٦

18:67.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٦٧

18:68.text: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٦٨

18:69.text: قَالَ سَتَجِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ صَابِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡصِى لَكَ أَمۡرًا ٦٩

18:70.text: قَالَ فَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعۡتَنِى فَلَا تَسۡــَٔلۡنِى عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُحۡدِثَ لَكَ مِنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا ٧٠

18:71.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَقَا حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا رَكِبَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَا‌ۖ قَالَ أَخَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَهَا لِتُغۡرِقَ أَهۡلَهَا لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتَ شَيۡــًٔا إِمۡرًا ٧١

18:72.text: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٧٢

18:73.text: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِى بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نِى مِنۡ أَمۡرِى عُسۡرًا ٧٣

18:74.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَقَا حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا لَقِيَا غُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَتَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَالَ أَقَتَلۡتَ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َكِيَّ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّكۡرًا ٧٤

18:75.text: ۞قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِىَ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٧٥

18:76.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتُكَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡ<rule class=iqlab>ءِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَهَا فَلَا تُصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِى‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَلَغۡتَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عُذۡرًا ٧٦

18:77.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَقَا حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَ قَرۡيَةٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَهَا فَأَبَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضَيِّفُوهُمَا فَوَجَدَا فِيهَا جِدَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َضَّ فَأَقَامَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَالَ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ لَتَّخَذۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا ٧٧

18:78.text: قَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فِرَاقُ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنِكَ‌ۚ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأۡوِيلِ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡتَطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٧٨

18:79.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتۡ لِمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ فَأَرَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّ أَنۡ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصۡبًا ٧٩

18:80.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤۡمِنَيۡنِ فَخَشِين<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡهِقَهُمَا طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُفۡرًا ٨٠

18:81.text: فَأَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ زَكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبَ رُحۡمًا ٨١

18:82.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِدَارُ فَكَانَ لِغُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَيۡنِ يَتِيمَيۡنِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ وَكَانَ تَحۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَن<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>زٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمَا وَكَانَ أَبُوهُمَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَرَادَ رَبُّكَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشُدَّهُمَا وَيَسۡتَخۡرِجَا كَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َهُمَا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۚ وَمَا فَعَلۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَنۡ أَمۡرِى‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ تَأۡوِيلُ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٨٢

18:83.text: وَيَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ‌ۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا ٨٣

18:84.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَبًا ٨٤

18:86.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغۡرِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغۡرُبُ فِى عَيۡنٍ حَمِئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َوَجَدَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهَا قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡنَا يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُعَذِّبَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّخِذَ فِيهِمۡ حُسۡنًا ٨٦

18:87.text: قَالَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيُعَذِّبُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّكۡرًا ٨٧

18:88.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرًا ٨٨

18:90.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا بَلَغَ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>لِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>لُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِهَا سِتۡرًا ٩٠

18:91.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رًا ٩١

18:93.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِهِمَا قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلاً ٩٣

18:94.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَأۡجُوجَ وَمَأۡجُوجَ مُفۡسِدُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَهَلۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ لَكَ خَرۡجًا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ سَدًّا ٩٤

18:95.text: قَالَ مَا مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى فِيهِ رَبِّى خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَعِينُونِى بِقُوَّةٍ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>مًا ٩٥

18:96.text: ءَاتُونِى زُبَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيدِ‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّدَفَيۡنِ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُخُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا جَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ ءَاتُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡهِ قِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رًا ٩٦

18:97.text: فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بًا ٩٧

18:98.text: قَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى‌ۖ فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّى جَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> دَكّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۖ وَكَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّى حَقًّا ٩٨

18:99.text: ۞وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمُوجُ فِى بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَمۡعًا ٩٩

18:100.text: وَعَرَضۡنَا جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَرۡضًا ١٠٠

18:101.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتۡ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ فِى غِط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِى وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَمۡعًا ١٠١

18:102.text: أَفَحَسِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِبَادِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ نُزُلاً ١٠٢

18:103.text: قُلۡ هَلۡ نُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخۡسَرِينَ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لاً ١٠٣

18:104.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا ١٠٤

18:105.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَحَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ وَزۡنًا ١٠٥

18:106.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ بِمَا كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَرُسُلِى هُزُوًا ١٠٦

18:107.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلاً ١٠٧

18:108.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلاً ١٠٨

18:109.text: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرُ مِدَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّى لَنَفِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َدَ كَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ رَبِّى وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَدَدًا ١٠٩

18:110.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='ikhafa'>دٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يَرۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلۡيَعۡمَلۡ عَمَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُشۡرِكۡ بِعِبَادَةِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَحَدَۢا ١١٠

19:2.text: ذِكۡرُ رَحۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> زَكَرِيَّآ ٢

19:3.text: إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نِد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً خَفِيًّا ٣

19:4.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى وَهَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظۡمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡتَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّأۡسُ شَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ أَك<rule class=iqlab>ُنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِدُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا ٤

19:5.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى خِفۡتُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡمَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِىَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِى وَكَانَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتِى عَاقِ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لِى م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ وَلِيًّا ٥

19:6.text: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنۡ ءَالِ يَعۡقُوبَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا ٦

19:7.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَكَرِيّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَحۡيَىٰ لَمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ سَمِيًّا ٧

19:8.text: قَالَ رَبِّ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتِى عَاقِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَلَغۡتُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا ٨

19:9.text: قَالَ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَلَمۡ تَكُ شَيۡــًٔا ٩

19:10.text: قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ لَيَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َوِيًّا ١٠

19:11.text: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِّحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُكۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَشِيًّا ١١

19:12.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَحۡيَىٰ خُذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِقُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمَ صَبِيًّا ١٢

19:13.text: وَحَنَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَزَكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ تَقِيًّا ١٣

19:14.text: وَبَرّ<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class='iqlab'>ب</rule>ِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َبَّارًا عَصِيًّا ١٤

19:15.text: وَسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡهِ يَوۡمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوۡمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ حَيًّا ١٥

19:16.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مَرۡيَمَ إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َبَذَتۡ مِنۡ أَهۡلِهَا مَكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرۡقِيًّا ١٦

19:17.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِهِمۡ حِجَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َوِيًّا ١٧

19:18.text: قَالَتۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعُوذُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَقِيًّا ١٨

19:19.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َكِيًّا ١٩

19:20.text: قَالَتۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِى بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ أَكُ بَغِيًّا ٢٠

19:21.text: قَالَ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا‌ۚ وَكَانَ أَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِيًّا ٢١

19:22.text: ۞فَحَمَلَتۡهُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َبَذَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َصِيًّا ٢٢

19:23.text: فَأَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذۡعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخۡلَةِ قَالَتۡ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى مِتُّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ نَسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِيًّا ٢٣

19:24.text: فَنَادَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَّا تَحۡزَنِى قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحۡتَكِ سَرِيًّا ٢٤

19:25.text: وَهُزّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكِ بِجِذۡعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخۡلَةِ تُسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكِ رُطَ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َنِيًّا ٢٥

19:26.text: فَكُلِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَرَيِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَشَرِ أَحَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى نَذَرۡتُ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ صَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَنۡ أُكَلِّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِيًّا ٢٦

19:27.text: فَأَتَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَوۡمَهَا تَحۡمِلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَرۡيَمُ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتِ شَيۡـ<rule class=ikhafa>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرِيًّا ٢٧

19:28.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أُخۡتَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَ سَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَتۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُكِ بَغِيًّا ٢٨

19:29.text: فَأَشَارَتۡ إِلَيۡهِ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَهۡدِ صَبِيًّا ٢٩

19:30.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا ٣٠

19:31.text: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ وَأَوۡصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِى بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ مَا دُمۡتُ حَيًّا ٣١

19:32.text: وَبَرّ<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class='iqlab'>ب</rule>ِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَتِى وَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى جَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َقِيًّا ٣٢

19:33.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ عَلَىَّ يَوۡمَ وُلِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّ وَيَوۡمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوۡمَ أُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ حَيًّا ٣٣

19:34.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ‌ۚ قَوۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فِيهِ يَمۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

19:35.text: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِذَا قَضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَقُولُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نُ ٣٥

19:36.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُوهُ‌ۚ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٦

19:37.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّشۡهَدِ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٧

19:38.text: أَسۡمِعۡ بِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرۡ يَوۡمَ يَأۡتُونَنَا‌ۖ لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٨

19:39.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسۡرَةِ إِذۡ قُضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ وَهُمۡ فِى غَفۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

19:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

19:41.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ صِدِّي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِيًّا ٤١

19:42.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ لِمَ تَعۡبُدُ مَا لَا يَسۡمَعُ وَلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرُ وَلَا يُغۡنِى عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ شَيۡــًٔا ٤٢

19:43.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ مَا لَمۡ يَأۡتِكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهۡدِكَ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>طًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َوِيًّا ٤٣

19:44.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ لَا تَعۡبُدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ كَانَ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَصِيًّا ٤٤

19:45.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمَسَّكَ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلِيًّا ٤٥

19:46.text: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِى يَ<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ـٰٓ</rule>إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمُ‌ۖ لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهِ لَأَرۡجُمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡجُرۡنِى مَلِيًّا ٤٦

19:47.text: قَالَ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡكَ‌ۖ سَأَسۡتَغۡفِرُ لَكَ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا ٤٧

19:48.text: وَأَعۡتَزِلُكُمۡ وَمَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبِّى عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكُونَ بِدُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا ٤٨

19:49.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ‌ۖ وَكُل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلۡنَا نَبِيًّا ٤٩

19:50.text: وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِنَا وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ لِسَانَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قٍ عَلِيًّا ٥٠

19:51.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ مُخۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>صًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِيًّا ٥١

19:52.text: وَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َانِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ نَجِيًّا ٥٢

19:53.text: وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَاهُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ نَبِيًّا ٥٣

19:54.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ إِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ صَادِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِيًّا ٥٤

19:55.text: وَكَانَ يَأۡمُرُ أَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَكَانَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَرۡضِيًّا ٥٥

19:56.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ إِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِيسَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ صِدِّي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِيًّا ٥٦

19:58.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَنۡعَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّةِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَإِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هَدَيۡنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ خَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبُكِيًّا ۩ ٥٨

19:59.text: ۞فَخَلَفَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ خَلۡفٌ أَضَاعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>شَّهَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَلۡقَوۡنَ غَيًّا ٥٩

19:60.text: إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ شَيۡــًٔا ٦٠

19:61.text: جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وَعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ عِبَادَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ وَعۡدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَأۡتِيًّا ٦١

19:62.text: لَّا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوًا إِلَّا سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ رِزۡقُهُمۡ فِيهَا بُكۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَشِيًّا ٦٢

19:63.text: تِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ تَقِيًّا ٦٣

19:64.text: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمۡرِ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِينَا وَمَا خَلۡفَنَا وَمَا بَيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا ٦٤

19:65.text: رَّبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَبِرۡ لِعِبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ هَلۡ تَعۡلَمُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَمِيًّا ٦٥

19:66.text: وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوۡفَ أُخۡرَجُ حَيًّا ٦٦

19:67.text: أَوَلَا يَذۡكُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَلَمۡ يَكُ شَيۡــًٔا ٦٧

19:68.text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَنُحۡضِرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ جِثِيًّا ٦٨

19:69.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمۡ أَشَدُّ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عِتِيًّا ٦٩

19:70.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَنَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا ٧٠

19:71.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا‌ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِيًّا ٧١

19:72.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُنَجِّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّنَذَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا ٧٢

19:73.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَرِيقَيۡنِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّقَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَحۡسَنُ نَدِيًّا ٧٣

19:74.text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ أَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِءۡيًا ٧٤

19:75.text: قُلۡ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَةِ فَلۡيَمۡدُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَدًّا‌ۚ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ هُوَ شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَضۡعَفُ جُ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ًا ٧٥

19:76.text: وَيَزِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ خَيۡرٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ ثَوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرَدًّا ٧٦

19:77.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َوَلَدًا ٧٧

19:78.text: أَطَّلَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَهۡدًا ٧٨

19:79.text: كَلَّا‌ۚ سَنَكۡتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ مَدًّا ٧٩

19:80.text: وَنَرِثُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأۡتِينَا فَرۡدًا ٨٠

19:81.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ عِزًّا ٨١

19:82.text: كَلَّا‌ۚ سَيَكۡفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضِدًّا ٨٢

19:83.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمۡ أَزًّا ٨٣

19:84.text: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدًّا ٨٤

19:85.text: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَفۡدًا ٨٥

19:86.text: وَنَسُوقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ وِرۡدًا ٨٦

19:87.text: لَّا يَمۡلِكُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَهۡدًا ٨٧

19:88.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَلَدًا ٨٨

19:90.text: تَكَادُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِنۡهُ وَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َقُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَتَخِرُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ هَدًّا ٩٠

19:91.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َعَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلَدًا ٩١

19:92.text: وَمَا يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َغِى لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا ٩٢

19:93.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دًا ٩٣

19:94.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحۡصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَعَدَّهُمۡ عَدًّا ٩٤

19:95.text: وَكُلُّهُمۡ ءَاتِيهِ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فَرۡدًا ٩٥

19:96.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وُدًّا ٩٦

19:97.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَسَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقِينَ وَتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ُّدًّا ٩٧

19:98.text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡنٍ هَلۡ تُحِسُّ مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَوۡ تَسۡمَعُ لَهُمۡ رِكۡزَۢا ٩٨

20:2.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ لِتَشۡقَىٰٓ ٢

20:3.text: إِلَّا تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡشَىٰ ٣
