20:4.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُلَى ٤

20:5.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ ٥

20:6.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَمَا تَحۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّرَىٰ ٦

20:7.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَرۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّرَّ وَأَخۡفَى ٧

20:8.text: ٱللَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ ٨

20:10.text: إِذۡ رَءَا نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡكُث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَانَسۡتُ نَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاتِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا بِقَبَسٍ أَوۡ أَجِدُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ هُدًى ١٠

20:11.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا نُودِىَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰٓ ١١

20:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنَاۡ رَبُّكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى ١٢

20:13.text: وَأَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَرۡتُكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمِعۡ لِمَا يُوحَىٰٓ ١٣

20:14.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نِى وَأَقِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ لِذِكۡرِىٓ ١٤

20:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٌ أَكَادُ أُخۡفِيهَا لِتُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=iqlab>سِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَسۡعَىٰ ١٥

20:16.text: فَلَا يَصُدَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَنۡهَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِنُ بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ هَوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ فَتَرۡدَىٰ ١٦

20:18.text: قَالَ هِىَ عَصَاىَ أَتَوَكَّؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِى وَلِىَ فِيهَا مَـَٔـارِبُ أُخۡرَىٰ ١٨

20:20.text: فَأَلۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا فَإِذَا هِىَ حَيَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡعَىٰ ٢٠

20:21.text: قَالَ خُذۡهَا وَلَا تَخَفۡ‌ۖ سَنُعِيدُهَا سِيرَتَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ ٢١

20:22.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡمُمۡ يَدَكَ إِلَىٰ جَنَاحِكَ تَخۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> بَيۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءٍ ءَايَةً أُخۡرَىٰ ٢٢

20:23.text: لِنُرِيَكَ مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَى ٢٣

20:24.text: ٱذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> طَغَىٰ ٢٤

20:25.text: قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَحۡ لِى صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى ٢٥

20:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡلُلۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّسَانِى ٢٧

20:29.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لِّى وَزِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِى ٢٩

20:35.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِنَا بَصِيرًا ٣٥

20:36.text: قَالَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُوتِيتَ سُؤۡلَكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ ٣٦

20:37.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَيۡكَ مَرَّةً أُخۡرَىٰٓ ٣٧

20:38.text: إِذۡ أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِكَ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ ٣٨

20:39.text: أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذِفِيهِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّابُوتِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذِفِيهِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ فَلۡيُلۡقِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاحِلِ يَأۡخُذۡهُ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّى وَعَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَأَلۡقَيۡتُ عَلَيۡكَ مَحَبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى وَلِتُصۡنَعَ عَلَىٰ عَيۡنِىٓ ٣٩

20:40.text: إِذۡ تَمۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُخۡتُكَ فَتَقُولُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ فَرَجَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِكَ كَىۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَ‌ۚ وَقَتَلۡتَ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ وَفَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ فُتُو<rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَبِثۡتَ سِنِينَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهۡلِ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جِئۡتَ عَلَىٰ قَدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ ٤٠

20:42.text: ٱذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَلَا تَنِيَا فِى ذِكۡرِى ٤٢

20:43.text: ٱذۡهَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> طَغَىٰ ٤٣

20:44.text: فَقُولَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَتَذَكَّرُ أَوۡ يَخۡشَىٰ ٤٤

20:45.text: قَالَا رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا نَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡرُطَ عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>غَىٰ ٤٥

20:46.text: قَالَ لَا تَخَاف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى مَعَكُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡمَعُ وَأَرَىٰ ٤٦

20:47.text: فَأۡتِيَاهُ فَقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رَسُولَا رَبِّكَ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَا بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَلَا تُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ عَلَىٰ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰٓ ٤٧

20:48.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ عَلَىٰ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ ٤٨

20:50.text: قَالَ رَبُّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡطَىٰ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ خَلۡقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ هَدَىٰ ٥٠

20:52.text: قَالَ عِلۡمُهَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّى فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَضِلُّ رَبِّى وَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َى ٥٢

20:53.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَلَكَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبَا<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َتَّىٰ ٥٣

20:54.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡعَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَكُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُهَىٰ ٥٤

20:55.text: ۞مِنۡهَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَفِيهَا نُعِيدُكُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا نُخۡرِجُكُمۡ تَارَةً أُخۡرَىٰ ٥٥

20:56.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا كُلَّهَا فَكَذَّبَ وَأَبَىٰ ٥٦

20:57.text: قَالَ أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتُخۡرِجَنَا مِنۡ أَرۡضِنَا بِسِحۡرِكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ ٥٧

20:58.text: فَلَنَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بِسِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكَ مَوۡعِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا نُخۡلِفُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَحۡنُ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مَكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>سُ</rule>وًى ٥٨

20:59.text: قَالَ مَوۡعِدُكُمۡ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زِّينَةِ وَأ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡشَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ ضُحًى ٥٩

20:60.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فَجَمَعَ كَيۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَتَىٰ ٦٠

20:61.text: قَالَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ وَيۡلَكُمۡ لَا تَفۡتَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُسۡحِتَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِعَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَابَ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ ٦١

20:62.text: فَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ وَأَسَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَىٰ ٦٢

20:63.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ لَسَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>حِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ يُرِيدَانِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡرِجَاك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَرۡضِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسِحۡرِهِمَا وَيَذۡهَبَا بِطَرِيقَتِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُثۡلَىٰ ٦٣

20:64.text: فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡدَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَف<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَفۡلَحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعۡلَىٰ ٦٤

20:65.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُلۡقِىَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ ٦٥

20:66.text: قَالَ بَلۡ أَلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَإِذَا حِبَالُهُمۡ وَعِصِيُّهُمۡ يُخَيَّلُ إِلَيۡهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِحۡرِهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا تَسۡعَىٰ ٦٦

20:67.text: فَأَوۡجَسَ فِى نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خِيفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ ٦٧

20:68.text: قُلۡنَا لَا تَخَفۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَىٰ ٦٨

20:69.text: وَأَلۡقِ مَا فِى يَمِينِكَ تَلۡقَفۡ مَا صَنَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا صَنَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡدُ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاحِرُ حَيۡثُ أَتَىٰ ٦٩

20:70.text: فَأُلۡقِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ سُجَّ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِرَبِّ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ وَمُوسَىٰ ٧٠

20:71.text: قَالَ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكَبِيرُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّحۡرَ‌ۖ فَلَأُقَطِّعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَأُصَلِّبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ فِى جُذُوعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َخۡلِ وَلَتَعۡلَمُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَيُّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشَدُّ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَىٰ ٧١

20:72.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡثِرَكَ عَلَىٰ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَنَا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ قَاضٍ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَآ ٧٢

20:73.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِرَبِّنَا لِيَغۡفِرَ لَنَا خَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡرَهۡتَنَا عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّحۡرِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَىٰٓ ٧٣

20:74.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ ٧٤

20:75.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَمِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُلَىٰ ٧٥

20:76.text: جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َزَكَّىٰ ٧٦

20:77.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِى فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ طَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ يَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فُ دَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَخۡشَىٰ ٧٧

20:78.text: فَأَتۡبَعَهُمۡ فِرۡعَوۡنُ بِجُنُودِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَغَشِيَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ مَا غَشِيَهُمۡ ٧٨

20:79.text: وَأَضَلَّ فِرۡعَوۡنُ قَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمَا هَدَىٰ ٧٩

20:80.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَدُوِّكُمۡ وَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عَ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ جَانِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡمَنَ وَنَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلۡوَىٰ ٨٠

20:81.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مَا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>غَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ فَيَحِلَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غَضَبِى‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحۡلِلۡ عَلَيۡهِ غَضَبِى فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> هَوَىٰ ٨١

20:82.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَغَفَّا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَىٰ ٨٢

20:83.text: ۞وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡجَلَكَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ ٨٣

20:84.text: قَالَ هُمۡ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَثَرِى وَعَجِلۡتُ إِلَيۡكَ رَبِّ لِتَرۡضَىٰ ٨٤

20:85.text: قَالَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَوۡمَكَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّامِرِىُّ ٨٥

20:86.text: فَرَجَعَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> غَضۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ أَسِ<rule class=ikhafa>فًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَلَمۡ يَعِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>كُمۡ رَبُّكُمۡ وَعۡدًا حَسَنًا‌ۚ أَفَطَالَ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَهۡدُ أَمۡ أَرَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحِلَّ عَلَيۡكُمۡ غَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ فَأَخۡلَفۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡعِدِى ٨٦

20:87.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡلَفۡنَا مَوۡعِدَكَ بِمَلۡكِنَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا حُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡزَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ِينَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ فَقَذَفۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا فَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَلۡقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّامِرِىُّ ٨٧

20:88.text: فَأَخۡرَجَ لَهُمۡ عِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خُوَا<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمۡ وَإِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مُوسَىٰ فَنَسِىَ ٨٨

20:89.text: أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَلَّا يَرۡجِعُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَمۡلِكُ لَهُمۡ ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَفۡعًا ٨٩

20:90.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قَالَ لَهُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا فُتِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُونِى وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرِى ٩٠

20:91.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَحَ عَلَيۡهِ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِفِينَ حَتَّىٰ يَرۡجِعَ إِلَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ ٩١

20:92.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونُ مَا مَنَعَكَ إِذۡ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ ضَلُّوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ٩٢

20:94.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَؤُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تَأۡخُذۡ بِلِحۡيَتِى وَلَا بِرَأۡس<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى خَشِيتُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولَ فَرَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَ بَيۡنَ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَلَمۡ تَرۡقُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> قَوۡلِى ٩٤

20:95.text: قَالَ فَمَا خَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بُكَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِرِىُّ ٩٥

20:96.text: قَالَ بَصُرۡتُ بِمَا لَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَقَبَضۡتُ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَثَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ فَنَبَذۡتُهَا وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ سَوَّلَتۡ لِى نَفۡسِى ٩٦

20:97.text: قَالَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولَ لَا مِسَاسَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ مَوۡعِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُخۡلَفَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ظَلۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ عَاكِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّنُحَرِّقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِفَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ نَسۡفًا ٩٧

20:98.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ وَسِعَ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ عِلۡمًا ٩٨

20:99.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَبَقَ‌ۚ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ذِكۡرًا ٩٩

20:100.text: مَّنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَحۡمِلُ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ وِزۡرًا ١٠٠

20:101.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهِ‌ۖ وَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ حِمۡلاً ١٠١

20:102.text: يَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َخُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ‌ۚ وَنَحۡشُرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُرۡقًا ١٠٢

20:103.text: يَتَخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فَتُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ إ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا عَشۡرًا ١٠٣

20:104.text: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ إِذۡ يَقُولُ أَمۡثَلُهُمۡ طَرِيقَةً إ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا يَوۡمًا ١٠٤

20:105.text: وَيَسۡــَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِفُهَا رَبِّى نَسۡفًا ١٠٥

20:107.text: لَّا تَرَىٰ فِيهَا عِوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡتًا ١٠٧

20:108.text: يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّاعِىَ لَا عِوَجَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَخَشَعَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصۡوَاتُ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَلَا تَسۡمَعُ إِلَّا هَمۡسًا ١٠٨

20:109.text: يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَةُ إِلَّا مَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَرَضِىَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَوۡلاً ١٠٩

20:110.text: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡمًا ١١٠

20:111.text: ۞وَعَنَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوُجُوهُ لِلۡحَىِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَيُّومِ‌ۖ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَابَ مَنۡ حَمَلَ ظُلۡمًا ١١١

20:112.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا يَخَافُ ظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا هَضۡمًا ١١٢

20:113.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َصَرَّفۡنَا فِيهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعِيدِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ أَوۡ يُحۡدِثُ لَهُمۡ ذِكۡرًا ١١٣

20:114.text: فَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ زِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نِى عِلۡمًا ١١٤

20:115.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ فَنَسِىَ وَلَمۡ نَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَزۡمًا ١١٥

20:116.text: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِأَدَمَ فَسَجَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ أَبَىٰ ١١٦

20:117.text: فَقُلۡنَا يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ـَٔـادَمُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا عَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ وَلِزَوۡجِكَ فَلَا يُخۡرِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ فَتَشۡقَىٰٓ ١١٧

20:118.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ أَلَّا تَجُوعَ فِيهَا وَلَا تَعۡرَىٰ ١١٨

20:119.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ ١١٩

20:120.text: فَوَسۡوَسَ إِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ـَٔـادَمُ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكَ عَلَىٰ شَجَرَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدِ وَمُلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>كٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَىٰ ١٢٠

20:121.text: فَأَكَلَا مِنۡهَا فَبَدَتۡ لَهُمَا سَوۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُهُمَا وَطَفِقَا يَخۡصِفَانِ عَلَيۡهِمَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۚ وَعَصَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَادَمُ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَغَوَىٰ ١٢١

20:122.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ ١٢٢

20:123.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡبِطَا مِنۡهَا جَمِيع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُ<rule class=ikhafa>وٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى هُ<rule class=ikhafa>دًى</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ هُدَاىَ فَلَا يَضِلُّ وَلَا يَشۡقَىٰ ١٢٣

20:124.text: وَمَنۡ أَعۡرَضَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِى فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَعِيشَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َن<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَحۡشُرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ أَعۡمَىٰ ١٢٤

20:125.text: قَالَ رَبِّ لِمَ حَشَرۡتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡمَىٰ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ بَصِيرًا ١٢٥

20:126.text: قَالَ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَتَتۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا فَنَسِيتَهَا‌ۖ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َىٰ ١٢٦

20:127.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى مَنۡ أَسۡرَفَ وَلَمۡ يُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَعَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَشَدُّ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَىٰٓ ١٢٧

20:128.text: أَفَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِى مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِهِمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُهَىٰ ١٢٨

20:129.text: وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لَكَانَ لِزَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًى ١٢٩

20:130.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ طُلُوعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ غُرُوبِهَا‌ۖ وَمِنۡ ءَانَآىِٕ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَافَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ لَعَلَّكَ تَرۡضَىٰ ١٣٠

20:131.text: وَلَا تَمُدَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَيۡنَيۡكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ زَهۡرَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا لِنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِ‌ۚ وَرِزۡقُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَىٰ ١٣١

20:132.text: وَأۡمُرۡ أَهۡلَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَبِرۡ عَلَيۡهَا‌ۖ لَا نَسۡــَٔلُكَ رِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحۡنُ نَرۡزُقُكَ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ لِلتَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ ١٣٢

20:133.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا يَأۡتِينَا بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَمۡ تَأۡتِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيِّنَةُ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّحُفِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ ١٣٣

20:134.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِعَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِلَّ وَنَخۡزَىٰ ١٣٤

20:135.text: قُلۡ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتَرَبِّ<rule class=ikhafa>صٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَرَبَّصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَسَتَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صِّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوِىِّ وَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَىٰ ١٣٥

21:1.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرَبَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ حِسَابُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِى غَفۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

21:2.text: مَا يَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمَعُوهُ وَهُمۡ يَلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

21:3.text: لَاهِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَأَسَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَلۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ‌ۖ أَفَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّحۡرَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

21:4.text: قَالَ رَبِّى يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٤

21:5.text: بَلۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَضۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثُ أَحۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>مِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ بَلۡ هُوَ شَاعِ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلۡيَأۡتِنَا بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

21:6.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَنَتۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> أَفَهُمۡ يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

21:7.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَكَ إِلَّا رِجَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ فَسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

21:8.text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَأۡكُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّعَامَ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

21:9.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ صَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدَ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَأَهۡلَكۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

21:10.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡ‌ۖ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

21:11.text: وَكَمۡ قَصَمۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ ظَالِمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأۡنَا بَعۡدَهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

21:12.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَسُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَأۡسَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا يَرۡكُض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

21:13.text: لَا تَرۡكُضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُتۡرِفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ وَمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

21:14.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

21:15.text: فَمَا زَالَت تِّلۡكَ دَعۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ حَتَّىٰ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ حَصِيدًا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

21:16.text: وَمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦

21:17.text: لَوۡ أَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتَّخِذَ لَهۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

21:18.text: بَلۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذِفُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ فَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>مَغُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَإِذَا هُوَ زَاهِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَيۡلُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

21:19.text: وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَمَنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا يَسۡتَحۡسِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

21:20.text: يُسَبِّحُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ لَا يَفۡتُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

21:21.text: أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

21:22.text: لَوۡ كَانَ فِيهِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَالِهَةٌ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَفَسَدَتَا‌ۚ فَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

21:23.text: لَا يُسۡــَٔلُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَفۡعَلُ وَهُمۡ يُسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

21:24.text: أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَالِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ هَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ‌ۖ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا ذِكۡرُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعِىَ وَذِكۡرُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِى‌ۗ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ‌ۖ فَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

21:25.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا نُوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٢٥

21:26.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ بَلۡ عِبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

21:27.text: لَا يَسۡبِقُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

21:28.text: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَلَا يَشۡفَعُونَ إِلَّا لِمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَضَىٰ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَشۡيَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

21:29.text: ۞وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُلۡ مِنۡهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيهِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

21:30.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ كَانَتَا رَتۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َفَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا‌ۖ وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ حَىٍّ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

21:31.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمِيدَ بِهِمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا فِجَا<rule class=ikhafa>جًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُبُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

21:32.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡفُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهَا مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

21:33.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى فَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡبَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

21:34.text: وَمَا جَعَلۡنَا لِبَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدَ‌ۖ أَفَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّتَّ فَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

21:35.text: كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۗ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

21:36.text: وَإِذَا رَءَاكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَذۡكُرُ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ هُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

21:37.text: خُلِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مِنۡ عَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>رِيكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٧

21:38.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

21:39.text: لَوۡ يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حِينَ لَا يَكُفُّونَ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ُجُوهِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ وَلَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>ُهُورِهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

21:40.text: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

21:41.text: وَلَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُهۡزِئَ بِرُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فَحَاقَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سَخِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

21:42.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡلَؤُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۗ بَلۡ هُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

21:43.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ ءَالِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمۡنَعُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِنَا‌ۚ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَلَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا يُصۡحَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

21:44.text: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمُرُ‌ۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَأۡتِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ نَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ُصُهَا مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رَافِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَفَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

21:45.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَحۡىِ‌ۚ وَلَا يَسۡمَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِذَا مَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

21:46.text: وَلَئ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَّتۡهُمۡ نَفۡحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّكَ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

21:47.text: وَنَضَعُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡمَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطَ لِيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فَلَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَرۡدَلٍ أَتَيۡنَا بِهَا‌ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِنَا حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

21:48.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

21:49.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

21:50.text: وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبَارَكٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ‌ۚ أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

21:51.text: ۞وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ رُشۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥١

21:52.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّمَاثِيلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَهَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

21:53.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا لَهَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

21:54.text: قَالَ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٥٤

21:55.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَجِئۡتَنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ أَمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

21:56.text: قَالَ بَ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبُّكُمۡ رَبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأَنَاۡ عَلَىٰ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='idgham_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

21:57.text: وَتَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَأَكِيدَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَصۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُوَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

21:58.text: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ذًا إِلَّا كَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

21:59.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَلَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بِـَٔـالِهَتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٩

21:60.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَمِعۡنَا فَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٠

21:61.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡيُنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَشۡهَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

21:62.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فَعَلۡتَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بِـَٔـالِهَتِنَا يَ<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ـٰٓ</rule>إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٢

21:63.text: قَالَ بَلۡ فَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَبِيرُهُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فَسۡــَٔلُوهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

21:64.text: فَرَجَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ فَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

21:65.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُكِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمۡتَ مَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

21:66.text: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُكُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ ٦٦

21:67.text: أُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ وَلِمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

21:68.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَرِّقُوهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

21:69.text: قُلۡنَا يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَارُ كُونِى بَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مَ ٦٩

21:70.text: وَأَرَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخۡسَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٠

21:71.text: وَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَلُوطًا إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكۡنَا فِيهَا لِلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

21:72.text: وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ نَافِلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلۡنَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

21:73.text: وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ فِعۡلَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَإِقَامَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ وَإِيت<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ‌ۖ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَنَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

21:74.text: وَلُوطًا ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كَانَت تَّعۡمَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِثَ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمَ سَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

21:75.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى رَحۡمَتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

21:76.text: وَنُوحًا إِذۡ نَادَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَرۡبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٧٦

21:77.text: وَنَصَرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمَ سَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

21:78.text: وَدَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ وَسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ إِذۡ يَحۡكُمَانِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡثِ إِذۡ نَفَشَتۡ فِيهِ غَنَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لِحُكۡمِهِمۡ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٨

21:79.text: فَفَهَّمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا سُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۚ وَكُلاًّ ءَاتَيۡنَا حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَخَّرۡنَا مَعَ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ يُسَبِّحۡنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرَ‌ۚ وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٩

21:82.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغُوصُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَيَعۡمَلُونَ عَمَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُمۡ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٢
