21:84.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمِثۡلَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّعَهُمۡ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِنَا وَذِكۡرَىٰ لِلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

21:85.text: وَإِسۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِيلَ وَإِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِيسَ وَذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِفۡلِ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

21:86.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى رَحۡمَتِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

21:87.text: وَذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ضِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرَ عَلَيۡهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

21:88.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ‌ۚ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نُـۨجِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٨

21:89.text: وَزَكَرِيّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِى فَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِث<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٩

21:90.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَحۡيَىٰ وَأَصۡلَحۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> زَوۡجَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِعُونَ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَنَا رَغَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَنَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

21:91.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّوحِنَا وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

21:92.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتُكُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَاۡ رَبُّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٩٢

21:93.text: وَتَقَطَّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِع<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

21:95.text: وَحَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَىٰ قَرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

22:41.text: ٱلَّذِينَ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَمَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَنَهَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ‌ۗ وَلِلَّهِ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٤١

22:44.text: وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ‌ۖ وَكُذِّبَ مُوسَىٰ فَأَمۡلَيۡتُ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَخَذۡتُهُمۡ‌ۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٤٤

22:45.text: فَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَبِئۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّعَطَّلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَصۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤٥

22:46.text: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمۡ قُلُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِلُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ ءَاذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡمَعُونَ بِهَا‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا لَا تَعۡمَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡمَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُلُوبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٤٦

22:47.text: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡلِفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَوۡمًا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ كَأَلۡفِ سَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعُدّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

22:48.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ أَمۡلَيۡتُ لَهَا وَهِىَ ظَالِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَخَذۡتُهَا وَإِلَىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٤٨

22:49.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ لَكُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤٩

22:50.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٠

22:51.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا مُعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِزِينَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥١

22:52.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَبِىٍّ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا تَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَلۡقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمۡنِيَّتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َخُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا يُلۡقِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحۡكِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٢

22:53.text: لِّيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ مَا يُلۡقِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ لَفِى شِقَا<rule class=iqlab>قِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٥٣

22:54.text: وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ فَيُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَتُخۡبِتَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٤

22:55.text: وَلَا يَزَالُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى مِرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ حَتَّىٰ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةً أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٥

22:56.text: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّهِ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥٦

22:57.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥٧

22:58.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَاجَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قُتِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡ مَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيَرۡزُقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رِزۡقًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِق<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

22:59.text: لَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡضَوۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَلِيمٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٩

22:60.text: ۞ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَمَنۡ عَاقَبَ بِمِثۡلِ مَا عُوقِبَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بُغِىَ عَلَيۡهِ لَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٦٠

22:61.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَيُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِي<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٦١

22:62.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلُ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٦٢

22:63.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتُصۡبِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ مُخۡضَرَّةً‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٦٣

22:64.text: لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٦٤

22:65.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ بِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمۡسِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقَعَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَرَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٥

22:66.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡيَاكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَكَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٦٦

22:67.text: لِّكُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلۡنَا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َكًا هُمۡ نَاسِكُوهُ‌ۖ فَلَا يُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زِعُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَعَلَىٰ هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٦٧

22:68.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَلُوكَ فَقُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

22:69.text: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فِيمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

22:70.text: أَلَمۡ تَعۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧٠

22:71.text: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يُنَزِّلۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا لَيۡسَ لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٧١

22:72.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡرِفُ فِى وُجُوهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرَ‌ۖ يَكَادُونَ يَسۡطُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۗ قُلۡ أَفَأُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ‌ۗ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ وَعَدَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٧٢

22:73.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ ضُرِبَ مَثَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذُبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡلُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّبَابُ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَسۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ِذُوهُ مِنۡهُ‌ۚ ضَعُفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّالِبُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>ل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ٧٣

22:74.text: مَا قَدَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ حَقَّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَقَوِىٌّ عَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٌ ٧٤

22:75.text: ٱللَّهُ يَصۡطَفِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ رُسُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِي<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧٥

22:76.text: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٧٦

22:77.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡكَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ٧٧

22:78.text: وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَقَّ جِهَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَمَا جَعَلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ مِنۡ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّلَّةَ أَبِيكُمۡ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ‌ۚ هُوَ سَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِمِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَفِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لِيَكُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ شَهِيدًا عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَتَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۚ فَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَصِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ فَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٧٨

23:2.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِى صَلَاتِهِمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

23:3.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّغۡوِ مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

23:4.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِلزَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

23:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

23:6.text: إِلَّا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُوم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

23:7.text: فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغَىٰ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَاد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

23:8.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ع<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

23:9.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ يُحَافِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

23:10.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِث<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

23:11.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

23:12.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٢

23:13.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ نُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى قَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٣

23:14.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَةَ عَلَقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلَقَةَ مُضۡغَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُضۡغَةَ عِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَسَوۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ لَحۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ خَلۡقًا ءَاخَرَ‌ۚ فَتَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَحۡسَنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

23:15.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَمَيِّت<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

23:20.text: وَشَجَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡرُجُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ُورِ سَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ تَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ُتُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّهۡنِ وَصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>غٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡأَكِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

23:24.text: فَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَضَّلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

23:33.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَأَتۡرَفۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ يَأۡكُلُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَأۡكُلُونَ مِنۡهُ وَيَشۡرَبُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَشۡرَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

23:34.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَطَعۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

23:35.text: أَيَعِدُكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِذَا مِتُّمۡ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّخۡرَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

23:38.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا نَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

23:40.text: قَالَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَلِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيُصۡبِحُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

23:41.text: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّيۡحَةُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ غُث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َبُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

23:42.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ قُرُونًا ءَاخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

23:43.text: مَا تَسۡبِقُ مِنۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسۡتَــٔۡخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

23:44.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا تَتۡرَا‌ۖ كُلَّ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولُهَا كَذَّبُوهُ‌ۚ فَأَتۡبَعۡنَا بَعۡضَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَحَادِيثَ‌ۚ فَبُعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

23:45.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَأَخَاهُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٤٥

23:46.text: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمًا عَال<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

23:47.text: فَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

23:48.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡلَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

23:49.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

23:50.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ مَرۡيَمَ وَأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاوَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َاتِ قَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٥٠

23:51.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلُ كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥١

23:52.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتُكُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَاۡ رَبُّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٢

23:53.text: فَتَقَطَّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡرَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ زُبُ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ حِزۡ<rule class=iqlab>بِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

23:54.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ فِى غَمۡرَتِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٥٤

23:55.text: أَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا نُمِدُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

23:56.text: نُسَارِعُ لَهُمۡ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ بَل لَّا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

23:57.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

23:58.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

23:59.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّهِمۡ لَا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

23:60.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡتُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّقُلُوبُهُمۡ وَجِلَةٌ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِع<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

23:61.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِعُونَ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَهُمۡ لَهَا سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

23:62.text: وَلَا نُكَلِّفُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا وُسۡعَهَا‌ۖ وَلَدَيۡنَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِقُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

23:63.text: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِى غَمۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

23:64.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَذۡنَا مُتۡرَفِيه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ إِذَا هُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ــَٔر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

23:65.text: لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ــَٔرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

23:66.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَتۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِكُمۡ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

23:67.text: مُسۡتَكۡبِرِينَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َهۡجُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

23:68.text: أَفَلَمۡ يَدَّبَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ أَمۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَمۡ يَأۡتِ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

23:69.text: أَمۡ لَمۡ يَعۡرِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَسُولَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

23:70.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

23:71.text: وَلَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ لَفَسَدَتِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِذِكۡرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

23:72.text: أَمۡ تَسۡــَٔلُهُمۡ خَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخَرَاجُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِق<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

23:73.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧٣

23:74.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ عَنِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صِّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ لَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

23:75.text: ۞وَلَوۡ رَحِمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَكَشَفۡنَا مَا بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّلَجُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى طُغۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

23:76.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِرَبِّهِمۡ وَمَا يَتَضَرَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

23:77.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا فَتَحۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َا عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِيدٍ إِذَا هُمۡ فِيهِ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

23:78.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفۡــِٔدَةَ‌ۚ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

23:79.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ذَرَأَكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

23:80.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

23:81.text: بَلۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

23:82.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

23:83.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وُعِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا نَحۡنُ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

23:84.text: قُل لِّمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

23:85.text: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ قُلۡ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

23:86.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عِ وَرَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٨٦

23:87.text: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ قُلۡ أَفَلَا تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٧

23:88.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِيَدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ يُجِيرُ وَلَا يُجَارُ عَلَيۡهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

23:89.text: سَيَقُولُونَ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ قُلۡ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُسۡحَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٩

23:90.text: بَلۡ أَتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٠

23:91.text: مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّذَهَبَ كُلُّ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>هِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا خَلَقَ وَلَعَلَا بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩١

23:92.text: عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ فَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

23:93.text: قُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَا يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

23:94.text: رَبِّ فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٤

23:95.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

23:96.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>فَعۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةَ‌ۚ نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

23:97.text: وَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَز<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ط<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٩٧

23:98.text: وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ رَبِّ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحۡضُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٩٨

23:99.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَحَدَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٩٩

23:100.text: لَعَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡمَلُ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيمَا تَرَكۡتُ‌ۚ كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا كَلِمَةٌ هُوَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلُهَا‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َرۡزَخٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٠

23:101.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠١

23:102.text: فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َقُلَتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٢

23:103.text: وَمَنۡ خَفَّتۡ مَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِينُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَسِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٣

23:104.text: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٤

23:105.text: أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٥

23:106.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا غَلَبَتۡ عَلَيۡنَا شِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَتُنَا وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٦

23:107.text: رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا مِنۡهَا فَإِنۡ عُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٧

23:108.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡسَــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا وَلَا تُكَلِّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٠٨

23:109.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِبَادِى يَقُولُونَ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡحَمۡنَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِم<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٩

23:110.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡتُمُوهُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َوۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرِى وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ تَضۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٠

23:111.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى جَزَيۡتُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

23:112.text: قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٢

23:113.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسۡــَٔلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡع<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٣

23:114.text: قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ إ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّبِثۡتُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٤

23:115.text: أَفَحَسِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٥

23:116.text: فَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۖ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١١٦

23:117.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ لَا بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا حِسَابُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٧

23:118.text: وَقُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡحَمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِم<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٨

24:1.text: سُورَةٌ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا وَفَرَضۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

24:2.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّانِيَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّانِى فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُلَّ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمَا مِ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ئَةَ جَلۡدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَأۡخُذۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهِمَا رَأۡفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى دِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۖ وَلۡيَشۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَذَابَهُمَا ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

24:3.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّانِى لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُ إِلَّا زَانِيَةً أَوۡ مُشۡرِكَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّانِيَةُ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا زَانٍ أَوۡ مُشۡرِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحُرِّمَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣

24:4.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡصَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ يَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَرۡبَعَةِ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>لِدُوهُمۡ ثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِينَ جَلۡدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةً أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

24:5.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَأَصۡلَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥

24:6.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَرۡمُونَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَهُمۡ وَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ فَشَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةُ أَحَدِهِمۡ أَرۡبَعُ شَهَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='iqlab'>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

24:7.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِسَةُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَعۡنَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

24:8.text: وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َشۡهَدَ أَرۡبَعَ شَهَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='iqlab'>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

24:9.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِسَةَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ غَضَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

24:10.text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ تَوَّابٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠

24:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِفۡكِ عُصۡبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ لَا تَحۡسَبُوهُ شَر<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ هُوَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ‌ۚ لِكُلِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرِى<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ٍٕ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَسَبَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَوَلَّىٰ كِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١

24:12.text: لَّوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٢

24:13.text: لَّوۡلَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو عَلَيۡهِ بِأَرۡبَعَةِ شُهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۚ فَإِذۡ لَمۡ يَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

24:14.text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ لَمَسَّكُمۡ فِى م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفَضۡتُمۡ فِيهِ عَذَابٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤

24:15.text: إِذۡ تَلَقَّوۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِأَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَتَقُولُونَ بِأَفۡوَاهِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَيۡسَ لَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَحۡسَبُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هَيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥

24:16.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذۡ سَمِعۡتُمُوهُ قُلۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَكُونُ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتَكَلَّمَ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بُهۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٦

24:17.text: يَعِظُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعُودُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِمِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَبَدًا إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

24:18.text: وَيُبَيِّنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٨

24:19.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُحِبُّونَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َشِيعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَةُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

24:20.text: وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٠

24:21.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خُطُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعۡ خُطُو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَأۡمُرُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ‌ۚ وَلَوۡلَا فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَرَحۡمَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا زَكَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَحَدٍ أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُزَكِّى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢١

24:24.text: يَوۡمَ تَشۡهَدُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَلۡسِنَتُهُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَرۡجُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

24:59.text: وَإِذَا بَلَغَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُلُمَ فَلۡيَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡذَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُبَيِّنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥٩

24:60.text: وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡقَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عِدُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى لَا يَرۡجُونَ نِكَا<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جُنَاحٌ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضَعۡنَ ثِيَابَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ غَيۡرَ مُتَبَرِّجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِزِينَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَعۡفِفۡنَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٠

24:61.text: لَّيۡسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَجِ
