24:62.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِذَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َامِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَذۡهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُوهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُونَكَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ فَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡذَنُوكَ لِبَعۡضِ شَأۡنِهِمۡ فَأۡذ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٢

24:63.text: لَّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ بَيۡنَكُمۡ كَدُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بَعۡضِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتَسَلَّلُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ لِوَا<rule class=ikhafa>ذًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلۡيَحۡذَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُخَالِفُونَ عَنۡ أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِيبَهُمۡ فِتۡنَةٌ أَوۡ يُصِيبَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٣

24:64.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> يَعۡلَمُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَيَوۡمَ يُرۡجَعُونَ إِلَيۡهِ فَيُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُۢ ٦٤

25:1.text: تَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَمِينَ نَذِيرًا ١

25:2.text: ٱلَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَمۡ يَتَّخِذۡ وَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكِ وَخَلَقَ كُلَّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَدَّرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِيرًا ٢

25:3.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَخۡلُقُونَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ يُخۡلَقُونَ وَلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا حَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نُشُورًا ٣

25:4.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِفۡكٌ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ وَأَعَانَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ قَوۡمٌ ءَاخَرُونَ‌ۖ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو ظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزُورًا ٤

25:5.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَتَبَهَا فَهِىَ تُمۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ بُكۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَصِيلاً ٥

25:6.text: قُلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّرَّ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٦

25:7.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَالِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ يَأۡكُلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡوَاقِ‌ۙ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡهِ مَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَكُونَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَذِيرًا ٧

25:8.text: أَوۡ يُلۡقَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ كَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ٌ أَوۡ تَكُونُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡكُلُ مِنۡهَا‌ۚ وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا رَجُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡحُورًا ٨

25:9.text: ٱ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ ضَرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ فَضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَبِيلاً ٩

25:10.text: تَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ جَعَلَ لَكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكَ قُصُورَۢا ١٠

25:11.text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ‌ۖ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ سَعِيرًا ١١

25:12.text: إِذَا رَأَتۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعِي<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهَا تَغَيُّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزَفِيرًا ١٢

25:13.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا مَكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َيِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورًا ١٣

25:14.text: لَّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُبُو<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِيرًا ١٤

25:15.text: قُلۡ أَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وُعِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقُونَ‌ۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَصِيرًا ١٥

25:16.text: لَّهُمۡ فِيهَا مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ‌ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ وَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسۡــُٔولاً ١٦

25:17.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَيَقُولُ ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَضۡلَلۡتُمۡ عِبَادِى هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَمۡ هُمۡ ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لَ ١٧

25:18.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ مَا كَانَ يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َغِى لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتَّخِذَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِكَ مِنۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّتَّعۡتَهُمۡ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡم<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُورًا ١٨

25:19.text: فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبُوك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا تَقُولُونَ فَمَا تَسۡتَطِيعُونَ صَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َظۡل<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ نُذِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>هُ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ١٩

25:20.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَيَأۡكُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّعَامَ وَيَمۡشُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡوَاقِ‌ۗ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَعۡضَكُمۡ لِبَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِتۡنَةً أَتَصۡبِرُونَ‌ۗ وَكَانَ رَبُّكَ بَصِيرًا ٢٠

25:21.text: ۞وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ أَوۡ نَرَىٰ رَبَّنَا‌ۗ لَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَعَتَوۡ عُتُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٢١

25:22.text: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡجُورًا ٢٢

25:23.text: وَقَدِمۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ عَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ هَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>ُورًا ٢٣

25:24.text: أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ يَوۡمَئِذٍ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَحۡسَنُ مَقِيلاً ٢٤

25:25.text: وَيَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ وَنُزِّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلاً ٢٥

25:26.text: ٱلۡمُلۡكُ يَوۡمَئِذٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ يَوۡمًا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَسِيرًا ٢٦

25:27.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَعَضُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّالِمُ عَلَىٰ يَدَيۡهِ يَقُولُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡتُ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ سَبِيلاً ٢٧

25:28.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِى لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلاً ٢٨

25:29.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَضَلَّنِى عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنِى‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لِلۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ خَذُولاً ٢٩

25:30.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قَوۡمِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورًا ٣٠

25:31.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَعَلۡنَا لِكُلِّ نَبِىٍّ عَدُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ‌ۗ وَكَفَىٰ بِرَبِّكَ هَادِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>يًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَصِيرًا ٣١

25:32.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ جُمۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِنُثَبِّتَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فُؤَادَكَ‌ۖ وَرَتَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ تَرۡتِيلاً ٣٢

25:33.text: وَلَا يَأۡتُونَكَ بِمَثَلٍ إِلَّا جِئۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَحۡسَنَ تَفۡسِيرًا ٣٣

25:34.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُحۡشَرُونَ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ إِلَىٰ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَضَلُّ سَبِيلاً ٣٤

25:35.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَجَعَلۡنَا مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَخَاهُ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ وَزِيرًا ٣٥

25:36.text: فَقُلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡهَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَدَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>مِيرًا ٣٦

25:37.text: وَقَوۡمَ نُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلَ أَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ٣٧

25:38.text: وَعَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمُودَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسِّ وَقُرُون<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ كَثِيرًا ٣٨

25:39.text: وَكُل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ‌ۖ وَكُل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبَّرۡنَا تَتۡبِيرًا ٣٩

25:40.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمۡطِرَتۡ مَطَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ‌ۚ أَفَلَمۡ يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَرَوۡنَهَا‌ۚ بَلۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَرۡجُونَ نُشُورًا ٤٠

25:41.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡكَ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذُونَكَ إِلَّا هُزُوًا أَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَعَثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَسُولاً ٤١

25:42.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َادَ لَيُضِلُّنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َبَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا‌ۚ وَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ حِينَ يَرَوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ مَنۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلاً ٤٢

25:43.text: أَرَءَيۡتَ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هَوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَكُونُ عَلَيۡهِ وَكِيلاً ٤٣

25:44.text: أَمۡ تَحۡسَبُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ يَسۡمَعُونَ أَوۡ يَعۡقِلُونَ‌ۚ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ‌ۖ بَلۡ هُمۡ أَضَلُّ سَبِيلاً ٤٤

25:45.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَيۡفَ مَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظِّلَّ وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَجَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَاكِ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ عَلَيۡهِ دَلِيلاً ٤٥

25:46.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قَبَضۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَيۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسِيرًا ٤٦

25:47.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ لِبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوۡمَ سُبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ نُشُورًا ٤٧

25:48.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡسَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ بُشۡر<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ يَدَىۡ رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َهُورًا ٤٨

25:49.text: لِّنُحۡــِۧىَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَلۡدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنُسۡقِيَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَاسِىَّ كَثِيرًا ٤٩

25:50.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَرَّفۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ لِيَذَّكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأَبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَكۡثَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ إِلَّا كُفُورًا ٥٠

25:51.text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِى كُلِّ قَرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِيرًا ٥١

25:52.text: فَلَا تُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جِهَا<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٥٢

25:53.text: ۞وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى مَرَجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا عَذۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِلۡحٌ أُجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ بَيۡنَهُمَا بَرۡزَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>خًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡجُورًا ٥٣

25:54.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بَشَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َصِهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ رَبُّكَ قَدِيرًا ٥٤

25:55.text: وَيَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُهُمۡ وَلَا يَضُرُّهُمۡ‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَافِرُ عَلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ظَهِيرًا ٥٥

25:56.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِيرًا ٥٦

25:57.text: قُلۡ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَبِيلاً ٥٧

25:58.text: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَا يَمُوتُ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بِذُنُوبِ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَبِيرًا ٥٨

25:59.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فَسۡــَٔلۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَبِيرًا ٥٩

25:60.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَنَسۡجُدُ لِمَا تَأۡمُرُنَا وَزَادَهُمۡ نُفُورًا ۩ ٦٠

25:61.text: تَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بُرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ فِيهَا سِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّنِيرًا ٦١

25:62.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ خِلۡفَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنۡ أَرَادَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َذَّكَّرَ أَوۡ أَرَادَ شُكُورًا ٦٢

25:63.text: وَعِبَادُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَمۡشُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ هَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِذَا خَاطَبَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِلُونَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا ٦٣

25:64.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَبِيتُونَ لِرَبِّهِمۡ سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا ٦٤

25:65.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡرِفۡ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَذَابَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا ٦٥

25:66.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ مُسۡتَقَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمُقَامًا ٦٦

25:67.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَمۡ يُسۡرِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانَ بَيۡنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ قَوَامًا ٦٧

25:68.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ وَلَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى حَرَّمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَزۡنُونَ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَلۡقَ أَثَامًا ٦٨

25:69.text: يُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَفۡ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ وَيَخۡلُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فِيه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُهَانًا ٦٩

25:70.text: إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ حَسَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٧٠

25:71.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَتُوبُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَتَابًا ٧١

25:72.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَشۡهَدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّغۡوِ مَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كِرَامًا ٧٢

25:73.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ لَمۡ يَخِرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهَا صُم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُمۡيَانًا ٧٣

25:74.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَنَا مِنۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِنَا وَذُرِّيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعۡيُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنَا لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا ٧٤

25:75.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُرۡفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيُلَقَّوۡنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا ٧٥

25:76.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ حَسُنَتۡ مُسۡتَقَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمُقَامًا ٧٦

25:77.text: قُلۡ مَا يَعۡبَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِكُمۡ رَبِّى لَوۡلَا دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ‌ۖ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامَۢا ٧٧

26:2.text: تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢

26:3.text: لَعَلَّكَ بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>خِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣

26:4.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُهُمۡ لَهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ضِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

26:5.text: وَمَا يَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

26:6.text: فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

26:7.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتۡنَا فِيهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ زَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧

26:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

26:9.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

26:10.text: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

26:12.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٢

26:13.text: وَيَضِيقُ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى وَلَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلِقُ لِسَانِى فَأَرۡسِلۡ إِلَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

26:14.text: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَىَّ ذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=ikhafa>ٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٤

26:15.text: قَالَ كَلَّا‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡهَبَا بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡتَمِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

26:16.text: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رَسُولُ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦

26:17.text: أَنۡ أَرۡسِلۡ مَعَنَا بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ١٧

26:18.text: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

26:19.text: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى فَعَلۡتَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

26:20.text: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

26:21.text: فَفَرَرۡتُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا خِفۡتُكُمۡ فَوَهَبَ لِى رَبِّى حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١

26:22.text: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُهَا عَلَىَّ أَنۡ عَبَّ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ٢٢

26:24.text: قَالَ رَبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

26:26.text: قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡ وَرَبُّ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

26:27.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَسُولَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٢٧

26:28.text: قَالَ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡرِقِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡرِبِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

26:29.text: قَالَ لَئِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡتَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا غَيۡرِى لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجُون<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

26:30.text: قَالَ أَوَلَوۡ جِئۡتُكَ بِش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٠

26:31.text: قَالَ فَأۡتِ بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

26:32.text: فَأَلۡقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ ثُعۡبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٣٢

26:33.text: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَإِذَا هِىَ بَيۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

26:34.text: قَالَ لِلۡمَلَإِ حَوۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِرٌ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٤

26:35.text: يُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡرِجَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَرۡضِك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسِحۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

26:36.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَرۡجِهۡ وَأَخَاهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنِ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

26:38.text: فَجُمِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٍ ٣٨

26:39.text: وَقِيلَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ هَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَمِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

26:40.text: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

26:41.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَنَا لَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

26:42.text: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَرَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

26:43.text: قَالَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلۡق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

26:44.text: فَأَلۡقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حِبَالَهُمۡ وَعِصِيَّهُمۡ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعِزَّةِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

26:45.text: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

26:46.text: فَأُلۡقِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَرَةُ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

26:47.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

26:49.text: قَالَ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكَبِيرُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى عَلَّمَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَ‌ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَأُصَلِّبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

26:50.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا ضَيۡرَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

26:51.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥١

26:52.text: ۞وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَاد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّتَّبَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

26:53.text: فَأَرۡسَلَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنِ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

26:54.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لَشِرۡذِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

26:56.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَجَمِيعٌ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

26:57.text: فَأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٥٧

26:58.text: وَكُنُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>زٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَقَا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٨

26:59.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَأَوۡرَثۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ٥٩

26:61.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

26:62.text: قَالَ كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَعِىَ رَبِّى سَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٦٢

26:63.text: فَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّوۡدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٦٣

26:65.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٥

26:66.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

26:67.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

26:68.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٨

26:69.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مَ ٦٩

26:70.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

26:71.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَا<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

26:72.text: قَالَ هَلۡ يَسۡمَعُونَكُمۡ إِذۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

26:73.text: أَوۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَضُرّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

26:74.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلۡ وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

26:75.text: قَالَ أَفَرَءَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

26:76.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

26:77.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَّا رَبَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

26:79.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى هُوَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُنِى وَيَسۡق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٧٩

26:81.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُمِيتُنِى ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحۡي<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٨١

26:82.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرَ لِى خَطِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓ</rule>ــَٔتِى يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٨٢

26:83.text: رَبِّ هَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لِى حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَلۡحِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نِى بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

26:84.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لِّى لِسَانَ صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

26:85.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَثَةِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٨٥

26:86.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِأَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

26:87.text: وَلَا تُخۡزِنِى يَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٧

26:88.text: يَوۡمَ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ مَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا بَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

26:89.text: إِلَّا مَنۡ أَتَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِقَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٨٩

26:92.text: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

26:93.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَكُمۡ أَوۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

26:94.text: فَكُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا هُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَاوُ<rule class=madda_permissible>ۥ</rule>نَ ٩٤

26:95.text: وَجُنُودُ إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٥

26:96.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ فِيهَا يَخۡتَصِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

26:97.text: تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٩٧

26:98.text: إِذۡ نُسَوِّيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٨

26:99.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَضَلَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٩

26:100.text: فَمَا لَنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٠

26:102.text: فَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَنَا كَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٢

26:103.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٣

26:104.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٤

26:106.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠٦

26:107.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكُمۡ رَسُولٌ أَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٠٧

26:108.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٠٨

26:109.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ‌ۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٩

26:110.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١١٠

26:111.text: ۞قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَنُؤۡمِنُ لَكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡذَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١١

26:179.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٧٩

26:180.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٍ‌ۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٠

26:181.text: ۞أَوۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخۡسِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨١

26:182.text: وَزِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطَاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٨٢

26:183.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ أَشۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٣

26:184.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبِلَّةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٤

26:185.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسَحَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٥

26:186.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُنَا وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكَ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٦

26:187.text: فَأَسۡقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> عَلَيۡنَا كِسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٧

26:188.text: قَالَ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٨

26:189.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلَّةِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٨٩

26:190.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٠

26:191.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٩١

26:192.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلُ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٢

26:193.text: نَزَلَ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٩٣

26:194.text: عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٤

26:196.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَفِى زُبُرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٦

26:197.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عُلَمَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ١٩٧

26:198.text: وَلَوۡ نَزَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡجَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٨

26:199.text: فَقَرَأَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩٩

26:200.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ سَلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فِى قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠٠

26:201.text: لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٢٠١

26:202.text: فَيَأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٢

26:203.text: فَيَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَلۡ نَحۡنُ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٣

26:205.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتَ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّتَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠٥

26:206.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٦

26:207.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُمَتَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٧

26:208.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠٨

26:209.text: ذِكۡرَىٰ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠٩

26:210.text: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتۡ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ط<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٢١٠

26:211.text: وَمَا يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َغِى لَهُمۡ وَمَا يَسۡتَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١١

26:212.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعِ لَمَعۡزُول<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١٢

26:213.text: فَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعَذَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١٣

26:214.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡ عَشِيرَتَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١٤

26:215.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡفِضۡ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١٥

26:216.text: فَإِنۡ عَصَوۡكَ فَقُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١٦

26:217.text: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢١٧

26:218.text: ٱلَّذِى يَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ حِينَ تَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مُ ٢١٨

26:219.text: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١٩

26:220.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٢٠

26:221.text: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َنَزَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ط<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٢٢١

26:222.text: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٢٢

26:223.text: يُلۡقُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَأَكۡثَرُهُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢٣

26:224.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّعَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَاوُ<rule class=madda_permissible>ۥ</rule>نَ ٢٢٤

26:225.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى كُلِّ وَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهِيم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢٥

26:226.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢٦

26:227.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَذَكَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَسَيَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَىَّ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢٧

27:1.text: ط<rule class=madda_necessary>سٓ</rule>‌ۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ وَكِتَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١

27:3.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

27:4.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ زَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ يَعۡمَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

27:5.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخۡسَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

27:6.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَتُلَقَّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُنۡ حَكِيمٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٦

27:7.text: إِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَانَسۡتُ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َـَٔـاتِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ ءَاتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِشِهَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

27:8.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهَا نُودِىَ أ<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُورِكَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

27:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

27:10.text: وَأَلۡقِ عَصَاكَ‌ۚ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا ج<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَّىٰ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يُعَقِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>‌ۚ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَا يَخَافُ لَدَىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

27:11.text: إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَمَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ بَدَّلَ حُسۡن<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدَ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١

27:12.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡ يَدَكَ فِى جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> بَيۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى تِسۡعِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢

27:13.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٣

27:14.text: وَجَحَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَيۡقَنَتۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ ظُلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُلُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

27:15.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ وَسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِبَادِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

27:16.text: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ‌ۖ وَقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ عُلِّمۡنَا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ شَىۡءٍ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٦

27:17.text: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ جُنُودُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

27:18.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ وَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمۡلِ قَالَتۡ نَمۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنَكُمۡ لَا يَحۡطِمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ سُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَجُنُودُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

27:19.text: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَىَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرۡضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡنِى بِرَحۡمَتِكَ فِى عِبَادِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

27:20.text: وَتَفَقَّدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِىَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُدَ أَمۡ كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

27:21.text: لَأُعَذِّبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِيدًا أَوۡ لَأَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ذۡبَحَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَوۡ لَيَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢١
