27:22.text: فَمَكَثَ غَيۡرَ بَعِي<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمۡ تُحِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَجِئۡتُكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَ<rule class=iqlab>إِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِنَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>إٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٢

27:23.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى وَجَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمۡلِكُهُمۡ وَأُوتِيَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهَا عَرۡشٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٣

27:24.text: وَجَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّهَا وَقَوۡمَهَا يَسۡجُدُونَ لِلشَّمۡسِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ فَهُمۡ لَا يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

27:25.text: أَلَّا يَسۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ءَ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُخۡفُونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

27:26.text: ٱللَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظِ<rule class=madda_permissible>ي</rule>مِ ۩ ٢٦

27:27.text: ۞قَالَ سَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُ أَصَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَ أَمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

27:28.text: ٱذۡهَب بِّكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فَأَلۡقِهۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ مَاذَا يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

27:29.text: قَالَتۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُلۡقِىَ إِلَىَّ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٩

27:30.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِسۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٠

27:31.text: أَلَّا تَعۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىَّ وَأۡتُونِى مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

27:32.text: قَالَتۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَفۡتُونِى ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡرِى مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ قَاطِعَةً أَمۡرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشۡهَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٢

27:33.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَحۡنُ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ إِلَيۡكِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرِى مَاذَا تَأۡمُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

27:34.text: قَالَتۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَرۡيَةً أَفۡسَدُوهَا وَجَعَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَعِزَّةَ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَذِلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

27:35.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُرۡسِلَةٌ إِلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَدِيَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَاظِرَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَ يَرۡجِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

27:36.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ سُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَدِيَّتِكُمۡ تَفۡرَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

27:37.text: ٱرۡجِعۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ فَلَنَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِجُنُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا قِبَلَ لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا وَلَنُخۡرِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَذِلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

27:38.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيُّكُمۡ يَأۡتِينِى بِعَرۡشِهَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتُونِى مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

27:39.text: قَالَ عِفۡرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ أَنَاۡ ءَاتِيكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُومَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّقَامِكَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى عَلَيۡهِ لَقَوِىٌّ أَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٣٩

27:40.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أَنَاۡ ءَاتِيكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡتَدَّ إِلَيۡكَ طَرۡفُكَ‌ۚ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَاهُ مُسۡتَقِرًّا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِ رَبِّى لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَأَشۡكُرُ أَمۡ أَكۡفُرُ‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َكَرَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى غَنِ<rule class=ikhafa>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٠

27:41.text: قَالَ نَكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهَا عَرۡشَهَا نَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ أَتَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡ تَكُونُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

27:42.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ قِيلَ أَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَذَا عَرۡشُكِ‌ۖ قَالَتۡ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ‌ۚ وَأُوتِينَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهَا وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

27:43.text: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا كَانَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٣

27:44.text: قِيلَ لَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّرۡحَ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَتۡهُ حَسِبَتۡهُ لُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَشَفَتۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َاقَيۡهَا‌ۚ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> صَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّمَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوَارِيرَ‌ۗ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِى وَأَسۡلَمۡتُ مَعَ سُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

27:45.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحًا أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمۡ فَرِيقَانِ يَخۡتَصِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

27:46.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ‌ۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

27:47.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>طَّيَّرۡنَا بِكَ وَبِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَكَ‌ۚ قَالَ طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِرُكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ بَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُفۡتَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

27:48.text: وَكَانَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ تِسۡعَةُ رَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُفۡسِدُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

27:49.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَقَاسَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَنَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِوَلِيِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا شَهِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا مَهۡلِكَ أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

27:50.text: وَمَكَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

27:51.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ مَكۡرِهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا دَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَقَوۡمَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥١

27:52.text: فَتِلۡكَ بُيُوتُهُمۡ خَاوِيَ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا ظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

27:53.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

27:54.text: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَةَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

27:55.text: أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالَ شَهۡوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

27:56.text: ۞فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَخۡرِج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَالَ لُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَتِكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أُنَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَطَهَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

27:57.text: فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَدَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

27:58.text: وَأَمۡطَرۡنَا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّطَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَطَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

27:59.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۗ</rule> ءَآللَّهُ خَيۡرٌ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

27:60.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> حَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقَ ذَاتَ بَهۡجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَانَ لَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَجَرَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَءِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡدِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

27:61.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ قَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَهَا رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ حَاجِزًا‌ۗ أَءِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

27:62.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجِيبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُضۡطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكۡشِفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءَ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُكُمۡ خُلَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ أَءِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

27:63.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِيكُمۡ فِى ظُلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡسِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ بُشۡر<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ يَدَىۡ رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۗ</rule> أَءِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ تَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

27:64.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡزُقُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ أَءِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قُلۡ هَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

27:65.text: قُل لَّا يَعۡلَمُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

27:66.text: بَلِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>دّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۖ بَلۡ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا عَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

27:67.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِذَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمُخۡرَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

27:68.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وُعِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا نَحۡنُ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

27:69.text: قُلۡ سِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٩

27:70.text: وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى ضَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَمۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

27:71.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

27:72.text: قُلۡ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ رَدِفَ لَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَسۡتَعۡجِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

27:73.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

27:74.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

27:75.text: وَمَا مِنۡ غ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧٥

27:76.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

27:77.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

27:78.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِى بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِحُكۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٧٨

27:79.text: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٧٩

27:80.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

27:81.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمۡىِ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَتِهِمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

27:82.text: ۞وَإِذَا وَقَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا لَهُمۡ د<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا لَا يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

27:83.text: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَهُمۡ يُوزَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٣

27:84.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو قَالَ أَكَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى وَلَمۡ تُحِيطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا عِلۡمًا أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َاذَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

27:85.text: وَوَقَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَهُمۡ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

27:86.text: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ لِيَسۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٦

27:87.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َخُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوۡهُ د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>خِر<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

27:88.text: وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ تَحۡسَبُهَا جَامِدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهِىَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّحَابِ‌ۚ صُنۡعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَتۡقَنَ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

27:89.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َزَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٩

27:90.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ هَلۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٠

27:91.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ رَبَّ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلۡدَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُلُّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩١

27:92.text: وَأَنۡ أَتۡلُوَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ‌ۖ فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَىٰ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَهۡتَدِى لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَّ فَقُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٢

27:93.text: وَقُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَتَعۡرِفُونَهَا‌ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِلٍ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٣

28:2.text: تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢

28:3.text: نَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

28:4.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِرۡعَوۡنَ عَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهۡلَهَا شِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَضۡعِفُ ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يُذَبِّحُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ وَيَسۡتَحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

28:5.text: وَنُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّمُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُضۡعِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهُمۡ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِث<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

28:6.text: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَنُرِىَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَحۡذَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

28:7.text: وَأَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَرۡضِعِيهِ‌ۖ فَإِذَا خِفۡتِ عَلَيۡهِ فَأَلۡقِيهِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ وَلَا تَخَافِى وَلَا تَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ر<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدُّوهُ إِلَيۡكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

28:8.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡتَقَطَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> ءَالُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ لِيَكُونَ لَهُمۡ عَدُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَزَنًا‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

28:9.text: وَقَالَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قُرَّتُ عَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّى وَلَكَ‌ۖ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوهُ عَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ نَتَّخِذَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

28:10.text: وَأَصۡبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ مُوسَىٰ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِغًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َادَتۡ لَتُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نَا عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

28:11.text: وَقَالَتۡ لِأُخۡتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قُصِّيهِ‌ۖ فَبَصُرَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ُنُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

28:12.text: ۞وَحَرَّمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرَاضِعَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ فَقَالَتۡ هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِ بَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُلُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

28:13.text: فَرَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَىۡ تَقَرَّ عَيۡنُهَا وَلَا تَحۡزَنَ وَلِتَعۡلَمَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

28:14.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ حُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

28:15.text: وَدَخَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيۡنِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَتِلَانِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِيعَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِنۡ عَدُوِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِيعَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى مِنۡ عَدُوِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَوَكَزَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۖ قَالَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِنۡ عَمَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّضِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٥

28:16.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ظَلَمۡتُ نَفۡسِى فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِى فَغَفَرَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٦

28:17.text: قَالَ رَبِّ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَىَّ فَلَنۡ أَكُونَ ظَهِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

28:18.text: فَأَصۡبَحَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ خ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡسِ يَسۡتَصۡرِخُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ قَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَغَوِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٨

28:19.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡ أَرَادَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِشَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى هُوَ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمَا قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَتُرِيدُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلَنِى كَمَا قَتَلۡتَ نَفۡس<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡسِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرِيدُ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ جَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٩

28:20.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأَ يَأۡتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

28:21.text: فَخَرَجَ مِنۡهَا خ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَرَقَّبُ‌ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢١

28:22.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدِيَنِى سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ٢٢

28:23.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا وَرَدَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ وَجَدَ عَلَيۡهِ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ يَسۡقُونَ وَوَجَدَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَيۡنِ تَذُودَانِ‌ۖ قَالَ مَا خَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بُكُمَا‌ۖ قَالَتَا لَا نَسۡقِى حَتَّىٰ يُصۡدِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَأَبُونَا شَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>خٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٣

28:24.text: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَوَلَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡتَ إِلَىَّ مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٤

28:25.text: فَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُ إِحۡدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمَا تَمۡشِى عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتِحۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَتۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَبِى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوكَ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَكَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ مَا سَقَيۡتَ لَنَا‌ۚ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَقَصَّ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَصَصَ قَالَ لَا تَخَفۡ‌ۖ نَجَوۡتَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

28:26.text: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمَا يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡجِرۡهُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ خَيۡرَ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَــٔۡجَرۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٢٦

28:27.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِحَكَ إِحۡدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَتَىَّ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَيۡنِ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡجُرَنِى ثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِىَ حِجَ<rule class=ikhafa>جٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِنۡ أَتۡمَمۡتَ عَشۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِكَ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرِيدُ أَنۡ أَشُقَّ عَلَيۡكَ‌ۚ سَتَجِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

28:28.text: قَالَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكَ‌ۖ أَيَّمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَجَلَيۡنِ قَضَيۡتُ فَلَا عُ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ عَلَىَّ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ٢٨

28:29.text: ۞فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَضَىٰ مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَجَلَ وَسَارَ بِأَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَانَسَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َانِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورِ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ لِأَهۡلِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡكُث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَانَسۡتُ نَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاتِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوۡ جَذۡوَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَصۡطَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

28:30.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا نُودِىَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِىِٕ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡمَنِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>عَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكَةِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

28:31.text: وَأَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَاهَا تَهۡتَزُّ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا ج<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَّىٰ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَمۡ يُعَقِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>‌ۚ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بِلۡ وَلَا تَخَفۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

28:32.text: ٱسۡلُكۡ يَدَكَ فِى جَيۡبِكَ تَخۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> بَيۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡمُمۡ إِلَيۡكَ جَنَاحَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّهۡبِ‌ۖ فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِكَ بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَانِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

28:33.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى قَتَلۡتُ مِنۡهُمۡ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٣

28:34.text: وَأَخِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونُ هُوَ أَفۡصَحُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لِسَا<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَرۡسِلۡهُ مَعِىَ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُصَدِّقُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٤

28:35.text: قَالَ سَنَشُدُّ عَضُدَكَ بِأَخِيكَ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ لَكُمَا سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا يَصِلُونَ إِلَيۡكُمَا‌ۚ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمَا وَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَكُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

28:36.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّفۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

28:37.text: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُونُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

28:38.text: وَقَالَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مَا عَلِمۡتُ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ غَيۡرِى فَأَوۡقِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لِى يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طِّينِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لِّى صَرۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَطَّلِعُ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَأَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

28:39.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

28:40.text: فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَجُنُودَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَنَبَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٠

28:41.text: وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ وَيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ لَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

28:42.text: وَأَتۡبَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا لَعۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بُوح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

28:43.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ بَص<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

28:44.text: وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِجَانِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَرۡبِىِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

28:45.text: وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأۡنَا قُرُو<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَطَاوَلَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمُرُ‌ۚ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ ثَاوِ<rule class=ikhafa>يًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهۡلِ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ تَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُرۡسِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥

28:46.text: وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِجَانِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّورِ إِذۡ نَادَيۡنَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

28:47.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِيبَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصِيبَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡتَ إِلَيۡنَا رَسُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَتَّبِعَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكَ وَنَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

28:48.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِنَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ مِثۡلَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ مُوسَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سِحۡرَانِ تَظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَرَا وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

28:49.text: قُلۡ فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُوَ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَّبِعۡهُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

28:50.text: فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَتَّبِعُونَ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ هَوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ بِغَيۡرِ هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٠

28:51.text: ۞وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَصَّلۡنَا لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

28:52.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

28:53.text: وَإِذَا يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

28:54.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُؤۡتَوۡنَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَّتَيۡنِ بِمَا صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَءُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةَ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

28:55.text: وَإِذَا سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّغۡوَ أَعۡرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ لَا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

28:56.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَا تَهۡدِى مَنۡ أَحۡبَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

28:57.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتَّبِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ مَعَكَ نُتَخَطَّفۡ مِنۡ أَرۡضِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَمۡ نُمَكّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ حَرَمًا ءَامِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ ثَمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

28:58.text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َطِرَتۡ مَعِيشَتَهَا‌ۖ فَتِلۡكَ مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنُهُمۡ لَمۡ تُسۡك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِث<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

28:59.text: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ مُهۡلِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِهَا رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا‌ۚ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُهۡلِكِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَّا وَأَهۡلُهَا ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

28:60.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِيت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتُهَا‌ۚ وَمَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>قَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَفَلَا تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

28:61.text: أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَعۡدًا حَسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِيهِ كَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّتَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ هُوَ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦١

28:62.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَزۡعُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

28:63.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ رَبَّنَا هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَغۡوَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡوَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ كَمَا غَوَيۡنَا‌ۖ تَبَرَّأۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ مَا كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِيَّانَا يَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

28:64.text: وَقِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ وَرَأَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ‌ۚ لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

28:65.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ مَاذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٥

28:66.text: فَعَمِيَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

28:67.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َعَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

28:68.text: وَرَبُّكَ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَخۡتَارُ‌ۗ مَا كَانَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِيَرَةُ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

28:69.text: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

28:70.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

28:71.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ مَنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٌ غَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَأۡتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِضِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ‌ۖ أَفَلَا تَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

28:72.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ سَرۡمَدًا إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ مَنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٌ غَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَأۡتِيك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِلَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡكُنُونَ فِيهِ‌ۖ أَفَلَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

28:73.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ لِتَسۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

28:74.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَزۡعُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

28:75.text: وَنَزَعۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقُلۡنَا هَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُرۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ فَعَلِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ لِلَّهِ وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

28:76.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ كَانَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡمِ مُوسَىٰ فَبَغَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُنُوزِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَفَاتِحَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓأُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُصۡبَةِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُوَّةِ إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَوۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا تَفۡرَحۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَرِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٦

28:77.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِ فِيم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ نَصِيبَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَأَحۡسِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَسَادَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧
