28:78.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِيتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ عِلۡمٍ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَهۡلَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ مَنۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَكۡثَرُ جَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُسۡــَٔلُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُنُوبِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

28:79.text: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فِى زِينَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُرِيدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَ لَنَا مِثۡلَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِىَ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَذُو حَظٍّ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧٩

28:80.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ وَيۡلَكُمۡ ثَوَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُلَقَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

28:81.text: فَخَسَفۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَبِدَارِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فَمَا كَانَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِئَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

28:82.text: وَأَصۡبَحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَكَانَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡسِ يَقُولُونَ وَيۡكَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ‌ۖ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا لَخَسَفَ بِنَا‌ۖ وَيۡكَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُفۡلِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

28:83.text: تِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُهَا لِلَّذِينَ لَا يُرِيدُونَ عُلُو<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فَسَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ لِلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٣

28:84.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ إِلَّا مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

28:85.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَرَضَ عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ لَر<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدُّكَ إِلَىٰ مَعَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_mutaqaribayn>ل</rule> رَّبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَمُ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ وَمَنۡ هُوَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٨٥

28:86.text: وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَرۡج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُلۡقَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ إِلَّا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۖ فَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ظَهِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٦

28:87.text: وَلَا يَصُدُّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَتۡ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

28:88.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ‌ۘ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ كُلُّ شَىۡءٍ هَالِكٌ إِلَّا وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٨

29:2.text: أَحَسِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُتۡرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَهُمۡ لَا يُفۡتَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

29:3.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَلَيَعۡلَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ صَدَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَيَعۡلَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣

29:4.text: أَمۡ حَسِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡبِقُونَا‌ۚ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

29:5.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يَرۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَجَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَأَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٥

29:6.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُ لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَغَنِىٌّ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

29:7.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَنُكَفِّرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ وَلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

29:8.text: وَوَصَّيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡهِ حُسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَاكَ لِتُشۡرِكَ بِى مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تُطِعۡهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِلَىَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

29:9.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَنُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

29:10.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُ ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوذِىَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ جَعَلَ فِتۡنَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ كَعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ نَصۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مَعَكُمۡ‌ۚ أَوَلَيۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِأَعۡلَمَ بِمَا فِى صُدُورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

29:11.text: وَلَيَعۡلَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَيَعۡلَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

29:12.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَبِيلَنَا وَلۡنَحۡمِلۡ خَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ وَمَا ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِلِينَ مِنۡ خَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

29:13.text: وَلَيَحۡمِلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَثۡقَالَهُمۡ وَأَثۡقَال<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ أَثۡقَالِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَلَيُسۡــَٔلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

29:14.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَلَبِثَ فِيهِمۡ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٍ إِلَّا خَمۡسِينَ عَا<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخَذَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طُّوفَانُ وَهُمۡ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

29:15.text: فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّفِينَةِ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

29:16.text: وَإِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُوهُ‌ۖ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

29:17.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَخۡلُقُونَ إِفۡكًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ لَكُمۡ رِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُوهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

29:18.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُكَذِّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبَ أُمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكُمۡ‌ۖ وَمَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٨

29:19.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٩

29:20.text: قُلۡ سِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ بَدَأَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ِئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َشۡأَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٠

29:21.text: يُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَرۡحَمُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>لَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

29:22.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِزِينَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ‌ۖ وَمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٢٢

29:23.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يَئِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِى وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٣

29:24.text: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُوهُ أَوۡ حَرِّقُوهُ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

29:25.text: وَقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّوَدَّةَ بَيۡنِكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ يَكۡفُرُ بَعۡضُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَلۡعَنُ بَعۡضُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ وَمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

29:26.text: ۞فَـَٔـامَنَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٌ‌ۘ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُهَاجِرٌ إِلَىٰ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٦

29:27.text: وَوَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُبُوَّةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

29:28.text: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَةَ مَا سَبَقَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا مِنۡ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٨

29:29.text: أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّجَالَ وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلَ وَتَأۡتُونَ فِى نَادِيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرَ‌ۖ فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِنَا بِعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

29:30.text: قَالَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡنِى عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

29:31.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ رُسُلُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُشۡرَىٰ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُهۡلِك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡلِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَهۡلَهَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

29:32.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِيهَا لُو<rule class=ikhafa>طًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا‌ۖ لَنُنَجِّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَتۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

29:33.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ رُسُلُنَا لُو<rule class=ikhafa>طًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓءَ بِهِمۡ وَضَاقَ بِهِمۡ ذَرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَخَفۡ وَلَا تَحۡزَنۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُنَجُّوكَ وَأَهۡلَكَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَكَ كَانَتۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

29:34.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلُونَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ رِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>زًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡسُق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

29:35.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule> تَّرَكۡنَا مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

29:36.text: وَإِلَىٰ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَنَ أَخَاهُمۡ شُعَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

29:37.text: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>فَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى دَارِهِمۡ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

29:38.text: وَعَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمُودَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule> تَّبَيَّنَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ فَصَدَّهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٨

29:39.text: وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَ وَفِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۖ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّوسَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٩

29:40.text: فَكُلاًّ أَخَذۡنَا بِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ حَاصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَخَذَتۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّيۡحَةُ وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَسَفۡنَا بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا‌ۚ وَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

29:41.text: مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ كَمَثَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َبُوتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَتۡ بَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَوۡهَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُيُوتِ لَبَيۡتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َبُوتِ‌ۖ لَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

29:42.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٤٢

29:43.text: وَتِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ‌ۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

29:44.text: خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

29:45.text: ٱتۡلُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَأَقِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ تَنۡهَىٰ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَحۡش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ‌ۗ وَلَذِكۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَصۡنَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

29:46.text: ۞وَلَا تُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ وَقُول<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡنَا وَأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ وَإِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُنَا وَإِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمۡ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَحۡنُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

29:47.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ‌ۚ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَدُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

29:48.text: وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَخُطُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِيَمِينِكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

29:49.text: بَلۡ هُوَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى صُدُورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ‌ۚ وَمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَدُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

29:50.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥٠

29:51.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِهِمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ يُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذِكۡرَىٰ لِقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

29:52.text: قُلۡ كَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ شَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ وَكَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

29:53.text: وَيَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ‌ۚ وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ وَلَيَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

29:54.text: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لَمُحِيطَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٤

29:55.text: يَوۡمَ يَغۡشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِ أَرۡجُلِهِمۡ وَيَقُولُ ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

29:56.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِبَادِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَرۡضِى و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِعَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ىَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٦

29:57.text: كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

29:58.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَنُبَوِّئَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ غُرَ<rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ نِعۡمَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

29:59.text: ٱلَّذِينَ صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَتَوَكَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

29:60.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَحۡمِلُ رِزۡقَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَرۡزُقُهَا وَإِيَّاكُمۡ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٠

29:61.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَسَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

29:62.text: ٱللَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٢

29:63.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّزَّلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَحۡيَا بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَوۡتِهَا لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

29:64.text: وَمَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا لَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ لَهِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَوَانُ‌ۚ لَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

29:65.text: فَإِذَا رَكِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَجَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

29:66.text: لِيَكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَلِيَتَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

29:67.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا حَرَمًا ءَامِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُتَخَطَّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ مِنۡ حَوۡلِهِمۡ‌ۚ أَفَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ وَبِنِعۡمَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

29:68.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> أَلَيۡسَ فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مَثۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٨

29:69.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ سُبُلَنَا‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَمَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٩

30:3.text: ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ غَلَبِهِمۡ سَيَغۡلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

30:4.text: فِى بِضۡعِ سِنِينَ‌ۗ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدُ‌ۚ وَيَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡرَحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

30:5.text: بِنَصۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٥

30:6.text: وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ لَا يُخۡلِفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

30:7.text: يَعۡلَمُونَ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمۡ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

30:8.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِلِقَآىِٕ رَبِّهِمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

30:9.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَثَارُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَعَمَرُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡثَرَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَمَرُوهَا وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۖ فَمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيَظۡلِمَهُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ يَظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

30:10.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓـ</rule>ــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓأَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

30:11.text: ٱللَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

30:13.text: وَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ شُفَعَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

30:14.text: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَرَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

30:15.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَهُمۡ فِى رَوۡضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡبَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

30:17.text: فَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

30:18.text: وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَعَشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحِينَ تُظۡهِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

30:19.text: يُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىَّ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيِّتِ وَيُخۡرِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيِّتَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىِّ وَيُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا‌ۚ وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ تُخۡرَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

30:20.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡ خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َشَ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َشِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

30:21.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡ خَلَقَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_wo_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتَسۡكُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهَا وَجَعَلَ بَيۡنَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوَدَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَةً‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

30:22.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> خَلۡقُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فُ أَلۡسِنَتِكُمۡ وَأَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

30:23.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَنَامُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

30:24.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يُرِيكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرۡقَ خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َطَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُنَزِّلُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

30:40.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ رَزَقَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ‌ۖ هَلۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='idgham_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

30:41.text: ظَهَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَسَادُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ بِمَا كَسَبَتۡ أَيۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لِيُذِيقَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

30:42.text: قُلۡ سِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۚ كَانَ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٢

30:43.text: فَأَقِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَكَ لِلدِّينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَيِّمِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا مَرَدَّ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َصَّدَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

30:44.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَنۡ عَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلِأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ يَمۡهَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

30:45.text: لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَا يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥

30:46.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡسِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَاحَ مُبَشِّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِيُذِيقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكُ بِأَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

30:47.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ رُسُلاً إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِمۡ فَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقَمۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَكَانَ حَقًّا عَلَيۡنَا نَصۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

30:48.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُرۡسِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ كَيۡفَ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كِسَ<rule class=ikhafa>فًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قَ يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ خِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

30:49.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَمُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

30:50.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِ رَحۡمَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَيۡفَ يُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَمُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ‌ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٥٠

30:51.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رِي<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرَأَوۡهُ مُصۡفَر<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّظَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

30:52.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

30:53.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمۡىِ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَتِهِمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُسۡمِعُ إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

30:54.text: ۞ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>فٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ضَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>فٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُوَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ قُوَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشَيۡبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٥٤
