30:56.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَعۡثِ‌ۖ فَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَعۡثِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

30:57.text: فَيَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعۡذِرَتُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُسۡتَعۡتَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

30:58.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ فِى هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ مَثَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ِئۡتَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

30:59.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

30:60.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

31:2.text: تِلۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢

31:4.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَيُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمۡ يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

31:5.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

31:6.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡتَرِى لَهۡوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيثِ لِيُضِلَّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَتَّخِذَهَا هُزُوًا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦

31:7.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا وَلَّىٰ مُسۡتَكۡبِ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَسۡمَعۡهَا كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُذُنَيۡهِ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َبَشِّرۡهُ بِعَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٧

31:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٨

31:9.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۖ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَق<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

31:10.text: خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ بِغَيۡرِ عَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرَوۡنَهَا‌ۖ وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَبَثَّ فِيهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ د<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتۡنَا فِيهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ زَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠

31:11.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا خَلۡقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَأَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١١

31:12.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا لُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرۡ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡكُرۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَشۡكُرُ لِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَنِىٌّ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٢

31:13.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ لُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ لِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَهُوَ يَعِظُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ لَا تُشۡرِكۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّرۡكَ لَظُلۡمٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٣

31:14.text: وَوَصَّيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡهِ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهۡنًا عَلَىٰ وَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى عَامَيۡنِ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرۡ لِى وَلِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡكَ إِلَىَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٤

31:15.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَاكَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُشۡرِكَ بِى مَا لَيۡسَ لَكَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تُطِعۡهُمَا‌ۖ وَصَاحِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا مَعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡ سَبِيلَ مَنۡ أَنَابَ إِلَىَّ‌ۚ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىَّ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَأُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

31:16.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكُ مِثۡقَالَ حَبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَرۡدَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى صَخۡرَةٍ أَوۡ فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ أَوۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَأۡتِ بِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَطِيفٌ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٦

31:17.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ أَقِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأۡمُرۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡرُوفِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>نۡهَ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ عَزۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٧

31:18.text: وَلَا تُصَعِّرۡ خَدَّكَ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَا تَمۡشِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مَرَحًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ١٨

31:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فِى مَشۡيِكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡضُضۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َوۡتِكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َرَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَصۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ لَصَوۡتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٩

31:20.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَخَّرَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَأَسۡبَغَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ نِعَمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَاطِنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِغَيۡرِ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٢٠

31:21.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلۡ نَتَّبِعُ مَا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا عَلَيۡهِ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَوَلَوۡ كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ عَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٢١

31:22.text: ۞وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُسۡلِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡسَكَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُرۡوَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوُثۡقَىٰ‌ۗ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٢٢

31:23.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَلَا يَحۡزُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ كُفۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِلَيۡنَا مَرۡجِعُهُمۡ فَنُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا عَمِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٢٣

31:24.text: نُمَتِّعُهُمۡ قَلِيل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نَضۡطَرُّهُمۡ إِلَىٰ عَذَابٍ غَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٍ ٢٤

31:25.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

31:26.text: لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٢٦

31:27.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َجَرَةٍ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرُ يَمُدُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَةُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا نَفِدَتۡ كَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٧

31:28.text: مَّا خَلۡقُكُمۡ وَلَا بَعۡثُكُمۡ إِلَّا كَنَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةٍ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِي<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٨

31:29.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَيُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٩

31:30.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلُ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٣٠

31:31.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرِ بِنِعۡمَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لِيُرِيَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ صَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣١

31:32.text: وَإِذَا غَشِيَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلَلِ دَعَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَجَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرِّ فَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَدُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا كُلُّ خَتَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣٢

31:33.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡشَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى وَالِدٌ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَا مَوۡلُودٌ هُوَ جَازٍ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َالِدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> شَيۡــًٔا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌّ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تَغُرَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٣٣

31:34.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِلۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ وَيُنَزِّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡثَ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامِ‌ۖ وَمَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّاذَا تَكۡسِبُ غَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى نَفۡ<rule class=iqlab>سُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِأَىِّ أَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمُوتُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِيمٌ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُۢ ٣٤

32:2.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

32:3.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ>ٮٰهُ‌ۚ بَلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

32:4.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ‌ۖ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا شَفِيعٍ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

32:5.text: يُدَبِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَعۡرُجُ إِلَيۡهِ فِى يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَارُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَلۡفَ سَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعُدّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

32:6.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦

32:7.text: ٱلَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ كُلَّ شَىۡءٍ خَلَقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَبَدَأَ خَلۡقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧

32:8.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلَ نَسۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٨

32:9.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ سَوَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ وَنَفَخَ فِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّوحِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَجَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفۡــِٔدَةَ‌ۚ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

32:10.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَءِذَا ضَلَلۡنَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَفِى خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َدِي<rule class=iqlab>دِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِلِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّهِمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

32:11.text: ۞قُلۡ يَتَوَفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّلَكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى وُكِّلَ بِكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

32:12.text: وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمُونَ نَاكِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رُءُوسِهِمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَرۡنَا وَسَمِعۡنَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحًا إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

32:13.text: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَأَتَيۡنَا كُلَّ نَفۡسٍ هُدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنۡ حَقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَأَمۡلَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

32:14.text: فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَسِينَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ وَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

32:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهَا خَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُجَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَبَّحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡتَكۡبِرُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ١٥

32:16.text: تَتَجَافَىٰ جُنُوبُهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَضَاجِعِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ رَبَّهُمۡ خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َطَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

32:17.text: فَلَا تَعۡلَمُ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُخۡفِىَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُرَّةِ أَعۡيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

32:18.text: أَفَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مُؤۡمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فَاسِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَسۡتَوُ<rule class=madda_permissible>ۥ</rule>نَ ١٨

32:19.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَلَهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَأۡوَىٰ نُزُل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

32:20.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فَسَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۖ كُلَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَاد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُعِيدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

32:21.text: وَلَنُذِيقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَىٰ دُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَكۡبَرِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

32:22.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُكِّرَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَعۡرَضَ عَنۡه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

32:23.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ فَلَا تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى مِرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ‌ۖ</rule> وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ هُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ٢٣

32:24.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدُونَ بِأَمۡرِنَا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

32:25.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ فِيمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

32:26.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَهۡدِ لَهُمۡ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ يَمۡشُونَ فِى مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنِهِمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

32:27.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَسُوقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُرُزِ فَنُخۡرِجُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> زَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡكُلُ مِنۡهُ أَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُهُمۡ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

32:28.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٨

32:29.text: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

32:30.text: فَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِرۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

33:1.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا ١

33:2.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرًا ٢

33:3.text: وَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكِيلاً ٣

33:4.text: مَّا جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِرَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلۡبَيۡنِ فِى جَوۡفِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ــٰٓ</rule>ــِٔى تُظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُونَ مِنۡهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَمَا جَعَلَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ قَوۡلُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِكُمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَهُوَ يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لَ ٤

33:5.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ لِأَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ هُوَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَطُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ فَإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ وَمَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِيكُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَيۡسَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ جُنَا<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡطَأۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَعَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َدَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٥

33:6.text: ٱ<rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ أَوۡلَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ‌ۖ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جُهُ<rule class='madda_obligatory_monfasel'>ۥٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُمۡ‌ۗ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡحَامِ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلَىٰ بِبَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِرِينَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َفۡعَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّعۡرُو<rule class=ikhafa>فًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مَسۡطُورًا ٦

33:7.text: وَإِذۡ أَخَذۡنَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَهُمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َإِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ مَرۡيَمَ‌ۖ وَأَخَذۡنَا مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قًا غَلِيظًا ٧

33:8.text: لِّيَسۡــَٔلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِقِينَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَأَعَدَّ لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ٨

33:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡكُمۡ جُنُو<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجُنُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَرَوۡهَا‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا ٩

33:10.text: إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِكُمۡ وَمِنۡ أَسۡفَلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَإِذۡ زَاغَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ وَبَلَغَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُلُوبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَنَاجِرَ وَتَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّنُونَاۡ ١٠

33:11.text: هُنَالِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُلِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ وَزُلۡزِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> زِلۡزَال<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِيدًا ١١

33:12.text: وَإِذۡ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا وَعَدَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا غُرُورًا ١٢

33:13.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَهۡلَ يَثۡرِبَ لَا مُقَامَ لَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَيَسۡتَــٔۡذِنُ فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىَّ يَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بُيُوتَنَا عَوۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا هِىَ بِعَوۡرَةٍ‌ۖ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيدُونَ إِلَّا فِرَارًا ١٣

33:14.text: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>طَارِهَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ سُئِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأَتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا يَسِيرًا ١٤

33:15.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ لَا يُوَلُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ‌ۚ وَكَانَ عَهۡدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَسۡــُٔولاً ١٥

33:16.text: قُل لّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفِرَارُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرَرۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَتۡلِ وَإِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُمَتَّعُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ١٦

33:17.text: قُلۡ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَعۡصِمُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءًا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَجِدُونَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصِيرًا ١٧

33:18.text: ۞قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> يَعۡلَمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعَوِّقِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلِينَ لِإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ هَلُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَيۡنَا‌ۖ وَلَا يَأۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَأۡسَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ١٨

33:19.text: أَشِحَّةً عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوۡفُ رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ تَدُورُ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُغۡشَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۖ فَإِذَا ذَهَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَوۡفُ سَلَقُوك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَلۡسِنَةٍ حِدَادٍ أَشِحَّةً عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَمۡ يُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأَحۡبَطَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَسِيرًا ١٩

33:20.text: يَحۡسَبُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابَ لَمۡ يَذۡهَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابُ يَوَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َادُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ يَسۡــَٔلُونَ عَنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٢٠

33:21.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِى رَسُولِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يَرۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَ وَذَكَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَثِيرًا ٢١

33:22.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَءَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَا وَعَدَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَصَدَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَمَا زَادَهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَسۡلِيمًا ٢٢

33:23.text: مِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ رِجَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َدَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَيۡهِ‌ۖ فَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َضَىٰ نَحۡبَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َظِرُ‌ۖ وَمَا بَدَّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيلاً ٢٣

33:25.text: وَرَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِغَيۡظِهِمۡ لَمۡ يَنَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَفَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِتَالَ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَوِيًّا عَزِيزًا ٢٥

33:26.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَرُوه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َيَاصِيهِمۡ وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّعۡبَ فَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلُونَ وَتَأۡسِرُونَ فَرِيقًا ٢٦

33:27.text: وَأَوۡرَثَكُمۡ أَرۡضَهُمۡ وَدِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ وَأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ وَأَرۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَطَــُٔوهَا‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدِيرًا ٢٧

33:28.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ قُل لِّأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِكَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ تُرِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا فَتَعَالَيۡنَ أُمَتِّعۡكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأُسَرِّحۡكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَرَا<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِيلاً ٢٨

33:29.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ تُرِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ أَعَدَّ لِلۡمُحۡسِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ٢٩

33:30.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَفۡ لَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَسِيرًا ٣٠

33:31.text: ۞وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نُتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتَعۡمَلۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَهَا مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لَهَا رِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َرِيمًا ٣١

33:32.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّ لَسۡتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَأَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِۚ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَيۡتُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَلَا تَخۡضَعۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ فَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فِى قَلۡبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُلۡنَ قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡرُوفًا ٣٢

33:33.text: وَقَرۡنَ فِى بُيُوتِكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا تَبَرَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَ تَبَرُّجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِلِيَّةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰۖ وَأَقِمۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَطِعۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۚ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُذۡهِبَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سَ أَهۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡتِ وَيُطَهِّرَكُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هِيرًا ٣٣

33:34.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡنَ مَا يُتۡلَىٰ فِى بُيُوتِكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةِۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ لَطِيفًا خَبِيرًا ٣٤

class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَبَدًاۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ كَانَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَظِيمًا ٥٣

33:54.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَيۡــًٔا أَوۡ تُخۡفُوهُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَلِيمًا ٥٤

33:55.text: لَّا جُنَاحَ عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أَخَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِ<rule class='ghunnah'>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا نِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َهِيدًا ٥٥

33:56.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُصَلُّونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىِّۚ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ وَسَلِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَسۡلِيمًا ٥٦

33:57.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَعَنَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّهِينًا ٥٧

33:58.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُؤۡذُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ بِغَيۡرِ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡتَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡتَمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بُهۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِثۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ٥٨

33:59.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ قُل لِّأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِكَ وَبَنَاتِكَ وَنِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نِينَ عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيبِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعۡرَفۡنَ فَلَا يُؤۡذَيۡنَۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ٥٩

33:60.text: ۞لَّئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡجِفُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ لَنُغۡرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بِهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُجَاوِرُونَكَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ٦٠

33:61.text: مَّلۡعُونِينَۖ أَيۡنَمَا ثُقِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أُخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَقُتِّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تِيلاً ٦١

33:62.text: سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ خَلَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُۖ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لِسُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيلاً ٦٢

33:63.text: يَسۡــَٔلُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِۖ قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عِلۡمُهَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۚ وَمَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِيكَ لَعَلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ تَكُونُ قَرِيبًا ٦٣

33:64.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ سَعِيرًا ٦٤

33:65.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًاۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصِيرًا ٦٥

33:66.text: يَوۡمَ تُقَلَّبُ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ يَقُولُونَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَطَعۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطَعۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَاۡ ٦٦

33:67.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَطَعۡنَا سَادَتَنَا وَكُبَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا فَأَضَلُّونَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلَاۡ ٦٧

33:68.text: رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتِهِمۡ ضِعۡفَيۡنِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَنۡهُمۡ لَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َبِيرًا ٦٨

33:69.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَاذَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُوسَىٰ فَبَرَّأَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۚ</rule> وَكَانَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَجِيهًا ٦٩

33:70.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َدِيدًا ٧٠

33:71.text: يُصۡلِحۡ لَكُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَازَ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا ٧١

33:72.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَرَضۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمَانَةَ عَلَى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ فَأَبَيۡنَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحۡمِلۡنَهَا وَأَشۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ مِنۡهَا وَحَمَلَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ ظَلُو<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َهُولاً ٧٢

33:73.text: لِّيُعَذِّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَيَتُوبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمَۢا ٧٣

34:1.text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَكِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١

34:2.text: يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَاۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢

34:3.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَأۡتِينَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُۖ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتَأۡتِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِۖ لَا يَعۡزُبُ عَنۡهُ مِثۡقَالُ ذَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصۡغَرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡبَرُ إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣

34:4.text: لِّيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرِزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤

34:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سَعَوۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا مُعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِزِينَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥

34:6.text: وَيَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ وَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٦

34:7.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَلۡ نَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَبِّئُكُمۡ إِذَا مُزِّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمۡ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَفِى خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٧

34:8.text: أَفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِبًا أ<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َۗ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٨

34:9.text: أَفَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّشَأۡ نَخۡسِفۡ بِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ أَوۡ نُسۡقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ كِسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٩

34:10.text: ۞وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَضۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِبَالُ أَوِّبِى مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرَۖ وَأَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ١٠

34:11.text: أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلۡ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَدِّرۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّرۡدِۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحًاۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١

34:12.text: وَلِسُلَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَوَاحُهَا شَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَسَلۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>رِۖ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡمَلُ بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۖۦ</rule> وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َزِغۡ مِنۡهُمۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِنَا نُذِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>هُ مِنۡ عَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٢

34:13.text: يَعۡمَلُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِيبَ وَتَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثِيلَ وَجِفَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَوَابِ وَقُدُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّاسِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَالَ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ شُكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِبَادِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٣

34:14.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قَضَيۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ مَا دَلَّهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَوۡتِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا د<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ تَأۡكُلُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َأَتَهُۖ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡلَمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبَ مَا لَبِثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٤

34:15.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ لِسَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>إٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى مَسۡكَنِهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَانِ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشِمَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡقِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُۚ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَلۡدَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَبٌّ غَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ١٥

34:16.text: فَأَعۡرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَيۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَيۡهِمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَيۡنِ ذَوَات<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َىۡ</rule> أُكُلٍ خَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَثۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ١٦

34:17.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَزَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۖ</rule> وَهَلۡ نُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ز<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رَ ١٧
