34:18.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكۡنَا فِيهَا قُ<rule class=ikhafa>رًى</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَدَّرۡنَا فِيهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيۡرَۖ سِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا لَيَالِىَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

34:19.text: فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ أَسۡفَارِنَا وَظَلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّكُلِّ صَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ١٩

34:20.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَدَّقَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسُ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

34:21.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ إِلَّا لِنَعۡلَمَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هُوَ مِنۡهَا فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىۡءٍ حَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٌ ٢١

34:22.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ زَعَمۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا لَهُمۡ فِيهِمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٢٢

34:23.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَةُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا لِمَنۡ أَذِنَ لَهُۚ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلُوبِهِمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمۡۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٢٣

34:24.text: ۞قُلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡزُقُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۖ قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ إِيَّاكُمۡ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوۡ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٤

34:25.text: قُل لَّا تُسۡــَٔلُونَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡــَٔلُ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

34:26.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعُ بَيۡنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَفۡتَحُ بَيۡنَنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتَّاحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٦

34:27.text: قُلۡ أَرُونِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَلۡحَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَۖ كَلَّاۚ بَلۡ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٧

34:28.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ إِلَّا ك<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفَّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بَشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

34:29.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

34:30.text: قُل لَّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّيعَادُ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَسۡتَــٔۡخِرُونَ عَنۡهُ سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

34:31.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ وَلَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ مَوۡقُوفُونَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُ بَعۡضُهُمۡ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلَ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُضۡعِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

34:32.text: قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُضۡعِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَنَحۡنُ صَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ بَعۡدَ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُمۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

34:33.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُضۡعِفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلۡ مَكۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ إِذۡ تَأۡمُرُونَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكۡفُرَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَسَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َدَامَةَ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ وَجَعَلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡنَاقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۚ</rule> هَلۡ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

34:34.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِى قَرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

34:35.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ل<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

34:36.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

34:37.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى تُقَرِّبُكُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َنَا زُلۡفَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ضِّعۡفِ بِمَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُرُفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ءَامِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

34:38.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا مُعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِزِينَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

34:39.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ يُخۡلِفُهُۖ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِق<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٩

34:40.text: وَيَوۡمَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَقُولُ لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ أَهَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِيَّاكُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

34:41.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ وَلِيُّنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِمۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡبُدُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َۖ أَكۡثَرُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

34:42.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ لَا يَمۡلِكُ بَعۡضُكُمۡ لِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا ضَر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

34:43.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َصُدَّكُمۡ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَانَ يَعۡبُدُ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّفۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًىۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤٣

34:44.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُتُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رُسُونَهَاۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَكَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٤٤

34:45.text: وَكَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَمَا بَلَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِعۡشَارَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَكَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رُسُلِىۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٤٥

34:46.text: ۞قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعِظُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةٍۖ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُومُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ مَثۡنَىٰ وَفُر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>دَىٰ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَتَفَكَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۚ</rule> مَا بِصَاحِبِك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَ يَدَىۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤٦

34:47.text: قُلۡ مَا سَأَلۡتُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٤٧

34:48.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبِّى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذِفُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ عَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤٨

34:49.text: قُلۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَمَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلُ وَمَا يُع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٤٩

34:50.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>َلَلۡتُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِىۖ وَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَيۡتُ فَبِمَا يُوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٥٠

34:51.text: وَلَوۡ تَرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ فَزِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا فَوۡتَ وَأُخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٥١

34:52.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّنَاوُشُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٥٢

34:53.text: وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُۖ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذِفُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٥٣

34:54.text: وَحِيلَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ مَا يَشۡتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشۡيَاعِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِۭ ٥٤

35:1.text: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَاعِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ رُسُلاً أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نِحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّثۡنَىٰ وَثُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ وَرُبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَۚ يَزِيدُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقِ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١

35:2.text: مَّا يَفۡتَحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا مُمۡسِكَ لَهَاۖ وَمَا يُمۡسِكۡ فَلَا مُرۡسِلَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۚۦ</rule> وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢

35:3.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ هَلۡ مِنۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِقٍ غَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَرۡزُقُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۚ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

35:4.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَۚ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٤

35:5.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌّۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَا تَغُرَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَا يَغُرَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٥

35:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَكُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=ikhafa>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّاۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حِزۡبَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِيَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٦

35:7.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧

35:8.text: أَفَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُيِّنَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ عَمَلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَرَءَاهُ حَسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًاۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُضِلُّ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَهۡدِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُۖ فَلَا تَذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> نَفۡسُكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تٍۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا يَصۡنَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

35:9.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡسَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَىٰ بَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيِّ<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُش<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٩

35:10.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًاۚ إِلَيۡهِ يَصۡعَدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَلِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَمَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُ يَرۡفَعُهُۚ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَمۡكُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَكۡرُ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُوَ يَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٠

35:11.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلَكُمۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۚۦ</rule> وَمَا يُعَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّعَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َصُ مِنۡ عُمُرِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٍۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١

35:12.text: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَحۡرَانِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا عَذۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=ikhafa>غٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرَابُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مِلۡحٌ أُجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡكُلُونَ لَحۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَسۡتَخۡرِجُونَ حِلۡيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َلۡبَسُونَهَاۖ وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

35:13.text: يُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَيُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى لِأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=ikhafa>ًّىۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>م<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١٣

35:14.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ وَلَوۡ سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَجَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡۖ وَيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِشِرۡكِكُمۡۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثۡلُ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ١٤

35:15.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُقَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٥

35:16.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَأۡ يُذۡهِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٦

35:17.text: وَمَا ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِعَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٍ ١٧

35:18.text: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓۗ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَۚ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َزَكَّىٰ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۚۦ</rule> وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٨

35:19.text: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٩

35:20.text: وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢٠

35:21.text: وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظِّلُّ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢١

35:22.text: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَلَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِمُسۡمِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٢٢

35:23.text: إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ إِلَّا نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٣

35:24.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ بَشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٤

35:25.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زُّبُرِ وَبِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٢٥

35:26.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَخَذۡتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۖ</rule> فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٢٦

35:27.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثَمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهَاۚ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالِ جُدَ<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحُمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ س<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٧

35:28.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّو<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نُهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَخۡشَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُلَمَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٢٨

35:29.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأَقَامُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سِر<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَلَانِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرۡجُونَ تِجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رَ ٢٩

35:30.text: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِهِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۚۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> غَفُو<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٣٠

35:31.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَخَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣١

35:32.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَوۡرَثۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَيۡنَا مِنۡ عِبَادِنَاۖ فَمِنۡهُمۡ ظَالِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَصِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنۡهُمۡ سَابِ<rule class=iqlab>قُۢ</rule> <rule class='iqlab'>ب</rule>ِ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٣٢

35:33.text: جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلُؤۡلُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ؤًاۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِبَاسُهُمۡ فِيهَا حَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣٣

35:34.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَذۡهَبَ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَزَنَۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُو<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٣٤

35:35.text: ٱلَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُقَامَةِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٣٥

35:36.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ نَارُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ فَيَمُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابِهَاۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى كُلَّ كَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣٦

35:37.text: وَهُمۡ يَصۡطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحًا غَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَعۡمَلُۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُعَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِرۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َذَكَّرَ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َذِيرُۖ فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَمَا لِلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٣٧

35:38.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ غَيۡبِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٣٨

35:39.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِفَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۚ فَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۖ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَا يَزِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تًاۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَزِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ إِلَّا خَسَارًا ٣٩

35:40.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُۚ بَلۡ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ بَعۡضُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا ٤٠

35:41.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُمۡسِكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َزُولَاۚ وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َالَت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَهُمَا مِنۡ أَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۚۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورًا ٤١

35:42.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ لَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّيَكُونُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡ إِحۡدَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُمَمِۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا زَادَهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورًا ٤٢

35:43.text: ٱسۡتِكۡبَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَكۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّىِٕۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَكۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهۡلِهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۚۦ</rule> فَهَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَّا سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلِينَۚ فَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لِسُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لِسُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَحۡوِيلاً ٤٣

35:44.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَكَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّۚ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِيُعۡجِزَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ عَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدِيرًا ٤٤

35:45.text: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule><rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓبَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=ikhafa>ًّىۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَصِيرَۢا ٤٥

36:4.text: عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤

36:5.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥

36:6.text: لِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

36:7.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> حَقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

36:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِهِمۡ أَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهِىَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَذۡقَانِ فَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>مَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

36:9.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَد<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَد<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَغۡشَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

36:10.text: وَسَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

36:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُ مَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ وَخَشِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِمَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١١

36:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ نُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَىۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٢

36:13.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ضۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّثَلاً أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

36:14.text: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِ<rule class=ikhafa>ثٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

36:15.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُنَا وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا تَكۡذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

36:16.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

36:17.text: وَمَا عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٧

36:18.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَنَرۡجُمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٨

36:19.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> طَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِرُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّعَكُمۡۚ أَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُكِّرۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُمۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

36:20.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مِنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

36:21.text: ٱتَّبِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

36:22.text: وَمَا لِىَ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَنِى وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

36:23.text: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَالِهَةً إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ بِضُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُغۡنِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى شَفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>ِذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٢٣

36:24.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ذًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٤

36:25.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٢٥

36:26.text: قِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَۖ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَ قَوۡمِى يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

36:27.text: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِى رَبِّى وَجَعَلَنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٧

36:28.text: ۞وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>ُن<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٨

36:29.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا هُمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

36:30.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَسۡرَةً عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِبَادِ‌ۚ مَا يَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

36:31.text: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

36:32.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَمِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

36:33.text: وَءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا وَأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا مِنۡهَا حَب<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

36:34.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّخِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٤

36:35.text: لِيَأۡكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َمَرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

36:36.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَ كُلَّهَا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تُ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

36:37.text: وَءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ فَإِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّظۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

36:38.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسُ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى لِمُسۡتَقَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٨

36:39.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُرۡجُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٩

36:40.text: لَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسُ يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َغِى لَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ‌ۚ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى فَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡبَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

36:41.text: وَءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٤١

36:42.text: وَخَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا يَرۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

36:43.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّشَأۡ نُغۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>هُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

36:44.text: إِلَّا رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عًا إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٤٤

36:45.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

36:46.text: وَمَا تَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

36:47.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَزَقَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَنُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِمُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَمَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٤٧

36:48.text: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَعۡدُ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

36:49.text: مَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

36:50.text: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

36:51.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَإِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

36:52.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَنَا م<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعَثَنَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرۡقَدِنَاۜ‌ۗ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَا وَعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَصَدَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

36:53.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

36:54.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ لَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

36:55.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ فِى شُغُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

36:56.text: هُمۡ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جُهُمۡ فِى ظِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لٍ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكِ مُتَّكِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٦

36:57.text: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَدَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

36:58.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>بٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٨

36:59.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

36:60.text: ۞أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَادَمَ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تَعۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦٠

36:61.text: وَأَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُونِى‌ۚ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦١

36:62.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَضَلَّ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ جِبِل<rule class=ikhafa>اًّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِيرًا‌ۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

36:63.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

36:64.text: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

36:65.text: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

36:66.text: وَلَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَبَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صِّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طَ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

36:67.text: وَلَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَمَسَخۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُضِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

36:68.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّعَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقِ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

36:69.text: وَمَا عَلَّمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّعۡرَ وَمَا يَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َغِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُرۡءَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦٩

36:70.text: لِّيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ حَي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَحِقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٠

36:71.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِين<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُمۡ لَهَا مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

36:72.text: وَذَلَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

36:73.text: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِعُ وَمَشَارِبُ‌ۖ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

36:74.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّهُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

36:75.text: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُن<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

36:76.text: فَلَا يَحۡزُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ قَوۡلُهُمۡ‌ۘ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٦

36:77.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا هُوَ خَصِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧٧

36:78.text: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَسِىَ خَلۡقَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ قَالَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ وَهِىَ رَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٨

36:79.text: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َأَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٩
