36:80.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخۡضَرِ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ تُوقِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

36:81.text: أَوَلَيۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِرٍ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلَىٰ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨١

36:82.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡرُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرَادَ شَيۡــًٔا أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نُ ٨٢

36:83.text: فَسُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بِيَدِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٣

37:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_necessary>ـٰٓ</rule>فَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ صَفًّا ١

37:2.text: فَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>زّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ زَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا ٢

37:3.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ذِكۡرًا ٣

37:4.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَكُمۡ لَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='qalaqah'>د</rule>ٌ ٤

37:5.text: رَّبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَرَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ٥

37:6.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا زَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَوَاكِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٦

37:7.text: وَحِفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ظًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ شَيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّارِ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٧

37:8.text: لَّا يَسَّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َعُونَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَإِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَىٰ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ذَفُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ جَانِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٨

37:9.text: دُحُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َاصِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٩

37:10.text: إِلَّا مَنۡ خَطِفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَةَ فَأَتۡبَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شِهَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َاقِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ١٠

37:11.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَهُمۡ أَشَدُّ خَلۡقًا أ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّازِ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِۭ ١١

37:13.text: وَإِذَا ذُكِّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَذۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

37:14.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَسۡخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

37:15.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٥

37:16.text: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُوث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

37:18.text: قُلۡ نَعَمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>خِر<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

37:19.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا هِىَ زَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا هُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

37:20.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَيۡلَنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٠

37:21.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَصۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

37:22.text: ۞ٱحۡشُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

37:23.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡدُوهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢٣

37:27.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

37:28.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَأۡتُونَنَا عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٨

37:29.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَل لَّمۡ تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

37:30.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَنَا عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>نِۭ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

37:31.text: فَحَقَّ عَلَيۡنَا قَوۡلُ رَبِّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

37:32.text: فَأَغۡوَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

37:33.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

37:34.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَفۡعَلُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٤

37:35.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَسۡتَكۡبِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

37:36.text: وَيَقُولُونَ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَتَارِك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَالِهَتِنَا لِشَاعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِۭ ٣٦

37:37.text: بَلۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَصَدَّقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

37:38.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٨

37:39.text: وَمَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

37:41.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ لَهُمۡ رِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤١

37:42.text: فَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>كِهُ‌ۖ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

37:43.text: فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٤٣

37:44.text: عَلَىٰ سُرُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٤

37:45.text: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِكَأۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِۭ ٤٥

37:47.text: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

37:48.text: وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمۡ قَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّرۡفِ ع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤٨

37:49.text: كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٤٩

37:50.text: فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

37:51.text: قَالَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كَانَ لِى قَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥١

37:52.text: يَقُولُ أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصَدِّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

37:53.text: أَءِذَا مِتۡنَا وَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا تُرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مًا أَءِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمَدِين<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

37:54.text: قَالَ هَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّطَّلِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

37:55.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>طَّلَعَ فَرَءَاهُ فِى سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥٥

37:56.text: قَالَ تَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّ لَتُرۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٥٦

37:57.text: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّى لَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

37:59.text: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٩

37:60.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٦٠

37:61.text: لِمِثۡلِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فَلۡيَعۡمَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

37:62.text: أَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّزُلاً أَمۡ شَجَرَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّقّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٦٢

37:63.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٣

37:64.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا شَجَرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡرُجُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَصۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٦٤

37:65.text: طَلۡعُهَا كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رُءُوسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ط<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٦٥

37:66.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَأَكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِــُٔونَ مِنۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

37:67.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٦٧

37:68.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَرۡجِعَهُمۡ لَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٦٨

37:69.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَلۡفَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ ض<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٩

37:70.text: فَهُمۡ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ يُهۡرَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

37:71.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَهُمۡ أَكۡثَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

37:72.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا فِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

37:73.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

37:75.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> نَادَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نَا نُو<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُجِيب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

37:76.text: وَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَرۡبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٧٦

37:77.text: وَجَعَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَاق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٧

37:79.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَىٰ نُو<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٩

37:80.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

37:81.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

37:82.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٢

37:83.text: ۞وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِيعَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَإِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مَ ٨٣

37:84.text: إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِقَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٨٤

37:85.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَاذَا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

37:86.text: أَئِفۡكًا ءَالِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرِيد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٦

37:87.text: فَمَا ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

37:88.text: فَنَظَرَ نَظۡرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٨٨

37:90.text: فَتَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٠

37:91.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَالِهَتِهِمۡ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩١

37:92.text: مَا لَكُمۡ لَا تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٢

37:93.text: فَرَاغَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ضَرۡب<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٩٣

37:94.text: فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ يَزِفّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٤

37:96.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَلَقَكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩٦

37:97.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَلۡقُوهُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٩٧

37:98.text: فَأَرَادُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡفَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩٨

37:99.text: وَقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ذَاهِبٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى سَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٩٩

37:100.text: رَبِّ هَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٠

37:101.text: فَبَشَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِغُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٍ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠١

37:102.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا بَلَغَ مَعَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّعۡىَ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُنَىَّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَنَامِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَذۡبَحُكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ مَاذَا تَرَىٰ‌ۚ قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَبَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡعَلۡ مَا تُؤۡمَرُ‌ۖ سَتَجِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٢

37:103.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لِلۡجَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٠٣

37:104.text: وَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ي</rule>َ<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ـٰٓ</rule>إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مُ ١٠٤

37:105.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَدَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّءۡي<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠٥

37:106.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٠٦

37:107.text: وَفَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِذِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠٧

37:109.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ه<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>مَ ١٠٩

37:110.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٠

37:111.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١١

37:112.text: وَبَشَّرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِإِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ نَبِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٢

37:113.text: وَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَعَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِسۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَ‌ۚ وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحۡسِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َظَالِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١١٣

37:114.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَنَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١٤

37:115.text: وَنَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا وَقَوۡمَهُمَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَرۡبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١١٥

37:116.text: وَنَصَرۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٦

37:117.text: وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١٧

37:118.text: وَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صِّر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ١١٨

37:120.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٠

37:121.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢١

37:122.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمَا مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٢

37:123.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِلۡيَاسَ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٣

37:124.text: إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَلَا تَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢٤

37:125.text: أَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ بَعۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَذَرُونَ أَحۡسَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٥

37:126.text: ٱللَّهَ رَبَّكُمۡ وَرَبَّ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢٦

37:130.text: سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلۡ يَاس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ

37:131.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣١

37:132.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٢

37:133.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٣

37:134.text: إِذۡ نَجَّيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَهۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٤

37:135.text: إِلَّا عَجُو<rule class=ikhafa>زًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٥

37:136.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ دَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٦

37:137.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصۡبِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٧

37:139.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣٩

37:140.text: إِذۡ أَبَقَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ١٤٠

37:141.text: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حَض<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤١

37:142.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡتَقَمَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤٢

37:143.text: فَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسَبِّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤٣

37:144.text: لَلَبِثَ فِى بَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٤

37:145.text: ۞فَنَبَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَهُوَ سَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤٥

37:146.text: وَأَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ شَجَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ط<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٤٦

37:147.text: وَأَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَىٰ مِ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>ئَةِ أَلۡفٍ أَوۡ يَزِيد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٧

37:148.text: فَـَٔـامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَمَتَّعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ إِلَىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٤٨

37:149.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَفۡتِهِمۡ أَلِرَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤٩

37:150.text: أَمۡ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ إِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٠

37:151.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ إِفۡكِهِمۡ لَيَقُول<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥١

37:152.text: وَلَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٢

37:156.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ سُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٥٦

37:157.text: فَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥٧

37:158.text: وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَبَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ نَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> عَلِمَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَمُحۡضَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٨

37:159.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥٩

37:162.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ بِفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٢

37:163.text: إِلَّا مَنۡ هُوَ صَالِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٦٣

37:164.text: وَمَا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَقَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ١٦٤

37:165.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٥

37:167.text: وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيَقُول<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦٧

37:168.text: لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َنَا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٨

37:169.text: لَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عِبَادَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخۡلَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦٩

37:170.text: فَكَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٠

37:171.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَبَقَتۡ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧١

37:172.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُور<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٢

37:173.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جُ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َنَا لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٣

37:175.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرۡهُمۡ فَسَوۡفَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٥

37:177.text: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمۡ فَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ صَبَاحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧٧

37:179.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرۡ فَسَوۡفَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧٩

37:180.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨٠

37:182.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨٢

38:1.text: <rule class=madda_necessary>صٓ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرِ ١

38:2.text: بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى عِزَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ٢

38:3.text: كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَادَو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَن<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>صٍ ٣

38:4.text: وَعَجِب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرُونَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٤

38:5.text: أَجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلِهَةَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَشَىۡءٌ عُج<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٥

38:6.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡشُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَالِهَتِكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لَش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٦

38:7.text: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِلَّةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٌ ٧

38:8.text: أَءُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ عَلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِنَا‌ۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِى‌ۖ بَل لَّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٨

38:9.text: أَمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمۡ خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنُ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٩

38:10.text: أَمۡ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا‌ۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٠

38:11.text: جُن<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا هُنَالِكَ مَهۡزُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡز<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١١

38:12.text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوۡت<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٢

38:13.text: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوۡمُ لُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ لۡــَٔيۡكَةِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡز<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ١٣

38:14.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٤

38:15.text: وَمَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِلَّا صَيۡحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا لَهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َو<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ٍ ١٥

38:16.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ١٦

38:17.text: ٱصۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَنَا دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡدِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَوّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ١٧

38:18.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَخَّرۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُسَبِّحۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَشِىِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِشۡر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١٨

38:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيۡرَ مَحۡشُورَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَوّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ١٩

38:20.text: وَشَدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا مُلۡكَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِط<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢٠

38:21.text: ۞وَهَلۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ نَبَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَصۡمِ إِذۡ تَسَوَّرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِحۡر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٢١

38:22.text: إِذۡ دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دَ فَفَزِعَ مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَخَفۡ‌ۖ خَصۡمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعۡضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَا تُشۡطِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡدِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>صِّر<rule class='madda_permissible'>ٰ</rule><rule class='qalaqah'>ط</rule>ِ ٢٢

38:23.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> تِسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتِسۡعُونَ نَعۡجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِىَ نَعۡجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ أَكۡفِلۡنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِط<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢٣

38:24.text: قَالَ لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعۡجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلَط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ لَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>غِى بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٍ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَقَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا هُمۡ‌ۗ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا فَتَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفَرَ رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَخَرَّ رَاكِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَنَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ۩ ٢٤

38:25.text: فَغَفَرۡنَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َنَا لَزُلۡفَىٰ وَحُسۡنَ مَــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢٥

38:26.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَاوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>دُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ خَلِيفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِس<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٢٦

38:27.text: وَمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِل<rule class=ikhafa>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> فَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٢٧

38:60.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا مَرۡحَب<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِكُمۡ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَدَّمۡتُمُوهُ لَنَا‌ۖ فَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٦٠

38:62.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَال<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَعُدُّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَشۡر<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٦٢

38:63.text: أَتَّخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سِخۡرِيًّا أَمۡ زَاغَتۡ عَنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رُ ٦٣

38:64.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَحَ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٦٤

38:65.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا مِنۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٍ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٦٥

38:66.text: رَبُّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفَّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رُ ٦٦

38:69.text: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنۡ عِلۡ<rule class=iqlab>مِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَإِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

38:70.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧٠

38:71.text: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=iqlab>قُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧١

38:72.text: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّوحِى فَقَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

38:73.text: فَسَجَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

38:74.text: إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

38:75.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>إِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َسۡجُدَ لِمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُ بِيَدَىَّ‌ۖ أَسۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ أَمۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَال<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

38:76.text: قَالَ أَنَاۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ‌ۖ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَنِى م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َخَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٧٦

38:77.text: قَالَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ رَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٧

38:78.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٧٨

38:79.text: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ِرۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

38:80.text: قَالَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

38:81.text: إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٨١

38:82.text: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغۡوِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٢

38:84.text: قَالَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ أَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>لُ ٨٤

38:85.text: لَأَمۡلَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٥

38:87.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٧

39:1.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١

39:2.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>صًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢

39:3.text: أَلَا لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَالِصُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا نَعۡبُدُهُمۡ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ زُلۡفَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَهُمۡ فِى مَا هُمۡ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى مَنۡ هُوَ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِ<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َفّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رٌ ٣

39:4.text: لَّوۡ أَرَادَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّخِذَ وَلَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡطَفَىٰ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رُ ٤

39:5.text: خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ يُكَوِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ‌ۖ وَسَخَّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ‌ۖ كُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى لِأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًى‌ۗ أَلَا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفَّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رُ ٥

39:6.text: خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ جَعَلَ مِنۡهَا زَوۡجَهَا وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ ثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡلُقُكُمۡ فِى بُطُونِ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ خَلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى ظُلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>ثٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ‌ۖ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُصۡرَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

39:7.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َكۡفُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَنِىٌّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۖ وَلَا يَرۡضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفۡرَ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َشۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَرۡضَهُ لَكُمۡ‌ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰ‌ۗ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِلَىٰ رَبِّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرۡجِعُكُمۡ فَيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٧

39:8.text: ۞وَإِذَا مَسَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ ضُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َعَا رَبَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُنِيبًا إِلَيۡهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> نِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ نَسِىَ مَا كَانَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُضِلَّ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قُلۡ تَمَتَّعۡ بِكُفۡرِكَ قَلِيلاً‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٨

39:9.text: أَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هُوَ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِتٌ ءَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ سَاجِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحۡذَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةَ وَيَرۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَحۡمَةَ رَبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۗ قُلۡ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَعۡلَمُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ‌ۗ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٩
