39:45.text: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَحۡدَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡمَأَزَّتۡ قُلُوبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِذَا هُمۡ يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

39:46.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ فَاطِرَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَ عِبَادِكَ فِى مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

39:47.text: وَلَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِثۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ وَبَدَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مَا لَمۡ يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَحۡتَسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

39:48.text: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتُ مَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَحَاقَ بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

39:49.text: فَإِذَا مَسَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ ضُ<rule class=ikhafa>رٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َعَانَا ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِذَا خَوَّلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ نِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتِيتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ عِلۡ<rule class=iqlab>مِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ هِىَ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

39:50.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قَالَهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

39:51.text: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتُ مَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتُ مَا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمُعۡجِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥١

39:52.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٢

39:53.text: ۞قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِبَادِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَسۡرَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَطُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَغۡفِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٥٣

39:54.text: وَأَنِيب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمۡ وَأَسۡلِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٤

39:55.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابُ بَغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٥

39:56.text: أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقُولَ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حَسۡرَتَىٰ عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطتُ فِى جَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ لَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>خِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

39:57.text: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هَدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>نِى لَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٧

39:58.text: أَوۡ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِى كَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَكُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٨

39:59.text: بَلَىٰ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡكَ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِى فَكَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَ بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرۡتَ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٩

39:60.text: وَيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ تَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وُجُوهُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡوَدَّةٌ‌ۚ أَلَيۡسَ فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ مَثۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَكَبِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٠

39:61.text: وَيُنَجِّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَفَازَتِهِمۡ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

39:62.text: ٱللَّهُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِقُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٌ ٦٢

39:63.text: لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَقَالِيدُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

39:64.text: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَأۡمُر<rule class=madda_necessary>ُو</rule>ٓ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٤

39:65.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ لَئِنۡ أَشۡرَكۡتَ لَيَحۡبَطَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٥

39:66.text: بَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

39:67.text: وَمَا قَدَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ حَقَّ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ضَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>وِيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِيَمِينِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَتَعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَىٰ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

39:68.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ فَصَعِقَ مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نُفِخَ فِيهِ أُخۡرَىٰ فَإِذَا هُمۡ قِيَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

39:69.text: وَأَشۡرَقَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ بِنُورِ رَبِّهَا وَوُضِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ وَجِ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ىٓ</rule>ءَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

39:70.text: وَوُفِّيَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا عَمِلَتۡ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

39:71.text: وَسِيقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ زُمَرًا‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوهَا فُتِحَتۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ رُسُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ يَتۡلُونَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّكُمۡ وَيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُونَكُمۡ لِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۚ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنۡ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧١

39:72.text: قِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَكَبِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٢

39:73.text: وَسِيقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ زُمَرًا‌ۖ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوهَا وَفُتِحَتۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بُهَا وَقَالَ لَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُهَا سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ طِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُوهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

39:74.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى صَدَقَنَا وَعۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَوۡرَثَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ نَتَبَوَّأُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ حَيۡثُ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ فَنِعۡمَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

39:75.text: وَتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ ح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۖ وَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَقِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٥

40:2.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِيلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢

40:3.text: غَافِرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِ وَقَابِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡبِ شَدِيدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِقَابِ ذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّوۡلِۖ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ إِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٣

40:4.text: مَا يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا يَغۡرُرۡكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِلَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤

40:5.text: كَذَّبَتۡ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡۖ وَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َتۡ كُلُّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=iqlab>ةِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِرَسُولِهِمۡ لِيَأۡخُذُوهُۖ وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلِ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>حِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ فَأَخَذۡتُهُمۡۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ عِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٥

40:6.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ حَقَّتۡ كَلِمَتُ رَبِّكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٦

40:7.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَحۡمِلُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشَ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيُؤۡمِنُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّنَا وَسِعۡتَ كُلَّ ش<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعِلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٧

40:8.text: رَبَّنَا وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نٍ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وَعَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تَّهُمۡ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َلَحَ مِنۡ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨

40:9.text: وَقِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِۚ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَحِمۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

40:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُنَادَوۡنَ لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَكۡبَرُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تِكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ إِذۡ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ فَتَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

40:11.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَتَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَتَيۡنِ وَأَحۡيَيۡتَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ثۡنَتَيۡنِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَرَفۡنَا بِذُنُوبِنَا فَهَلۡ إِلَىٰ خُرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ١١

40:12.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِذَا دُعِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَحۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَفَرۡتُمۡۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُشۡرَكۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡۚ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُكۡمُ لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِىِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٢

40:13.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُنَزِّلُ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رِزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ إِلَّا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ١٣

40:14.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

40:15.text: رَفِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ يُلۡقِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحَ مِنۡ أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>ِ ١٥

40:16.text: يَوۡمَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ ش<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٌۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَهّ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ١٦

40:38.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَامَنَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُونِ أَهۡدِكُمۡ سَبِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّش<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٣٨
