40:57.text: لَخَلۡقُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ خَلۡقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

40:58.text: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصِيرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓءُۚ قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَتَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

40:59.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ لَأَتِيَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٩

40:60.text: وَقَالَ رَبُّكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَسۡتَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> لَكُمۡۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ عَنۡ عِبَادَتِى سَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ دَاخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٠

40:61.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ لِتَسۡكُنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِرًاۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَذُو فَضۡلٍ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

40:62.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِقُ كُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ تُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٢

40:63.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُؤۡفَكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٣

40:64.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ قَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡ وَرَزَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡۖ فَتَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٤

40:65.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَىُّ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَۗ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٥

40:66.text: ۞قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى نُهِيتُ أَنۡ أَعۡبُدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّى وَأُمِرۡتُ أَنۡ أُسۡلِمَ لِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٦

40:67.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُرَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ مِنۡ عَلَقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُخۡرِجُكُمۡ طِفۡل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَشُدَّكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لِتَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شُيُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>خًاۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُتَوَفَّىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُۖ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَجَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٧

40:68.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُۖ فَإِذَا قَضَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَقُولُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نُ ٦٨

40:69.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُصۡرَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

40:70.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ وَبِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> رُسُلَنَاۖ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

40:71.text: إِذِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَغۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِلُ يُسۡحَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

40:72.text: فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمِيمِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ يُسۡجَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

40:73.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

40:74.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بَل لَّمۡ نَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ شَيۡـ<rule class=ikhafa>ـًٔاۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُضِلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٤

40:75.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِك<rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَفۡرَحُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَمۡرَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

40:76.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>بَ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَكَبِّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٦

40:77.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَۚ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نُرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَعِدُهُمۡ أَوۡ نَتَوَفَّيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ فَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

40:78.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َصَصۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>صُصۡ عَلَيۡكَۗ وَمَا كَانَ لِرَسُولٍ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ بِـَٔـايَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِۚ فَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قُضِىَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

40:79.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ لِتَرۡكَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا وَمِنۡهَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

40:80.text: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِعُ وَلِتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهَا حَاجَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى صُدُورِكُمۡ وَعَلَيۡهَا وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ تُحۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

40:81.text: وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأَىَّ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

40:82.text: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡۚ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَكۡثَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَأَشَدَّ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاثَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

40:83.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَرِحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمِ وَحَاقَ بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٣

40:84.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَأۡسَنَا قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَامَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَحۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَكَفَرۡنَا بِمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٤

40:85.text: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُهُمۡ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ فِى عِبَادِهِ<rule class=madda_normal>ۖۦ</rule> وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

41:2.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢

41:3.text: كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُصِّلَتۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

41:4.text: بَشِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِي<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَعۡرَضَ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

41:5.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قُلُوبُنَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَكِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِنَا وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِنَا وَبَيۡنِكَ حِجَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

41:6.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ بَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِ<rule class='ikhafa'>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقِيم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُوهُ‌ۗ وَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

41:7.text: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

41:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٨

41:9.text: ۞قُلۡ أَئِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَتَكۡفُرُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فِى يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َا<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ رَبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٩

41:10.text: وَجَعَلَ فِيهَا رَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>سِىَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهَا وَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكَ فِيهَا وَقَدَّرَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>قۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تَهَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡبَعَةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلسّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

41:11.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَهِىَ دُخَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَالَ لَهَا وَلِلۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتِيَا طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>هًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَيۡنَا ط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

41:12.text: فَقَضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وَا<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَأَوۡحَىٰ فِى كُلِّ سَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ أَمۡرَهَا‌ۚ وَزَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا بِمَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيحَ وَحِفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ظًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٢

41:13.text: فَإِنۡ أَعۡرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَقُلۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َرۡتُكُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِقَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِقَةِ عَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ١٣

41:14.text: إِذۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ أَلَّا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رَبُّنَا لَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ مَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

41:15.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنۡ أَشَدُّ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قُوَّةً‌ۖ أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَهُمۡ هُوَ أَشَدُّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

41:16.text: فَأَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِي<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َرۡصَ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَيَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّحِسَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّنُذِيقَهُمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِزۡىِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ أَخۡزَىٰ‌ۖ وَهُمۡ لَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

41:17.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ثَمُودُ فَهَدَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَحَبُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَمَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِقَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُونِ بِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَكۡسِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

41:18.text: وَنَجَّيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

41:19.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

41:20.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوهَا شَهِدَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ وَجُلُودُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

41:21.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِجُلُودِهِمۡ لِمَ شَهِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ عَلَيۡنَا‌ۖ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َقَنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َقَ كُلَّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

41:22.text: وَمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَسۡتَتِرُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشۡهَدَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ سَمۡعُكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُكُمۡ وَلَا جُلُودُكُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَعۡلَمُ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

41:23.text: وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرَبِّكُمۡ أَرۡدَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ فَأَصۡبَحۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٣

41:24.text: فَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َصۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ مَثۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَعۡتِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَمَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُعۡتَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

41:25.text: ۞وَقَيَّضۡنَا لَهُمۡ قُرَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَزَيَّنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡ وَحَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

41:26.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَسۡمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَغۡلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

41:27.text: فَلَنُذِيقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَسۡوَأَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

41:28.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ أَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۖ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا دَارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُلۡدِ‌ۖ جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

41:29.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذَيۡنِ أَضَلَّانَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡهُمَا تَحۡتَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَامِنَا لِيَكُونَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡفَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

41:30.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبُّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَتَنَزَّلُ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ أَلَّا تَخَافُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَا تَحۡزَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>شِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

41:31.text: نَحۡنُ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُكُمۡ وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَا تَدَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

41:32.text: نُزُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٢

41:33.text: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ قَوۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َع<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَعَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٣

41:34.text: وَلَا تَسۡتَوِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَسَنَةُ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّئَةُ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>فَعۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى هِىَ أَحۡسَنُ فَإِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَيۡنَكَ وَبَيۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَ<rule class='ikhafa'>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلِىٌّ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٤

41:35.text: وَمَا يُلَقَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ صَبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَمَا يُلَقَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا ذُو حَظٍّ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٥

41:36.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َغَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ نَزۡ<rule class=ikhafa>غٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعِذۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣٦

41:37.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرُ‌ۚ لَا تَسۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلشَّمۡسِ وَلَا لِلۡقَمَرِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡجُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِيَّاهُ تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

41:38.text: فَإِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ يُسَبِّحُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَهُمۡ لَا يَسۡــَٔمُ<rule class=madda_permissible>و</rule>نَ ۩ ٣٨

41:39.text: وَمِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ تَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا عَلَيۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَزَّتۡ وَرَبَتۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡيَاهَا لَمُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣٩

41:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُلۡحِدُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا لَا يَخۡفَوۡنَ عَلَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۗ</rule> أَفَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُلۡقَىٰ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ خَيۡرٌ أ<rule class=idgham_shafawi>َم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَامِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡمَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا شِئۡتُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤٠

41:41.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرِ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بٌ عَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٌ ٤١

41:42.text: لَّا يَأۡتِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَلَا مِنۡ خَلۡفِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَكِيمٍ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤٢

41:43.text: مَّا يُقَالُ لَكَ إِلَّا مَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قِيلَ لِلرُّسُلِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذُو عِقَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤٣

41:44.text: وَلَوۡ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ قُرۡءَانًا أَعۡجَمِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا فُصِّلَتۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۖ</rule> ءَا۠عۡجَمِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌّ۬</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَرَبِ<rule class=ikhafa>ىٌّ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ هُوَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشِف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ عَمًى‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ يُنَادَوۡنَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=iqlab>نِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤٤

41:45.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتُلِفَ فِيهِ‌ۗ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ مُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٤٥

41:46.text: مَّنۡ عَمِلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلِنَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَنۡ أَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَعَلَيۡهَا‌ۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤٦

41:47.text: ۞إِلَيۡهِ يُرَدُّ عِلۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ‌ۚ وَمَا تَخۡرُجُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ث</rule>َمَر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَكۡمَامِهَا وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ أَيۡنَ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِى قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَاذَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ مَا مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٤٧

41:48.text: وَضَلَّ عَنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>صٍ ٤٨

41:49.text: لَّا يَسۡــَٔمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَيۡرِ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرُّ فَيَــُٔو<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ٌ ٤٩

41:50.text: وَلَئِنۡ أَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ ضَرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَسَّتۡهُ لَيَقُولَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا لِى وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّجِعۡتُ إِلَىٰ رَبّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِى عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَلۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۚ فَلَنُنَبِّئَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَنُذِيقَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابٍ غَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٍ ٥٠

41:51.text: وَإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ أَعۡرَضَ وَنَـَٔـا بِجَانِبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَإِذَا مَسَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّرُّ فَذُو دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٍ عَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ضٍ ٥١

41:52.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَفَرۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنۡ هُوَ فِى شِقَا<rule class=iqlab>قِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٥٢

41:53.text: سَنُرِيهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَفَاقِ وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ حَتَّىٰ يَتَبَيَّنَ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۗ أَوَلَمۡ يَكۡفِ بِرَبِّكَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٥٣

41:54.text: أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى مِرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِكُلِّ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ط</rule>ُۢ ٥٤

42:3.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يُوح<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣

42:4.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٤

42:5.text: تَكَادُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تُ يَتَفَطَّرۡنَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َوۡقِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ لِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٥

42:6.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِوَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٦

42:7.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ وَمَنۡ حَوۡلَهَا وَتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ‌ۚ فَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَفَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>قٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٧

42:8.text: وَلَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَجَعَلَهُمۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فِى رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُونَ مَا لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٨

42:9.text: أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَلِىُّ وَهُوَ يُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٩

42:10.text: وَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفۡتُمۡ فِيهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َحُكۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبِّى عَلَيۡهِ تَوَكَّلۡتُ وَإِلَيۡهِ أُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ١٠

42:11.text: فَاطِرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ جَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>جًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َذۡرَؤُكُمۡ فِيهِ‌ۚ لَيۡسَ كَمِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمِيعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١١

42:12.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَقَالِيدُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُطُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّزۡقَ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢

42:13.text: ۞شَرَعَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ مَا وَصَّىٰ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ وَمَا وَصَّيۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ‌ۖ</rule> أَنۡ أَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ وَلَا تَتَفَرَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهِ‌ۚ كَبُرَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ مَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ١٣

42:14.text: وَمَا تَفَرَّق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمُ بَغۡي<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبَقَتۡ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّقُضِىَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُورِثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ لَفِى شَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>كٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ مُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ١٤

42:15.text: فَلِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقِمۡ كَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُمِرۡتَ‌ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعۡ أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَقُلۡ ءَامَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأُمِرۡتُ لِأَعۡدِلَ بَيۡنَكُمُ‌ۖ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمۡ‌ۖ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُنَا وَلَكُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ‌ۖ لَا حُجَّةَ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمُ‌ۖ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعُ بَيۡنَنَا‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٥

42:16.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓجُّونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتُجِيبَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حُجَّتُهُمۡ دَاحِضَةٌ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ وَعَلَيۡهِمۡ غَضَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٦

42:17.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ‌ۗ وَمَا يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِيكَ لَعَلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ قَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ١٧

42:18.text: يَسۡتَعۡجِلُ بِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِهَا‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُشۡفِقُونَ مِنۡهَا وَيَعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُمَارُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>لِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٨

42:19.text: ٱللَّهُ لَطِي<rule class=iqlab>فُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِعِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَرۡزُقُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زُ ١٩

42:20.text: مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ حَرۡثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ نَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى حَرۡثِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُرِيدُ حَرۡثَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا نُؤۡتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡهَا وَمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢٠

42:21.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> شَرَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ مَا لَمۡ يَأۡذ<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَلَوۡلَا كَلِمَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَصۡلِ لَقُضِىَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢١

42:22.text: تَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِينَ مُشۡفِقِينَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَسَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُوَ وَاقِ<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فِى رَوۡضَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاتِ‌ۖ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٢٢

42:23.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُبَشِّرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عِبَادَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۗ قُل لّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡــَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوَدَّةَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِفۡ حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِيهَا حُسۡنًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٢٣

42:24.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَذِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َشَإِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَخۡتِمۡ عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِكَ‌ۗ وَيَمۡحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلَ وَيُحِقُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٢٤

42:25.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡبَةَ عَنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَعۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَفۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥
