42:46.text: وَمَا كَانَ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضۡلِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لٍ ٤٦

42:47.text: ٱسۡتَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِرَبِّك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ يَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا مَرَدَّ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ مَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّلۡجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>إٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٤٧

42:48.text: فَإِنۡ أَعۡرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظًا‌ۖ إِنۡ عَلَيۡكَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ‌ۗ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَذَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا رَحۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َرِحَ بِهَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُصِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُمۡ سَيِّئَ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ كَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٤٨

42:49.text: لِّلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ يَهَبُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ إِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَهَبُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذُّك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رَ ٤٩

42:50.text: أَوۡ يُزَوِّجُهُمۡ ذُكۡرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ عَقِيمًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٥٠

42:51.text: ۞وَمَا كَانَ لِبَشَرٍ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَلِّمَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَّا وَحۡيًا أَوۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَآىِٕ حِجَابٍ أَوۡ يُرۡسِلَ رَسُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُوحِىَ بِإِذۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِىٌّ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥١

42:52.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَوۡحَيۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ رُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَمۡرِنَا‌ۚ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ وَلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّهۡدِى بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَتَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٥٢

42:53.text: صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>طِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۗ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَصِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٥٣

43:3.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ قُرۡء<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

43:4.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَدَيۡنَا لَعَلِىٌّ حَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤

43:5.text: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

43:6.text: وَكَمۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِ<rule class=ikhafa>ىٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

43:7.text: وَمَا يَأۡتِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّبِىٍّ إِلَّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

43:8.text: فَأَهۡلَكۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَشَدَّ مِنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>شًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَضَىٰ مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

43:9.text: وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلۡتَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ خَلَقَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

43:10.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ مَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ لَكُمۡ فِيهَا سُبُل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

43:11.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى نَزَّلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِقَدَ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َرۡنَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> بَلۡدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>تًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ك</rule>َذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ تُخۡرَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

43:12.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جَ كُلَّهَا وَجَعَلَ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُلۡكِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ مَا تَرۡكَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

43:13.text: لِتَسۡتَوُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>اۡ عَلَىٰ ظُهُورِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تَذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نِعۡمَةَ رَبِّكُمۡ إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَيۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ وَتَقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا وَمَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

43:14.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

43:15.text: وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ عِبَادِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> جُزۡءًا‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ لَكَفُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٥

43:16.text: أَمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذَ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَخۡلُقُ بَنَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَصۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦

43:17.text: وَإِذَا بُشِّرَ أَحَدُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا ضَرَبَ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مَثَل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ظ</rule>َلَّ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُسۡوَد<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ كَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٧

43:18.text: أَوَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُنَشَّؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِلۡيَةِ وَهُوَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخِصَامِ غَيۡرُ مُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ١٨

43:19.text: وَجَعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عِبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ إِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثًا‌ۚ أَشَهِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَلۡقَهُمۡ‌ۚ سَتُكۡتَبُ شَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَتُهُمۡ وَيُسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

43:20.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ ش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ مَا عَبَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍ‌ۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

43:21.text: أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مُسۡتَمۡسِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

43:22.text: بَلۡ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

43:23.text: وَكَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ فِى قَرۡيَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتۡرَفُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

43:24.text: ۞قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَ أَوَلَوۡ جِئۡتُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَهۡدَىٰ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا وَجَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ عَلَيۡهِ ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ‌ۖ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

43:25.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

43:26.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمُ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

43:27.text: إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فَطَرَنِى فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> سَيَهۡد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٧

43:28.text: وَجَعَلَهَا كَلِمَ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َاقِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى عَقِبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

43:29.text: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡتُ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ وَرَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢٩

43:30.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٠

43:31.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣١

43:32.text: أَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُونَ رَحۡمَتَ رَبِّكَ‌ۚ نَحۡنُ قَسَمۡنَا بَيۡنَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّعِيشَتَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۚ وَرَفَعۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ فَوۡقَ بَعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَتَّخِذَ بَعۡضُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُخۡرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَتُ رَبِّكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

43:33.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَ<rule class='idgham_wo_ghunnah'>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّجَعَلۡنَا لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكۡفُرُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِضَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

43:34.text: وَلِبُيُوتِهِمۡ أَ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسُرُرًا عَلَيۡهَا يَتَّكِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

43:35.text: وَزُخۡرُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

43:36.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َعۡشُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> شَيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهُوَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٣٦

43:37.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَيَصُدُّونَهُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

43:38.text: حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَ بَيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكَ بُعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشۡرِقَيۡنِ فَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٣٨

43:39.text: وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ إِ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ذ</rule> ظَّلَمۡتُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ مُشۡتَرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

43:40.text: أَفَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ تُسۡمِعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ أَوۡ تَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُمۡىَ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٤٠

43:41.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَذۡهَبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِكَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

43:42.text: أَوۡ نُرِيَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى وَعَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَدِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

43:43.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡسِكۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُوحِىَ إِلَيۡكَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَلَىٰ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤٣

43:44.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ وَلِقَوۡمِكَ‌ۖ وَسَوۡفَ تُسۡــَٔل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

43:45.text: وَسۡــَٔلۡ مَنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِكَ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّسُلِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجَعَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ ءَالِهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُعۡبَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

43:46.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule>ه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَقَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُولُ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

43:47.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِذَا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا يَضۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

43:48.text: وَمَا نُرِيه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ ءَايَةٍ إِلَّا هِىَ أَكۡبَرُ مِنۡ أُخۡتِهَا‌ۖ وَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

43:49.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاحِرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُ لَنَا رَبَّكَ بِمَا عَهِدَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َنَا لَمُهۡتَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

43:50.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَشَفۡنَا عَنۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ إِذَا هُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٠

43:51.text: وَنَادَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنُ فِى قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ أَلَيۡسَ لِى مُلۡكُ مِصۡرَ وَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> أَفَلَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥١

43:52.text: أَمۡ أَنَاۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى هُوَ مَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَكَادُ يُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٥٢

43:53.text: فَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقِىَ عَلَيۡهِ أَسۡوِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َهَبٍ أَوۡ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَعَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٣

43:54.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَخَفَّ قَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَأَطَاعُوهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٤

43:55.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاسَفُونَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

43:56.text: فَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ سَلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡأَخِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٦

43:57.text: ۞وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ضُرِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ مَثَلاً إِذَا قَوۡمُكَ مِنۡهُ يَصِدّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٧

43:58.text: وَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَأ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهَتُنَا خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ هُوَ‌ۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَل<rule class=iqlab>اَۢ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٌ خَصِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٨

43:59.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دٌ أَنۡعَمۡنَا عَلَيۡهِ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ مَثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّبَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓء<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>لَ ٥٩

43:60.text: وَلَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَجَعَلۡنَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ يَخۡلُف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

43:61.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَعِلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمۡتَرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِهَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبِعُونِ‌ۚ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦١

43:62.text: وَلَا يَصُدَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَكُمۡ عَدُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦٢

43:63.text: وَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عِيسَىٰ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ قَالَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡتُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةِ وَلِأُبَيِّنَ لَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَخۡتَلِفُونَ فِيهِ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٦٣

43:64.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُوهُ‌ۚ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٦٤

43:65.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>خۡتَلَفَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡزَابُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِهِمۡ‌ۖ فَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٦٥

43:66.text: هَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٦

43:67.text: ٱلۡأَخِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=iqlab>ذِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٧

43:68.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِبَادِ لَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٨

43:69.text: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِنَا وَكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦٩

43:70.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَأَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جُكُمۡ تُحۡبَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

43:71.text: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِصِحَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَكۡوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُ وَتَلَذُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡيُنُ‌ۖ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧١

43:72.text: وَتِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٢

43:73.text: لَكُمۡ فِيهَا فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِهَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َثِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٣

43:74.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمِينَ فِى عَذَابِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٤

43:75.text: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَهُمۡ فِيهِ مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِس<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٥

43:76.text: وَمَا ظَلَمۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٦

43:77.text: وَنَادَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِكُ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>ضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَ‌ۖ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِث<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٧

43:78.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جِئۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَكُمۡ لِلۡحَقِّ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٨

43:79.text: أَمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

43:80.text: أَمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَا نَسۡمَعُ سِرَّهُمۡ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َلَىٰ وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ يَكۡتُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٠

43:81.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ لِلرَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَنَاۡ أَوَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨١

43:82.text: سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ رَبِّ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَصِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٢

43:83.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَلۡعَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٣

43:84.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَكِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨٤

43:85.text: وَتَبَارَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عِلۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

45:20.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بَصَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِرُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

45:21.text: أَمۡ حَسِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَرَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّيِّـَٔـاتِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهُمۡ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّحۡيَاهُمۡ وَمَمَاتُهُمۡ‌ۚ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا يَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

45:22.text: وَخَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلِتُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَىٰ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=iqlab>سِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَتۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

45:24.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا هِىَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا يُهۡلِكُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّهۡرُ‌ۚ وَمَا لَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مِنۡ عِلۡمٍ‌ۖ إِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَظُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٤

45:25.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا كَانَ حُجَّتَهُمۡ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

45:26.text: قُلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يُحۡيِيكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُمِيتُكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعُكُمۡ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

45:27.text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡسَرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

45:28.text: وَتَرَىٰ كُلَّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َاثِيَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

45:30.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ فِى رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٣٠

46:3.text: مَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَّا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَأَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّى‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُعۡرِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

46:4.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَرُونِى مَاذَا خَلَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ‌ۖ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ئۡتُونِى بِكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡ أَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ عِلۡمٍ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤

46:5.text: وَمَنۡ أَضَلُّ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَسۡتَجِيبُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ وَهُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ غَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

46:6.text: وَإِذَا حُشِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ أَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِعِبَادَتِهِمۡ كَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

46:7.text: وَإِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُنَا بَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٧

46:8.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُ‌ۖ قُلۡ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَيۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَلَا تَمۡلِكُونَ لِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡــًٔا‌ۖ هُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تُفِيضُونَ فِيهِ‌ۖ كَفَىٰ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> شَهِيد<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِى وَبَيۡنَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَفُورُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٨

46:9.text: قُلۡ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ بِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى مَا يُفۡعَلُ بِى وَلَا بِكُمۡ‌ۖ إِنۡ أَتَّبِعُ إِلَّا مَا يُوحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىَّ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ إِلَّا نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٩

46:10.text: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَكَفَرۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَشَهِدَ شَاهِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَـَٔـامَنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

46:11.text: وَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ كَانَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا سَبَقُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ‌ۚ وَإِذۡ لَمۡ يَهۡتَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَسَيَقُولُونَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِفۡ<rule class=ikhafa>كٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١

46:12.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِمَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّسَانًا عَرَبِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَبُشۡرَىٰ لِلۡمُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢

46:13.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبُّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

46:14.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا جَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=iqlab>ءَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

46:15.text: وَوَصَّيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡهِ إِحۡسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نًا‌ۖ حَمَلَتۡهُ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َوَضَعَتۡهُ كُرۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>هًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َحَمۡلُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَفِصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثُونَ شَهۡرًا‌ۚ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَبَلَغَ أَرۡبَعِينَ سَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ رَبِّ أَوۡزِعۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَشۡكُرَ نِعۡمَتَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡعَمۡتَ عَلَىَّ وَعَلَىٰ و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَىَّ وَأَنۡ أَعۡمَلَ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َرۡضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَأَصۡلِحۡ لِى فِى ذُرِّيَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُ إِلَيۡكَ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٥

46:16.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ نَتَقَبَّلُ عَنۡهُمۡ أَحۡسَنَ مَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَنَتَجَاوَزُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۖ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>قِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

46:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى قَالَ لِو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِدَيۡهِ أُ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَعِدَانِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَنۡ أُخۡرَجَ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرُونُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِى وَهُمَا يَسۡتَغِيثَانِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَيۡلَكَ ءَامِنۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَعۡدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَ<rule class=ikhafa>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَقُولُ مَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِيرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

46:18.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أُمَ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>ِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٨

46:19.text: وَلِكُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَلِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

46:20.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ أَذۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ طَيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِكُمۡ فِى حَيَاتِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمۡتَعۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُونِ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَسۡتَكۡبِرُونَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَبِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَفۡسُق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

46:21.text: ۞وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرۡ أَخَا عَادٍ إِذۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>َرَ قَوۡمَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡقَافِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُذُرُ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَلَّا تَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢١

46:22.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَجِئۡتَنَا لِتَأۡفِكَنَا عَنۡ ءَالِهَتِنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٢

46:23.text: قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَأُبَلِّغُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡتُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

46:24.text: فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا رَأَوۡهُ عَارِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بِلَ أَوۡدِيَتِهِمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا عَارِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّمۡطِرُنَا‌ۚ بَلۡ هُوَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَعۡجَلۡت<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ رِي<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٤

46:25.text: تُدَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِرُ كُلَّ شَىۡ<rule class=iqlab>ءِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِأَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يُرَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَّا مَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنُهُمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٥

46:26.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> مَكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِيم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ فِيهِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَهُمۡ سَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَفۡــِٔدَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُمۡ سَمۡعُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَفۡــِٔدَتُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِذۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>حَدُونَ بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَحَاقَ بِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَسۡتَهۡزِء<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

46:27.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

46:28.text: فَلَوۡلَا نَصَرَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّخَذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ قُرۡبَانًا ءَالِهَ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ ضَلُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُمۡ‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ إِفۡكُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡتَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٨

46:29.text: وَإِذۡ صَرَفۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ نَفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا حَضَرُوهُ قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ِتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا قُضِىَ وَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٩

46:30.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا سَمِعۡنَا كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بًا أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مُوسَىٰ مُصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِ يَهۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَإِلَىٰ طَرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٠

46:31.text: يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَجِيبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> دَاعِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَغۡفِرۡ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُجِرۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣١

46:32.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> دَاعِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلَيۡسَ بِمُعۡجِ<rule class=ikhafa>زٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَيۡسَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٢

46:33.text: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَلَمۡ يَعۡىَ بِخَلۡقِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِرٍ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُحۡــِۧىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَىٰ‌ۚ بَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣٣

46:34.text: وَيَوۡمَ يُعۡرَضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ أَلَيۡسَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّنَا‌ۚ قَالَ فَذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ بِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

46:35.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ كَمَا صَبَرَ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزۡمِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلِ وَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِل لَّهُمۡ‌ۚ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ مَا يُوعَدُونَ لَمۡ يَلۡبَث<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَّا سَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّهَا<rule class=iqlab>رِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>غٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َهَلۡ يُهۡلَكُ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

47:1.text: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ١

47:2.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا نُزِّلَ عَلَىٰ مُحَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقُّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ‌ۙ كَفَّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ وَأَصۡلَحَ بَالَهُمۡ ٢

47:3.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِلَ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقَّ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمۡ‌ۚ كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَضۡرِبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ أَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٣

47:4.text: فَإِذَا لَقِيتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَضَرۡبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّقَابِ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَثۡخَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُوهُمۡ فَشُدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَثَاقَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدُ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا فِد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءً حَتَّىٰ تَضَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرۡبُ أَوۡزَارَهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَلَوۡ يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصَرَ مِنۡهُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَعۡضَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قُتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضِلَّ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٤

47:6.text: وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ عَرَّفَهَا لَهُمۡ ٦

47:7.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَامَكُمۡ ٧

47:8.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَعۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٨

47:9.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَرِهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٩

47:10.text: ۞أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ فَيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ دَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۖ وَلِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ أَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُهَا ١٠

47:11.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَوۡلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ لَا مَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ ١١

47:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَتَمَتَّعُونَ وَيَأۡكُلُونَ كَمَا تَأۡكُلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ مَثۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>وًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ ١٢

47:13.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ هِىَ أَشَدُّ قُوَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَتِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخۡرَجَتۡكَ أَهۡلَكۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فَلَا نَاصِرَ لَهُمۡ ١٣

47:14.text: أَفَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> كَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>ُيِّنَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءُ عَمَلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُم ١٤

47:15.text: مَّثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى وُعِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقُونَ‌ۖ فِيه<rule <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلشَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِبِينَ وَأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule
