class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ ١٥

47:16.text: وَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَمِعُ إِلَيۡكَ حَتَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذَا خَرَجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>ِكَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ مَاذَا قَالَ ءَانِفًا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ طَبَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَهۡو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ ١٦

47:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>هۡتَدَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> زَادَهُمۡ هُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ ١٧

47:18.text: فَهَلۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡتِيَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َغۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَشۡرَاطُهَا‌ۚ فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ لَهُمۡ إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡهُمۡ ذِكۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ ١٨

47:19.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡلَمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِكَ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مُتَقَلَّبَكُمۡ وَمَثۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ ١٩

47:20.text: وَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَتۡ سُورَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلَتۡ سُورَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّحۡكَمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َذُكِرَ فِيهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِتَالُ‌ۙ رَأَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَ إِلَيۡكَ نَظَرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغۡشِىِّ عَلَيۡهِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ‌ۖ فَأَوۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ ٢٠

47:21.text: طَاعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡرُو<rule class=ikhafa>فٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذَا عَزَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ فَلَوۡ صَدَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَكَانَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ ٢١

47:22.text: فَهَلۡ عَسَيۡتُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّيۡتُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُفۡسِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَتُقَطِّع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَرۡحَامَكُمۡ ٢٢

47:23.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ لَعَنَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فَأَصَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهُمۡ وَأَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ ٢٣

47:24.text: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ أَمۡ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبٍ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>فَالُهَآ ٢٤

47:25.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَى‌ۙ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ سَوَّلَ لَهُمۡ وَأَمۡلَىٰ لَهُمۡ ٢٥

47:26.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِلَّذِينَ كَرِهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَا نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَنُطِيعُكُمۡ فِى بَعۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرِ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِسۡرَارَهُمۡ ٢٦

47:27.text: فَكَيۡفَ إِذَا تَوَفَّتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ يَضۡرِبُونَ وُجُوهَهُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَهُمۡ ٢٧

47:28.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡخَطَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَكَرِهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٢٨

47:29.text: أَمۡ حَسِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ فِى قُلُوبِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّرَضٌ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُخۡرِجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَضۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ ٢٩

47:30.text: وَلَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَأَرَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ‌ۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ فِى لَحۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ ٣٠

47:31.text: وَلَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِرِينَ وَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُو<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule></rule> أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ ٣١

47:32.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَش<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ مَا تَبَيَّنَ لَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضُرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َسَيُحۡبِطُ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَهُمۡ ٣٢

47:33.text: ۞يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ وَلَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>طِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ ٣٣

47:34.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ مَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَهُمۡ كُفَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ ٣٤

47:35.text: فَلَا تَهِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلۡمِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ ٣٥

47:36.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا لَعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَهۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>وٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَتَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُؤۡتِكُمۡ أُجُورَكُمۡ وَلَا يَسۡــَٔلۡكُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ ٣٦

47:37.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡــَٔلۡكُمُوهَا فَيُحۡفِكُمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيُخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule> أَضۡغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَكُمۡ ٣٧

47:38.text: هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ؤُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ تُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ لِتُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُ ع<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفُقَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِلۡ قَوۡمًا غَيۡرَكُمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَكُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُم ٣٨

48:1.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا فَتَحۡنَا لَكَ فَتۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبِينًا ١

48:2.text: لِّيَغۡفِرَ لَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَا تَقَدَّمَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِكَ وَمَا تَأَخَّرَ وَيُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ نِعۡمَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَيۡكَ وَيَهۡدِيَكَ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقِيمًا ٢

48:4.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّكِينَةَ فِى قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لِيَزۡدَاد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَ إِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ‌ۗ وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا ٤

48:5.text: لِّيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا وَيُكَفِّرَ عَنۡهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَوۡزًا عَظِيمًا ٥

48:6.text: وَيُعَذِّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظّ<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِينَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ‌ۚ عَلَيۡهِمۡ د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِرَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ‌ۖ وَغَضِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَعَنَهُمۡ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۖ وَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ مَصِيرًا ٦

48:7.text: وَلِلَّهِ جُنُودُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا ٧

48:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ شَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمُبَشِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَذِيرًا ٨

48:9.text: لِّتُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتُعَزِّرُوهُ وَتُوَقِّرُوهُ وَتُسَبِّحُوهُ بُكۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَصِيلاً ٩

48:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يُبَايِعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَوۡقَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ‌ۚ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّكَثَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِمَا عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدَ عَلَيۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَسَيُؤۡتِيهِ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا عَظِيمًا ١٠

48:11.text: سَيَقُولُ لَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخَلَّفُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ شَغَلَتۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُنَا وَأَهۡلُونَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَنَا‌ۚ يَقُولُونَ بِأَلۡسِنَتِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا لَيۡسَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ‌ۚ قُلۡ فَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َمۡلِكُ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡــًٔا إِنۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ ضَرًّا أَوۡ أَرَادَ بِكُمۡ نَفۡع<rule class=iqlab>َۢا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َلۡ كَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَبِيرَۢا ١١

48:12.text: بَلۡ ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِيهِمۡ أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزُيِّنَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فِى قُلُوبِكُمۡ وَظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ ظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّوۡءِ وَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ قَوۡم<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُورًا ١٢

48:13.text: وَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ سَعِيرًا ١٣

48:14.text: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحِيمًا ١٤

48:15.text: سَيَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُخَلَّفُونَ إِذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>َلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمۡ إِلَىٰ مَغَانِمَ لِتَأۡخُذُوهَا ذَرُونَا نَتَّبِعۡكُمۡ‌ۖ يُرِيدُونَ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُبَدِّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ قُل لَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَّبِعُونَا كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ فَسَيَقُولُونَ بَلۡ تَحۡسُدُونَنَا‌ۚ بَلۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلاً ١٥

48:16.text: قُل لِّلۡمُخَلَّفِينَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَابِ سَتُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَىٰ قَوۡمٍ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى بَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَهُمۡ أَوۡ يُسۡلِمُونَ‌ۖ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُؤۡتِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمَا تَوَلَّيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٦

48:17.text: لَّيۡسَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡمَىٰ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعۡرَجِ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرِيضِ حَرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>جٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُطِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡهُ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّ يُعَذِّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>هُ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ١٧

48:18.text: ۞لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ إِذۡ يُبَايِعُونَكَ تَحۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّجَرَةِ فَعَلِمَ مَا فِى قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّكِينَةَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَأَثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُمۡ فَتۡ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِيبًا ١٨

48:19.text: وَمَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡخُذُونَهَا‌ۗ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمًا ١٩

48:20.text: وَعَدَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَغَانِمَ كَثِيرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َأۡخُذُونَهَا فَعَجَّلَ لَكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَكَفَّ أَيۡدِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلِتَكُونَ ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَيَهۡدِيَكُمۡ صِر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسۡتَقِيمًا ٢٠

48:21.text: وَأُخۡرَىٰ لَمۡ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحَاطَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهَا‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدِيرًا ٢١

48:22.text: وَلَوۡ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوَلَّوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يَجِدُونَ وَلِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا نَصِيرًا ٢٢

48:23.text: سُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَتۡ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ وَلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َجِدَ لِسُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِيلاً ٢٣

48:24.text: وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَفَّ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيَكُمۡ عَنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِبَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>نِ مَكَّةَ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِ أَنۡ أَظۡفَرَكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَصِيرًا ٢٤

48:25.text: هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَصَدُّوكُمۡ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ىَ مَعۡكُوفًا أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُغَ مَحِلَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَلَوۡلَا رِجَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنُونَ وَنِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَعۡلَمُوهُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َطَــُٔوهُمۡ فَتُصِيبَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّعَرَّ<rule class=iqlab>ةُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِغَيۡرِ عِلۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ فِى رَحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ لَوۡ تَزَيَّلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَعَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا ٢٥

48:26.text: إِذۡ جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمِيَّةَ حَمِيَّةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِلِيَّةِ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَكِينَتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَأَلۡزَمَهُمۡ كَلِمَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ وَكَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَحَقَّ بِهَا وَأَهۡلَهَا‌ۚ وَكَانَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَلِيمًا ٢٦

48:27.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَدَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ رَسُولَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّءۡيَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ لَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسۡجِدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَرَامَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ءَامِنِينَ مُحَلِّقِينَ رُءُوسَكُمۡ وَمُقَصِّرِينَ لَا تَخَافُونَ‌ۖ فَعَلِمَ مَا لَمۡ تَعۡلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَجَعَلَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَتۡ<rule class=ikhafa>حًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِيبًا ٢٧

49:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ يَرۡتَابُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

49:16.text: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٦

50:2.text: بَلۡ عَجِب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرُونَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا شَىۡءٌ عَج<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٌ ٢

50:5.text: بَلۡ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ج</rule>ٍ ٥

50:14.text: وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيۡكَةِ وَقَوۡمُ تُبَّ<rule class=ikhafa>عٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>لٌّ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٤

50:15.text: أَفَعَيِينَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَلۡقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلِ‌ۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِى لَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَلۡ<rule class=ikhafa>قٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ١٥

50:16.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَنَعۡلَمُ مَا تُوَسۡوِسُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> نَفۡسُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَنَحۡنُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِنۡ حَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ١٦

50:17.text: إِذۡ يَتَلَقَّى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّمَالِ قَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٧

50:18.text: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ١٨

50:19.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتِ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۖ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ مِنۡهُ تَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ١٩

50:20.text: وَنُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٠

50:21.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَهَا س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َشَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢١

50:22.text: لَّقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ فِى غَفۡلَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا فَكَشَفۡنَا عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ غِط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ حَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٢

50:23.text: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَا لَدَىَّ عَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٢٣

50:24.text: أَلۡقِيَا فِى جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٢٤

50:25.text: مَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡخَيۡرِ مُعۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٢٥

50:26.text: ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَ مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ فَأَلۡقِيَاهُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٦

50:27.text: ۞قَالَ قَرِينُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رَبَّنَا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>غَيۡتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>لِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٢٧

50:28.text: قَالَ لَا تَخۡتَصِمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَدَىَّ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قَدَّمۡتُ إِلَيۡك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٨

50:29.text: مَا يُبَدَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلُ لَدَىَّ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ بِظَلَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٢٩

50:30.text: يَوۡمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ هَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡتَلَأۡتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٣٠

50:31.text: وَأُزۡلِفَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةُ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ غَيۡرَ بَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٍ ٣١

50:32.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>ظٍ ٣٢

50:33.text: مَّنۡ خَشِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِقَلۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٣٣

50:34.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُوهَا بِسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٣٤

50:35.text: لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا يَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيۡنَا مَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٣٥

50:36.text: وَكَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡنٍ هُمۡ أَشَدُّ مِنۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>شًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َنَقَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِ هَلۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>صٍ ٣٦

50:37.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فِى ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لَذِكۡرَىٰ لِمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> قَلۡبٌ أَوۡ أَلۡقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّمۡعَ وَهُوَ شَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٣٧

50:38.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا مَسَّنَا م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ُّغ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٣٨

50:39.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ طُلُوعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٣٩

50:40.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤٠

50:41.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَادِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكَا<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٤١

50:42.text: يَوۡمَ يَسۡمَعُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّيۡحَةَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ج</rule>ِ ٤٢

50:43.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَحۡنُ نُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٤٣

50:44.text: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَا<rule class=ikhafa>عًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤٤

50:45.text: نَّحۡنُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ‌ۖ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ عَلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِجَبَّا<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َذَكِّرۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخَافُ وَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤٥

51:1.text: وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>ذّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رِيَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>تِ ذَرۡوًا ١

51:2.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رًا ٢

51:6.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينَ لَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>قِعٌ ٦

51:8.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ لَفِى قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّخۡتَلِفٍ ٨

51:11.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِى غَمۡرَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َاه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

51:12.text: يَسۡــَٔلُونَ أَيَّانَ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ١٢

51:13.text: يَوۡمَ هُمۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ يُفۡتَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

51:14.text: ذُوقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> تَسۡتَعۡجِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

51:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعُي<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ١٥

51:16.text: ءَاخِذِينَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ مُحۡسِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦

51:17.text: كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ مَا يَهۡجَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

51:19.text: وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلسّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِلِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَحۡر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ١٩

51:20.text: وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

51:21.text: وَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۚ أَفَلَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

51:22.text: وَفِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ رِزۡقُكُمۡ وَمَا تُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

51:23.text: فَوَرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نط</rule>ِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

51:24.text: هَلۡ أَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كَ حَدِيثُ ضَيۡفِ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٤

51:25.text: إِذۡ دَخَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ فَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالَ سَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

51:26.text: فَرَاغَ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَهۡلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بِعِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٦

51:27.text: فَقَرَّبَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِمۡ قَالَ أَلَا تَأۡكُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

51:28.text: فَأَوۡجَسَ مِنۡهُمۡ خِيفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَخَفۡ‌ۖ وَبَشَّرُوهُ بِغُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٢٨

51:29.text: فَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِى صَرَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَكَّتۡ وَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَهَا وَقَالَتۡ عَجُوزٌ عَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٩

51:30.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَكِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣٠

51:31.text: ۞قَالَ فَمَا خَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>بُكُمۡ أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُرۡسَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

51:32.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرۡسِلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَىٰ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٢

51:33.text: لِنُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حِجَارَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٣

51:34.text: مُّسَوَّمَةً عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّكَ لِلۡمُسۡرِف<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٤

51:35.text: فَأَخۡرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَا مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ فِيهَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٥

51:36.text: فَمَا وَجَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا فِيهَا غَيۡرَ بَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُسۡلِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

51:37.text: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٣٧

51:38.text: وَفِى مُوسَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ بِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٨

51:39.text: فَتَوَلَّىٰ بِرُكۡنِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَقَالَ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِرٌ أَوۡ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٣٩

51:40.text: فَأَخَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَجُنُودَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَنَبَذۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِ وَهُوَ مُل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٠

51:41.text: وَفِى عَادٍ إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رِّيحَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٤١

51:42.text: مَا تَذَرُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ أَتَتۡ عَلَيۡهِ إِلَّا جَعَلَتۡهُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٤٢

51:43.text: وَفِى ثَمُودَ إِذۡ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَمَتَّعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ ح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٤٣

51:44.text: فَعَتَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِقَةُ وَهُمۡ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

51:45.text: فَمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِيَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َصِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٥

51:46.text: وَقَوۡمَ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

51:47.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ بَنَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا بِأَيۡ<rule class=slnt>يۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَمُوسِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

51:48.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فَرَشۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا فَنِعۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٨

51:49.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلِّ شَىۡءٍ خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٩

51:50.text: فَفِرّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥٠

51:51.text: وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هًا ءَاخَرَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥١

51:52.text: كَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٥٢

51:53.text: أَتَوَاصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َاغ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥٣

51:54.text: فَتَوَلَّ عَنۡهُمۡ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٍ ٥٤

51:55.text: وَذَكِّرۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَىٰ تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٥

51:56.text: وَمَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٦

51:57.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرِيدُ مِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُرِيدُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٧

51:58.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّزَّاقُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُوَّةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ٥٨

51:59.text: فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذَنُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلَ ذَنُوبِ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِهِمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَعۡجِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٥٩

51:60.text: فَوَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٠

52:3.text: فِى رَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣

52:5.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>فِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَرۡف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>عِ ٥

52:7.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>قِعٌ ٧

52:8.text: مَّا لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>َافِعٍ ٨

52:12.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِى خَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َلۡعَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

52:13.text: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ دَعًّا ١٣

52:14.text: هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَا تُكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

52:15.text: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ لَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

52:16.text: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

52:17.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٧

52:18.text: فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِهِينَ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٨

52:19.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَنِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓـ</rule>ـ<rule class=iqlab>ـَٔۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

52:20.text: مُتَّكِــِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّصۡفُوفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َزَوَّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِحُورٍ ع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢٠

52:21.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ أَلۡحَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَتۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَمَلِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرِى<rule class=iqlab>ِٕۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا كَسَبَ رَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢١

52:22.text: وَأَمۡدَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَشۡتَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

52:23.text: يَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>زَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>سًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا لَغۡ<rule class=ikhafa>وٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡث<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٣

52:24.text: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُمۡ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لُؤۡلُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ؤٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّكۡن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٢٤

52:25.text: وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>بَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ضٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٥

52:26.text: قَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا قَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٦

52:27.text: فَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَا عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٢٧

52:28.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوهُ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَرُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٨

52:29.text: فَذَكِّرۡ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا مَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٢٩

52:30.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّتَرَبَّصُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> رَيۡبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣٠

52:31.text: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مَعَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَرَبِّص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣١

52:32.text: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َاغ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

52:33.text: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

52:34.text: فَلۡيَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِحَدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ثٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّثۡلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٤

52:35.text: أَمۡ خُلِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَىۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

52:36.text: أَمۡ خَلَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ‌ۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٦

52:37.text: أَمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمۡ خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصَۣيۡطِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

52:38.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِ‌ۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٨

52:39.text: أَمۡ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ وَلَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

52:40.text: أَمۡ تَسۡــَٔلُهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّغۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّثۡقَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

52:41.text: أَمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

52:42.text: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَكِيد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

52:43.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هٌ غَيۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

52:44.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كِسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ سَاقِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>طًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> سَحَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤٤

52:45.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى فِيهِ يُصۡعَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٥

52:46.text: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِى عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا هُمۡ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

52:47.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

52:48.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَا‌ۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مُ ٤٨

52:49.text: وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٤٩

53:1.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مِ إِذَا هَوَىٰ ١

53:4.text: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا وَحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ىٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوحَىٰ ٤

53:9.text: فَكَانَ قَابَ قَوۡسَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَىٰ ٩

53:10.text: فَأَوۡحَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡحَىٰ ١٠

53:12.text: أَفَتُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُونَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَا يَرَىٰ ١٢

53:14.text: عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ سِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهَىٰ ١٤

53:16.text: إِذۡ يَغۡشَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَةَ مَا يَغۡشَىٰ ١٦

53:18.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَىٰٓ ١٨

53:19.text: أَفَرَءَيۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُزَّىٰ ١٩

53:20.text: وَمَنَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ثَّالِثَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُخۡرَىٰٓ ٢٠

53:21.text: أَلَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذَّكَرُ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ikhafa>نث</rule>َىٰ ٢١

53:22.text: تِلۡكَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِسۡمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ض</rule>ِيزَىٰٓ ٢٢

53:23.text: إِنۡ هِىَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=ikhafa>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َيۡتُمُوه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ وَءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِهَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>ُلۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٍ‌ۚ إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَمَا تَهۡوَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسُ‌ۖ وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰٓ ٢٣

53:24.text: أَمۡ لِلۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مَا تَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ ٢٤

54:1.text: ٱ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَرَبَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّاعَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َقَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرُ ١

54:7.text: خُشَّعًا أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَاثِ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ جَرَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َشِرٌ ٧

54:12.text: وَفَجَّرۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ عُيُو<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡتَقَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> قُدِرَ ١٢

54:13.text: وَحَمَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ عَلَىٰ ذَاتِ أَلۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َدُسُرٍ ١٣

56:61.text: عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّبَدِّلَ أَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَكُمۡ وَنُ<rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ِئَكُمۡ فِى مَا لَا تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦١

56:65.text: لَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ حُطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٥

56:69.text: ءَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡتُمُوهُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُزۡنِ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦٩

56:70.text: لَوۡ نَش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ أُجَا<rule class=ikhafa>جًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَوۡلَا تَشۡكُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٠

56:73.text: نَحۡنُ جَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>و<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧٣

56:74.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمِ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٧٤

56:75.text: ۞فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِمَو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>قِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُج<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مِ ٧٥

56:76.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَقَسَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّوۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧٦

56:79.text: لَّا يَمَسُّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُطَهَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧٩

56:80.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨٠

56:81.text: أَفَبِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيثِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨١

56:84.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ حِينَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٤

56:85.text: وَنَحۡنُ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَبُ إِلَيۡهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨٥

56:91.text: فَسَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٩١
