57:1.text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١

57:2.text: لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ يُحۡى<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُمِيتُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢

57:3.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَوَّلُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَاطِنُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣

57:4.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فِى سِتَّةِ أَيَّا<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَوَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَرۡشِ‌ۚ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا يَخۡرُجُ مِنۡهَا وَمَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِلُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَمَا يَعۡرُجُ فِيهَا‌ۖ وَهُوَ مَعَكُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤

57:5.text: لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلۡكُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ وَإِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٥

57:6.text: يُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارِ وَيُولِجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهَارَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّيۡلِ‌ۚ وَهُوَ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٦

57:7.text: ءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا جَعَلَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡتَخۡلَفِينَ فِيهِ‌ۖ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧

57:8.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ لَا تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُوكُمۡ لِتُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّكُمۡ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَخَذَ مِيثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٨

57:9.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ عَلَىٰ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُخۡرِجَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُمۡ لَرَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٩

57:10.text: وَمَا لَكُمۡ أَلَّا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِلَّهِ مِير<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ثُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۚ لَا يَسۡتَوِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحِ وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلَ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدُ وَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَكُل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَدَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٠

57:11.text: مَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رِضُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَ<rule class=ikhafa>نًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِفَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١

57:12.text: يَوۡمَ تَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ يَسۡعَىٰ نُورُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ُشۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٢

57:13.text: يَوۡمَ يَقُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرُونَا نَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تَبِسۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّورِكُمۡ قِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡتَمِسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نُو<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضُرِبَ بَيۡنَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِسُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَا<rule class=iqlab>بُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َاطِنُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فِيهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَةُ وَظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ِبَلِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ُ ١٣

57:14.text: يُنَادُونَهُمۡ أَلَمۡ نَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعَكُمۡ‌ۖ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ فَتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ وَتَرَبَّصۡتُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ وَغَرَّتۡكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمَانِىُّ حَتَّىٰ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَغَرَّك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٤

57:15.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ لَا يُؤۡخَذُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>يَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> مَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارُ‌ۖ هِىَ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٥

57:16.text: ۞أَلَمۡ يَأۡنِ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َخۡشَعَ قُلُوبُهُمۡ لِذِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَمَا نَزَلَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَلَا يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ فَطَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمَدُ فَقَسَتۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ‌ۖ وَكَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

57:17.text: ٱعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحۡىِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَا‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> بَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

57:18.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصَّدِّقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٨

57:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صِّدِّيقُونَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شُّهَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَبِّهِمۡ لَهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رُهُمۡ وَنُورُهُمۡ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١٩

57:21.text: سَابِق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ مَغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّكُمۡ وَجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةٍ عَرۡضُهَا كَعَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ أُعِدَّتۡ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢١

57:22.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّصِيبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ إِلَّا فِى كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رَأَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢٢

57:23.text: لِّكَيۡلَا تَأۡسَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَا فَاتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَفۡرَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ كُلَّ مُخۡتَا<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َخ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٢٣

57:24.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>خَلُونَ وَيَأۡمُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبُخۡلِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٢٤

57:25.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا رُسُلَنَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا مَعَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِيزَانَ لِيَقُومَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِسۡطِ‌ۖ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيدَ فِيهِ بَأۡ<rule class=ikhafa>سٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِعُ لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ وَلِيَعۡلَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَرُسُلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٌ ٢٥

57:26.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule>َإِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِى ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُبُوَّةَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ‌ۖ فَمِنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّهۡتَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َكَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٦

57:27.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ قَفَّيۡنَا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> ءَاثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرُسُلِنَا وَقَفَّيۡنَا بِعِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ مَرۡيَمَ وَءَاتَيۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيلَ وَجَعَلۡنَا فِى قُلُوبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُوهُ رَأۡفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَحۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َرَهۡبَانِيَّةً <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَدَعُوهَا مَا كَتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ رِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَمَا رَعَوۡهَا حَقَّ رِعَايَتِهَا‌ۖ فَـَٔـاتَيۡنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رَهُمۡ‌ۖ وَكَثِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ فَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

57:28.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَءَامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يُؤۡتِكُمۡ كِفۡلَيۡنِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّحۡمَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ نُو<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َمۡشُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٢٨

57:29.text: لِّئَلَّا يَعۡلَمَ أَهۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ أَلَّا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دِرُونَ عَلَىٰ ش<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۙ وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلَ بِيَدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٢٩

58:1.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> سَمِعَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَوۡلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّتِى تُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِلُكَ فِى زَوۡجِهَا وَتَشۡتَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَسۡمَعُ تَحَاوُرَكُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ سَمِي<rule class=iqlab>عُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١

58:2.text: ٱلَّذِينَ يُظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا هُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ‌ۖ إِنۡ أُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُهُمۡ إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ــٰٓ</rule>ــِٔى وَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَيَقُولُونَ مُ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡلِ وَزُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَعَفُوٌّ غَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٌ ٢

58:3.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِرُونَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَتَحۡرِيرُ رَقَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَم<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓسَّا‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ تُوعَظُونَ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣

58:4.text: فَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَصِيَامُ شَهۡرَيۡنِ مُتَتَابِعَيۡنِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَم<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓسَّا‌ۖ فَم<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَسۡتَطِعۡ فَإِ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>عَامُ سِتِّينَ مِسۡكِي<rule class=ikhafa>نًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ لِتُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ وَتِلۡكَ حُدُودُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَلِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤

58:5.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُبِتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَمَا كُبِتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=iqlab>تِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلِلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٥

58:6.text: يَوۡمَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا عَمِل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ُوٓ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule>‌ۚ</rule> أَحۡصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَنَسُوهُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٦

58:7.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ مَا يَكُونُ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَىٰ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ رَابِعُهُمۡ وَلَا خَمۡسَةٍ إِلَّا هُوَ سَادِسُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَكۡثَرَ إِلَّا هُوَ مَعَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُنَبِّئُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا عَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧

58:8.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ نُهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَىٰ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يَعُودُونَ لِمَا نُهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ وَيَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جَوۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡعُ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ وَإِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُوكَ حَيَّوۡكَ بِمَا لَمۡ يُحَيِّكَ بِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ وَيَقُولُونَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ لَوۡلَا يُعَذِّبُنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا نَقُولُ‌ۚ حَسۡبُهُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ يَصۡلَوۡنَهَا‌ۖ فَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٨

58:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا تَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جَيۡتُمۡ فَلَا تَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِثۡمِ وَ<rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡعُ<rule class='qalaqah'>دۡ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِ وَمَعۡصِيَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولِ وَتَنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبِرِّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>وَىٰ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

58:10.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَىٰ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ لِيَحۡزُنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَلَيۡسَ بِض<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓرِّهِمۡ شَيۡــًٔا إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

58:11.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا قِيلَ لَكُمۡ تَفَسَّحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِسِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡسَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَفۡسَحِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِذَا قِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ُزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>ُزُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَرۡفَعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِلۡمَ دَرَجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١١

58:12.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جَيۡتُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ فَقَدِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ يَدَىۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ صَدَقَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>هَرُ‌ۚ فَإ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ تَجِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢

58:13.text: ءَأَشۡفَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُقَدِّمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَ يَدَىۡ نَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>وَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كُمۡ صَدَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َإِذۡ لَمۡ تَفۡعَلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَءَاتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>زَّكَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

58:14.text: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَوَلَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡمًا غَضِبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّا ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَلَا مِنۡهُمۡ وَيَحۡلِفُونَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبِ وَهُمۡ يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

58:15.text: أَعَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِيدًا‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٥

58:16.text: ٱتَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ جُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ١٦

58:17.text: لَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُغۡنِىَ عَنۡهُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُهُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡــًٔا‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ‌ۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٧

58:18.text: يَوۡمَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َيَحۡلِفُونَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَمَا يَحۡلِفُونَ لَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَيَحۡسَبُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عَلَىٰ شَىۡءٍ‌ۚ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

58:19.text: ٱسۡتَحۡوَذَ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ ذِكۡرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ حِزۡبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ‌ۚ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ حِزۡبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

58:20.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدُّونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَذَلّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٢٠

58:21.text: كَتَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَأَغۡلِبَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَنَاۡ وَرُسُل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَوِىٌّ عَز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>زٌ ٢١

58:22.text: لَّا تَجِدُ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ يُو<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدُّونَ مَنۡ ح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَان<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ءَاب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ أَوۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَهُمۡ أَوۡ إِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ أَوۡ عَشِيرَتَهُمۡ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ كَتَبَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ وَأَيَّدَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُ‌ۖ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلُهُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۚ رَضِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنۡهُمۡ وَرَضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَنۡهُ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ حِزۡبُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ أَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ حِزۡبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٢

59:1.text: سَبَّحَ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١

59:2.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخۡرَجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ لِأَوَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَشۡرِ‌ۚ مَا ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡرُجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَظَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّانِعَتُهُمۡ حُصُونُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَأَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَمۡ يَحۡتَسِبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۖ</rule> وَقَذَفَ فِى قُلُوبِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّعۡبَ‌ۚ يُخۡرِبُونَ بُيُوتَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَيۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَبِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_permissible>ـٰ</rule>رِ ٢

59:3.text: وَلَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َتَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا‌ۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَةِ عَذَابُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>رِ ٣

59:4.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ش<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُش<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤

59:5.text: مَا قَطَعۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّينَةٍ أَوۡ تَرَكۡتُمُوهَا ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِمَةً عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أُصُولِهَا فَبِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَلِيُخۡزِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

59:6.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡهُمۡ فَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡجَفۡتُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا رِكَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُسَلِّطُ رُسُلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَىٰ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٦

59:7.text: مّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرَىٰ فَلِلَّهِ وَلِلرَّسُولِ وَلِذِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡبَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَىٰ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِينِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّبِيلِ كَىۡ لَا يَكُونَ دُولَ<rule class=iqlab>ةَۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَغۡنِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولُ فَخُذُوهُ وَمَا نَهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ عَنۡهُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َهُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ شَدِيدُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِق<rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule><rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٧

59:8.text: لِلۡفُقَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِرِينَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ أُخۡرِجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ وَأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُونَ فَضۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرِضۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

59:9.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ تَبَوَّءُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دَّارَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ يُحِبُّونَ مَنۡ هَاجَرَ إِلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا يَجِدُونَ فِى صُدُورِهِمۡ حَاجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُوتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيُؤۡثِرُونَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِهِمۡ وَلَوۡ كَانَ بِهِمۡ خَصَاصَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

59:10.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُو م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا وَلِإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ سَبَقُونَا بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِيمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ وَلَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡ فِى قُلُوبِنَا غِل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اًّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ رَءُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>فٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٠

59:11.text: ۞أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ نَافَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَقُولُونَ لِإِخۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نِهِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡ أَهۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تُمۡ لَنَخۡرُجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَا نُطِيعُ فِيكُمۡ أَحَدًا أَبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُوتِلۡتُمۡ لَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

59:12.text: لَئِنۡ أُخۡرِجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَخۡرُجُونَ مَعَهُمۡ وَلَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُوتِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>ُرُونَهُمۡ وَلَئ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّصَرُوهُمۡ لَيُوَلُّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَا يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٢

59:13.text: لَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ أَشَدُّ رَهۡبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى صُدُورِه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

59:14.text: لَا يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَكُمۡ جَمِيعًا إِلَّا فِى قُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًى</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّحَصَّنَةٍ أَوۡ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ جُدُ<rule class=iqlab>رِۭ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َأۡسُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>َيۡنَهُمۡ شَدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡسَبُهُمۡ جَمِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُلُوبُهُمۡ شَتَّىٰ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ قَوۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَعۡقِل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٤

59:15.text: كَمَثَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ قَرِي<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َاقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥

59:16.text: كَمَثَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّيۡطَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ إِذۡ قَالَ لِلۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>كۡفُرۡ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا كَفَرَ قَالَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى بَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ِى</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَخَافُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٦

59:17.text: فَكَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَتَهُم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدَيۡنِ فِيهَا‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ جَز<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُ<rule class='slnt'>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٧

59:18.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَلۡتَ<rule class=ikhafa>نظ</rule>ُرۡ نَفۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>سٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا قَدَّمَتۡ لِغَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٨

59:19.text: وَلَا تَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ نَسُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ فَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَهُمۡ‌ۚ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٩

59:20.text: لَا يَسۡتَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ وَأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ‌ۚ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡف<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٠

59:21.text: لَوۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُرۡءَانَ عَلَىٰ جَبَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّرَأَيۡتَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّتَصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَتِلۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِل<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَفَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢١

59:22.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۖ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ‌ۖ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٢

59:23.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُدُّوسُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهَيۡمِنُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَبَّارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُتَكَبِّرُ‌ۚ سُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ عَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

59:24.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِقُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَارِئُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُصَوِّرُ‌ۖ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَسۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُسۡنَىٰ‌ۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢٤

60:1.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَتَّخِذُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَدُوِّى وَعَدُوَّكُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ تُلۡقُونَ إِلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوَدَّةِ وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِمَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ يُخۡرِجُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ وَإِيَّاكُمۡ‌ۙ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ رَبِّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ خَرَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تُمۡ جِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>دًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى سَبِيلِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تِغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَرۡضَاتِى‌ۚ تُسِرُّونَ إِلَيۡه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوَدَّةِ وَأَنَاۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخۡفَيۡتُمۡ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡلَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ضَلَّ سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ١

60:2.text: إ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َثۡقَفُوكُمۡ يَكُونُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَكُمۡ أَعۡد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ءً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>سُط<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ أَيۡدِيَهُمۡ وَأَلۡسِنَتَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُو</rule>ٓءِ وَوَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ تَكۡفُر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

60:3.text: لَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َعَكُمۡ أَرۡحَامُكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُكُمۡ‌ۚ يَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ يَفۡصِلُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٣

60:4.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَتۡ لَكُمۡ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِذۡ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لِقَوۡمِهِمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا بُرَء<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓؤُ<rule class='slnt'>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَمِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَفَرۡنَا بِكُمۡ وَبَدَا بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَكُمُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule>لۡعَد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>وَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَغۡض<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ أَبَدًا حَتَّىٰ تُؤۡمِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَحۡدَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا قَوۡلَ إِ<rule class='qalaqah'>بۡ</rule>ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِيمَ لِأَبِيهِ لَأَسۡتَغۡفِرَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكَ وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡلِكُ لَكَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َىۡءٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبَّنَا عَلَيۡكَ تَوَكَّلۡنَا وَإِلَيۡكَ أَنَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا وَإِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٤

60:5.text: رَبَّنَا لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلۡنَا فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَنَا رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٥

60:6.text: لَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانَ لَكُمۡ فِيهِمۡ أُسۡوَةٌ حَسَنَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يَرۡجُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرَ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَنِىُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٦

60:7.text: ۞عَسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ عَادَيۡت<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّوَدَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قَدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٧

60:9.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا يَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلُوكُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ وَأَخۡرَجُوك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِكُمۡ وَظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِخۡرَاجِكُمۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّوۡهُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَلَّهُمۡ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

60:12.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ يُبَايِعۡنَكَ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يُشۡرِكۡنَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَسۡرِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ وَلَا يَزۡنِينَ وَلَا يَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُلۡنَ أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا يَأۡتِينَ بِبُهۡتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡتَرِينَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأَرۡجُلِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا يَعۡصِينَكَ فِى مَعۡرُو<rule class=ikhafa>فٍ‌ۙ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َبَايِعۡهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٢
