61:4.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحِبُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِلُونَ فِى سَبِيلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> صَف<rule class=ikhafa>ًّا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ُنۡيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّرۡص<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>صٌ ٤

61:5.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِقَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ لِمَ تُؤۡذُونَنِى وَقَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule> تَّعۡلَمُونَ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا زَاغ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَزَاغَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ قُلُوبَهُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

61:6.text: وَإِذۡ قَالَ عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى رَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّصَدِّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَىَّ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةِ وَمُبَشِّر<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِرَسُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِى م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَحۡمَدُ‌ۖ فَلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا سِحۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٦

61:7.text: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>فۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِسۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

61:8.text: يُرِيدُونَ لِيُ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>فِــُٔو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نُورَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِأَفۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>هِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مُتِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ُ نُورِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

61:9.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَرۡسَلَ رَسُولَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡهُدَىٰ وَدِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ لِيُظۡهِرَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دِّينِ كُلِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُشۡرِك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

61:10.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَلۡ أَدُلُّكُمۡ عَلَىٰ تِجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule>ِيك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابٍ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ١٠

61:11.text: تُؤۡمِنُونَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَتُجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدُونَ فِى سَبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ بِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

61:12.text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ ذُنُوبَكُمۡ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡكُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ وَمَسَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِنَ طَيِّبَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٢

61:13.text: وَأُخۡرَىٰ تُحِبُّونَهَا‌ۖ نَصۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَفَتۡ<rule class=ikhafa>حٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ‌ۗ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَشِّرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٣

61:14.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كُون<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َارَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ كَمَا قَالَ عِيسَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نُ مَرۡيَمَ لِلۡحَوَارِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ مَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َار<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ قَالَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَوَارِيُّونَ نَحۡنُ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نص</rule>َارُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۖ فَـَٔـامَنَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِسۡر<rule class='madda_obligatory_mottasel'>ٰ</rule>ٓءِيلَ وَكَفَرَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>ت</rule> طّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِفَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَيَّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ عَدُوِّهِمۡ فَأَصۡبَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٤

62:1.text: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلِكِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقُدُّوسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ١

62:2.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بَعَثَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِيِّـ<rule class=madda_normal>ـۧ</rule>نَ رَسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ يَتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُزَكِّيهِمۡ وَيُعَلِّمُهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِكۡمَةَ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ لَفِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٢

62:3.text: وَءَاخَرِينَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَلۡحَقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِهِمۡ‌ۚ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٣

62:4.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَضۡلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َش<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ ذُو <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٤

62:5.text: مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ حُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّوۡرَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>ةَ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَمۡ يَحۡمِلُوهَا كَمَثَلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِمَارِ يَحۡمِلُ أَسۡفَار<rule class=iqlab>َۢا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِئۡسَ مَثَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥

62:6.text: قُلۡ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هَاد<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ز</rule>َعَمۡتُمۡ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكُمۡ أَوۡلِي<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ لِلَّهِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>د</rule>ُونِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسِ فَتَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

62:7.text: وَلَا يَتَمَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َوۡنَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَبَد<rule class=iqlab>َۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٧

62:8.text: قُلۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى تَفِرُّونَ مِنۡهُ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِيكُمۡ‌ۖ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ تُرَدُّونَ إِلَىٰ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ فَيُنَبِّئُك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

62:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِذَا نُودِىَ لِلصَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجُمُعَةِ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡعَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَىٰ ذِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَذَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيۡعَ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

62:10.text: فَإِذَا قُضِيَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّلَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةُ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>َشِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َضۡلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>ذۡكُرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ كَثِي<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٠

62:11.text: وَإِذَا رَأَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تِجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَةً أَوۡ لَهۡوًا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َضّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَيۡهَا وَتَرَكُوكَ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=ikhafa>مًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُلۡ مَا عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّهۡوِ وَمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تِّجَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَةِ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَيۡرُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>رّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>زِق<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

63:1.text: إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقُونَ قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> نَشۡهَدُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَرَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ لَرَسُولُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ يَشۡهَدُ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ لَكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذِب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١

63:2.text: ٱتَّخَذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَهُمۡ جُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=ikhafa>ةً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َصَدُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َبِيلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ مَا كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢

63:3.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣

63:4.text: ۞وَإِذَا رَأَيۡتَهُمۡ تُعۡجِبُكَ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>سَامُهُمۡ‌ۖ وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َقُولُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تَسۡمَعۡ لِقَوۡلِهِمۡ‌ۖ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ خُشُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َدَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َحۡسَبُونَ كُلَّ صَيۡحَةٍ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَدُوُّ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡذَرۡهُمۡ‌ۚ قَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تَلَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۖ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َىٰ يُؤۡفَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

63:5.text: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ تَعَالَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ رَسُولُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ لَوَّوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رُءُوسَهُمۡ وَرَأَيۡتَهُمۡ يَصُدُّونَ وَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّسۡتَكۡبِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

63:6.text: سَو<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَسۡتَغۡفَرۡتَ لَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تَسۡتَغۡفِرۡ لَهُمۡ ل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َغۡفِرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٦

63:7.text: هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ لَا تُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَىٰ مَنۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َ رَسُولِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ حَتَّىٰ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>َضُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۗ</rule> وَلِلَّهِ خَز<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِنُ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ لَا يَفۡقَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

63:8.text: يَقُولُونَ لَئ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّجَعۡن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَدِينَةِ لَيُخۡرِجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَعَزُّ مِنۡهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَذَلَّ‌ۚ وَلِلَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِزَّةُ وَلِرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٨

63:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تُلۡهِكُمۡ أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُكُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ِكۡرِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َفۡعَلۡ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>سِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٩

63:10.text: وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا رَزَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِىَ أَحَدَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتُ فَيَقُولَ رَبِّ لَوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَخَّرۡتَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرِي<rule class=ikhafa>بٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَصَّدَّقَ وَأَك<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

63:11.text: وَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤَخِّرَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ أَجَلُهَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ خَبِي<rule class=iqlab>رُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِمَا تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١١

64:1.text: يُسَبِّحُ لِلَّهِ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَمَا فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ‌ۖ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ وَلَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَمۡدُ‌ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١

64:2.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَكُمۡ فَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ كَافِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ بَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٢

64:3.text: خَلَقَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَقِّ وَصَوَّرَكُمۡ فَأَحۡسَنَ صُوَرَكُمۡ‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٣

64:4.text: يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِى <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>سَّمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ٤

64:5.text: أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَبَؤُ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُ فَذَاقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهِمۡ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٥

64:6.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ بِأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَت تَّأۡتِيهِمۡ رُسُلُه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فَقَال<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَبَشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َهۡدُونَنَا فَكَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَوَلَّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> وَّ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡنَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَنِىٌّ حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule><rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ٌ ٦

64:7.text: زَعَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَثُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَتُنَبَّؤُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِمَا عَمِلۡتُمۡ‌ۚ وَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٧

64:8.text: فَـَٔـامِنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَرَسُولِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلۡنَا‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ خَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٨

64:9.text: يَوۡمَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>مَعُكُمۡ لِيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَمۡعِ‌ۖ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ يَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>تَّغَابُنِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَعۡمَلۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔـاتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡهُ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَوۡزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٩

64:10.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَكَذَّبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِـَٔـايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارِ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيهَا‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٠

64:11.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَصَابَ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّصِيبَةٍ إِلَّا بِإِذۡنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ يَهۡدِ قَلۡبَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١١

64:12.text: وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّسُولَ‌ۚ فَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>غُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نُ ١٢

64:13.text: ٱللَّهُ ل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَ إِلَّا هُوَ‌ۚ وَعَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٣

64:14.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِكُمۡ عَدُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّكُمۡ فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>حۡذَرُوهُمۡ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعۡفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَصۡفَحُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٤

64:15.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لُكُمۡ وَأَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دُكُمۡ فِتۡنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رٌ عَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٥

64:16.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَطَعۡتُمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَطِيعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسِكُمۡ‌ۗ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوقَ شُحَّ نَفۡسِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُفۡلِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ١٦

64:17.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رِضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُضَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>عِفۡهُ لَكُمۡ وَيَغۡفِرۡ لَكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ شَكُورٌ حَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١٧

64:18.text: عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ١٨

65:1.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ إِذَا طَلَّ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>تُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فَطَلِّقُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِعِدَّتِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَأَحۡصُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعِدَّةَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ رَبَّكُمۡ‌ۖ لَا تُخۡرِجُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ م<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ُيُوتِهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَلَا يَخۡرُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>نَ إِلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِينَ بِفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>حِشَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّبَيِّنَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتِلۡكَ حُدُودُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَعَدَّ حُدُودَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ظَلَمَ نَفۡسَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۚ لَا تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِى لَعَلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُحۡدِثُ بَعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَمۡرًا ١

65:2.text: فَإِذَا بَلَغۡنَ أَجَلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ فَأَمۡسِكُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِمَعۡرُوفٍ أَوۡ فَارِقُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ بِمَعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَشۡهِدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ذَوَىۡ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ وَأَقِيمُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دَةَ لِلَّهِ‌ۚ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكُمۡ يُوعَظُ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> مَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَخِرِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مَخۡرَجًا ٢

65:3.text: وَيَرۡزُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>هُ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَحۡتَسِبُ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَهُوَ حَسۡبُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ‌ۚ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغُ أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۚ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> جَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لِكُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رًا ٣

65:4.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ــٰٓ</rule>ــِٔى يَئِسۡنَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَحِيضِ م<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ِّس<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِكُمۡ إِنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تُمۡ فَعِدَّتُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ثَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَةُ أَشۡهُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ــٰٓ</rule>ــِٔى لَمۡ يَحِضۡنَ‌ۚ وَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَحۡمَالِ أَجَلُهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َضَعۡنَ حَمۡلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنۡ أَمۡرِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> يُسۡرًا ٤

65:5.text: ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ أَمۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَيۡكُمۡ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتَّقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يُكَفِّرۡ عَنۡهُ سَيِّـَٔـاتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَيُعۡظِمۡ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رًا ٥

65:6.text: أَسۡكِنُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِنۡ حَيۡثُ سَكَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دِكُمۡ وَلَا تُض<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓرُّوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِتُضَيِّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ حَمۡ<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ حَتَّىٰ يَضَعۡنَ حَمۡلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۚ فَإِنۡ أَرۡضَعۡنَ لَكُمۡ فَـَٔـاتُوهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أُجُورَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ‌ۖ وَأۡتَمِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَيۡنَك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِمَعۡرُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>فٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َعَاسَرۡتُمۡ فَسَتُرۡضِعُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أُخۡرَىٰ ٦

65:7.text: لِيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> ذُو سَعَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َعَتِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>ُدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَلۡيُ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule> مِ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ‌ۚ لَا يُكَلِّفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> ءَاتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا‌ۚ سَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ بَعۡدَ عُسۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُسۡرًا ٧

65:8.text: وَكَأَيّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َرۡيَةٍ عَتَتۡ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهَا وَرُسُلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَحَاسَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا حِسَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َعَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا عَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّكۡرًا ٨

65:9.text: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا ٩

65:10.text: أَعَدَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُمۡ عَذَا<rule class=ikhafa>بًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َدِي<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَلۡبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ‌ۚ</rule> قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>َلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ إِلَيۡكُمۡ ذِكۡرًا ١٠

65:11.text: رَّسُول<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َتۡلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> عَلَيۡكُمۡ ءَايَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ مُبَيِّنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّيُخۡرِجَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَعَمِلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظُّلُمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُورِ‌ۚ وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُؤۡم<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَيَعۡمَلۡ صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلۡهُ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِدِينَ فِيه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبَ<rule class=ikhafa>دًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحۡسَنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> رِزۡقًا ١١

65:12.text: ٱللَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى خَلَقَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َمِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ مِثۡلَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ يَتَنَزَّلُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَمۡرُ بَيۡنَهُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لِتَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َدِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> أَحَاطَ بِكُلِّ شَىۡءٍ عِلۡمَۢا ١٢

66:1.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَحَلَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكَ‌ۖ تَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغِى مَرۡضَاتَ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِكَ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ غَفُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١

66:2.text: قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> فَرَضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ لَكُمۡ تَحِلَّةَ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِكُمۡ‌ۚ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ‌ۖ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مُ ٢

66:3.text: وَإِذۡ أَسَرَّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ إِلَىٰ بَعۡضِ أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِه<rule class='madda_normal'>ِۦ</rule> حَدِي<rule class=ikhafa>ثًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَبَّأَتۡ بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَأَظۡهَرَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ عَلَيۡهِ عَرَّفَ بَعۡضَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَأَعۡرَضَ ع<rule class=iqlab>َنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َعۡ<rule class=ikhafa>ضٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َلَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا نَبَّأَهَا بِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> قَالَتۡ مَنۡ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َأَكَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا‌ۖ قَالَ نَبَّأَنِىَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَلِيمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٣

66:4.text: إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َتُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ فَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> صَغَتۡ قُلُوبُكُمَا‌ۖ وَإِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َظَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَرَا عَلَيۡهِ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ هُوَ مَوۡلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ وَجِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>رِيلُ وَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ‌ۖ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ بَعۡدَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ ظَه<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤

66:5.text: عَسَىٰ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>َلَّقَكُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دِلَهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جًا خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مُسۡلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّؤۡمِنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تٍ عَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>بِد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َيِّبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>كَارًا ٥

66:6.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نف</rule>ُسَكُمۡ وَأَهۡلِيكُمۡ نَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقُودُهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحِجَارَةُ عَلَيۡهَا مَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةٌ غِلَا<rule class=ikhafa>ظٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>ِدَا<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّا يَعۡصُونَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَمَرَهُمۡ وَيَفۡعَلُونَ مَا يُؤۡمَر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٦

66:7.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَعۡتَذِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ‌ۖ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>زَوۡنَ مَا كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡمَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٧

66:8.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> تُوب<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ تَوۡبَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>َّصُوحًا عَسَىٰ رَبُّكُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَفِّرَ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ سَيِّـَٔـاتِكُمۡ وَيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خِلَكُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َحۡتِهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُ يَوۡمَ لَا يُخۡزِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىَّ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَعَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule>‌ۖ نُورُهُمۡ يَسۡعَىٰ بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَبِأَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِهِمۡ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَتۡمِمۡ لَنَا نُورَنَا وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡفِرۡ لَن<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٨

66:9.text: يَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>أَيُّهَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َبِىُّ جَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِدِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكُفَّارَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِقِينَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>غۡلُظۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡ‌ۚ وَمَأۡوَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>هُمۡ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمُ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٩

66:10.text: ضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>حٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَ لُو<rule class=ikhafa>طٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَتَا تَحۡتَ عَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>دَيۡنِ مِنۡ عِبَادِنَا صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِحَيۡنِ فَخَانَتَاهُمَا فَلَمۡ يُغۡنِيَا عَنۡهُمَا مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ شَيۡـ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ـًٔا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقِيلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َارَ مَعَ <rule class='ham_wasl'>ٱ</rule><rule class='laam_shamsiyah'>ل</rule>دّ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>خِل<rule class='madda_permissible'>ِي</rule>نَ ١٠

66:11.text: وَضَرَبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مَثَل<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نِ لِى عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َكَ بَيۡ<rule class=ikhafa>تًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَنَجِّنِى مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَنَجِّنِى مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ظَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١١

66:12.text: وَمَرۡيَمَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَتَ عِمۡر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>نَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّت<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَحۡصَنَتۡ فَرۡجَهَا فَنَفَخۡنَا فِيهِ م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ُّوحِنَا وَصَدَّقَتۡ بِكَلِمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ رَبِّهَا وَكُتُبِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> وَكَانَتۡ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ١٢

67:1.text: تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رَكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى بِيَدِهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ ش<rule class=ikhafa>َىۡءٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َد<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١

67:2.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَوۡتَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَيَ<rule class=slnt>و</rule><rule class=madda_normal>ٰ</rule>ةَ لِيَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لُوَكُمۡ أَيُّكُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَزِيزُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٢

67:3.text: ٱلَّذِى خَلَقَ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِبَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَرَىٰ فِى خَلۡقِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رَّحۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>َفَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>وُ<rule class=ikhafa>تٍ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرَ هَلۡ تَرَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ُط<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رٍ ٣

67:4.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>رۡجِعِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرَ كَرَّتَيۡنِ يَ<rule class=ikhafa>نق</rule>َلِ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule> إِلَيۡكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡبَصَرُ خَاسِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ئًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهُوَ حَس<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٤

67:5.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> زَيَّ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دُّنۡيَا بِمَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هَا رُجُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>مًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلشَّيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِينِ‌ۖ وَأَعۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>نَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ٥

67:6.text: وَلِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرَبِّهِمۡ عَذَابُ جَهَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َمَ‌ۖ وَبِئۡسَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَص<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ٦

67:7.text: إِذ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِيهَا سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَهَا شَهِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َهِىَ تَف<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ٧

67:8.text: تَكَادُ تَمَيَّزُ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡظِ‌ۖ كُلَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُلۡقِىَ فِيهَا فَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>جٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َأَلَهُمۡ خَزَنَتُه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَلَمۡ يَأۡتِكُمۡ نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ٨

67:9.text: قَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بَلَىٰ قَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَنَا نَذِي<rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َكَذَّ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>نَا وَقُلۡنَا مَا نَزَّلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َىۡءٍ إِنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ إِلَّا فِى ضَلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٍ ٩

67:10.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَوۡ كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا نَسۡمَعُ أَوۡ نَعۡقِلُ مَا كُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٠

67:11.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡتَرَفُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِذَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>ِهِمۡ فَسُحۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>قًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّأَصۡحَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١١

67:12.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبِ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّغۡفِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رٌ ١٢

67:13.text: وَأَسِرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>هَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> عَلِي<rule class=iqlab>مُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِذَاتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رِ ١٣

67:14.text: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>لَّطِيفُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رُ ١٤

67:15.text: هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ ذَلُول<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡشُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> فِى مَنَاكِبِهَا وَكُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>ِّزۡقِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule>‌ۖ وَإِلَيۡهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ُش<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٥

67:16.text: ءَأَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِىَ تَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>رُ ١٦

67:17.text: أَمۡ أَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>َّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ حَاصِ<rule class=ikhafa>بًا‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َسَتَعۡلَمُونَ كَيۡفَ نَذ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٧

67:18.text: وَلَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَذَّبَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِهِمۡ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>رِ ١٨
