68:39.text: أَمۡ لَكُمۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نٌ عَلَيۡنَا بَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِغَةٌ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقِيَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>مَةِ‌ۙ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ لَكُمۡ لَمَا تَحۡكُم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

68:40.text: سَلۡهُمۡ أَيُّه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ زَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٤٠

68:41.text: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِشُرَك<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهِمۡ إِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

68:42.text: يَوۡمَ يُكۡشَفُ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>س</rule>َا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّجُودِ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

68:43.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعَةً أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ‌ۖ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َقَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عَوۡنَ إِلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سُّجُودِ وَهُمۡ سَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

68:44.text: فَذَرۡنِى وَم<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُكَذِّبُ بِهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ذَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَدِيثِ‌ۖ سَنَسۡتَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رِجُه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

68:45.text: وَأُمۡلِى لَهُمۡ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ كَيۡدِى مَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٤٥

68:46.text: أَمۡ تَسۡــَٔلُهُمۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّغۡرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>مٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّثۡقَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٦

68:47.text: أَمۡ عِ<rule class=ikhafa>ند</rule>َهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُب<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٧

68:48.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تَكُ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َصَاحِبِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحُوتِ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ وَهُوَ مَكۡظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤٨

68:49.text: لَّوۡل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ت</rule>َد<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>رَكَهُ<rule class='madda_normal'>ۥ</rule> نِعۡمَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> لَنُبِذَ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءِ وَهُوَ مَذۡم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٤٩

68:50.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>تَبَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُ رَبُّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> فَجَعَلَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لِح<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٠

68:51.text: وَإ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َكَادُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَيُزۡلِقُونَكَ بِأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِهِمۡ لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا سَمِعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>ذِّكۡرَ وَيَقُولُونَ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَمَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>ن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٌ ٥١

68:52.text: وَمَا هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٢

69:3.text: وَم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَ<rule class=madda_normal>ٮٰ</rule>كَ مَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡح<rule class=madda_necessary>َا</rule>ٓقَّةُ ٣

69:4.text: كَذَّبَتۡ ثَمُودُ وَعَا<rule class=iqlab>دُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَارِعَةِ ٤

69:5.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا ثَمُودُ فَأُهۡلِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>طَّاغِيَةِ ٥

69:6.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا عَا<rule class=ikhafa>دٌ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َأُهۡلِكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> بِرِي<rule class=ikhafa>حٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٍ ٦

69:7.text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ لَيَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َثَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُو<rule class=ikhafa>مًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َتَرَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٍ ٧

69:8.text: فَهَلۡ تَرَىٰ لَه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ّ<rule class=iqlab>ِنۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>َاقِيَةٍ ٨

69:9.text: وَج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُؤۡتَفِكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَاطِئَةِ ٩

69:10.text: فَعَصَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّابِيَةً ١٠

69:11.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا طَغَا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ حَمَلۡنَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>كُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجَارِيَةِ ١١

69:12.text: لِنَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَعِيَه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُذُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>نٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>عِيَةٌ ١٢

69:13.text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>صُّورِ نَفۡخَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةٌ ١٣

69:14.text: وَحُمِلَتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ةً</rule> <rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>و</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>حِدَةً ١٤

69:16.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>نش</rule>َقَّتِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ فَهِىَ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َاهِيَةٌ ١٦

69:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَكُ عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَرۡج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِهَا‌ۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>َمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نِيَةٌ ١٧

69:18.text: يَوۡمَئِ<rule class=ikhafa>ذٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ت</rule>ُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule>ُمۡ خَافِيَةٌ ١٨

69:19.text: فَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِيَمِينِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيَقُولُ ه<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓؤُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>رَءُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيَهۡ ١٩

69:20.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى ظَنَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى مُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قٍ حِسَابِيَهۡ ٢٠

69:24.text: كُلُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>شۡرَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> هَنِ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>يٓـ</rule>ـ<rule class=iqlab>ـَٔۢا</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِم<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَيَّامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَالِيَةِ ٢٤

69:25.text: وَأَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا مَنۡ أُوتِىَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> بِشِمَالِه<rule class=madda_normal>ِۦ</rule> فَيَقُولُ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَيۡتَنِى لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِيَهۡ ٢٥

69:32.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ فِى سِلۡسِلَ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َرۡعُهَا سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عُونَ ذِرَا<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>َ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡلُك<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>هُ ٣٢

69:33.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٣٣

69:34.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٣٤

69:35.text: فَلَيۡسَ لَهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمَ هَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هُنَا حَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ٣٥

69:36.text: وَلَا طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِنۡ غِسۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٍ ٣٦

69:37.text: لَّا يَأۡكُلُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>طِــٔ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٧

69:38.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِمَا تُ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٨

69:40.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَقَوۡلُ رَسُو<rule class=ikhafa>لٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٤٠

69:41.text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِ<rule class=ikhafa>رٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تُؤۡمِن<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤١

69:42.text: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِ<rule class=ikhafa>نٍ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َلِيل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا تَذَكَّر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

69:43.text: تَ<rule class=ikhafa>نز</rule>ِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>لَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٣

69:44.text: وَلَوۡ تَقَوَّلَ عَلَيۡنَا بَعۡضَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَقَاو<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>لِ ٤٤

69:46.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ لَقَطَعۡنَا مِنۡهُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٦

69:47.text: فَمَا مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>جِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٧

69:48.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَتَذۡكِرَ<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ةٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>ِّلۡمُتَّق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٨

69:49.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَنَعۡلَمُ أَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>نك</rule><rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّكَذِّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤٩

69:50.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَسۡرَةٌ عَلَى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٥٠

69:51.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> لَحَقُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٥١

69:52.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡمِ رَبِّكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مِ ٥٢

70:1.text: سَأَلَ س<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِ<rule class=iqlab>لُۢ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِعَذَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َاقِعٍ ١

70:2.text: لِّلۡكَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِرِينَ لَيۡسَ لَهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> دَافِعٌ ٢

70:4.text: تَعۡرُجُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَةُ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>رُّوحُ إِلَيۡهِ فِى يَوۡ<rule class=ikhafa>مٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َانَ مِ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>دَارُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> خَمۡسِينَ أَلۡفَ سَنَةٍ ٤

70:5.text: فَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>صۡبِرۡ صَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ج</rule>َمِيلاً ٥

70:8.text: يَوۡمَ تَكُونُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءُ كَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُهۡلِ ٨

70:11.text: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡ‌ۚ يَوَدُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمُ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>رِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِى مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِ<rule class=iqlab>ذِۭ</rule> <rule class=iqlab>ب</rule>ِبَن<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ١١

70:14.text: وَمَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ جَمِي<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ث</rule>ُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُ<rule class=ikhafa>نج</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>هِ ١٤

70:17.text: تَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>عُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مَنۡ أَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>بَرَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ ١٧

70:19.text: ۞إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡإِ<rule class=ikhafa>نس</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ خُلِقَ هَلُوعًا ١٩

70:23.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ د<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٣

70:24.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>قٌّ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّعۡل<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>مٌ ٢٤

70:26.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ يُصَدِّقُونَ بِيَوۡمِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>دّ<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٢٦

70:27.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنۡ عَذَابِ رَبِّه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ِم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ُّشۡفِق<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٧

70:28.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ عَذَابَ رَبِّهِمۡ غَيۡرُ مَأۡم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نٍ ٢٨

70:29.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِفُرُوجِهِمۡ حَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>فِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٢٩

70:30.text: إِلَّا عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَزۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>جِهِمۡ أَوۡ مَا مَلَكَتۡ أَيۡمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نُهُمۡ فَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ غَيۡرُ مَلُوم<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٠

70:31.text: فَمَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَغَىٰ وَر<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ ذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ فَأُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ هُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعَاد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣١

70:32.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ لِأَمَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ وَعَهۡدِهِمۡ ر<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>ع<rule class='madda_permissible'>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٢

70:33.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ ه<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِشَهَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>د<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>تِهِمۡ ق<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓئِم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٣

70:34.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَلَىٰ صَلَاتِهِمۡ يُحَافِظ<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٤

70:35.text: أُ<rule class=slnt>وۡ</rule>لَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ـٰٓ</rule>ئِكَ فِى جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّكۡرَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٥

70:36.text: فَمَالِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِينَ كَفَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> قِبَلَكَ مُهۡطِع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٦

70:37.text: عَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَمِينِ وَعَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شِّمَالِ عِز<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٣٧

70:38.text: أَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>طۡ</rule>مَعُ كُلُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرِى<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ٍٕ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خَلَ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةَ نَع<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٍ ٣٨

70:39.text: كَلّ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ‌ۖ</rule> إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>نَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ه<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َا يَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٣٩

70:40.text: فَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أُ<rule class=qalaqah>قۡ</rule>سِمُ بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَشَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِقِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمَغَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رِبِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َا لَقَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>دِر<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٠

70:41.text: عَلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ن</rule>ُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوق<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نَ ٤١

70:42.text: فَذَرۡهُمۡ يَخُوضُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَيَلۡعَبُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> حَتَّىٰ يُلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يَوۡمَهُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٢

70:43.text: يَوۡمَ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>دَاثِ سِرَا<rule class=ikhafa>عًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ك</rule>َأَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ إِلَىٰ نُصُ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>ُوفِض<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٣

70:44.text: خَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>شِعَةً أَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>صَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رُهُمۡ تَرۡهَقُهُمۡ ذِلَّ<rule class=ikhafa>ةٌ‌ۚ</rule> <rule class='ikhafa'>ذ</rule><rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَوۡمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى كَانُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> يُوعَد<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤٤

71:1.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِه<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِۦٓ</rule> أَنۡ أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نذ</rule>ِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ق</rule>َ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>لِ أ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ي</rule>َأۡتِيَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَل<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مٌ ١

71:2.text: قَالَ يَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>قَوۡمِ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى لَكُمۡ نَذِي<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّب<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نٌ ٢

71:3.text: أَنِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>عۡبُدُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّقُوهُ وَأَطِيع<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نِ ٣

71:4.text: يَغۡفِرۡ لَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>ُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ىٰٓ</rule> أَجَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ُّسَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>ًى‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ أَجَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُ‌ۖ لَوۡ كُ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ تَعۡلَم<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٤

71:5.text: قَالَ رَبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِى لَيۡل<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>اً</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َنَهَارًا ٥

71:6.text: فَلَمۡ يَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُمۡ دُع<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓء<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> إِلَّا فِرَارًا ٦

71:7.text: وَإِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>ُوٓ</rule><rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> أَصَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِعَهُمۡ ف<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡشَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَكۡبَرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتِكۡبَارًا ٧

71:8.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>ِى دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارًا ٨

71:9.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ِىٓ</rule> أَعۡلَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارًا ٩

71:10.text: فَقُلۡتُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> رَبَّكُمۡ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ غَفَّارًا ١٠

71:11.text: يُرۡسِلِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>سَّم<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ عَلَيۡك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>رَارًا ١١

71:12.text: وَيُمۡدِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>ك<rule class=ikhafa_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class='ikhafa_shafawi'>ب</rule>ِأَمۡو<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='idgham_ghunnah'>لٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َبَنِينَ وَيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ جَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>تٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َيَ<rule class=qalaqah>جۡ</rule>عَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>رًا ١٢

71:13.text: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارًا ١٣

71:15.text: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡ<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> كَيۡفَ خَلَقَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ سَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>عَ سَمَ<rule class='madda_normal'>ـٰ</rule>و<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule><rule class='ikhafa'>تٍ</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ط</rule>ِبَاقًا ١٥

71:16.text: وَجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡقَمَرَ فِيهِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ نُو<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>رًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َجَعَلَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule>شَّمۡسَ سِرَاجًا ١٦

71:17.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ أَ<rule class=iqlab>نۢب</rule>َتَك<rule class=idgham_shafawi>ُم</rule> <rule class=idgham_shafawi>م</rule>ِّنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتًا ١٧

71:18.text: ثُ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َ يُعِيدُكُمۡ فِيهَا وَيُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجًا ١٨

71:19.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطًا ١٩

71:20.text: لِّتَسۡلُكُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> مِنۡهَا سُبُل<rule class=ikhafa>اً</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ف</rule>ِجَاجًا ٢٠

71:21.text: قَالَ نُو<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>حٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ر</rule>َّبِّ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِى وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>تَّبَعُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> م<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>َن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّمۡ يَزِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>هُ مَالُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَوَلَدُهُ<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>ۥٓ</rule> إِلَّا خَسَارًا ٢١

71:23.text: وَقَالُو<rule class=slnt>اۡ</rule> لَا تَذَرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ وَد<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ًّا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا سُوَا<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>عًا</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َلَا يَغُوثَ وَيَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرًا ٢٣

107:2.text: فَذ<rule class='madda_normal'>ٰ</rule>لِكَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لَّذِى يَدُعُّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡيَت<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>مَ ٢

107:3.text: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡمِسۡك<rule class=madda_permissible>ِي</rule>نِ ٣

107:5.text: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ عَ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ص</rule>َلَاتِهِمۡ سَاه<rule class=madda_permissible>ُو</rule>نَ ٥

108:3.text: إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡأَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule>تَرُ ٣

109:3.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِدُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٣

109:4.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَنَاۡ عَابِ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>دٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّا عَبَ<rule class=idgham_mutajanisayn>د</rule>تُّمۡ ٤

109:5.text: وَل<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَ<rule class=ikhafa>نت</rule>ُمۡ عَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>بِدُونَ م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَعۡبُ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُ ٥

110:1.text: إِذَا ج<rule class=madda_obligatory_mottasel>َا</rule>ٓءَ نَصۡرُ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡفَتۡحُ ١

110:2.text: وَرَأَيۡتَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َاسَ يَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule>خُلُونَ فِى دِينِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>للَّهِ أَفۡوَاجًا ٢

110:3.text: فَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>سۡتَغۡفِرۡهُ‌ۚ إِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كَانَ تَوَّابَۢا ٣

111:1.text: تَبَّتۡ يَد<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَبِى لَهَ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>بٍ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>و</rule>َتَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َّ ١

111:2.text: م<rule class=madda_obligatory_monfasel>َآ</rule> أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> وَمَا كَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٢

111:3.text: سَيَصۡلَىٰ نَا<rule class=ikhafa>رًا</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ذ</rule>َاتَ لَهَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ٍ ٣

111:4.text: وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>مۡرَأَتُهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> حَ<rule class=ghunnah>مّ</rule>َالَةَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡحَطَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>ِ ٤

111:5.text: فِى جِيدِهَا حَ<rule class=qalaqah>بۡ</rule><rule class=idgham_ghunnah>لٌ</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>ّ<rule class=idgham_ghunnah>ِن</rule> <rule class=idgham_ghunnah>م</rule>َّسَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِۭ ٥

112:3.text: لَمۡ يَلِ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> وَلَمۡ يُولَ<rule class=qalaqah>دۡ</rule> ٣

112:4.text: وَلَمۡ يَك<rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ُن</rule> <rule class=idgham_wo_ghunnah>ل</rule>َّهُ<rule class=madda_normal>ۥ</rule> كُفُوًا أَحَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ُۢ ٤

113:2.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ مَا خَلَ<rule class=qalaqah>ق</rule>َ ٢

113:3.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَ<rule class=qalaqah>ب</rule>َ ٣

113:4.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َفَّ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>ثَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>تِ فِى <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡعُقَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>ِ ٤

113:5.text: وَمِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَ<rule class=qalaqah>د</rule>َ ٥

114:1.text: قُلۡ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ١

114:3.text: إِلَ<rule class=madda_normal>ـٰ</rule>هِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٣

114:4.text: مِ<rule class=ikhafa>ن</rule> <rule class=ikhafa>ش</rule>َرِّ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡوَسۡوَاسِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡخَ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٤

114:5.text: ٱلَّذِى يُوَسۡوِسُ فِى صُدُورِ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٥

114:6.text: مِنَ <rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule>لۡجِ<rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule>َةِ وَ<rule class=ham_wasl>ٱ</rule><rule class=laam_shamsiyah>ل</rule><rule class=ghunnah>نّ</rule><rule class=madda_permissible>َا</rule>سِ ٦
